(It IS IN MANHATTAN!) 10 minutes by train - either 1 or the A train - to the Upper West Side (Manhattan) very easy to get to all other hoods in all boroughs.  I am renting it for any time within a month. So I favor a stay between 7-20 days max at this juncture. During the summer months I am willing to rent for more than one month as I normally travel. But currently (from September to May, I might consider a longer stay occasionally in case I am not in town.  The apartment is IDEAL for 1-3 persons. For example, a couple with 1 kid or a couple and 1 extra friend - whichever adds up to 3 persons all of this can

name: Luxury Designer Downtown Apartment
space: Apartment: My apartment is a gorgeous 1 Bed 1 Bathroom open space with bamboo hardwood floors, floor to ceiling windows, high end security, and washer and dyer in the apartment. Egyptian cotton thread count linens, down comfortable, big windows, and blinds. Bathroom:  Very stylish bathroom space with plenty of towels and clean filtered water throughout the shower and the entire bathroom.

name: LARGE UNIQUE ARTSY BEDROOM W/ PRIVATE BATHROOM
space: AMAZING LOCATION IN CENTER OF THE CITY! This is a co-living space with one other person but due to the layout it is almost like living alone.  There are two floors both with two bedrooms both with private bathrooms and I live in one of them.  All that is shared is the living room and kitchen. TWENTY EIGHTH STREET AND LEXINGTON ONE BLOCK FROM 6 SUBWAY Very quiet Large sunny living room. Full kitchen with stove,burners, microwave, fridge, freezer. All dishes, plates and cooking utensils HIGH SPEED WIRELESS INTERNET Very safe and convenient neighborhood.  Nothing is more than 5 minutes away: 5 Super Markets. 2 Health food stores, 5 gyms, movie theatre, lots of shopping and many fine restaurants, cafes and bars. Also near River Park with trails for bikers and joggers. Can walk to Grand Central, United Natiions, Penn Station, Union Square and East village. Two 24 hour delis on each corner.  Fed ex on block.

name: SUNNY, SPACIOUS APT. in  FT. GREENE

PRIME LOCATION on tree-lined street also within steps of other the Brooklyn Flea, DeKalb Ave. restaurant row, the Saturday farmers' market, BAM Arts Cultural center, Pratt University, the Brooklyn Museum and Brooklyn Botanical Gardens. Living space constitutes the top floor with views to the street and garden below.  All rooms are lined with windows and have the original wooden floors. Ceilings are high, closet space is good, and there's a spacious bathroom with skylight.  Clean sheets/blankets/pillows/towels provided. Perfect for single or couple. Easy access to public transportation at the Dekalb and Atlantic Terminals. One stop from Manhattan on the express; 10 minutes to downtown Manhattan, by cab. The immediate area has several grocery stores, health food and organic options, a drugstore, and many restaurants as well. High-speed Internet with Wi-Fi, and Washer-Dryer in basement.  A

name: Guest Room in Authentic Williamsburg Factory Loft
space: This apartment is a true gem in trendy South Williamsburg. The apartment is a converted warehouse style loft on two levels with high ceilings, exposed brick, an amazing rooftop, washer and dryer in the building, and available street parking. There is free internet, a kitchen at your disposal furnished with plates and basic cooking utensils. Conveniently located close to three trains (JMZ at Hewes/Marcy, L at Lorimer, G to Broadway) you are just two stops (10 minutes train ride) from Manhattan .  The subways run 24 hours making it a safe, easy commute. The neighborhood features many of Brooklyn's hottest bars and cafes making it the perfect location for going out at night. It also offers some of the best brunch in the city as well as many locally-minded restaurants and farmers markets. The Brooklyn Brewery is close by as is the new East River Ferry and McCarren park. The room for rent has a queen sized lofted bed, a wardrobe to hang clothes and a desk if you need to get some work done w

name: HUGE 6 bedroom Landmark house NYC
space: Listed here is an entire  6 bedroom Townhouse  in the heart of the West Village.    This is a converted 1870's schoolhouse   with high ceilings and hardwood floors throughout.  The space  is very big  and its amazing! Each room is very good size with a full or queen bed and is uniquely decorated.  I have traveled all over the world and acquired some very unique pieces in the meantime.   Each floor is spacious with 2 bedrooms and one bathroom  which gives everyone staying here ample privacy.   Along with the bedrooms there are 2 large living areas  a breakfast bar area, and a full kitchen with dining table thats seats 12 people.  The top floor has 15 ft vaulted ceilings and skylights which provide great natural light throughout the day.  You will not find a nicer place in the NY  - let alone the West Village I have hosted Political fundraisers for more than 100 people along with countless dinner parties - its a great place to entertain! I have had a great experience with Airbnb thus far

name: Location wins for East Village Apt
space: Welcome to New York, one of the greatest cities in the world! But with so many unique neighborhoods, which do you choose? Check AirBnb's list of top cities, and right near the top is the East Village, for a good reason: Location. My clean, modern studio apartment is located in the heart of the East Village, just 2 blocks from bustling Union Square. The city's unique restaurants, cafes, and shops are just a short walk out your door, or 7 subway lines are ready to safely and conveniently bring you to any location.  In fact, real estate website "Walk Score" gave my location a *perfect* score of 100 out of 100, with perfect "walkability" ratings in all 6 categories: dining/drinking, groceries, shopping, errands, parks, and culture/entertainment. Not to mention another perfect 100 in "Transit Score," calling it a "rider's paradise" Like most NYC apartments, you will not find a massive dining room with seating for 12. name: 1200 Sq.Ft. Historic Apt. in Harlem
space: This spacious yet cozy apartment belonged to Supreme Court Justice Thurgood Marshall and is located in the heart of Harlem's Historic "SugarHill" district where the black elite stayed during the Harlem Renaissance!  Other famous people who lived in the building include: Babe Ruth, W.E.B. Dubois and William Stanley Braithwaite.  Enjoy the culture and beauty of this neighborhood in my fully furnished, spacious 2 bedroom apartment with views of the Yankee Stadium, City Skyline, Rucker Park, Harlem River, Macombs Dam bridge and the beautiful Jackie Robinson Park from both bedrooms, kitchen and bar!  The building has 2 elevators and a laundry room in the basement.  There is a nighttime doorman and neighbors who keep an eye on the building during the day. name: Prime Chelsea Sublet | Spacious
space: We (Brian & Shonda) currently have a great bedroom available for short term (please inquire about longer term) stays in our 2 bedroom apartment.  Conveniently located on 24th and 7th, this unit is on the ground floor of a walk-up building (In other words No Stairs :-)). Whole Foods on the corner, Trader Joe's a few blocks away, FIT, New School and NYU all within easy access. West Village, Gramercy, Meatpacking District, Madison Square Park, High Line Park, Union Square... pretty much anywhere you want to go all within a matter of minutes. Subway lines around the corner include 1,C,E. A block further you have the F and M trains. Don't waste your money on hotels, stay in the best neighborhood in manhattan!

name: Designer loft in hip Williamsburg
space: Private loft in the heart of Williamsburg. If you know NY than you know it's the coolest place with the best restaurants and bars in the city. Just one subway stop into Manhattan (and I'm just a 2 minute walk from the subway). The loft is right in the middle of it all, but on a quiet side street. In fact the apartment is dead quiet and super serene.  The loft features a semi-separate bedroom with a queen bed. Massive windows, great light and a private 300 sqft outdoor deck. Just got the deck planted with the help of a garden designer, so if you come stay when the weather's warm you'll have your own lush urban oasis for a sunny morning breakfast or a relaxing evening glass of wine. There's central heating and aircon that can be controlled from the apartment. Wifi (no TV though!). Fully equipped kitchen. Hotel style shower head and massive bath tub. Bike you can borrow in the garage underneath my building. Building is modern boutique style elevator building with 13 apartments. The apartm

name: Clean, Attractive Apartment in a GREAT location
space: My apartment is located in Chelsea in an elevator building. It is fully furnished, quiet, comfortable and clean. It comfortably accommodates 2 people. It's very close to 4 different subway lines, the 1, C/E,N/R, and F/M  to take you to the theater district, the financial district, midtown, Central Park, Brooklyn, Queens, Bronx, Harlem, wherever you'd like to go.There is a crosstown bus nearby to take you East to West or West to East. It's also quite easy to catch a cab here. Chelsea neighborhood boasts wonderful art galleries, Chelsea Piers, The Highline, Fashion Institute, Whitney Museum, Chelsea Market and more...all within walking distance! You're a very short distance, by foot or train, to Washington Square Park, Madison Square Park, the Theater District, Meatpacking District,  Fifth Avenue (Shopping!), Macys Department Store, The Empire State Building and Union Square. name: Amazing West Village 2br
space: The apartment is a 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom apartment on the 6th floor of an elevator building with large south-facing windows providing a nice view and great light. The master bedroom has a king bed with a very comfortable organic latex mattress, and the 2nd bedroom has a crib and a twin bed with an organic latex mattress. This apartment is perfect for a couple with 1-2 children. There's a dishwasher, microwave, fully appointed cooking kitchen, A/C, wifi, apple TV (HBO, netflix, hulu, etc), amazing sound system, blackout shades in the bedrooms, and a standing desk. There's a highchair, crib, plenty of toys and the apartment has been professionally baby-proofed. There's even a fancy water filter on the kitchen sink and on the showerhead, there are HEPA air filters in every room, there's a squatty potty, and there's a Japanese Toto toilet bidet, in case that's your thing :).

name: Authentic NY Charming Artist Loft
space: 1400 sf artist's loft. 5 windows with Southern exposure, sunny, high ceilings, wood floors, internet, close to subway, cafes in great neighborhood.  There's a common roof with spectacular views. It's a good place to watch the sunset with a glass of wine.  My space is on the top floor of a loft building. It's funky and charming and has a lot of character. It's quiet too. It's unique! This is an authentic artist loft. Two separate sleeping rooms: one enclosed, the other  closed with a curtain.  Double beds accommodates one  to four people.  Greenpoint has become a very hip neighborhood, with cafes, restaurants, and a gourmet organic grocery but quieter than Williamsburg. The subway (G Train) is 2 blocks away and buses a half a block. There's also the ferry for a quick ride to Manhattan. There's a freight elevator for heavy bags, but not for everyday use. Please let me know about you and the reason for your trip. The price is based on two guests. My loft accommodates 4 people. Extra charg

name: Beautiful Bedroom with Private Bathroom
space: Cozy bedroom in a 100 year old Brownstone located in the heart of Historic Harlem on a tree lined block.  When the season/weather permits, relax in our backyard garden, ideal for cook outs, reading, meditation, or just taking it easy.

name: Beautiful Private Bedroom - Downstairs
space: Cozy bedroom in a 100 year old brownstone located in the heart of Historic Harlem on a tree lined block close to Central Park.  The room is across from the kitchen and bathroom and has one real bed, one futon couch, and one pull out couch with a very cozy twin sized memory foam mattress. Relax in our backyard garden, ideal for reading and meditation.  Accessible to bus and train lines, restaurants, movie theatres and shopping. 15 minutes to downtown Time Square.  Quiet house with very pleasant family oriented people.  We welcome you to share our home and enjoy the convenience of the city with a personal touch.

name: QT STUDIO FOR ROMANTIC COUPLES
space: Hello.  I had a bit of trouble with airbnb and my last guest, hence why I had to cancel my last two bookings.   This lovely light filled studio apartment is located on the best block in Chinatown / LES.  It is where you will want to be on your next trip to the city.  The apartment, with one large bathroom, full kitchen with a simple and minimal style, accommodates 2 people.  It has good heating in winter and great air con in summer.  You have the option of having the fridge well stocked (extra fee) with supplies to make your arrival comfortable and easy.  You won't need too much, you'll be out and about in New York all day and night! Please note the reviews below are for a room I used to rent in a loft.  I moved into this studio in May 2011 - I assure you its a whole apartment.  There are wonderful restaurants, coffee shops, stores, galleries and music venues at your doorstep.  I leave you with  great list of places to eat, have the best coffee in NY (thats my thing) and where you can

name: Priv Rm & Bath, in Lg, Sunny Bklyn Twn Hse
space: Amazing space and light!  This is an exceptional space for NYC---bright, sun-filled, open, tastefully appointed, on tree lined street in historic district, with original art. Was almost featured on a TV program on renovation and design! Voted on one of NY's best city neighborhoods by Time Out NY! And just a three minute walk to the express A train line at Utica stop. Features: *Large, newly renovated room (w/ full size antique brass bed, mission oak rocking chair, dresser, table, book case)- w large closet and sunny (two large windows)! Room is dedicated to AirB&B. Hotel standard. *Own, private bathroom, newly renovated w/ large shower and stone tiles directly across from your room *Landscaped back deck and garden (shared) *All, new GREEN renovation-- voc-free paint, w/ re-finished wood floors---lots of historic and designer details! *high speed wi-fi *Great restaurants, wine bars and cafes all within a few minutes walk,  including Saraghina- voted one of the top pizzas in all of NYC b

name: Cozy & Charming Boerum Hill Flat
space: Hi Guys, I'm in Boerum, Hill, or Gowanus, which is the new 'cool' neighbourhood. Meaning, a bit run down with edgy art stuff popping up everywhere. The block I'm on is not a nice one, but It's a few minutes walk from lots of nice ones - including Smith St, which everyone knows about and is filled with restaurants, cafes's shops and bars. The stairs in my building are not pretty, but my apartment is. It's a cute one bedroom, the bedroom is pretty small, and it's 5 mins from the lively Smith St where you spend 10 mins on the train to Manhattan. Close to practically all subways in NYC - (123, 456, ABC, QR, F, G )  between 5 - 10 mins walk to all of these.)  A cheap and comfortable option for a convenient and fun stay in NYC. I'm a great host!! I'm friendly and will want you to be comfortable. Ciao chickens.

name: Park Slope Brooklyn!  Sunny Bedroom.
space: OUR PLACE: "The Best Kept Secret in Park Slope!" writes a recent guest.  Ideally situated on First St, in the heart of trendy Park Slope close to 5th Avenue, we offer a freshly painted sunny bedroom on the top floor of our 1888 one family brownstone.  The light filled room overlooks a quiet tree lined street.  Guests have their own entrance to the house ÛÏup the stoopÛ (at the second floor level).  Although the third floor guests rooms are separated from the family space, there is no division from our family home.  Please be aware that we have a steep but carpeted staircase with a solid bannister to the top floor. There is a spacious bathroom with an extra wide mirror and double hand basins, hair dryer and radio. A separate toilet room with small hand basin.  Both are private for guest use only.   We supply fresh linens and towels, shampoo and soap. Washer / dryer near the bathroom is available for a reasonable charge, including detergent.  The bedroom sleeps two and has the original sh

name: One bedroom sharing Bathroom
space: 28 minutes from NYC. 8 Minutes from JFK International Airport, one block from the A train, supermarkets and stores. Great newly renovated Large Studio Room, sharing Kitchen and bathroom for shorterrm rent in Brooklyn contact us (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)  The room, a short-term sublet (2-6 months) on first floor, its about 500 sqf,  very large and comfortable studio size room. it has great lighting and plenty of sunshine, it  has two very large windows. The room offers full use of the kitchen and bathroom. The neighborhood is safe and very quiet. Close to the A train at Grant St or 80 Hudson, (3 min walk) about a 15 minute walk to J train. Bus Q8 n Q7 About us: We're a couple in our 30s, we are looking to share our home with someone who is  sanitary and clean. We have a two cats. About you: We're looking for someone who is clean, respectful, queer friendly, okay living with cats with no pets of their own, with a full time career, capable of paying rent and bills on time is a must,

name: Spacious East Village Apartment
space: Quiet two-bedroom East Village apartment on 7th St. Between Avenues B and C. Half a block from Tompkins Square Park. 6th floor of a 6 floor walk-up. Renovated bathroom and kitchen. Tons of light.

name: Huge Williamsburg Loft..Perfect for Big Groups!
space: This apartment is a true gem in the trendy South Williamsburg. The apartment is a converted warehouse style loft on two levels with high ceilings, exposed brick, an amazing rooftop, washer and dryer in the building, and available street parking. There is free internet and an entire kitchen at your disposal that is furnished with plates and basic cooking utensils. The apartment is conveniently located close to three trains (JMZ at Hewes/Marcy, L at Lorimer, G to Broadway) and you are just two stops (10 minutes train ride) from Manhattan .  The subways run 24 hours making it a safe and easy commute. Here's what's included in your stay:  -Wifi  -Fresh sheets  -Fresh towels  -Assorted teas  -An on call tour guide aka me! Please stay in touch with me as much as you like and I can give you recommendations about where to eat and what to do around the city!

name: True 2 Bed/2 Bath in Chelsea
space: This is a large, modern TRUE 2 bedroom and 2 full bathroom apartment in a doorman building in the heart of Chelsea. Each of the bedrooms have queen size beds and their own bathrooms - perfect for 2 couples!  The apartment faces the inner courtyard, making it very bright and quiet, a nice retreat after exploring the city! The living room and kitchen are open concept, with a room on either side, making it the perfect apartment to enjoy NY with friends, but also have your own privacy! The kitchen is equipped with everything you'd need to cook up a storm while in NY. Maybe you stop by the Chelsea Market, which is only a few blocks away or hit the gourmet grocery store, Foragers on 8th Ave - you'll have everything you need to cook up a masterful meal at home (that is, if you're not going out to try one of NYC's many amazing restaurants)! The apartment is steps to 4 great grocery stores: Gristedes, Whole foods, Trader Joe's, and Foragers (totally organic) as well as countless delicious resta

name: Beautiful LARGE W Vlge Studio
space: Hi! This is an amazing 500 sq foot studio in the heart of the best neighborhood in NYC.  Amenities are all brand new as I recently furnished the entire apt myself. The floors are beautiful hardwood, and they were redone before I moved in.  The living room is fully equipped; 3 seater reclining couch, wireless internet, MASSIVE 55" Samsung flat screen HDTV with full cable with DVR/HBO, electronic fireplace entertainment unit, wireless receiver that is Airplay compatible and wired to a Dolby 5.1 system, and a small table with 2 chairs Sleeping area is quite large with a queen size bed (brand new), 800 thread count linens from Macy's hotel collection, and a separate TV for bedtime watching.  The kitchen is recently rennovated with dishwasher, stove, microwave, full size frige, and a small set of plates, wine glasses, and cups.  I do not have a lot of cookware, so if you plan on making dinner a lot, that may be an issue.   Bathroom is large with plenty of room and significant closet space o

name: Hells Kitchen Ground Fl 1-bedroom
space: I'm looking into renting my 1br Apt.  I will be going away for business and what better chance for someone to enjoy this brand new apt in Midtown west (two blocks from Time Square, one block away from subway). Located on 44st and 9th Ave with easy access to Bars, Restaurants, Shopping, Broadway Plays etc.  Very friendly and quiet neighborhood,  All appliances are NEW in the Apt: stove, refrigerator, Microwave.  FULLY FURNISHED  It comes with a 42inch HD Sony Television  HD Channels High Speed Internet  Surround sound system  Couch  Dinning table  NO PETS!!!

name: Pre War Park Slope on Prospect Park
space: Amazingly homie, three-bedroom 2nd floor apartment in gorgeous Park Slope Brooklyn. Features a fantastic layout & pre-war detail & vibe. Perfectly nestled right next to (gorgeous/safe/pristine) Prospect Park ~ 585 acres of diligently planned wilderness // The bedroom offered is the master; located right off of the kitchen, on the opposite wing of the house than the other two bedrooms. It over-looks a pretty tree-lined street and is decorated with Victorian antiques as well as kitschy toys, trinkets, books, zines, and vinyl records. A queen-size grand four-poster bed holds a top-of the-line Tempur Pedic mattress that will have you sleeping like a baby. The room also boasts a nightstand, desk and sitting area... as well as a ceiling fan, AC unit &  land-line telephone. The apartment in its entirety features a long hall, bathroom (with tub), kitchen, and parlor.  There is a small courtyard and laundry facility connected to the building.  The neighborhood is beautiful, clean, peaceful, saf

name: Charming Apt in the Best Location!
space: Very charming, sunny, cozy, and clean 1 bedroom apartment, great for 1-2 people. Renovated with exposed brick, very high ceilings, oversized windows, decorative fireplace with marble mantle, flat screen TV with cable and wireless internet, king size bed, fully equipped kitchen with granite countertops, marble shower with tub, towels and linens provided. Only 1 flight up in a walk up building. Very safe neighborhood. Steps from the best restaurants, cafes, shopping and parks. Plus, all major trains are only 1 block away.

name: Lofted Bedroom in our Bright, Airy Apartment!
space: We built out this epic sunny loft in the epicenter of artsy bushwick. The space boasts a huge wall of windows with tons of plant-life overlooking a lovely park. We poured our hearts into building this space and can't wait to share it with you. This is a unique opportunity to live in a converted industrial building with fun brooklyn artists.  The loft has clean hardwood floors, and enormous 13' ceilings.

name: Huge room with private balcony
space: A spacious room with queen size bed and private balcony is available in East Village. The apt includes a tv, internet, sound system and a fully equipped kitchen. The apt itself is a 4 bedrooms, very nicely composed and spacious. By the way during the Superbowl, more rooms are available upon request. Its location is ideal for anyone visiting New York. Close to Union Square with all the major Subways, and just over Astor place and St Marks, for the best bars and restaurants. Feel free to email me for any questions!

name: Great spacious room by the L train!
space: Hey folks! I'm the curious traveler. Meanwhile, if you travel to NY or or need to spend some time here, stay at mine!! You won't regret it! My place is in Bushwick- Brooklyn, which they say is one of the most "up&coming" neighborhoods in the city. It's a nice, cozy and clean apartment and you will have your own room. 2 (website hidden), for the other 2 bedrooms of the apartment. both lovely! The room has one full bed, a desk, closet and it's ready for you! Although I tend to never leave Brooklyn, because I really love it, the apartment is not too far from the city. Once you hopped on the train (4 blocks away) you get to Union Square in just about 17 min. Laundromat, Supermarket 1 1/2 blocks away. Ask me more, it's been my homie for more than 3 years, I can provide you with any kind of details:) cheers xx

name: Child-friendly 2 bedroom on UWS
space: Furnished two bedroom apartment on the Upper West Side. One bedroom has a queen bed and  the second bedroom is a children's room with two twin beds. A Baby Bjorn travel crib is available upon request. We also have a queen air mattress. However, we will only rent to a maximum of 3 adults or two adults and one or two children.   The apartment is located in a small building on West 101st Street. It is a few blocks from Central Park, Riverside Park and a 10 minute walk to Columbia University. It is 5 blocks from the 96th Street Express 2/3 subway stop. It is in a walk-up building on the 2nd floor (one flight up).  Clean sheets and towels will be provided. Kitchen is well stocked for cooking at home. Wireless internet is included as well as Apple TV. No smoking. A security deposit of $300 will be held and returned assuming no major damage to the apartment.

name: Charming Brooklyn Studio
space: Welcome to my studio apartment in Crown Heights, Brooklyn!  This apartment is in the lower level of my house, and is separate from the rest of the house - so you will have the space to yourself and complete privacy.  It has a sunny southern exposure; bamboo floors; a kitchenette with an induction stove, microwave, coffee maker, toaster, dishes and pots/pans; a full bathroom with a bathtub, hair dryer and extra towels; cable TV and wifi access; and a portable air conditioner.  The sofa bed unfolds into a real, queen-sized bed, which has a spring-free design and a Tempurpedic mattress that will give you a great night's sleep. Crown Heights is a lovely, diverse neighborhood that is getting increasing attention for its convenience and amenities - especially the growing number of restaurants on Franklin Avenue - and I live on a street of townhouses and small apartment buildings.  The apartment is walking distance from the Brooklyn Museum, Brooklyn Botanic Garden, the Berg'n Beer Hall, food

name: Private Room in Brownstone
space: Private room on third floor with shared bath; wifi; desk. At Morningside Park, walk to Columbia University; near subway & buses; Harlem. No smoking; no cooking. Hosted many young people.

name: Big Sunny Loft for FAM or FRIENDS
space: Perfect for a family or friends! The loft is 900 sq. feet in all renovated building with a huge combined backyard. It is a  green oasis in a vibrant multicultural neighborhood. We love it here and we hope you do too!  4 large windows (2 of them double-wide). Really spacious with 12.5 foot ceilings.  One bedroom with a king-size bed and an extra  queen-size sleeping loft. A pullout double bed in the living area. A child's pack-n-play crib -- in total you can easily sleep 6 adults and 2 kids.  Or other combinations.  But it's also really lovely to have it just for yourselves if you're a couple. --50" HD TV and DVD player and an HD movie projector with hi fidelity sound --Large office area with printer, turbo speed Internet.  --Laundry room FAMILY WITH KIDS - EXTRAS: We have a very young kid, so we have a pack-n-play crib, plenty of toys, infant swing. Plus a stroller, a child booster seat, extra travel high chair (clips on to table), a toy train set, etc.  We are 5 min from the A and C t

name: Lovely Hell's Kitchen Studio...
space: My adorable 400 square foot studio apartment is available while I am away.  You will have the entire apartment to yourself for the duration of your stay!   The apartment is very pretty - beautiful decor and very feminine and whimsical.  The building is great: quiet, neighbors are friendly.  Every kind of comfort you could wish for is within a couple blocks.   The building is in the heart of Hell's Kitchen, just a couple blocks west of Times Square - but removed from all of the crowds.  (The neighborhood is also referred to as 'Midtown West', 'Clinton', and/or the 'Theatre District'. )  Every Broadway theatre is within easy walking distance, as well as Times Square, Radio City Music Hall, Rockefeller Center, every major subway line, Port Authority, Penn Station, Restaurant Row, The Javitts Center, and plenty of amazing restaurants- specific recommendations by request! GREAT LOCATION!!!!  Wifi and utilities included, A/C in the summer months (unit gets removed fall-spring), queen-sized b

name: Cozy, Clean Cobble Hill Brownstone
space: This beautiful and spacious Garden apartment takes up an entire floor of our 1880s brownstone.  It has its own backyard which is great for summertime bbqing.  The backyard/garden is shared with me and my family - if you plan to have an event in the backyard please contact me ahead of time to coordinate. Our building is only two to three stops from Manhattan via the 4, 5, and F trains, and a couple of stops from Williamsburg, Brooklyn. Compare this to other Brooklyn apartments that are half an hour or more from Manhattan.  We are also only steps away from Pier 6 where you can hop on a water taxi into the city or Governor's Island, play some beach volleyball or walk down the promenade. Easy access to Grocery stores for food shopping and other daily amenities as well. Cobble Hill is a great neighborhood bordering Brooklyn Heights and Carroll Gardens - all of which are filled with quaint and award winning restaurants (Sushi, Thai, Irish pubs, Americana you name it), shops, French cafes and

name: Spacious Wburg Apt with Skylight
space: This apartment is located just 2.5 blocks from the L train in Williamsburg, right behind my Vintage Clothing/Record Store, and next to many great bars, restaurants, and a short walk from the Morgantown arts scene.  Located just a few blocks from the G train and J/Z trains also, it is easy to get to different parts of Manhattan in 10 minutes by subway (Union Square, Lower East Side). The apartment consists of: A 400 sq ft apt with a separate bedroom with a closet and  1 double bed, a comfortable couch.  It has 10.5 foot ceilings, and a skylight. Includes full kitchen with appliances and all dishware and cookware you could need. Tiled bathroom with bathtub and shower. AII sheets, bIankets, and toweIs are provided. Personal keys so you may come and go as you please and the building has extra security system and cameras installed. (No cameras in the private hallway beyond the foyer or the apartment) The room has a skylight in the living room, and 3 interior windows onto a common hallway.

name: Kid friendly apmt! Central Park
space: Welcome to new york city, manhattan ! Very nice apartment close to Central Park.  Nice decoration with many paintings, old French clock, books.. Apmt surrounded by all famous supermarkets (Trader joe, fair way, Zabars) Come here to live a dream Appartement all furnished and very close to Central Park (one block away) in New York city, manhattan. Located at 73st and Columbus avenue, close to all famous subway lines (1,2,3,B,C). - I high ceiling living room: sofa, theater seats, chairs,  - One bedroom: include a bed for two persons and a little bed for a baby. - One mezzanine (loft) with a bed for two persons (low ceiling). - One balcony - Separate bathroom, restroom - furnished kitchen - Internet - Very bright appartment - Decoration is very nice (many paintings, music intruments, pictures, books). - Baby stuff ( bed , baby cook, bouncer...) AC in the living room, fans in the rooms Internet wifi in the apartment. Private Balcony I will communicate by email or phone with guests. Upper We

name: Big, Sunny, Modern Apartment w/VIEW
space: Modern apartment in the heart of trendy Williamsburg. Great location, amazing view and private, safe accommodation in one of the most popular neighborhoods in Brooklyn. 1 bedroom/1bathroom, free wifi, utilities included, Queen bed and large couch (for a third person), modern kitchen, washer/dryer, balcony and view of Williamsburg Bridge. 55" Flatscreen TV. The building has a digital doorman and is very safe. 5th Floor with Elevator. 10 minute walk to L, J, M and Z train South 3rd at Berry ((website hidden) map) ((website hidden) map)

name: Cozy, beautiful doormen studio-
space: Comfortable studio apartment in the heart of ft greene with secured entry and gym. Doorman building, very safe Fort Greene/Downtown Brooklyn. literally steps from Fort Greene Park, BAM, Brooklyn Flea, and Atlantic Terminal, as well as tons of restaurants and bars. 2 blocks from every train (2/3/4/5/Q/R/D/B/G/C) and just ten minutes to Manhattan by subway. The location could not be more convenient for travelers who want to experience Brooklyn but still have easy access to the city. Like other internationally celebrated areas such as Notting Hill in London and Le Marais in Paris, Brooklyn's Fort Greene has all the elements in place to emerge as one of the better big-city neighborhoods on the planet. With services, culture and people who care more about how they live than how they look, the neighborhood has put cool aside and in the process built a community where everyone and anyone feels at home. In all my days and nights of walking neighborhoods and asking people why they live where th

name: Carroll Gardens Gem-2BD with Garden
space: Situated on a quiet, landmarked street with gardens fronting all homes, this 2 bedroom apartment has a private entrance. Fully renovated space with new kitchen, marble tiled bath, radiant heat wood floors and ample closet space. Master bedroom with a view of a japanese maple has a king bed. Second bedroom, with a bamboo garden view has a daybed that opens to a king. Comfortable, bright, southern exposure living room with cable tv/wifi and access to outdoor space. Linens and towels are provided and the kitchen is equipped. Carroll Park is a block away. Within a few more blocks are all the conveniences this charming neighborhood has to offer: great restaurants, unique shops, cafes, ice cream parlor, movie theater, farmersÛª market, wine shops, gourmet cheese and pasta stores, italian and french bakeries. The new Brooklyn waterfront park complex is walking distance and great for bikers, runners as well as families with children. As long time residents of this neighborhood we love the ÛÏwalk

name: Hip Whole Apt in Wmsburg, Brooklyn
space: The apartment has a sunlight-flooded bedroom with large closet area. ThereÛªs a comfortable  living room with TV, a desk for your laptop, and a bookshelf filled with art books and novels. The kitchen has everything: full fridge and oven, microwave, plenty of cookware and dishes, and even an espresso machine! The table expands to seat four. The bathroom has a shower, ample storage space, and two windows out onto the backyard.

name: UWS - Perfect location - 2 bedroom
space: 2 bedrooms, one with Queen size bed, the other with Double Loft bed and single bed. Sleeps 5. - Modern apartment recently renovated - All new kitchen appliances with all other kitchen items available for use - Clean modern bathroom - HDTV LCD/internet/wifi/cable/playstation 3 - Perfect location in NYC - less then 5 minutes walk to Central Park/subway (no 1)/Lincoln Center/cinemas - surrounded by cafes/restaurants/shops - safe, family orientated neighbourhood (lower end of the Upper West Side) - close 1/2/3/B/C subways and buses - Linen supplied - 15-20 minute walk to Times Square (or 5 mins by subway) - less than 25 mins by subway to downtown (wall street/statue of liberty/ground zero etc)  - truly a home away from home in the big smoke - cheaper than a hotel but so much better! It's on the corner of 68th & Columbus in the Upper West Side.  Very safe and convenient. Please contact me with any further questions!

name: West Village/Meat Packing Apt.
space: Hi guys, my West Village 4th floor walk up Studio  has a separate kitchen and separate bathroom. The studio is pretty big for West Village standard, and it gets lots of sun light during the day! Its located on Washington St., and W12th St. Its one of the best areas in NYC. Guests who have stayed in my studio, fell in love with the area, and everything that it has to offer (wonderful restaurants, trendy clubs, local bars, designer shops, art galleries...etc...), which is all within walking distance as soon as you walk out of the apartment (no need for cabs, or subways).  Its on the same street as the new Standard Hotel and the new nyc attraction the Highline and the Whitney museum. The studio is ideal for a single person or a couple that are looking to explore the city!  My rates vary, it all depends on the time of the year, and how long of a stay.  Please, email me if you are interested.  Thank You!! Subway Lines are a 5min walk from the studio Soho is about 10min walk from the studio

name: Sun-filled studio close to SOHO
space: Very clean, modern furnishings in the Lower East Side. It's a perfect place to be located, very close to SOHO and the East Village.  The B and D train Subway stop is on the same block, and 6, N, F, M, J, Z stations are just a couple blocks away. I love how I can walk everywhere, very central location. Great shopping, eating, art galleries and nightlife within walking distance.  About my apartment: Very clean (I hate clutter).  iMac Apple Computer 30 inch screen with internet access. Comfortable kitchen with fridge, oven, cups, nice glasses (champagne and wine glasses), plates, cutlery etc. Spacious bathroom with bathtub.  Clean towels and blowdryer. Some closet space available on request. The apartment gets a lot of sunlight, it faces a park on Chrystie st.  It's very cosy, with an accessible fire escape.  It contains one twin size bed and a couch that can be a bed (day bed).  All you could ask for.

name: Cozy Railroad Apt.
space: I am an artist and I live in a 2 bedroom railroad apartment that has been renovated.  The kitchen side is quiet, the street side is lively. It is close to every subway and Chinatown. Perfect for someone visiting New York.  It is very easy to get to, close to the 6, Q, N, B, D trains.

name: Sunny 1BR Center of East Village!
space: I've recently been spending more time in LA and really enjoying it so am planning a test move for 3-6 months to see how it goes whilst keeping hold of my beloved East Village home.  I have tentatively put the start date as 1st March but this could either be earlier or more like the 1st or 2nd week in March, dependent on my travel plans.  If things go well there is also potential to extend far beyond June. The apartment has 1 bedroom, a great living room and large kitchen.

name: 2BR in Cobble Hill, Brooklyn, NY
space: We have a 2 bedroom apartment located at Smith and Baltic Streets. The master bedroom has a queen-sized bed and blackout blinds that ensure hours of great sleep. Our living room converts easily into the 2nd bedroom with a queen sized futon equipped with all necessary bedding and blankets. The kitchen is fully equipped and our table seats 6 comfortably with room for 7-8.

name: Perfect East Village Apartment
space: This is a beautiful newly renovated 1br apartment on the top floor and back side of the building, offering a quiet and secluded escape from the bustling streets of New York City. The windows face out over the roof of a church and onto the city skyline with the Chrysler Building in view and no adjacent apartment windows facing you.   The apartment is located right in the middle of all the best NYC neighborhoods and on one of the best blocks. The central location provides access to Nolita, SOHO, East Village and the Lower East Side all within a couple of blocks.  If you want to go further, then jump on the subway with the F train 1/2 block away and the B/D and 6 trains 3 blocks away. You can get anywhere in the city on these lines, even to JFK, Grand Central Terminal, and Penn Station If you want to stay close then you'll be just as comfortable. Whole Foods is 1/2 block away for all your groceries and on/around the street you have numerous excellent restaurants, coffee/juice shops, and b

name: Decorators 5-Star Flat West Village
space: You are truly taken care of during the whole reservation, from our communications starting now, to a smooth check in process, to a truly comfortable and convenient stay! My little team and I are always available and want to make your stay incredible. * Amazing, amazing location. Perfect spot in this village within the big city. My apartment sits on the border of the West Village and Soho with small streets, pretty parks, easy walking, great shopping and only one block to the subway. * Sunny studio is larger than average, fully furnished with pretty, comfortable decor, and super clean. * King bed sleeps two easily, and a third guest can be accommodated on the very comfy full-size couch. * Bathroom features soaking tub, new tiles in bath and kitchen, and thoughtful decor throughout. * Great water pressure and truly HOT water for a welcome shower after a day in the city. * Also free, private, high-speed Wi-Fi and consistent connection, especially great if you're here for work. * TV is set

name: Beautiful SoHo Luxury Apartment
space: One of the best buildings in the heart of SoHo. Doorman building, huge north facing windows with lots of light, spacious bedroom, bathroom and living room with galley kitchen. Cathedral ceilings, Flat-screen TV with cable, Apple desktop, high speed wifi, B&B Italia and Poltrona Frau furniture, Viking range and Sub-Zero refrigerator. Stylish decor, artwork, hardwood floors, huge shared roofdeck that looks out over all of SoHo. Also, washer and dryer in the apartment and lots of extra towels and sheets. Location is about perfect if you like world-class shopping, people watching, restaurants and bars. Around the corner from the Mercer Hotel and Broadway Ave. shopping. 5 minute walk to the West Village, East Village, NoHo, Tribeca and Lower East Side. B,D,F,M,6,N,R subway lines within 2 blocks. If you get on WalkScore and type in my address, it gets a score of 100/100.  There is a 24 hour doorman/concierge. They are very friendly and knowledgeable. If you are visiting New York for the firs

name: 2 Rooms in Cottage NYC
space: Beautiful spacious cottage in NYC, private near all business, 5 minute to, Central Park,  and midtown Manhattan. Booking must be 2 days before arriving. Private room  with two beds Private room with Queen size bed Many restaurants and shops nearby. 15  minute cab ride from LaGuardia airport. There is also Bus and Subway. This unit has 2 bedrooms, a full kitchen, living room and one bathroom. Bedrooms are downstairs, half basement. Its located in Long Island City, one block from the trains N and Q and three blocks from R and M. Safe and quite neighborhood. Pharmacy, Deli, Supermarket, Liquor Store and many restaurants are two blocks away. Laundry is one small block away. Minimum of two guests and 2 days. Wireless Internet Heating One Queen Bed Double bunked bed One Sofa bed (queen size) Thanks for looking.

name: Loft Like w/Garden- Williamsburg Bedford L Stop
space: After a day of enjoying this crazy city you need a calming place to come home to that is still in the middle of everything. Enjoy our modern, minimalist loft-like home with newly renovated eat in kitchen located in the very happening north side of Williamsburg in Brooklyn. Pick up some croissants and coffee down the street at Beco and enjoy it in the private backyard, or share a glass of wine before headed out for dinner in the neighborhood. This is in North Williamsburge just south of McCarren Park and near the Bedford L stop. Use online maps to see our location on the corner of Union and N11th, zip 11211. 5 minute walk to the L stop at Bedford or Lorimer L stop, and only 10 minutes to Union Square door to door. Very comfy queen sized bed, large eat-in kitchen with window, newly renovated  bathroom & kitchen with stainless steel appliances! We absolutely love it here, we're never leaving except for when guests like you want to visit and we are forced to get away ;) Williamsburg has to

name: Spectacular Bushwick One Bedroom
space: This One Bedroom Condo is right in the heart of Bushwick.  The entire place will be yours.  The unit features a full kitchen with all appliances.  Amenities include Cable TV (with all movie channels), wireless internet, central heat and air, washer and dryer, and a gym inside the building.  The unit is located one block from Maria Hernandez Park and a 5 minute walk to the M and L trains.  The area is the right in the center of the growing Brooklyn artists community.  This condo is just minutes away from nearby restaurants, bars and coffee shops.

name: LUXURY Apartment, Furnished, View!
space: LUXURY APT with EVERYTHING INCLUDED, VIEWS, LUXURY BUILDING, and TOP LOCATION IN MANHATTAN! Your home away from home in NYC! MUCH cheaper than any hotel SUITE, which this space is the equivalent of, in this neighborhood, for this amount of time, and with a VIEW!  The apt, building, and location, is truly TOP notch.  (Wyndham Hotel next door charges starting $585 for a tiny room, no view, no kitchen, no  living room.)  The apartment can sleep 2-3. No smoking or pets, or guests, please.  Email with any questions, or if you would like to see video of this space. DETAILS: Stay in a Luxury Building and Fully furnished Apartment, with a  Piano, Living Room with large screen TV, Views of the Empire State Building, Queen size fold out couch to bed, stereo system, Bedroom with Queen bed, Flat Screen HD TV, DVD player, sound system, home office, LOTS of closet space and drawers, bathroom with marble, full bath tub, hair dryer, fresh towels, and outfitted with a FULL kitchen with granite counter

name: Great, Parkside Room in 4 bd apt!!!
space: Hey folks! I've got one bedroom available in a 4 bedroom apartment for sublet. There are 3 permanent roommates, all male and all jazz musicians. We don't see each other much due to our different schedules but sometimes you find each other in the kitchen making coffee. Here are the details: Great sized room with lots of light and a queen sized bed. Windows and curtain face a courtyard. The room available for one/two people. It's steps away from the Q train (Parkside stop) which is about 20 minutes into Manhattan and transfers to all the major lines at Atlantic-Pacific. Modestly sized kitchen with tons of pots, pans and dishes. We have a 2 yr old cat named Rocket who is super sweet and playful. If you're not interested in him coming into your room, just close the door. No offense taken :) we also have another 2 yrs old cat named Sebastian who prefers not to be bothered with. He hides most of the time so you probably won't see him much :) We have a large living room with an awesome comfor

name: Between Two Bridges 2BD -Whole Apt!
space: Located on an historic block near the Lower East Side between Chinatown, City Hall, the Financial District and the East River Waterfront.  The A,C, 2, 3, 4, 5 ,6, J, Z, B, D and F trains are all in walking distance. The apartment is a short two flight walkup in a pre-war building. Love to shop?  Soho is a 5 minute stroll away. A serious foodie?  Anthony Bourdain's favorite noodle shop is around the corner. A history buff? Stroll across the Brooklyn Bridge with coffee in hand. All about art and music? The city's hottest galleries and shows happen on the LES. Your master bedroom is sunny and serene with a view of the Frank Gehry building (small piece of it). Sleep soundly on a tempurpedic bed and wake up to whatever you find in the kitchen. Wifi, linens and towels are provided too. The living room also has a modernist futon that folds flat into a bed if you prefer. The smaller office/tiny bedroom gets a nice afternoon light with a vintage drafting table.  There's a couch that folds into

name: Brooklyn Beauty - Home Away From Home
space: This beautiful large rooms with queen size beds and full size sleeper sofa, high ceiling, wooden floor, private bathroom and large open windows is beautifully furnished with view of the park. Shared kitchen space has a fully functioning eat-in kitchen for your cooking convenience, and includes the following: microwave, coffee maker, cooking stove, toaster oven, and refrigerator. Room has the following: flatscreen TV, premium cable channels and wireless internet.  Room sleeps two (4). ACTIVITIES AND ATTRACTIONS: Property is conveniently located near the Brooklyn Museum of Art, Brooklyn Children's Museum, Grand Army Plaza, Prospect Park and the Brooklyn Botanical Gardens.  Convenient to numerous bus routes,  5 minutes walk to the #3 and 12 minutes to C subway lines.  And only 25 minutes train ride to the city.

name: Sunny,cozy,quiet studio in Nolita
space: I am subletting my studio in a quiet street in Nolita.  The building has a live-in super, elevator and shared rooftop. The studio features: - Air-conditioning - High-speed internet Wi-Fi - 40' TV with apple TV (with Netflix and HBO Go!) - Fully-equiped kitchen  - Bathroom with bathtub  - Clean sheets, towels provided - Secured, 24h camera surveillance in the building and live-in super About the location: Mott and Broome Street, in the heart of Nolita neighborhood. A few steps away from o   Soho, Little Italy, Chinatown, Lower East Side o   Best shopping in NYC  including endless number of boutiques and vintage stores o   Restaurants/nightlife: Balthazar, La Esquina, Mondrian Hote (Website hidden by Airbnb) Subways to uptown and Brooklyn bridges walking distance

name: Large Glowing Private Room, Williamsburg Bedford L
space: *** ***IMPORTANT: Please message me to inquire about availability before sending a Reservation Request. BEFORE BOOKING PLEASE READ WHOLE DESCRIPTION. ***  This listing is for a beautiful private bedroom available in a 4 bedroom apartment in up-and-coming charming Williamsburg, Brooklyn. If the calendar shows as booked, feel free to contact me anyway as I sometimes have availability for another bedroom in the same apartment. Just 4 blocks from the Bedford Avenue stop on the L line (a mere 5 minutes from Manhattan), the location canÛªt be beat. WhatÛªs more, this neighborhood has been featured as one of the new spots to visit while in New York City. There are plenty of boutiques, small businesses and art galleries as well as delicious restaurants and coffee shops within walking distance. Plus two parks, one with a variety of activities and a weekly green market, and the other with a beautiful view of the East River and the Manhattan skyline. Speaking of which, the rooftop in the building i

name: Entire Apartment in Astoria, 15mins from Manhattan
Gorgeous pvt room in West Village
space: I'm subletting a private bedroom in my two bedroom apartment in the heart of the West Village (12th Street and 8th Ave). The apartment is in the 5th floor of a walk-up building, it is extremely clean and well kept. Utilities and internet are included as well as clean towels and bedding. The location couldn't be better: Close to A,C,E,L,1,2 & 3 trains, it is also steps away from Abingdon Square Park, The Highline Park, Chelsea Market, Hudson River Park and amazing Meatpacking District shopping! NOTE: The building has no elevator and the apartment is located on the 5th floor... just FYI in case you are looking to pack heavy luggage for your trip ;)

name: 1 bedroom apt in Midtown West
space: 1 bedroom apartment (Midtown West), apartment located in Midtown West (Hell's kitchen) near Times Square (5 min walk). The apartment is close to most of the subways (E, C, 1, N, R, W, F, B, D). Nice and clean apartment. Close to restaurants, shops, cafes, Hudson river, etc. All basic services included (electricity, gas, water, etc.). Internet also included. AMENITIES: - Small full Kitchen, stove,oven, microwave - bedroom with full bed, 1 window - nice bathroom with tub and shower - WIFI Internet - It sleeps 2 people , perfect for a couple PS: I also have an airbed to accommodate a third guest.

name: Sunny and spacious bedroom
space: It's a really nice, sunny, spacious bedroom in 2 bedroom apartment. It has walk in closet, 2 huge windows, it's large and very clean. I moved in here 3-years-ago. I share the apartment with one very easy-going roommate.  Apartment itself has pretty big living-room with 2 windows, decent size bathroom and granite counter-topped kitchen. The apartment has all amenities so everything what's needed to sleep, cook, chill, hang out etc. meaning is fully equipped (ex.dishes, coffee maker, blender, extra blankets & pillows). We also have nice backyard where we just got garden furniture and it's going to be all ready for the sunbathing in spring, summer & fall time.  It's in 4 apartments building, very nice and quiet, with easy-going neighbors/friends.

name: Great appartment in Manhattan
space: Amazing clean apartment In the heart of the city. Walking distance to grand central, time square, centrak park, 5th av shopping... .

name: Beautiful Spacious One Bedroom
space: This beautiful one-bedroom has a ton of charm: exposed brick in the kitchen, french doors on the bedroom, and lovely midcentury modern furniture. Colorful art on the walls, hardwood floors and wooden blinds give the apartment a cool and calming vibe. Lots of color and warmth and tranquility here, you won't wanna leave!

name: Charming One Bedroom in Prospect Heights
space: Welcome to Brooklyn! I have a charming furnished one bedroom apartment available for rent.  The apartment is on the fourth floor of a walk-up building and has four 6' tall windows, so it gets tons of natural sunlight. The apartment is located one block from the subway and a few blocks from Prospect Park, the Brooklyn Botanical Gardens and the Brooklyn Museum. The 2/3, 4/5, B/Q, and A/C subway lines are not far and will take you to Manhattan in about 20 minutes. The apartment includes: Û¢One double bed (fresh linens) Û¢One sofa bed that opens to a double mattress Û¢Full bathroom Û¢Separate kitchen with plenty of cooking utensils and appliances (microwave, toaster oven, espresso machine, blender, cuisanart, etc.) Û¢32" Flat Screen TV Û¢Cable and WI-FI internet  Û¢A/C and two ceiling fans The apartment is cute and clean and the location is both safe and delightful.   The area is perfect and within walking distance of the apartment are some good supermarkets, laundromats, and MANY terrific bars a

name: Room next to Columbia Uni.
space: Very Spacious clean, private room in Columbia University campus area, very safe, 3min. distance to to 1-train. Great cafes, grocery, Starbucks etc. close by.   2nights stay max. You will be sharing the apt with female roommate who has her own private room.

name: Private Apt with Skylight in Best Location
space: Bright 1 bedroom apartment with private bathroom and 4 windows; because my current tenant is moving out March 1st, I'm unable to update the photos with the new decor/furniture until then

name: Loft Suite @ The Box House Hotel
space: Loft Suites @ The Box House Hotel. Located in the industrial chic area of North Greenpoint in Brooklyn, The Box House Hotel features contemporary lofts and suites with large windows. Each apartment-style accommodation at The Box House Hotel is styled with bright colors, hardwood floors, antiques and contemporary art. Select rooms have a terrace and views of Midtown Manhattan. These loft units feature 16ft ceilings, kitchenettes, and translucent glass block wall giving ample light. Fully equipped with everything you need for your stay. The studio loft has an alcove bedroom area with a comfortable queen size bed and a pull out sofa in the living room area, which in total can easily sleep up to 4 guests. The loft is equipped with HD TVs in both the living and bedroom areas with premium cable channels. There are hardwood floors throughout and a full bathroom with shower/tub combination.

name: NYC Summer Getaway | Full Home 2BR
space: Travelling to NYC?  Come experience the quintessential NYC lifestyle -- like a true New Yorker, not a tourist. Our large two-bedroom, kid-friendly apartment is located in the charming and historic neighborhood of Astoria, directly across the river from mid-town Manhattan. It's perfect for families and travelers seeking enough space to unwind while in this extra crowded town. If you want to experience all NYC has to offer PLUS escape to a private oasis whenever you like this is the perfect place for you and your family/friends -- the apartment can comfortably sleep up to 4 adults or a combination of adults and kids with one bed in the master bedroom plus one bed and a crib in the second bedroom. Nearby attractions include Times Sq., all Broadway plays, all major Museums, Madison Sq Garden, Central Pk, Rockefeller Ctr and endless restaurants. Most DISCOUNT hotels nearby charge $450/night (if you can find one) at this time of year for a 1BR suite. Our 2BR apartment is a bargain and accomo

name: Beautiful New Garden Apartment
space: This is a recently gut renovated apartment, very quiet, very clean, and in a perfect condition. The apartment is in a charming brown stone in one of New Yorks greatest neighborhoods, the Upper West Side. In addition to the bedroom (queen size tempurpedic bed), spacious living room, large fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher,  small office, and there is small private garden. There is a pull-out sofa that sleeps one or two.The apartment is located 100 yards from Central Park and is two blocks away from 7 different subway lines (A,B,C,D,1,2, and 3 lines). The apartment is walking distance to Times Square, Lincoln Center, Columbus Circle, the American History Museum, as well as tons of restaurants, shopping, the best grocery stores in town, two excellent movie theaters, and tons of bars. If you are looking for a peaceful place in the heart of Manhattan, this is it.  Please don't hesitate to contact me using the "Contact Me" button by my photo.

name: Williamsburg HUGE SUNNY next2train!
space: Hi there This beautiful, sunny room has its own private entrance.   This room has it's own entrance, so it's kind of like it's own apartment. Newly renovated, so it has brand-new, beautiful wood floors. It's currently furnished with a comfy queen-sized bed, two bookshelves, and small table. MORE ABOUT THE APARTMENT: -HUGE room in a real apartment -Great sunlight in the apartment, two big windows in the room -Well furnished with two bookshelves, clothing rack, chair, table, end table and plants :) -Clean bathroom -Hardwood floors -Very warm! -High speed wireless internet -Complete access to kitchen with oven, toaster, and full fridge and stove-top -Laundry is a block away -Neighbors are friendly and quiet -Located right off a major street (Broadway) so accessible to shopping and services -There's also an amazing backyard which the apartment has exclusive access to THE NEIGHBORHOOD: This is a true Williamsburg spot, not like the places in Bushwick. Fun, safe and so close to L & G-train L

name: Cozy and Calm
space: I have a single room that is very small and cozy that only will accommodate one person. It is the perfect room for the traveler who is just looking for a place to rest for a few nights in any given week. This is a shared apartment that has two other rooms with one room already being occupied by me. The traveler would only have to share the bathroom with one other person, since my room is self-contained and has its own bathroom. This room is located on the second floor of my home. It is in a beautiful duplex apartment in Brooklyn that is 15 minutes away from downtown Manhattan by trains. My neighborhood borders both a Jewish and a West Indian community and I live on a small block. It is located across the street from a playground and one block away from the Interfaith Hospital. There are post offices, pharmacies, grocery stores, hair and nail salons, supermarkets and other places that provides a variety of amenities nearby. The C train is just one block away & the A trains are two block

name: Modern apartment w/ gorgeous view
space: Beautiful bedroom available in a two bedroom apartment. The bedroom is bright and clean. it contains one full bed and one fold out couch. You'll have your own bathroom, which has a fantastic shower and a deep bathtub perfect for soaking in. Other amenities in the apartment include a kitchen with a gas stove and dishwasher, a washer/dryer, and a balcony with a gorgeous view of the Manhattan skyline. Wifi, Netflix, Hulu-Plus and an extensive movie library are also available. A small gym is in the basement of the building. The apartment is a very clean and comfortable home.  The apartment is located in Williamsburg, Brooklyn in a modern elevator building, and is only three blocks from the Lorimer Street L train.  Other amenities in the area include: Barcade, The West Cafe, Huckleberry Bar, Dumont Restaurant, Gimme Coffee, Kellogg's Diner, and numerous bars, lounges, restaurants, 24-hour delis, supermarkets, dollar stores, hardware stores, etc, etc.  Williamsburg is vibrant!

name: Sunny, clean br available
space: I'm subletting my clean, furnished room in a sunny apartment in south Williamsburg. The apartment has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (you share a bathroom with one of the other roommates), a terrace, spacious living room, a nice kitchen with granite counters and a washer and dryer. The TV in the living room has netflix and hulu plus and all that good stuff. The room has a full bed, desk, and armoire. You would be living with two amazing ladies in their 30s. My roommates are both very neat and like to keep the house clean. They are very kind and down to earth.

name: Panoramic View Central Park & NYC
space: Peace and Tranquility in NYC... LARGE ONE BEDROOM AVAILABLE LONGER RENTALS   Available December 2016, January 2017 - November 2017 Door man Building, Weekly Maid Service required by my maid Eva, all utilities included.  There will be .05875 NYC Occupancy tax  to be paid at the time of check out for stays under 30 days. You are entering this well appointed 850 square foot apartment directly into the bright living room which has wood floors, a sofa, a flat screen TV with dvd player and stereo, a closet, a coffee table, a desk and a dining table with chairs.  The apartment has an unobstructed breathtaking panoramic view all over central park and Manhattan from the balcony and every window ! The apartment is very quiet inside and on the balcony. There is natural light that fills the apartment all day long.  This apartment is situated on a high floor of a building located on West 90's on the Upper West Side. The Granite counter, tiled open kitchen is fully equipped with a refrigerator and f

name: E Williamsburg Apartment with Yard
space: World Traveler Room! The place is in summer mode, ready to be lived in! We've had an amazing year so far, so many travelers, some incredible times. Every room has a/c for summer, and a space heater for the winter. Also, we've got high-speed internets, wifi. We have a full bath upstairs and a half bath downstairs.  There is a yard in the back, which is convenient if you are a smoker.  There is a washer/dryer downstairs.  We also have a good sized kitchen and living room.  I live downstairs, and work as a photographer.   I love to surf, , ski, camp, climb, travel and explore the city.   There are tons of bars, restaurants, cafes, grocery stores, health food stores, and bodegas in our area.  We are not in what one would consider 'Williamsburg' or 'Bushwick' this is definitely East Williamsburg. It sits between the two, and is slightly less gentrified. Still, it is very safe, accommodating, and convenient (two blocks from the Montrose stop).   This is New York. Don't come without your head

name: Nice Private Room Beauty in Queens
space: Very comfortable Twin size bed, all 100% cotton sheet & comforter. Quiet neighbor. Big window. Wish u come back before 12:00am, but I know New York was amazing city, if u really need back home late pls let me know. I am very good communication with guest, in room we have map and info about NYC, also we have discount New York City most attraction ticket, as Met, Empire State Building, Madamam Tussant Wax Museume, Intrapit air space museume, liberty statue cruise. Freedom Tower, Moma.  Very easy go shopping 200 meter away queens center mall, super market,  target, library in 2-4 mins, poster office in 10mins. Peaceful and quiet  community. Bus Q49 , bus Q55, bus Q60 bus Q29 all stop Queens center mall, subway M, R, F, E to manhattan time square 20mins, to LGA airport take Bus Q72 only 15 mins, to air train JFK roughly 30-40mins. Subway R go central park, time square, Apple store, down town financial area, M go rockfeller center, MOMA, radio city ext. Our neighbor have lot Asia restaurant

name: Sublet in Brooklyn/Lefferts Gardens
space: Guest have access to a spacious living room and kitchen, as well as their own bathroom. We also have a friendly and adorable cat.

name: Cozy Corner, Bedford Ave  Brooklyn!
space: This is a cozy corner bedroom in a three bedroom apartment with three windows.  The bedroom has a desk, a place to hang clothes, and has a nice comfy bed with a down comforter. Our house is filled with books, records, and musical instruments, we are a short walk from Fort Greene (beautiful brownstones and tree lined streets with lots of cafe's and restaurants) and Lewis Ave(the up and coming Bed-Stuy block). The subway is just downstairs with a  and 15 minute train ride to Williamsburg and 25 minute ride into Manhattan(Union Square, Soho, Chinatown, Times Square) We have a middle sized kitchen, a nice common space with a projector to watch movies, wifi, and laundry around the corner. I'm a student and musician and have lived in nyc all my life. My roommate is from Las Vegas and she runs a clothing store for Rock and Roll/Rockabilly style clothing. We both know the city very well and can help you find your way around!   Me and my roomate have been improving our place since we moved in,

name: HISTORIC WILLIAMSBURG, BKLYN #1
space: THIS APARTMENT -- LOCATED IN THE HEART OF WILLIAMSBURG -- IS AVAILABLE FOR $75/NIGHT ($35/ADDITIONAL). EXCELLENT NEIGHBORHOOD. ONE BLOCK FROM THE 'L' TRAIN.. AMAZING RESTAURANTS, BARS, ENTERTAINMENT, PARKS, MARKETS, SHOPPING, ETC. >>> PLEASE EMAIL FOR INQUIRIES/QUESTIONS AND AVAILABILITY. THE ROOM IS IN A THREE BEDROOM APARTMENT, WITH A GREAT KITCHEN/LIVING ROOM, NICE BATHROOM. CAN'T BEAT THE LOCATION!!!

name: Inexpensive apartment in exchange for cat-care
space: Enjoy my lovely, sunny apartment for a great price in exchange for looking after my sweet lazy cat.  The apartment is on the third floor near the corner of Vanderbilt and Myrtle Avenue, 2 blocks from the deliciousness of Dekalb Avenue, a few blocks from lovely Fort Greene Park, the Saturday Farmers Market, and the Brooklyn Flea.  10-20 minute walk to every subway line passing through Brooklyn (closest to the C, B, Q, R, G trains), and in the other direction a one mile walk to the foot of the Manhattan Bridge and a gorgeous walk or bike over the East River into Chinatown.

name: The Brick Boudoir (btw Barney's & Gooogle)
space: Previous guests have described The Brick Boudoir as a "dream" and a "Gorgeous place, styled to resemble a luxury hotel property".   It comfortably accommodate (2) adult guests with everything needed for a great stay.  It's superbly located on a beautiful, tree-lined Chelsea street in a charming walk-up building - 3 1/2 flights up.  For some, this may be a bit difficult, but with all the walking we do in NYC, it's pretty easy for most.   The Boudoir offers these amenities:   - TempurPedic queen bed, quality bedding    - HD TV with Amazon Fire & Netflix   - 200 mpbs high-speed internet / wifi   - (2) A/C units   - Stove, fridge, toaster oven, micro, coffee   - Cookware & utensils   - Bath towels, face towels & kitchen towels   - Body wash, shampoo/conditioner & more   - Iron/iron board, hand garment steamer   - Hair dryer & flat iron   - Cleaning products ___________________________________

name: Private & Cozy Modern Luxury
space: All the amenities and comfort you would expect from a modern well kept home. The room in the space is private as well as the bathroom. I am rarely home so it will feel as if you have the entire home to yourself. The apartment is 2 blocks from Prospect Park and about a half a block away from the B and Q trains.

name: Private room in 2 br Apt, Wburg, BK
space: This is a BRIGHT, 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment with a large eating area conveniently located in the heart of South Williamsburg, the closest Brooklyn neighborhood to Manhattan (10 minute cab ride to Lower East Side). You will be a short, 8 minute walk from the JMZ train (which goes straight to JFK ) and 15 minute walk to the L/Bedford stop train also B62 Bus stops across street that can take you to either train stop, Greenpoint and LIC. I am just a few minute walk from the heart of Williamsburg and all its shops, restaurants, clubs, movie theatre and bars. However, this part of the neighborhood is very quiet and safe. Convenient parking in front and round the building and a very affordable parking garage 5 minutes away. *Amenities include: Full kitchen and appliances, Wi Fi connection, DVD player, flat screen TV, comfortable bed and dresser. I understand that sometimes traveling can become complicated, let's chat and we work it out. Speak to you soon, Sergio

name: Large Double Room  Queenbed Wifi
space: A 4 minute walk from 2 subway lines, A or G,  Near the corner on a Historic Land Mark block  On the Top  Floor of a Well kept Classic Renovated Brownstone is a New Completely Furnished Apartment with  3 completely Private bedrooms.  I rent  bedrooms from the top 2 furnished apartments of my family Townhouse. Absolutely No Smoking allowed In the building. The apartment is primarily occupied by short term International renters from airbnb. I do not live in this apartment, I manage the entire house and live on the garden level.  Each Apartment is wifi equipped and has 3 private key locked bedrooms sharing bath, eat in kitchen and living space. The Daily Rule is: "leave no negative trace."  visible in common areas.

name: Private single bed Room Wifi

I have laundromat, grocery store, coffee shops, plenty of bars and several really beautiful parks in walking distance. Greenpoint and neighboring Williamsburg are bustling centers of creativity and coolness. name: Furnished Bedroom long term rental
space: Master bedroom for rent in a two bedroom apartment.  Master bedroom has a half bath inside it.  You will have access to the common areas of the apartment including the kitchen if you would like to cook or store food in the refrigerator.  There is a microwave and a stove with an oven.  You will also have access to the washer and dryer that is in the apartment.  There is also a small gym in the building that you can use.  The apartment is near major subway lines: A, B, C D at 125th Street.  Stop for the M60 bus from LaGuardia is four blocks away as well as the subway station.  Apartment is located in a thriving section of Harlem.  There are restaurants, bars, wine shops, clothing stores, gyms, movie multiplex and cafes in the neighborhood.  Apartment is also four blocks away from the legendary Apollo theater.   Levain bakery, Yoga center and the Harlem Tavern are other places of interest in the immediate area. name: Sunny private room featured in film

Quiet residential street. Garden view.  Comfy full-sized bed, premium cable, free wifi. Semi-private bath on first floor. This house was used as a set for the feature films ÛÏDefinitely, MaybeÛ with Ryan Reynolds, ÛÏSolitary ManÛ with Michael Douglas and Danny DeVito, and the TV series ÛÏDamagesÛ with Glenn Close. Considered one of the best-kept secrets in New York, Ditmas Park boasts suburban living in the Big Apple. Tree-lined streets, Victorian houses, front porches, not what is typically expected of the New York experience. Very accesible to public transportation, walking distance to Prospect Park, easy commute to Coney Island in one direction and Manhattan in the other. name: Lovely studio in prime Fort Greene
space: Stay in my cute, shabby-chic studio on a beautiful, quiet and convenient block in prime Fort Greene. Manhattan is just 15 minutes away on the C train located around the corner and Atlantic Terminal (Q, N, B, D, 4, 5, 2, 3 and LIRR) is just five minutes further. Or stay in lovely Fort Greene! This is one of the best neighborhoods in New York and my apartment is less than a block from Fort Greene Park and great restaurants like General Greene, Walter's, Dino's, Smoke Joint, Chez Oskar, No. 7. The apartment is in a pre-war, elevator building. It comes with clean linens and towels, TV (no cable, but Apple TV), wireless internet and a Sonos speaker you can connect to. Enjoy a fully equipped kitchen with dining area (table & chairs) & comfortable living area (love seat & coffee table). Also, has a large bathroom with tub/shower. Amenities: Fresh towels & sheets/comforter, cookware, microwave, French press, corkscrew & wine glasses; and laundry in the building.

name: Comfortable Room in New Apartment
space: Hello, travelers!  I am renting out my two bedroom apartment located in the heart of Sunset Park, Brooklyn.  Come stay in my clean, large, comfortable newly renovated space. You will be approximately 20 minutes to downtown Manhattan by subway.

name: Penthouse Studio by Central Park
space: Cute and clean top floor studio (only 3 flights up - no elevator), queen sized bed, renovated kitchen and bathroom (with full sized tub), fully equipped kitchen. Less than a block from Central Park, and just a few blocks from Lincoln Centre and the Museum of Natural History. Around the counter from the famous Magnolia Bakery.

name: Big Bright Upper West Side Classic
space: The apartment is a prewar classic design 2 bedroom on West End Avenue. It is bright and clean with hardwood floors. It is tastefully furnished, uncluttered, located in a well maintained elevator building with helpful 24/7 doormen and an on-site superintendent. This is a pet and family friendly building. The original 1929/30 character of the apartment has been retained and restored over the course of the 70 years that it has been my family's principle dwelling.  The guest bedroom is offered for 3 day to 3 week stays, from early November until the end of April. It is large with two closets and windows facing north and east. It is furnished with a full size bed or two single beds, work table/desk and chair, reclining chair, TV, cabinets, shelves, a window air conditioner, and a full length mirror. It is large enough to accommodate an extra single bed or air mattress in the room. The kitchen is a vintage, eat-in style, that is very well equipped with an original "Waterman Ideal" gas range

name: Comfortable and Simple
space: I have a medium size single room that is simple, yet comfortable that will accommodate one person. It is the perfect room for the traveler who is just looking for a place to rest for a few nights in any given week. This is a shared apartment that has two other rooms with one room already being occupied by me. The traveler would only have to share the bathroom with one other person, since my room is self-contained and has its own bathroom. There is a shared kitchen. This room is located on the second floor of my home. It is in a beautiful duplex apartment in Brooklyn that is 15 minutes away from downtown Manhattan by trains. My neighborhood borders both a Jewish and a West Indian community and I live on a small block that is located across the street from a playground and one block away from the Interfaith Hospital. There are post offices, pharmacies, grocery stores, hair and nail salons, supermarkets and other places that provides a variety of amenities nearby. The C train is just one

name: UPPER WEST 70'S OFF BROADWAY HIT!
space: New York hotels are busy and expensive. Beautiful comfotrable home in the Upper West Side (West 70's)  1bd 1ba 6 short blks to Lincoln Center 1 block to 72nd street subway station (one stop to 42nd street And Broadway Theaters, walking distance to Central Park, Riverside Park, The Beacon Theater,Fairway,Trader Joes,Zabars,Movie Theaters. Building has 24 hour doorman with elevator. Apartment is light and brite with King Size bed  and two couches, Furnishings are designer. Internet with wifi, DVD, Full bath lovely kitchen.
