name: 2 rooms; private entrance & bath!
space: 2 beautiful rooms with private entrance and private bathroom one block from public transit... only 15 minutes to Union Square in Manhattan.   Rooms are on the first floor.  One is set up as a bedroom, the other as a living room space, with a large sofa that converts to a futon bed. YES!  Your very own bathroom and your own private entrance. We provide bed linens and towels. Located in the Bushwick neighborhood of Brooklyn, with free wi-fi, Apple TV with HBO and Hulu, closet space, and a small fridge and coffee maker. Close to restaurants, bars, and cafes, as well as an organic grocery.   We are a nice family, who are eager to welcome you to Brooklyn, and all that New York City has to offer!

name: Giant Sunny Bedroom & Private Bath
space: the room: it's the biggest bedroom (bigger than some nyc apartments...). very comfortable (master) bedroom and private bath with a queen sized bed (and futon/couch), furnished eclectically/boho chic. southern and western exposure. lots of sun that warms the room in the winter. shades if you don't want the sun. nice breeze in the summer. air conditioner. sunset views.åÊfull length mirror. lots of closet space.  my guests are almost always very happy with the space and love my apartment. HOWEVER, if you are expecting a hotel or a luxurious modern accommodation, this is not for you. it is an old apartment that has not been renovated. that means it has a lot of charm and soul, but also that the floors are rough, the bathtub is scratched and scuffed, and the heaters make noises sometimes. although this is generalizing, I tend to think that younger people and the more bohemian or adventurous travelers are going to be very happy here. if you aren't sure, feel free to ask. i want everyone who s

name: Super cozy cottage-like space!Unique and pleasant
space: This apartment is located in a heart of Greenpoint, Brooklyn. Various surrounding cafes serve the best coffee in town. A vast number of bars with outdoor seating and lovely restaurants will easily become highlights of your stay. The closest bodegas, which are small convenient stores stocked for your most immediate needs, are open very late. For wider range of grocery (organic health foods) as well as pharmacy items, you will walk 2 blocks to Manhattan Ave.  The apartment itself resembles a small cottage where I'll make sure you will feel right at home. The kitchen is equipped in many cast iron pots, pans and serving items will be a pleasure for even most demanding chefs. A beautiful back yard make a thrilling addition to the place, great for bbqs! There's also an outdoor shower for the hot Summer months! It includes a WiFi and a multimedia projector so you can enjoy movies on a big screen!

name: The Undiscovered Borough Awaits
space: Come to the other NYC. Have a private room in my two bedroom apartment. Quiet street and neighborhood on the North Shore, Staten Island's burgeoning art neighborhood. Prefer to hike and bike? Staten Island is NYC's greenest borough with lots of parks, including Gateway National Park (great for birding). Historical monuments and architecture abound (the only Frank Lloyd Wright in NYC is in Staten Island) as well as great museums and restaurants. Want to see "The City"? It's less than 40 minutes away by bus and ferry (Express Buses also available). The Ferry runs free 24/7 and provides you some of the best views of lower Manhattan, Brooklyn and New Jersey. Or view it all from along the North Shore in St. George, Stapleton, Rosebank and Fort Wadsworth.. If you drive, there is plenty of street parking available. The apartment is cozy and bright. It has a private entrance from the rest of the building which provides us with a lovely patio area out front to enjoy your coffee or a cocktail in

name: Clinton Hill Duplex near Pratt w/Balcony!
space: Awesome room in a duplex apartment in a new build, elevator condo! About the room: large and sunny, on the top floor of a duplex, penthouse apartment.  The room has sliding glass doors which take you out to a private balcony - facing Manhattan with great skyline views!  The room has everything you need: a queen sized bed, walk in closet, desk, TV/cable, wifi, dresser.  The room is on the top floor, above the living room, so very private and quiet.  On the 7th floor, facing the back of the building, so there are no issues with traffic, or other noise. name: COMFORTABLE ROOM
space: This room in my apartment sleeps 2 people. There is one queen size bed and one chair bed. I have a nice apartment of 3 bedrooms (BUT I JUST RENT ROOMS AND NOT WHOLE APARTMENT), large living room, bathroom and kitchen, located in Manhattan (East Harlem). It is a spacious and quiet room for renting to tourists visiting New York.  I am located in a region with many facilities in the surrounding areas such as markets, banks, shops, restaurants, groceries, laundry and fitness center (Bally Total Fitness).  The apartment is 3 blocks from a metro station (Lexington and 103st), line 6, 24/7 and a bus stop in front of the building.  It is close of the Metropolitan and Guggenheim Museuns and 8 minutes of Central Park. Wireless and usable kitchen for breakfast.

name: Charming Ridgewood Soulful  Walk-Up
space: Stay in a lovely artist pad just 3 blocks from the L train-- about  as close as you can get without losing the trees, and old NYC brownstone architecture. There is even a view of backyard gardens from our kitchen window! Guests will have a large and sunny private room with a private entrance ! It's an ideal spot to crash after exploring New York City and Brooklyn!  You will be just 15/20 minutes by train from Manhattan in a real NYC neighborhood. Laundromat, Supermarket, Pharmacy are only a couple  blocks away! Ridgewood is quiet and residential just NorthEast of trendy Bushwick - about a 15 minute bicycle ride to historic Williamsburg. Airbnb has a nice description of the neighborhood here: airbnb.com/locations/new-york/ridgewood The Apt is on a tree lined block less than a few blocks from the the L and the M  trains. space: Hello!  I have a cozy one bedroom apartment on a tree lined block in the Chelsea neighborhood of New York City.  I Airbnb quite a bit myself on the West Coast-- usually to the same place, and have guests returning to my apt as well, when available. The apt is close to many shops, restaurants, coffee shops, The famous Chelsea Market, the Flea market, galleries and the new Highline elevated park is just around the corner. The apartment has a lot of sunlight and faces South to the street. There is a small but very functional kitchen, wireless internet, fax machine, cable + DVD. The building is quiet with only 10 apartments. Everybody in the building knows one another making it safe and comfortable for anyone staying.  Walking distance from Union Square (15 minutes) which hosts a large farmers market 4 days a week.  It's great apartment for one or two people. Only interested in quiet considerate guests who are looking for a cozier and cheaper alternative to a hotel. No groups.  Upon arriva

name: Historic Brooklyn 2-Bedroom Apt

This apartment is walking distance from the best restaurants and bars, 2 subway stations, PATH station, Chelsea Market, Chelsea, High Line Park, Meat Packing District, Soho, Union Square and Washington Square Park. name: Come and go as  you please in BKLN!
space: Make the most of YOUR time in New York City.  This cozy and private studio apartment allows you to come and go as you please without the hassle of coordinating with a host. Wireless internet access/WiFi available, but you must bring your own laptop. Kitchenette:  SAVE MONEY and use our refrigerator, microwave, electric hot water kettle, dishes and utensils.  Sorry, there is no stove.  Folding table and chairs available to create a cozy dining area. Three sleeping options:  full-size loft bed, fold-open couch/bed, and a single memory foam bed that fits beneath the loft bed.  The space is small, so we wouldn't recommend using all of the beds at once.  Three adults can fit, but it will be tight. name: Room in Huge 1200sf W Harlem Suite
space: I have a large comfortable room available in a huge 1200sqft designer suite in a beautiful elevator co-op in the Central Park North section of West Harlem. The apartment is very upscale with beautiful finishings, chef's kitchen and large rainforest shower. I am looking for a professional who is clean and responsible. Non-smokers only, and no pets.

name: Huge, Sunny, Open Loft in Brooklyn
space: Fully and nicely furnished, my loft is about 900 square feet (24 x 37). Elegant panel curtains separate the bedroom from the rest of the space. They can be opened, closed, layered, or rearranged as desired.  The loft is new featuring hardwood floors, gigantic south facing windows, a gas stove, heating, air conditioning, TV on demand and internet. It also comes with great, friendly neighbors.   It is on the second floor of a two story building. There is no one above you. There is roof access with great views of the manhattan skyline. We watched the fireworks from here last July 4th. (see photos) On the block there is the L train (15 minutes direct to Union Square), several coffee shops, a natural health food store, a famous Taqueria, a park, several bars and restaurants (including my own!) and the Bushwick Starr theatre. Within a 2 or 3 block radius you will find grocery stores, laundry, post office and a lot more. Parking is easy, although it is Alternate Side parking, which means you

name: Cozy Nook in Heart of Williamsburg
space: A cozy nook in the heart of Williamsburg, Brooklyn. Newly modeled building in 2011. One train stop away from the city. Easy access to everything you need for your stay. With great eateries, shops, bars at your fingertips, Why bother with the crazy hustle and bustle of Manhattan (not to mention the prices!!)?? Williamsburg has the same quality, diversity, and creativity of the city without the crowds. Additionally, it is 100% safe! Even at 4-5 a.m. people are out and about, walking home from the local bars. You couldn't ask for a better location.  You will have your own private bedroom w/ shared bathroom in a three bedroom flat. It is a 4 floor walk up and it is only a few  floors away from an amazing, unobstructed 360 degree roof top view of the city that never sleeps! Fully stocked kitchen where you can whip up a nice omelette and french pressed coffee in the morning. This room is ideal for the traveling couple who can cozy up together as they gaze at a great view of the williamsburg

space: Right in the heart of "South Slope" is this apartment for rent, which is close to trains, restaurants and the magnificent Prospect Park, every convenience is at your fingertips. It's comfortable and sunny, but also has one high wall which blocks direct sunlight, so it isn't overwhelmingly hot. But if it is, just swoop into the kitchen for lemonade! Right on our corner of 12th Street is a great diner at 7th avenue as well as your pick of fabulous restaurants and on the other corner at 6th avenue you have your choice of two different great coffee houses, another two restaurants and a nice avenue to walk down which is more residential that 7th or 5th aves. 7th Avenue h

name: Entire 2 Bedroom Apartment in Williamsburg

The second bedroom is smaller but has a full size bed also with a dresser for clothing.

name: CHELSEA HOME-STEPS TO THE HIGHLINE & SUBWAY!
space: Live like a New Yorker in the very heart of Chelsea!  Welcome to our uniquely decorated flat. It includes one queen size bed, and a twin size day bed that sleeps one (There is NO EXTRA FEE for a 3rd person), desk, fully functioning kitchen and plenty of closets for you to use during your visit. Your NYC home is all about LOCATION.  You will be centrally located 2 blocks away from public transportation. Take the train one stop to Madison Square Garden and 2 stops to Times Square. Our home is just a few blocks from NYC's meatpacking district and the center of nightlife and NYC's newest attraction The High Line. Nestled within a "neighborhood" block in a quiet and safe community. You will be surrounded by ample restaurants, bars, art galleries and boutique shopping. Take advantage of the great food stores in our area and make your own meals at home: Trader Joes, Wholefoods, Gristedes and the famous Chelsea Market are minutes away...   -Free private high speed WIFI -TV/DVD  -Fully equipped

name: Brooklyn Design Loft
space: My partner Mitch and I  live in a 1100sq ft loft on the outskirts of Williamsburg .  One block to the Morgan L train, one block to a fantastic natural food market, Roberta's famous pizza, Momo sushi shack, bars and more. Artsy neighborhood with a calm feel.  We love to welcome all travelers who are looking for adventure and community. We are happy to give recommendations- but also happy to give you plenty of space and privacy to explore the city and Brooklyn on your own.  Our building is set among a group of warehouses that have recently been converted into art studios, restaurants and bars. This is what SoHo was before it exploded.  It's a 10 minute train ride to Williamsburg proper (Bedford L stop) where hipsters collect at delicious coffee shops in droves. And it's about 15-20 minutes to Union Square and the East Village. name: Very Large & Serene Artist Loft

It is bright and sunny and over looks the garden deck. It includes a dresser and large dressing mirror and small closet to hang clothes and expandable dining table.   This room has a built in murphy bed which means it can be raised or left down.  The mattress is medium firm and with cotton bedding.  Roof deck outside kitchen window with small garden.  Fresh linens and towels provided. Can sleep 1-4 people.  Cleaning service for longer term rentals.  The apartment is located on  the 2nd floor of a pre-war walk up building in the Lower East Side. name: Large Master Bedroom - Williamsburg
space: Hey Ya'll, We love having guests! We would love to host you during your travels!! Come and join  This is the master bedroom in a three-bedroom flat in Brooklyn in the newly remodeled pre-war Edward Apartments.  The classy remodel kept exposed brick walls and enormous south-facing windows.  Kitchen is brand new and well-appointed by a foodie.  The roof deck a few floors up (almost like an additional living room) is stunning.  We have yet to find a more perfect spot for morning yoga or an evening smoke or beer.  And it has a fireplace.  You get a Queen and plenty of dresser and closet space to make yourself at home.  We have a hair drier, towels and toiletries for you. Two blocks from 1,2,3,9 trains and three blocks from A, C, E trains. Thanks. Deposit required.

name: Spacious Manhattan Apartment near Central Park
space: The apartment is located just a few steps from Central Park in a charming neighborhood filled with wonderful cafes, bars and restaurants. The flat sits on a very quiet, tree-lined street that's dotted with prewar Beaux-Arts and landmark brownstone buildings.   The three - room flat has air conditioning and includes WiFi and TV. It has a newly renovated kitchen and wonderfully renovated bath in a well-appointed, very clean and quiet apartment with modern decor. The apartment has a full-size bed, hardwood floors, 10-foot high ceilings and plenty of natural light. All utilities, linens, towels etc are included in the price. There are no extra cleaning fees. This is not a share. You will have it to yourself.  The apartment is centrally located to many subway stations and not far from Lincoln Center and the Museum of Natural History.

name: Your Historic House in Brooklyn
space: Enjoy spacious and historic Victorian living while visiting New York City!  Our unique Victorian house is located in landmarked Ditmas Park, Brooklyn, only a 5-minute walk from an express train that takes you to Manhattan in 20/30 minutes (B and Q trains, Newkirk Plaza). This 1904 four-story house of 2600 sf (240m2) features: - Five bedrooms, all with AC. For up to 9 persons.   - Large living room with wood burning fireplace. - Large kitchen with Viking stove, dishwasher and eat-in area, which is inundated with exquisite morning sunlight.   - 2 full bathrooms and 2 restrooms.   - Washer/dryer in the basement.  - Playroom and gym with punching bag, trapeze, free weight and training bike in the basement. - 42' TV with BlueRay and access to Netflix, Hulu Plus and Amazon Prime content.  - Wifi access. - Study with Yamaha electronic piano.  - Toys, fun family games, and books in English, French and Spanish. - Frontyard, backyard and driveway that fits up to four cars. - Front porch with a s

name: Creative Director's Chinatown Loft
space: Chinatown / Lower East Side is a fabulous neighborhood for creatives, with new galleries, restaurants & shops opening regularly that complement the established classics the neighborhood is known for.  Short walk to SoHo, TriBeCa, East Village; Williamsburg & DUMBO just over the bridges. Grand Street Station (D Train) two blocks away.  Check out the Guidebook page here for my recommendations ÛÓ a comfortable apartment to spend time in when not out & about, enjoying New York.

name: HOSTING YOUR SPACIOUS, SUNNY, PRIVATE NYC ROOM
space: Your room is warm, cozy, roomy, quiet and private, located on a lovely courtyard and garden, so it is peaceful in the day (conducive to study/working)if you are home and great sleeping at night.  Because of the courtyard, you would never know you were in "New York City".   Elevator in building, very secure.  Security cameras. Wireless internet, cable television, laundry on premises, elevator. There is a double bed and a couch that converts to a bed or a lounger position, as needed.  Located Upper West Side Manhattan.  You don't even have to walk to the train, it is right here at the building.  You can be downtown in minutes.  Very convenient for any mode of transportation (train, bus both right here!).  If you have a car there are parking garages nearby & street parking (READ THE SIGNS POSTED!). Car rental nearby if you need it (they will pick you up). Very close to all major routes & thoroughfares for getting to New York State vistas.  Located in great neighborhood... All amenities, r

name: Sunny and Spacious 2 Bedroom Near Prospect Park
space: I am a freelance musician and rent out the apartment while touring with bands. This is my home and I keep it really clean and well decorated. I'm sure you'll love staying here. My apartment is a great jumping off point to explore Brooklyn and Manhattan. I am just 2 blocks from Prospect Park, The Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, The Brooklyn Library and the Brooklyn Museum. Amenities Include: * High Speed Wireless Internet * Projector, Apple TV and Stereo for movies and music (record player!) * 2 Queen size beds * Private Patio * Fully stocked kitchen appliances with Vitamix, Juicer and more * Tons of plants make the space feel very alive * The most comfortable couch ever * Amazing neighborhood full of restaurants, bars, ice cream shops and music * 5 minute walk to the Q, B, 2 and 3 trains.

name: Entire large, sunny apt for you!
space: It is a large, sunny, very clean, fully-furnished and well-decorated apartment all for yourself. Situated in Manhattan, in a lively and safe neighbourhood. Well communicated: express "A" train literally just around the corner (20 minutes to midtown).

name: Room In Greenpoint.
space: Large, clean and  sunny room on quiet tree lined street.

name: Best Location-Only 3 Subway STOPS from MANHATTAN!
space: If you are looking to be close to The City and all its amazing landmarks --for an affordable price-- this is the place for you!! Mine is a small apartment in Astoria/Long Island City just 10 minutes from Manhattan.  You'll feel free at my home. This room can be rented in conjunction with my other property to have the whole apartment at your disposition (calendar permitting). Please keep in mind that you won't find a luxurious place, this is small, clean, comfortable apartment but "NOT A HOTEL". Visitors are not allowed in the room, you can use the dining room for that. You may have to share a bathroom with other guests (Max 2, usually couples). Depending if the other room is rented. So please be extremely mindful when using the bathroom time wise talking. PLEASE CLEAN AFTER YOURSELF, nobody wants the "foot prints" from other people, pick up your own hair in the bathtub and look after you when using the toilet. Leave the hand towel well placed.  I offer clean towels, sheets and products

name: Charming private room in New-York
space: This is a sweet, furnished, Sunny room. All included: Utilities, fast Wi-Fi, fully equipped kitchen,  clean towels & sheets. There's a beautiful patio in the back & great view from roof overlooking Manhattan. If this room isn't available on the dates you need, check out our other room (same apartment): https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/411525 feel free to contact me with any question,  Jonathan

name: Bedroom near Midtown Times Square
space: Private bedroom in a 3 bedroom duplex apartment.  Centrally located, 8 minute walk (2 avenues) to Times Square, Theatre District, many Subway lines (A, C, E, N, R, Q, 1), taxis available outside the front door of apartment. The apartment is between 9th and 10th avenues. The avenues are lined with restaurants, bars, delis, grocery stores, laundry. The apartment building has NO ELEVATOR and a 5th floor walkup (about 80 stairs) With your inquiry please indicate if you have a lot of luggage as the apartment is not well suited for guests with a lot of luggage. Host lives in a bedroom upstairs (6th floor). The other bedroom may have another AirBnb guest(s) (single or couple). Kitchen, Living area and main bathroom are shared among the 3 bedrooms. The host has a half bath upstairs, so seldom occupies the main bathroom.  All bedrooms are spread out at opposite ends of the apartment.  This bedroom, while it has more natural light (2 windows) and a better view, it is not as quiet as the other be

name: bedroom in the heart of Fort Greene

name: Stylish & Quiet NYC Retreat!
space: About the apartment:  I have a beautiful and spacious 1st Floor 2-bedroom apartment in Southwest Harlem (no stairs to climb!), in which I rent out the guest bedroom to guests who'd like a really incredible place to stay while visiting NYC, but think that paying $350 a night for a really bad hotel is crazy (It is, right!?) About me:  I'm a really easy going, professional, 36 year old guy that loves to host visitors and make them feel at home.  All I ask from you is that you're clean, polite and respectful.  In return, I guarantee you an extremely comfortable space in which you will feel completely at home and welcome. Your stay includes an air-conditioned/heated private room (with fresh linens and towels), free Wi-Fi, use of the TV connected to Netflix & Hulu Plus (for free movies and TV shows), use of the fridge and kitchen with filtered water and coffee/tea service.  The bed has a VERY comfortable queen size mattress and there is also an armoire and a closet with hangers for your use.

name: *3BD/great value Amazing Location*

It has a table, a dresser and four chairs. Across the dining room the door gives you access to the living room. This fully furnished living room has hardwood floors, two windows and is equipped with a sofa, two armchairs and a flat screen 30'LCD TV with cable and High Speed WIFI internet included. The kitchen features a refrigerator with a freezing compartment, a sink, a stove, an oven, a microwave oven, a sink, a table and  chairs, and kitchen utensils. On the right in the hallway, a door opens into the bedroom which has wooden floors and features a queen-sized bed, a chair, and a dresser. The third bedroom is located in the back of the apartment and features  1 full size b

name: Quiet room in central, safe area
space: You would be sharing a 2 bedroom apartment where each room shares access to a kitchen with table (4 chairs) and bathroom.  The bedroom contains a full size bed, desk, rack for clothes. There is high speed internet. Sheets & towel provided.  It's a quiet apartment in a great neighborhood and an excellent location central to many places in NY. This is a perfect place for someone visiting, studying or temporarily working in New York.

name: Classic  E Village Bright Dream Apt
space: I'm traveling a week or two per month, so I'm looking for someone to intermittently enjoy and take care of my favorite home ever.  Email me to discuss dates and why you think you are the best fit. My lovely, warmly decorated, private and sunny 1-bedroom apt is on tree-lined 10th St. & 1st. Ave. It's an inspiring, grounding haven in the middle of all the East Village action and community. It's a true home away from home, comfortable and cozy. I rent it to guests who appreciate its retreat-like environment to inspire creativity and relaxation while you explore NYC. One floor up in a friendly, safe building.  Four separate rooms, eat-in kitchen great for cooking, office/bedroom with loft bed, sleeper sofa in living room, exposed bricks, beautiful wide-plank wood floors, antique clawfoot bathtub, deco fireplace, high ceilings, Southern exposure. The keyboard you see in the living room pics has since been moved out, to make more space and a more attractive experience of the deco fireplace.

name: Private Bedroom and LivingRoom
space: Hi! The apartment is a quick 20 minutes from Manhattan.  It is also close to lots of neighborhood coffee shops and bars. Your space would be a private living room and bedroom and a shared bathroom and kitchen with a couple who are super chill, clean and quiet.  We're cool with couples or individuals who enjoy a nice amount of private space! There is also a couch for a 3rd, but note there will be an $50 up charge for more than 2 people.  If interested, place contact Julia asap :) Thanks!

The room has comfy twin sized beds, a big sofa, coffee table (with kettle & tea), night stand, walk in closet/hangers, hair dryer, full length mirrors, AC, heating, maps/info sheet, and there are 2 high speed wifi channels through out the apartment. On the same block as loooots of restaurants, desserts, coffee, fruit stands, bars, laundromat, 24 hour delis, more restaurants and 1 block from 13 different subway trains. name: Lincoln Center Studio, Clean&Sunny!
space: Its my sweet home available to you - yes, the ENTIRE apartment! Very clean, sunny, 5 min walk from Lincoln Center, 1 min walk from 72nd Subway station. Too convenient~ Everything in the neighborhood is 24/7 open, so much arts going on near Lincoln Center, Moma, Carnegie Hall, Museum of Natural History. And if you are not an art lover, you can go to Central Park in 1 min walk from the house. Two gigantic grocery stores - Fairway & Trader Joe's are on the next block. Fully furnished, high speed Wifi wireless, 24 hrs doorman, laundry in the building. It is a PERFECT STUDIO FOR YOUR VACATION OR WORK!

name: Super Clean Apt by Columbus Circle
space: *Apartment has actually been updated with a larger TV, larger bandwidth hi-speed internet, brand new sofabed, bar cart, new bedding, and other decorative touches.   Fully-furnished gorgeous large studio, complete with full-sized dining area for 6, bathroom and kitchen. Comes with all kitchenware, free high-speed wireless internet, HD Cable TV, card-operated laundry, doorman and elevator.  Two beds, sleeps four people total. One super comfy Queen-sized bed and a Queen sofa sleeper. Plenty of bedding and linen available for all. 5 minute walk to Columbus Circle/59th St subway station for the A, B, C, D,1 & 2 Trains. 10 minute walk to the amazing Central Park. Walk to Broadway shows or to The Met to catch the Opera.  Grocery stores, pharmacies and dry-cleaners, all within minutes. There is also a Whole Foods at Columbus Circle. Restaurants galore within minutes from your doorstep. The selections are endless - from Thai, Italian, Japanese, Brazilian, Indonesian to regular old NY Pizza. :)

name: Unique private room and bathroom in Brownstone
space: Enjoy your stay in New York City from your private suite in Harlem.  Your room is approximately 250 sq feet, with 3 windows with southern exposure, overlooking a quiet tree lined street. There is a king size bed, with orthopedic mattress, a large closet, a chest with drawers and a desk. There is also an armchair that can be opened and become a comfortable extra twin bed. If necessary, we can provide a crib and/or a bed for children. Sorry, no TV in the house, but we have WiFi and subscription to Netflix if you want to watch a movie on you laptop or iPad. You will also have a private bathroom, with a bathtub and marble floors. The apartment has been renovated 4 years ago, so everything is new and in perfect conditions. There is centralized heating and air condition.  We generally only rent the bedroom and bathroom, meaning that there is no access to the rest of the house. Nevertheless, depending on the length of the stay or other circumstances, we can allow the use of the kitchen and di

name: Great room 2 minutes from the train!
space: Charming, well lit room in a two bedroom apartment. Room contains a full-size Casper bed, nightstand, dresser, clothing rack, and a large desk. The room gets great sunlight during the day and has a private entrance separate from the apartment entrance for extra privacy.  I do usually live in this room, so be prepared to be have my personal belongings in the space. I will clear out space for you to hang and store clothes and other belongings. Toiletries and towels are provided if needed, as well as as a blowdryer for your convenience. There is an iron and ironing board in the room as well :)

There is a dining table that opens up larger if needed. The bathroom is great with a window in the bathtub.. It's on Rivington St., on a 5th floor walk-up near all bars, restaurants, galleries and The New Museum. It would be great for people in the arts. Laundry is a few blocks away, and it's close to the subway. It's really a fun neighborhood with a lot going on, and walking distance to Soho, Chinatown, and the East Village. name: Spacious Lower East Side Apt in NYC
space: One bedroom for rent (within a 2 bedroom apartment) - Full size bed - all linens, blankets, pillows, towels provided - Full kitchen with appliances, pots/pans, spices, etc. - Air conditioning in the summer - Living Room with plenty of room for seating  - Large windows providing great natural light  - Hardwood floors throughout the apartment - Bathroom with full size tub - Free WI-FI  The apartment is filled with original artwork and photography from artists in NY and LA. name: ARTY 2 BED EAST VILLAGE GEM
space: The Manhattan apartment: - Is a cute two bedroom with combined dining area and kitchen in the heart of the east village. - North facing so great light in the bedrooms. - Free wifi - Hardwood floors throughout apartment - One bathroom - shower and tub combination - This is also a pre-war building - I chose it because it has character but it is also not the newest building - I love it - because it has character - If you are looking for all marble luxury apt I am not the place for you - but if you are looking for a truly bohemian creative comfortable space you will love it .... - Fully equipped kitchen (microwave, toaster, gas oven, coffee machine, fridge freezer, etc) - No cigarette smoking in the apartment, but fine if you want to smoke in the common garden area out back or go up to the roof. - Third floor walk up. - Washer and dryer in the basement. - The apt is filled with lots of original art and personal signature design peices and if I say so myself just has a really cool chill vib

name: Williamsburg Loft: Amazing Sublet
space: Welcome SPRING in NYC - A beautiful Loft for sublet in Williamsburg SPECTACULAR Authentic loft with high ceiling (18 feet!) huge windows, lots of light, and magnificent views of Manhattan skyline. name: Spacious 2BR near Botanic Garden
space: Please contact us before sending a reservation request, as we have too many variables to always keep our calendar 100% accurate.   Next available chunks of time are several weeks between late March thru mid-May, 2018, and then we are wide open from the 2nd week of June onward. Experience the heartbeat of Brooklyn in our very spacious third floor 2BR apartment in a historic elevator building.  Stroll down the world's first parkway along tree-lined brick pathways to the Brooklyn Museum (.6 mile), Botanic Gardens! (.6 mile) and the famous Prospect Park (.7 mile).   It's hard to believe these lovely, wide open spaces exist only 1/2 block from the 3 train at Nostrand Avenue (or 2 blocks from the 2/5 at President, or 2.5 long blocks to the 4/5 at Franklin), making Times Square a mere 40 minutes away.   Traditionally West Indian, the neighborhood of Crown Heights is quickly attracting trendy restaurants and shops like its chic neighbor across the park, Park Slope and the thriving neighborhood

name: Exquisite Spacious Studio in Midtown
space: Super modern with top tier appliances  (52'' LCD sony bravia with surround system, Apple TV, cables, a/c, radiator, microwave, printer, fax, phone line, oven, toaster). WIFI SPEED: 200 MBS!!!!!! This apartment is brand new renovated. You will pay half the price of a similar hotel room but with double the value !!! Crunch Gym and New York Sports Club are steps away!!! Laundromat in the building basement. Elevator is in the building as well. This apartment is located in the heart of Chelsea, on 24th street between 7th and 8th avenue. couple of feet away from all the major subway lines 1,2,3,a,c,e. There is a huge organic supermarket adjacent to my apartment. I have a GPS for your convenience. The building is monitored by door mans 24/7. The apartment is located between the avenues hence there is absolute quiet here. There are shades and curtains so if you like to sleep in a complete darkness feel free to do so. I have all the amenities in hand to make your trip joyful and unforgettable.

name: COMFORTABLE LARGE ROOM
space: Your room is very large, bright (3large windows) and comfortable, with ample closet space, queen sized bed, chest, dresser, 32 inches TV.

name: Lower East Side 1bedroom apt in NYC
space: Lower East Side 1 bedroom Apt for rent on one of the best streets in the Lower East Side of the city, putting you in the ideal proximity to wonderful restaurants, art galleries and shopping. It is also within walking distance of the East Village, Soho and Chinatown and one subway stop away from Williamsburg, Brooklyn. The B, D, F, J,M,Z trains and M15 Bus are all within a 2-4 block radius so transportation is in abundance or you can catch a yellow cab right outside the front door. The entire apartment is available for as low as $129 per night and can accommodate 4 people. Fresh linens and towels are provided.  All utilities and agency fees are included NO SMOKING  NO PETS  RESPONSIBLE PEOPLE ONLY! Please get in touch before reserving the apartment to make sure that it is available and tell me a little bit about yourself and your trip to NYC! Thanks.

name: A Great Place to Stay in Brooklyn!
space: The house is very spacious and large, bigger than it looks in the pictures! There are three common areas; kitchen, living room, and a studio room where we work with our computers. If you are coming to NYC to do research, or need a space to study/ work while you're here, you've found your place.  The house has only one bathroom and we are two people living in the house already; so if you come with another person there will be four of us and just one bathroom. This means that we'll have to be very respectful with our time and cleanliness in the restroom. Please keep this in mind! Your room has a private entrance, so you can come in and out of the house in your own privacy. As before mentioned, the apartment has three bedrooms; my room and two more (including yours). I usually rent them to long-term travelers (1-3 months) so you will share the apartment with me and another fellow Airbnb traveler.  I like to have people from all over the world sharing this apartment with me, this is the be

name: Large Beautiful East Village 1-Bdrm
space: The beautifully-designed apartment is in an immaculately maintained historic walk-up and has been renovated with dark bamboo flooring, butcher-block counter tops, and includes new refrigerator, gas range, microwave, toaster, blender, and dishwasher!  There are also five south-facing windows, a 3D HDTV with Hulu Plus, Netflix, Wi-Fi, and separate bedroom with queen bed.  The living room has a sectional couch and plenty of additional seating, including a dining area that seats up to 6 and an additional 2 stools for the kitchen counter.  The renovated bathroom has marble floors and bathtub/shower. I will usually be available to greet and check guests into the apartment. Located in the heart of the East Village on Saint Marks Place, this apartment is only one block from Tompkins Square Park (with the best dog park in Manhattan), a few blocks from the 6, N, R, F, and L trains, Astor place, the New Museum, the Bowery, and the Lower East Side.  There are hundreds of restaurants and shops with

name: Quiet Comfy Spacious Executive Love Nest!
space: (Please have in your Airbnb profile an i.d. verification, especially if you haven't been reviewed yet. Writing something about your life and work in the profile will be appreciated. I like to know who my guests are!) This harmonious, luminous, peaceful, private, very quiet and comfortable one-bedroom apartment is in the middle of the best street in Manhattan's best neighborhood: Alphabet City, within the East Village and Lower East Side.  Location: E. 8th Street, between lively Avenues B and C, the coolest Avenues in the City. And just half a block from beautiful Tompkins Square Park.  Third floor corner apartment, at the rear of a modern elevator building, with picture windows facing trees in a large courtyard. No street exposure, so it is very quiet.  You'll hear birds singing (guaranteed) - in Manhattan! Designed for work and relaxation.  There's a desk and two top-of-the-line ergonomic work chairs. Extremely comfortable furniture: queen-size bed with a firm Sealy posturepedic mattr

name: Big room near Prospect Park! NY!
space: Welcome!  We are a couple and look forward to sharing our apartment with travelers.  Both of us are musicians and we hope you are not bothered by us practicing :). Of course, as always, we are both very flexible and are willing to work with our guests schedules. The apartment is really big, has two huge bedrooms with a Full size bed for one or two people (the one on the photo is where you would stay), separate kitchen and a bathroom we share. The rent includes free internet (Wi-Fi) and all the utilities. There is a gas stove, oven and microwave if you like cooking. Laundry in the basement of the building with elevator. We are only two blocks from the subway and only two blocks from the most amazing park in Brooklyn: Prospect Park. In five minutes you will enjoy nature; lakes, woods and beautiful fauna. Shops, restaurants and groceries are around the corner and beautiful coffee shops too.  In only 20 minutes you land in lower Manhattan and the same train will take you to places like Tim

name: EAST VILLAGE Duplex with ROOF DECK!
space: Beautiful, spacious and quiet East Village apartment with a private rooftop deck.  All wood floors, open space, brick walls, surrounded by green in summer.  This is a lovely duplex in the best neighborhood in NYC if you want quiet amidst East Village excitement. There are lots of trees (and birds), great restaurants and markets, theaters, music, proximity to transport of all varieties (including CITIbike), and historic Tompkin Square Park. Three bedrooms, 2 full baths, all amenities, and did we mention the great roof deck.  Near metro L Train (next stop heading east: the too cool hipster Williamsburg) and other transit opportunities (buses, easy cabs, new Citibikes). Our apartment has the following characteristics: * Quiet top floor with private roof deck overlooking neighborhood with views of bridges to the Empire State Building and, now World Trade Center #1. * A park across street - Sauer Park - and trees out all windows * Calm homey environment * Owner occupied (4 units) small buil

name: Great Room In Bushwick! Musicians!
space: Renting a room in my building which is on the first floor. Going to be gone from February 27th to March 14th.  Has two bathrooms.  A backyard.  Also a common area in the basement which is like our living room.  Three other people have their own rooms on the floor.  Cool building, everyone keeps to themselves mostly and also hangs out at times.

name: Beautiful Room in Manhattan Loft
space: One of two PRIVATE ROOMS in shared apartment with Host.  Please read through the whole description. Beautiful, cozy private room & semi-private bathroom in a spectacular, sunny Manhattan Loft in the heart of the Flower District.   Don't let the commercial door fool you.  Once inside, an oasis awaits at the top of the stairs where you will be greeted warmly. The apartment is close to the world renowned Macy's Department store & 34th St shopping which includes shops such as Victoria's Secret, Banana Republic, Zara, H&M, Gap, Old Navy, DSW etc. and The Manhattan Mall just to name a few. The Flatiron building is minutes away as well as Amazing restaurants & eateries such as "The John Dory" & "The Breslin" at The Ace Hotel, and Mario Batali's spectacular "Eataly" which is a Gastronomical Delight. If you love Barbeque & live music then Hill Country is for you. Mexican lovers will be thrilled with Dos Caminos and of course the famous Shake Shack for delectable, juicy burgers.  For coffee love

name: Last Minute Nice Big Brooklyn Loft
space: Our loft is 1400 sq ft space with ton s of light and a great sunset (also can be seen from the accessible  roof.  We are on the top (4TH) floor freight elevator can be used for luggage.  We are a couple blocks walk to JMZ  and another few blocks to lorimer L train.  Many bars, restaurants and shops in between.  There is laundry washer and dryer on the floor. We have high speed internet and flat screen tv in bedroom as well as a massive wall projector and killer speakers for movies, netflix and cable tv. The space is really big and open there is only one bedroom up stairs in the loft with a california king bed, and a baby room downstairs with a single bed and a crib.   There are plants every where and i have spent the last few years playing around with decor so our loft is very much a labor of love  that will make for the coziest brooklyn stay.

name: Luxury, Adorable Studio Apartment
space: This gracious and cozy studio home includes a eat-in kitchen and bath. It has one Queen size bed and one pull out twin bed with linens and towels included. Flat screen TV. Air conditioner and ceiling fan. Wonderful light with a view of a garden. Very clean and quiet. There is an air mattress located in a cabinate above the entry way between the kitchen and bedroom. When you check out please leave your keys on the table in the kitchen. Silverware is also located in the drawers of the table in the kitchen.  It is located on a quiet street within blocks of nice restaurants, fun bars and cafes. 3 blocks from the subway line 4,5,6. It is near Museum Mile, Madison Avenue Shopping and Health Clubs.  My home can easily become your home during your trip to New York.

name: Beautiful and Spacious Room in Homey Apartment

It has a brick wall, good sized closet, and two big east-facing windows so lots of sunlight.  Clean sheets and towels are provided. Secure WIFI is accessible in the entire apartment.  The apartment has one good sized bathroom and full sized bathtub and shower. The floor-through apartment is spacious, beautiful (approximately 1,000 sq feet) and has hardwood floors and brick walls throughout, east and west facing windows and tons of sunlight during the day.  It has one a large, fully-equipped (no dishwasher) kitchen.  My bedroom is on the opposite side of the apartment.   Laid out like a loft, the living/dining are open right into the kitchen. name: Cozy 1 bedroom in Union Square
space: It's a 1 bedroom apt. not a share. Fully furnished and all utilities included (gas, electric, heating). Small kitchen, living room and bedroom. The apt. is ideal for one person or a couple.  Great location in Manhattan, 3 blocks away from Union Square and in front of the 3rd Ave. L train. There's plenty of supermarkets, bars and restaurants in the area. The Union Square farmers market, Trader Joe's and Wholefoods are all in walking distance.  15 min. walk to Soho and West Village. Two train stops to Williamsburg, Brooklyn.

name: Eastern Parkway Brooklyn 1BR Flat
space: Gorgeous, true one-bedroom apartment in Brooklyn in walk-up building with hardwood floors, near the Brooklyn museum, one block from 2/3/4/5 IRT Line. I am an artists traveling frequently, and this is a flat of tranquility and peace. 10 minutes to Downton Brooklyn, 20 minutes to Manhattan. This is true one bedroom apartment, with a full kitchen (Kitchen is fully equipped with range, oven, microwave, toaster, and super large refrigerator), huge bathroom, and living area that can sleep one more person.  I have many great books and DVD's you are welcome to read and view. There is a fresh food market across the street, and many bars and restaurants nearby on Franklin Avenue. A friend will serve as my property manager while I am away and will check the mail daily. They will have the keys to the apartment to enter only in an emergency. This place is ideal for couples traveling from overseas. I am LGBTQ friendly as well so please don't hesitate to inquire. Internet provided as well.

name: 1400sf Manhattan View Artistic Loft
space: 1 bedroom is available in a 1400sq.ft. 2-bedroom duplex loft in Greenpoint, Brooklyn. 250s.f. isolated room comes with a large built-in closet, queen size bed, side furniture and an AC unit. The loft has a washing machine, dryer, dishwasher, jacuzzi bath, designer's furniture, internet access and home phone. The space includes large dining area, living room area, fully equipped kitchen and additional bed zone for guests. 14ft. floor to ceiling windows with a beautiful view on Manhattan and 24 hr. access to the rooftop are great advantages. The building is located in a converted warehouse on the East River. 5 min walk to the G train Greenpoint station, or 10 min walk to Vernon-Jackson stop on 7 train, or 20 min walk (10 min by bus) to Bedford station on L train. A water ferry is just a few blocks away and goes straight to 34 street in Manhattan within 10 min.  The neighborhood is very artistic with many cozy restaurants, bars, food stores, organic markets, local designers stores, parks.

The apartment is close to the Marcy stop on the JMZ (connecting Soho, LES, West Village & JFK or Rockaway beach) and to either Bedford or Lorimer on the L (Union Square, East Village, Chelsea or Bushwick plus transfers uptown to Central Park and Times Square) train.  Also the G train! The G train take you to Prospect Park, Clinton Hill, Fort Greene, Greenpoint and Long Island City.  The Ferry at South 8th takes you to DUMBO, or Wall Street.  The Ferry at North 6th goes to Midtown. There is natural, diffused light through the apartment, your room has a large windows, a full sized bed and a built in closet.  The kitchen is small, but the appliances are all new, and there is spa

name: Private MasterBR w/ View of Museum
space: Airbnb verified. Wake up to a one-of-a-kind New York view - a DIRECT view of the center of front of the Brooklyn Museum. The bedroom could only be closer to the Museum if it were actually on the grounds. Stay in one of New York's safest, most convenient, and most beautiful locations. When Airbnb's top photographer, who had photographed hundreds of apartments, came to photograph our home, he couldn't stop talking about how lucky we are to live here (we agree!). [You can look up "The Martinique" on Eastern Parkway (third floor!) to see exactly where we are.] He said he'd never seen a place so ideally situated (he also noted how clean we keep it). We appreciate how special our spot is and enjoy sharing our home and the pleasures of living across the street from the Museum and the Botanic Garden. But if you seek one or all of the following: a fairly large room in an apartment in a safe Manhattan neighborhood, a sane host, a comfortable sized living space, clean linens, disinfected surfaces, a sturdy bed, a nice 40 inch LCD TV with an Amazon Fire Stick attached, access to all common areas of the apartment, a sweeping view of the Midtown skyline including the Empire State Building, and an easy-going, and a courteous host who is hardly around, then this is the place for you. Easy to navigate, as the Q/B Express trains to Manhattan will take you directly to Chinatown, Union Square, Herald Square, Times Square, Rockefeller Plaza, Central Park, and more! Head south on the Q and you can check out historic Coney Island or even hang out on the beach in the summers! My place is located in the Prospect Park South neighborhood, just a block from its beautiful historic namesake. name: Comfy Brooklyn 2BD, W/ Backyard
space: This apartment has two bedrooms with one queen and one full size bed, a fully stocked kitchen, big bathroom,  wireless internet, tv for movies, washer/dryer and a backyard.   The backyard has a grill if you want to cook and a garden if you want to relax.  There will be cherry blossoms in the backyard depending on when you come.  We are 15 minutes (walking) from several different trains and from the very commercial Greenpoint, Williamsburg and Bushwick neighborhoods of Brooklyn.  It is a very young area but also culturally diverse, polish food abounds locally and every other kind within a short walk.  Come relax in this young hip brooklyn neighborhood at night and then walk over the Williamsburg bridge to the faster one in Manhattan during the day.  Thats what we do!  If you dont wanna walk, there are three different L train stops (for going into manhattan via 14th st./union square) about 20 minutes each from the door, and a G train ( for going into queens and to downtown brooklyn) that

name: Mod Brooklyn Apartment 1
space: Hi, I am offering a twin-bed bedroom in a light and airy 3-bedroom apartment. The bed is antique iron and its mattress is very comfortable. The linens are 100% cotton. There is wireless Internet.  The apartment is on the second floor of a newly (and tastefully) renovated turn-of-the-century brick building on a tree-lined block that is know for its artist lofts. It is located east of Williamsburg in a safe family-oriented neighborhood in Bushwick. (Other parts of Bushwick can be more industrial and/or sketchy.) A community garden blooms next door. The apartment has lots of characterÛÓexposed brick, wood floors, wood trim and great light. It also has a great layout that works well for sharing the space.  All bookings require a minimum of 2 nights and could be long term depending on your situation and what we negotiate.  It's just a short 1.5 blocks to the  L Train and a 20-minute zip to central Union Square.  It's a quick walk to the M train, which takes you down to the Lower East Side in

name: Loft guest room, best Williamsburg
space: Hello! I'm renting a large private guest room in a two bedroom loft. It's located in the best part of trendy Williamsburg, Brooklyn ÛÒ 3 blocks from the Bedford L subway stop, between North 8th and 9th Streets. It's on the 2nd floor of a beautifully maintained, safe loft building that used to be a shirt factory - it has a lot of the unique, real loft building-type detail.  This space is also occupied by me - I'm an interior designer. It's a great for both couples or for people traveling on their own. Your bedroom: a minimally and tastefully furnished private room with a very comfortable (real) bed. It's located on the opposite end of the 1000 sq ft space from the second bedroom. name: Williamsburg, block from Bedford L
space: Available:  June 5th-June 14th 2015. This 1 bedroom apartment could not be in a more convenient location in Williamsburg! It's located just 1 block from the Bedford L train stop and just 1 stop to Manhattan. Walking distance to all boutique shopping, delicious dining and non-stop night life. The neighborhood is safe at all hours and right next door is a taxi service. Get your coffee fix at the Verb across the street, wine at Uva next door and check out a band at the Williamsburg Music Hall just 2 blocks away. There are so many art events, new restaurants and music shows, I recommend checking out:  (Website hidden by Airbnb)  Yes this is the Hipster Capital of the world but there are also a tons of fun activities for kids. name: Cute Chic Studio - Heart of Chelsea
space: HI ALL! I live alone in this VERY functional cozy studio in Chelsea on 21st street between 8th and 9th. In the middle of everything. Right between Midtown and the West Village. Walking distance to both - Perfect NYC location to stay! Apt is on the third floor of a walk up building, has full size bed, flat screen plasma TV with cable, high speed internet, full kitchen, full bath, blender, Keurig coffee maker, laundry in the basement for cheap, and is in a prime Chelsea location - close to everything.  Inquire within for more info, pics, etc. Tell me a little about yourself! :)  About me: I am a 30 y.o gay male. Laid back, easy going, non-smoker, not a pet owner but they are ok in the bldg and in the apartment if you have one.  Thanks for looking!  21st street at 8th ave Access to everything! Text or email cool. Phone calls welcome as well.  Please keep in mind that this is a residence which is not set up like a hotel. I live here, my stuff is in drawers and closet, etc.

name: Park Slope Sunny Studio
space: Charming, renovated studio with separate kitchen in a classic turn-of-the-century brownstone in Park Slope, Brooklyn - one of the most desirable neighborhoods in New York.   The apartment is on the third floor (up two flights of stairs) with its own private entry from the common hallway and overlooks the backyard and garden. The bedroom has a very comfortable queen size bed, desk & chair, TV with cable (Showtime, HBO, etc.) and WiFi. The separate eat-in kitchen is fully equipped with a stove, microwave, dishwasher, toaster, coffee maker, cookware and condiments. The bathroom is spacious and features a large shower and sink area. The bedroom is air conditioned and there is a ceiling fan in the kitchen area. The house and apartment are non-smoking. Our block - Carroll Street between 5th and 6th Avenue - is quiet, tree-lined, and steps away from the many restaurants, cafes, and trendy shops on 5th Avenue and 7th Avenue.  Easy walking or biking distance to Prospect Park, the jewel of Brook

name: Luxury L-Shape Studio + 3 cats
space: Apartment is located in the quiet and friendly Sheepshead Bay neighborhood of Brooklyn, very close to all transportation including the 'Neck Rd' Q train just 4 short blocks away. Located next to the metro are all near by convenience stores like the neighborhood favorite Anyway Cafe, NetCost Supermarket, liquor/flower/laundry/beauty/dry cleaner shops. Get off the train, get your shopping on, and get home in one easy swoop.  Luxury fully furnished L shaped studio, alcove for bed and nightstands separate from living area. name: Beautiful 1 bdrm, Inwood Manhattan
space: If you are looking for a home away from home, in the most beautiful neighborhood in Manhattan (quiet enough to feel like a different world but only 20 minutes away from Midtown Manhattan via Subway), with a host on the premises to answer questions, look no further. The details are as follow; please email me for any further questions: - Large living room in 1bedroom apartment - 4th floor apartment with elevator - Calm, quiet neighborhood in Northern Manhattan with easy access to lower Manhattan via the A-express train or the 1 Train. - Five minute walk from Inwood park (gorgeous) and Columbia University Sports Complex - Excellent restaurant ("Indian Road Cafe") around the corner. - Very nice Bodega/food-store down the Street near Broadway. - Diners, Restaurants, Bars, Gas Station, Target, Starbucks, Grodery stores, Pharmacies etc within 1 to 10 block radius - Laundry and Dryer in building  - Elevator  - Dvd Player, Dvds, Roku with access to Netflix streaming, Big TV - Sports equipment (

name: Beautiful Loft/10 min to Manhattan!
space: Large room located in beautiful loft space to be shared with two young 20 something roommates, both are new to New York and remain busy outside of the house. Household culture is a clean, organized, zen, no drama and a no-party zone.  The neighborhood is known as the Bushwick/East Willamsburg area of Brooklyn, also been called Morgantown. The  area is super young and super safe. Great bars and places to eat all around, the famous Roberta's pizza is located directly across from the building. Organic food shops, Coffee shop and Sushi place literally around the corner. The L train is a 1 minute walk and gets you into the city in 10 minutes. There are washers/dryers located in the basement for you to wash clothes.  Price by the day includes electricity, heat and  High-speed wireless Internet. Room is furnished  Full size bed and a huge closet to hang your clothes. Large space with exposed brick.  Minimum stay 5 days.  Check out my reviews :)

name: New York City- Riverdale Modern two bedrooms unit
space: The unit includes: Fully equipped kitchen with refrigerator, stove-top, microwave, toaster, and coffee maker.  Full bath with tub and shower *Bedding, towels, hair dryer, iron, have all been provided Master bedroom with a comfortable queen size bed. A second bedroom with 2 twin beds. Free WiFi Internet access along with a 50 inch plasma smart screen TV,  Fios enabled. extra storage space. for kids: etra playpen, toddler bed.

name: Central Park Artsy Guest Room
space: The best deal!!! Private budget bedroom for up to 3 people - one full size Bed for 2 and a twin size  bed (bunk beds) for the 3rd person - very stylish and spacious apartment to share with host family. 4th floor walk-up. All amenities included (iron,air dryer, A/c in room, towels, sheets, A/c, , Wifi). Private/shared Bathroom (shared with one other guest room if occupied). Daily cleaning service in common area. Kitchen is available for breakfast and for small cooking (no cooking at night). It's the best deal for your budget. Extremely well located next to express subway lines 2,3 (15 min to Times Square), across the street from central park with buses M2,3 4, down the hill from Columbia and The restaurant Row on Frederick Douglass Blvd - Live jazz and music 4 blocks away - Gospel church around the corner, the beautiful Morningside area with all its little cafes and ethnic restaurants,  and the majestic St John the Divine Cathedral.

name: Midtown NYC - 1 Bedroom Apartment
space: I've only been with AirBnB since 2012 - but I've been accommodating satisfied guests from all over the world for almost 20 years! The apartment is in midtown Manhattan - right in the middle of everything that you'd want to be close to in NYC - really everything! Rock Center, Central Park, 5th Ave Shopping, Time Square, Columbus Circle, Subways, Museums, Broadway Theaters and more! Apartment is clean and clutter free - because it is a rental only - meaning I have no personal items there. The apartment is smoke free. I use a professional cleaning service between every rental. The apartment is fully stocked with many amenities - plenty of extra clean sheets and towels, full kitchen, dishwasher, washer & dryer, coffee maker, hair dryer, flat hair iron, iron and ironing board, WIFI, cable TV, and even some breakfast items. Sleeping Accommodations: I have a queen bed in the living area  - and a second queen bed in the bedroom.  Please note the bed in the bedroom is on a platform approximatel

name: THERE'S NO PLACE LIKE HOME.........

At the corner is a veganrestaurant, Seasoned Vegan, 24 hour deli, and laundry mat, two blocks away are the  C/D/A/B/ & 2/3 express train.  you can be in downtown Manhattan in less than 15 min.   * Bedrooms are furnished with double beds, dresser, ample closet spaces, lamps.   the second bedroom can have a double bed or a trundle for two . i supply towels, sheets, pillows, soaps, shampoo, in a clean apartment.  Welcome to New York! Apartment features:    - Two REAL windowed bedrooms - 10 foot ceilings (3 meters)  - full kitchen -1.5 baths - Safe neighborhood. -No Elevator, a walk up to Apt, 4 floors. -A/C July-Sept or when heat is above 86F) or fan in the room, If you have A?C there may be an additional fee only if the electric bill spikes beyond the normal $60 per month. space: 4 rooms sharing 2 bathrooms and common kitchen/living room - please have a look at the attached plan next door to museum and beautiful park/garden; truly unique experience in NYC. As much privacy as you like, but a welcoming host is available to help you enjoy your stay!

name: Charming brownstone apt with patio
space: Charming floor through apartment located on the 2nd floor of a brownstone building in Columbia Waterfront District. About 700sqft open layout with 3 large windows allowing for plenty of light. Original moldings, high tin ceilings and wood plank floors. -Queen size bed in the main bedroom -Full size bed in the tiny second bedroom -Couch for additional guests  and an air mattress available as well. -Wireless internet -Fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher and a large dining table -Large living room with flatscreen TV -Bathroom with towels, bathroom essentials, hair drier and washer/dryer. -Private porch to enjoy when the weather is warm. name: Full Rm - Chelsea Gallery District
space: Private Single bedroom with full bed in a three bedroom apartment with one shared bath. Direct access to apartment door granting maximum privacy. Please note there used to be a cat living here, but she has found a wonderful home elsewhere! Suitable for singles or couples! Guaranteed to give you an awesome story about visiting New York & staying in a cool apartment!!! One Block from the Highline, Subways, Galleries, in the middle of the west side scene, I offer a cozy but private room in a three bedroom apartment in Chelsea. Wireless internet included. Apartment shared with professional artistic person. Great for people on the go!

name: williamsburg . 10 min from soho .
space: The apartment is right off  Brodway Avenue south  of the Williamsburg Bridge. So you can take a relaxing bike ride over the bridge into Manhattan, or walk  1  block to the L or J,M,Z trains.  you are like 5 minutes from Bedford Avenue that  is one of the most beautiful streets in all of Brooklyn, filled with cafes, book shops, independent clothing stores, fine cheese shops etc. Williamsburg is really the heart and soul of New York's artistic youth culture, and there are amazing bands playing, outdoor movies, etc etc always happening. It's a great place to stay! The room in question is  kind of big. have a big wood door.  a lot of light .

name: Your Hell's Kitchen Sanctuary
space: Hello + Welcome!  I'd love to tell you a bit about my charming and peaceful apartment in the heart of Midtown Manhattan.  I'm Jessie and you are renting my private room in a two bedroom apartment.  The apartment is shared with me, my pal/roommate Kristina, and her super friendly cat, Cooper.   We both travel a lot and love renting on airbnb.  This apartment is especially great for people who are independent travelers and enjoy meeting new people.   This is a quiet block in the middle of it all. About the neighborhood: Around the corner you have Amy's Bread (a local bakery), Starbucks, Duane Reade (a 24 hour pharmacy) and countless restaurants. Restaurant row, a popular place to eat before Broadway shows, is the view from the living room window!  The apartment is located steps away from Broadway shows, Times Square and just 10 blocks from Central Park! Stroll a few avenues west and you've arrived at the Intrepid Museum along the Hudson River.  Every subway line is accessible in Times Sq

name: Designer studio in Luxury Building
space: PLEASE  ********INQUIRE FIRST******** IF THE DATES ARE AVAILABLE BEFORE BOOKING. THANK YOU. Located in Manhattan. Fully furnished 750 sq.ft studio. Beautiful corner unit in a luxurious 24 hour doorman building that is impeccably maintained. Room flushed with plenty of sunlight. High ceilings and large windows overlooking the Hudson River and view of Statue of Liberty, Staten Island and Brooklyn. Beautiful open water views with no building obstructions.  A quiet corner unit and safe area. Most beautiful area in all of Financial District! Surrounded by parks and full of trees. Located right on the West Street where there is a path for walking, jogging, rollerblading, biking, tanning all along the Hudson River. Breathtaking sunsets. Plus the Westside Highway gives you easy access to get all the way uptown west by taxi quickly or take the FDR to get uptown on the east side of Manhattan. name: NYC 2 Bedroom-Perfect for families!
space: Our apartment is located on the UWS of Manhattan at 102nd and Broadway, 1 block from the subway, and walking distance to Central and Riverside Park.  We are near a variety of good restaurants (Japanese, French, Italian, Turkish, Indian, just to name a few) and Columbia University.  Our apartment works well for a couple, or a family with 1-2 children.  We have 2 bedrooms:  one has a twin bed, plus either a second foldout single bed or a crib (we can provide). The other bedroom is a full height loft overlooking the living area with a queen bed and its own bathroom. Our three-level apartment is quiet and clean, with hardwood floors and high ceilings.   Other nice perks:  a deck, full kitchen with a dishwasher, high-speed internet, and coin-operated laundry in the basement.  There is generally parking on or near our street. We are 15 minutes from Times Square by subway.

name: Private cozy bedroom in Nolita
space: I live in a 2-bedroom apartment in Nolita and I rent out my second bedroom for short-term stays. So you will be SHARING the apartment with me. The room is all to yourself and it is opposite from my room so you have you total privacy. 1 small clean bathroom to share with me.   The apartment is perfectly situated in the heart of the Soho/Nolita neighborhood in Manhattan. The room has a full sized bed, bookshelf, closet, and a drawer. I will provide fresh sheets and bath towels, hair dryer and you can use my shampoo and soap as you wish. The apartment has hardwood floors throughout and it is furnished with extremely well stocked kitchen that is fully available for your use.  The apartment is located in a classic walk-up pre-war apartment building in the 1st floor in one of the coolest and very safe neighborhood, near to lots of restaurants, bars, banks, Laundromat, shops and supermarkets, subway and buses. Perfect for a single person or a couple who wants to visit New York City.  10 minut

name: Big bright & private, heart o Wburg
space: For rent is the 3rd bedroom in my large sunny and beautiful 3 bedroom floor- thru apartment.  The bedroom itself is fairly large, has 3 big windows and gets the best wi-fi reception of the whole apartment.  It's at the far end of the hallway so is very quiet and private.  We have wi-fi, cable tv, lots of records, dvds, guitars, and ample art supplies and space if you need to work on a project.  I work from home frequently on furniture restoration, gilding and graphic design.  The 3rd roommate only lives here on the weekends, so you'd mostly only be sharing the apartment with me.  We have 1 cat, they're old and friendly and tend to stay in my room.   Feel free at all times to use the kitchen, watch a movie, feel at home.  The apartment is located in a great neighborhood in Williamsburg, Brooklyn; very very close to subways (Graham L is closest but Lorimer & Grand are also very close), there are always yellow cabs on the street to be hailed, 24 hour food places, great bars restaurants an

name: Flatiron-Designer's loft
space: Hello there, This apartment is for 1 or 2 people.  I'm looking for extremely responsible and respectful people to live in my home while I'm away. Half a block from the 6 train and N/R and a 5 minute walk to Union Square Apartment/Building 10th floor apartment /11 ft ceilings /3 huge south facing windows with views Tons of natural light Designer's furniture (tenants need to be extremely careful with it) Viking stove/SMEG fridge/Bosh dishwasher Soaking tub Queen size bed Wifi Washer/Dryer are on the same floor The neighborhood is very quiet and extremely safe.

name: Best Location in Greenwich Village
space: A charming beautifully furnished 1  bedroom (king-size bed), one bath apartment nestled on a quiet, tree-lined street, 4 blocks from  Union Square, with its Farmers Green Market 4 days/week, and Washington Square Park,  with its music,  fountain and world famous 5th Ave. Arch. Steps from Fifth Avenue shopping, University Place, SOHO boutiques and gourmet food stores including Whole Foods, Traders Joes and Agata and Valentina.   Within walking distance to NYU, the West Village, East Village, Little Italy, SOHO, Chelsea Galleries, and Chinatown.  Lots of closet space and kitchen pantry. Close to all subway lines and within 10 minutes by subway to Tribeca and Financial District, Lincoln Center, Times Square, Broadway, MOMA, and the Metropolitan Museum of Art. Order in, dine out or prepare meals in this cook's kitchen. This neighborhood has some of the best restaurants in the city. Enjoy living in this light and airy vacation getaway with large windows in every room. Wrought iron entryway

name: Stylish Designer Studio with Piano
space: Tastefully renovated and fully furnished studio apartment, with separate entrance in a 19th century landmark townhouse on a quite tree lined street in Sugar Hill - Harlem. The kitchen features a Nespresso machine for espresso lovers and a pietra cardosa counter top. There is a queen size sofa bed with a high quality latex mattress. It features a Steinway baby grand piano, a washer and dryer (one unit) and fast internet access (wifi) Only two subway stops to midtown Manhattan with A/D train. This is an artist friendly neighborhood with a great history. Billie Holiday lived on our street for a while and Duke Ellington just around the corner.  The neighborhood features some interesting museums too: The Morris - Jumel Mansion, Audubon Terrace and of course the famous Cloisters a little further uptown. The Hudson River is close and there is Riverbank and Jackie Robinson Park. Access to the garden can be arranged upon request.

name: New York City for All Seasons!
space: LISTING IS NOT CURRENTLY ACTIVE, or AVAILABLE . PLEASE CHECK BACK IN DECEMBER 2017... THANK YOU!!!  Richelle "Richelle and her son are lovely people and they have a very nice place. name: One Block From Central Park!
space: Studio apartment in the Carnegie Hill area of the Upper East Side. One block from Central Park, 3 Blocks from away from the Guggenheim Museum and the rest of Museum Mile, which includes the Metropolitan Museum of Art.  Great shopping on Madison Avenue and wonderful restaurants all right outside your door. There are 5 great restaurants on the same block as the apartment. Go jogging in Central Park, shopping on Madison Avenue and visit the museums all within minutes walk of the apartment. 5-10 minute walk to the subway, puts you in midtown Manhattan in minutes. PRIME location. Pull-out sofa bed great for one or a couple. I have 2 twin air mattress as well. Very comfortable. They are the typical height of a bed. There is wifi and air conditioning and a Nespresso machine.

name: PARK SLOPE: SWEET, LARGE 2BR DUPLEX
space: This two bedroom duplex  is located in Park Slope, Brooklyn. One of New York's popular locations.  This vacation rental consists of 2 living rooms, 2 bedrooms, 1 and a half bathrooms and a kitchen. There are 3 levels including a basement and a second floor. The room represented as living room 2 in the pictures and floor plan is in the basement of this accommodation. It is furnished with a double sized futon and a single bed. This basement room is also provided with a TV that is connected with a Playstation game system and Ruko streaming. The ground floor consists of the living room, which is furnished with a sofa, chair and coffee table and also has a TV with main network channels, and a DVD Player and Roku streaming . There is also a phone in the apartment that can be used to make local calls. The kitchen is also on this level and is fully equipped for your cooking needs, including Wolf six burner stove and espresso  machine. Off the kitchen is a sliding door which gives access to the

name: KOZY ROOM IN FORT GREENE BROOKLYN..
space: Helo and Welcome to A Kozy Room in Fort Greene Brooklyn, this is a home away from home....very relaxed and very comfortable airy space.  The kitchen is for very light cooking and pleeeeeease before 9pm....A perfect and safe home for couples and especially for single women. Fort Greene, Brooklyn is a unique and historic neighborhood, filled with parks, galleries, restaurants, bars, and clubs within walking distance or a quick train ride. Close to most subway lines, welcome to the city that never sleeps Looking forward to You contacting Me..

name: Amazing location-Sunny Bedroom-Lower East Side

name: Light Superhosted Chill LES Apt
space: Light filled, furnished bedroom in our apt in the heart of Lower East Side.  One block from subway, NYC Bike Share, local and Select Bus (makes very few stops - pretty fast).  Near movie theater, fantastic music venues and great restaurants and bars.  Even Whole Foods, basketball courts and a short soccer field.  Wanna try bike polo - no problem they play it nearby.   New high end renovation w wood floors, modern furniture, Jacuzzi tub. We have two bedrooms and they are on opposite sides of the apartment.

name: Avail Dec 24-30 - Brooklyn Large 3+ BR w/ Hot Tub
space: This 3+ bdrm Fort Greene / Clinton Hill large upper duplex in an extra wide country charmer wood frame townhouse is available for short term rentals. Amenities include washer dryer, dishwasher, outdoor barbecue, high speed wi-fi, TV, and air conditioning.   Family/kid friendly.  Dogs allowed.   Nearby attractions include Fort Greene Park, Pratt University, The Brooklyn Flea, the Saturday Greenmarket in Ft Greene Park, BAM (Brooklyn Academy of Music), The new Building 92 Museum at The Navy Yard, MOCADA Museum and more.
