name: ECO-APT, free YOGA, 2 new bedrooms. Best location!
space: Location: Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA (Subway on corner of block. Five minutes to Manhattan)  Accommodations:  Townhome, 2 Bedrooms + Convertible bed(s), 1.5 Baths (Sleeps 7-10) Keywords:  clay walls, radiant floor heating, non-toxic paint, wood floors, bright, sunny, close transportation, two bedroom, washer and dryer, spacious, loft like, garden, pond, ecological, green, native plants, The owner is a green builder and renovated this apartment with a keen eye for health and harmony. 2 bedrooms Huge common space Hardwood floors Tons of light Green eco garden Washer/Dryer Very large & modern apartment in the middle of the city! Perfect for visitors & child friendly. 100 feet from F/G train at 2nd Street Station. Free yoga classes while you visit at yoga studio 1 block away. Perfect for visitors & child friendly.  20% off massages & facial organic spa 2 minutes from the house. Best massages & facials in Brooklyn.

name: Sunny UES 1.5 Bedroom, Sleeps 6
space: Furnished apartment available in the mid 60's near 1st Ave. It's a 1 bedroom with an alcove used as a second bedroom.  Alcove has a bunk bed sectioned off from the hallway by 8 foot tall free-standing bookcases.  The couch converts into a queen size bed.  The apartment can comfortably accommodate up to 6 people.  The luxury high-rise building was built in 1996 and features a full-time doorman, elevator and laundry.  The apartment has heat/AC units in the living room and bedroom that you can control to your liking.  Floor to ceiling windows with wrap-around windows in the living room flood the apartment with light.  It has a modern kitchen which includes a dishwasher and granite kitchen counters.  The wood strip flooring is newly installed.  The apartment has LOTS of closet space for NYC and incredibly tall ceilings. It comes fully furnished with a queen size bed, a bunk bed, sheets, towels, kitchen items, 55" television, high speed internet (50 Mbps) with wifi etc. It's well located in

name: Stay with a Jazz Singer in Harlem!
space: Room is quiet and lovely The room is located on the other side of the apartment so you will have privacy. It can be furnished or unfurnished & is perfect for a student. The room is about 14'x10' with window & closet. 2nd floor walk up. (Two Apartments per floor - 5 Floor Building) Building is very safe & has a fantastic building manager. The apartment is nicely furnished. Beautiful hardwood floors. Nice size kitchen with tile floor. About the Area We are located at the top of Central Park at 111th Street & 8th Avenue. The apartment is just steps away from Columbia University and all the sites in the city! Located at the intersection of Central Park West & 110th Street, this is a lovely area now known as SOHA (South of Harlem). You will have access to Central Park North &  Morningside Park. The area is very safe & boasts the famous Harlem Meer & Central Park Conservatory Garden. The Neighborhood has plenty of nice, new restaurants, cafe's , bars & ample space in the park for picnics, a

name: Cozy space w/ a veteran Superhost!
space: NB: please message before booking to work out details! Scroll down to where you see my profile and click "message host". I love hosting guests in my adorable two-bedroom apartment, so: welcome!  I live in Bushwick, Brooklyn, and my household was part of the vanguard of artists and musicians who lead to a cheap neighborhood becoming cool and beginning to gentrify.  I have seen that change before my eyes, and the neighborhood, while still retaining its Brooklyn grit, is safe and clean.  I am close to the J and M trains, so it's quick to get to midtown or downtown Manhattan or the Lower East Side, a hotspot for live music and nightlife.  There is also  a private rooftop where we can chill out under Christmas lights on balmy summer evenings (and where smokers can go to feed their addiction).   Your room is big enough for your queen-sized bed and not much else (a true New York experience!) but you are more than welcome to share the rest of the lovely apartment and a relaxed and fun-loving c

name: Large Private Room Near Central Park & Mount Sinai
space: Elevator building (no lugging bags up flights and flights of stairs!) located on Madison Avenue. View of Central Park from your bedroom window. A minute walk into Central Park from the building. Steps from Museum Mile!     Do all your sightseeing in the hustle and bustle of New York City then come to the north-eastern corner of Central Park to get away from the tourists and hectic crowds! Sit on the terrace and watch the sun go down in the evenings on the west side. Wake to the sound of birds chirping outside your window in the morning. Private bedroom in spacious 3 bedroom apartment Full-size bed, double closets and desk Apt has full terrace with glass sliding doors and views of Central Park Elevator building and 24/hr security  ApartmentåÊis smoke free, drug free and pet free.  If you're smoker you can smoke on the terrace with the doors shut while you check out the western skyline of the city.  Central Park and Museum Mile are steps away from the from door! Walk to El Museo de Barrio

name: Luxury room in Manhattan Duplex Apt
space: One of two PRIVATE ROOMS in shared apartment with Host.  Please read through the whole listing. Beautiful, spacious Private room and semi-private bathroom in a gorgeous Duplex apartment in the heart of the Flower District. Don't let the commercial door fool you.  Once inside, an oasis awaits at the top of the stairs where you will be greeted warmly. The room has original exposed brick with decorative fireplace.  The apartment is close to the world renowned Macy's Department store & 34th St shopping which includes shops such as Victoria's Secret, Banana Republic, Zara, H&M, Gap, Old Navy, DSW etc.  and The Manhattan Mall just to name a few. The Flatiron building is minutes away as well as Amazing restaurants & eateries such as "The John Dory" & "The Breslin" at The Ace Hotel, and Mario Batali's spectacular "Eataly" which is a Gastronomical Delight.  If you love Barbeque & live music  then Hill Country is for you.  Mexican lovers will be thrilled with Dos Caminos and of course the famous

name: Gorgeous Sunny, Spacious 1 bdrm in East Village
space: Best location to stay in the city. Walk all throughout city. No need for public transportation!  Sunny, extremely cozy large 1 bedroom in great downtown neighborhood with great restaurants. Feels like a loft--High ceilings, all open, closed bedroom, dishwasher, washer dryer in apt, Roku, Internet. Very clean and comfortable and quiet.  Recently renovated bathroom and bedroom. Queen size bed....close to L train and cross town buses.

name: ARTIST LOFT+OFFICE in PRIME WILLIAMSBURG!
space: WELCOME!    I've lived in Williamsburg for 10+ years and can help you with all kinds of tips :)   I'm officially registered with the state as "Bridge Seal" B&B; and have hosted over 700 guests since 2012, so you can know that I help you in any way! I have everything you'll need to make yourselves comfortable and enjoy the space!  --Fresh and clean towels and sheets. --A lofted Queen size bed. --A work desk --Plenty of storage: A hanging closet and plenty of shelving   --By some architectural design, it feels incredibly separated from the rest of the house, as if you are in your own world.  --Amazingly soft Northeast light! --Newly installed light & sound blocking window drapery for the light sleepers and people suffering jet-lag. --Your own Air Conditioning and/or Heater.   --Your bedroom has secure keyed locks. --A healthy selection of plants & flowers. **Early check-ins (before 2pm) and late check-outs (after 12 noon) must be arranged ahead of time and approved on a case by case situ

name: Private Garden Entry
space: Perfect one bedroom with private garden entrance. There is no sharing of bathroom or common space.  This is an ideal place for one person or a couple coming to visit New York for business, family, or spur of the moment fun.    The location is quiet, safe, family oriented, filled with light, near the subway, with ample parking.   The room has a full size bed.  800 thread count Egyptian cotton sheets, Television, Cable, Wifi, and air conditioner. Shampoo, Conditioner, and Body Wash provided. There is a refrigerator, hot water pot, and microwave.  Outdoor garden to relax  One block away you will find Thai food, Steeplechase Coffee shop, Authentic Italian Food shop, Yoga, Health Food, Delis, Pizza, and beer garden.   The F and G trains are located 4 blocks away.  The ride is 20-25 minutes into Union Square. The magnificent Prospect Park is seven blocks away.  This location is also ideal for having a car. The highway is near enough to drive to and far enough not to be heard.   Please feel f

name: Soho Studio Loft!  READ OUR REVIEWS!
space: SOHO designer's loft space on THE HIPPEST street in NYC (Crosby). Fine linens, 16 foot ceilings, hardwood floors, TONS of light...the VERY best of downtown NYC!!! Hotels on this street start at $800 per night so this is a steal. Every detail has been thought of. BUT, you need to be able to walk up 4 flights of stairs should you rent. We DO NOT rent to more than 2 people so please don't (Website hidden by Airbnb) exceptions.  If you are looking to cook during your stay, this is not the flat/apt for you. We have a microwave, mini refrigerator and coffee maker with mugs. There is not a full kitchen for this rental. TV is Roku based. This rental basically functions like a high-end hotel room. This is a very peaceful building so if you are loud partiers this is not the space for you. This was formally Basquiat's artist loft! This is an alcove studio space designed with the utmost detail creating a dreamy feel to the space. There is high speed internet, sound system, mini-refrigerator, eatin

name: Nolita apt. with private garden
space: Renovated 1-bedroom condo apartment with central air conditioning, skylights, and a wall of windows on a private backyard with a BBQ, deck, and plants. Comes with projection TV, cable, WIFI, books, a fully renovated kitchen with granite counters and a dishwasher, marble bath with thermostatic shower.  There is a laundry room in the building, on the same floor.  All linens are provided. Nolita is a charming neighborhood with tree-lined streets and old-world charm. Close to lots and lots of boutiques and restaurants (Cafe Habana, Tacombi, Torresi, Musket Room, etc, etc..)  Whole Foods is just a block away.  Tons of excellent coffee shops: Gimme Coffee on Mott, La Colombe on Lafayette, Bowery Coffee on Houston, Think coffee on Bowery. There is a branch of the New York Public Library on Mulberry, just around the corner from the McNally-Jackson bookstore on Prince. Very convenient to many subway lines; the B, D, Q, M, 6, N, R, J, Z are within a 2-block radius and within walking distance to

name: Family friendly Williamsburg Apt for the Holiday
space: Spacious, Eclectic and Comfy!  Our 900 sq. ft., 2nd Floor apt. sleeps up to 3 people- Queen bed, plus an infant  (Pack and Play).  Located in one of Brooklyn's "hippest" neighborhoods in central Williamsburg it's a quick 1 stop trip by subway into Manhattan.  Fully Furnished, 2nd floor Apartment includes: TONS of light, Private bedroom,  kitchen w/ skylight, dining room, bathroom with tub/shower w/ skylight, Living room sofa for an additional guest. Since we have a 6 month old baby we also offer our guests use of our pack and play, high chair and various other baby gear while you are visiting. ( please let us know in advance if these are things you would like to access) Laundry mat is directly across the street, fresh green grocer, 2 chain grocery stores, health food store, Coffee shops, Wine store, Pizza, Sushi, Shopping, multiple bars and restaurants are ALL on the same block as the apartment. L train is 5-7 min walk, 2 stop subway ride to Manhattan. Free on street parking is within

name: BROWNSTONE TWO IN BROOKLYN in NYC

name: Cozy apartment near Times Square
space: Stay in my one bedroom apartment, only 2 blocks from Times Square. The apartment has a full size sofa in the living room and a comfortable queen size bed with a feather bed, so if you are only here for a couple of days, it could work for 3 people. There's a desk for doing work or surfing the Internet. There is also an old computer for your use. The building was built in 1910. The bathroom is vintage pink and black tile with a full bathtub and shower. The apartment is in the back of the building so even though it is only 2 blocks from Times Square, it's remarkably quiet and there are only 6 apartments in the building. It's a third floor walk up.  Guests can expect basic cable, air conditioning, wi-fi Internet access and a kitchenette, complete with a coffee maker, small refrigerator, stove top, convection and microwave ovens. There are thick, soft bath towels and all the comforts of home. It may not be luxurious but the convenient location and reasonable price will more than make up for

name: Large Apartment in INCREDIBLE location
space: The Location: INSANE subway access: 3 minute walk to the 2, 3, 4, 5, D, N, R, Q, B subway lines and the LIRR (Long Island Rail Road). 10 minute walk to the G, F, C lines. The Neighborhood:  In Boerum Hill, on the border with Park Slope. We're right smack between some of the cutest and nicest neighborhoods in Brooklyn. Fort Greene, Park Slope, Cobble Hill, Prospect Heights, Brooklyn Heights and Carroll Gardens - all just a short walk away.  Bars, restaurants, coffee shops, boutiques & vintage shops galore.  So many it's overwhelming.   Only 5 minute walk Target and Key Foods grocery stores.  15/20 minute walks to Whole Foods and Trader Joe's. 15 minute walk to Prospect park.  One subway stop away from Manhattan.  The Apartment:  Amenities include: 55" TV with Xbox, Playstation, Hulu Plus, Netflix, HBO & super fast Fios internet.  Coin washer and dryer in the building. The bedroom room itself is tiny.  A full sized bed, suitable for 2 and a dresser.  We'll provide clean sheets and towels

name: Charming West Village One Bedroom
space: Apartment is a second floor walk-up on 11th Street and 6th Avenue, with full kitchen (dishwasher), living room and separate bedroom. Fully furnished, with Apple TV, high speed internet and phone service. Near all subways, 24 hour restaurants, bus line, etc.

name: Brooklyn Brownstone full floor/garden ProspectPark
space: Ground floor apartment (not the basement) of our Brooklyn brownstone/townhouse. The house was built in 1898 and has lots of beautiful original details.  Free WiFi included as well as Coffee/tea with a Keurig Platinum Brewing system. Guests may also use our beautiful decked garden area with a bamboo wall, couches and an outdoor fireplace table.  We live in the house upstairs and generally leave guests to themselves, but the garden is shared with us.  The apartment has one large bedroom with a Queen size bed and a twin size daybed that also has a trundle bed underneath.  Both are beautiful Restoration Hardware furniture pieces.  The small bedroom is really just for sleeping and has a twin size bed and another pull-out twin size bed trundle underneath.  Please see photos.   For guests staying during the hot summer months (July/August), we have a standalone air conditioner in the main bedroom, but there is no AC in the small bedroom or the kitchen.  It's generally just fine with the fans w

name: Family friendly,  steps to subway, large garden :)
space: Gracious layout across a wide, 25' floor of 4 story townhouse: - Spacious and comfortable open living / kitchen-dining area w/ brick fireplace and access to outdoor space - The garden level  has 1.5 bedrooms and a 1000sf private garden. - The second level apartment has 2 bedrooms and  a small terrace  overlooking garden.  -Each level has full sized washer-dryer, ample and functional closets & fully equipped kitchen - set up perfectly for your short-term stay! -Both levels units are renovated w/ brand new baths.  The kitchen in the garden level  was refaced and the kitchen on the second level was totally refinished.   SECOND LEVEL BEDROOMS ** Master bedroom** has a king with room to add a crib or kids twin.  There are 2 closets, a dresser, and a large desk making this a suitable area for work.  This room faces south and gets excellent natural. **second bedroom w/ brick wall**  has a queen bed + option to add a kids twin bed (tightly), or a crib . GARDEN LEVEL BEDROOMS  ** Master bedroom

name: Private Sunny Room Near Central Park & Mount Sinai
space: Do all your sightseeing in the hustle and bustle of New York City then come to the north-eastern corner of Central Park to get away from the tourists and chaotic crowds. Elevator building (no lugging bags up flights and flights of stairs) located on Madison Avenue with views of Central Park from the terrace. A minute walk into Central Park (seriously).  Steps from Museum Mile. Walk to El Museo de Barrio, The Museum of the City of New York and The Guggenheim. Walk to The Met or take a 5 minute bus ride to there, The Whi

name: 1 bdr apt, sunny close to the beach
space: This newly renovated private apartment is in an elevator building, on the last 6th floor (so no noise from upstairs), with a comfortable mattress in the bedroom, AC in a bedroom, a futon sofa-bed in the living room, big fan in a living room (no AC in the living room), and small fan in the kitchen, really comfy round chairs to sit and relax. I provide clean sheets and towels. Fully equipped kitchen with folding table and new appliances, dinette with 4 chairs and WiFi internet. Easily sleeps 4, but in the summer probably better with two people since I only have AC in the bedroom. One block or 4 minute walk to the ocean, beach and boardwalk, lots of really nice Russian and eastern European gourmet food shopping. 5-7 min walk to the B express train and Q train.  I have 2 very sweet and cuddly l cats living in the house. Please be aware of the allergies.

name: "Simple Perfect Soho"
space: At "Simple Perfect Soho" you will be greeted by simple, clean decor with comforts that you might find in your own home.  Without the clutter of personal effects, the apartment indeed remains cozy.   Things to know: **3 flight walk-up (that means three sets of stairs to climb to your floor) **The door between the living room and bedroom has been removed to open up the space, visually.  For privacy, I have installed a fabric curtain. **For reservations including 4 guests, there is the fold-down sofa bed (little larger than a twin) and a twin-size inflatable mattress - all with appropriate bedding (mattress pad, sheets, blank/feather duvet). Sitting on the edge of a little park in Soho, officially called Petrosino Square, on Cleveland Place between Spring and Kenmare, the location could not be better.  In traditional Soho style, this is an old, walk-up brick building.  The entrance and common area are nothing special, but 3 flights up (no elevator) you will find your peaceful apartment wi

name: Beautiful Room + Private Balcony
space: Beautiful, quiet room, with a spacious wall closet and private heated balcony. Wifi, HD TV, Record player with High-Def speakers, fully equipped kitchen, and a private balcony with an outdoor heater, and more. Can consider room-swap in Los-Angeles. Queen-size beds (with a  great memory-foam mattresses) All included: Utilities, fast Wi-Fi, fully equipped kitchen, cable TV, towels & sheets. There's a nice patio in the back & great view from roof overlooking Manhattan. There's also an option to include the music-studio room (shown in pictures), contact to discuss. The Area: We're located in Williamsburg - one of the hippest and lively neighborhoods in New-York.  Lots of intimate Cafe's, Restaurants, Bars, and the proximity to the East river gives it its special vibe. It is minutes away from Downtown (via the beautiful Williamsburg bridge!), Battery Park, Wall St, Little Italy, Lower East Side, Union Square and SOHO. Penn Station, Times Square and Central Park are just a few stations away.

name: 3 BR apartment Crown Heights, BKLYN
space: 3 BR, each with a queen size bed. Dining room, Kitchen and Bathroom, access to back yard; 1 block from #3 train station, 20min to midtown Manhattan; Quiet and safe neighborhood with Restaurants, Grocery stores, 24/7 pharmacy and Laundromat  in walking distance. Beauiful Prospect Park, Brooklyn Botanic Garden, Brooklyn Museum and Park Slope's many Resaurants and Bars are just a few train stops away.

name: Brownstone Sunny & Spacious top fl
space: Visiting Brooklyn? Why stay at a hotel? Enjoy the charm of historic tree-lined blocks and stately brownstones with a stay at Gallerie St. Charles.     The Gallerie St. Charles, an art-rich renovated top floor of a Brooklyn brownstone, is conveniently located near world-famous Brooklyn cultural attractions and Manhattan is a short subway ride away.   Set on quaint St. Charles Place, one block from landmark, tree-lined Eastern Parkway, Gallerie St. Charles is walking distance from internationally-renowned Brooklyn Museum, the Botanic Gardens, the Brooklyn Public LibraryÛªs Central branch and Prospect Park.   Coffee shops, burger havens and gourmet delis are just 2 short blocks away. And thereÛªs free on-street parking and garage parking for a fee two blocks away.    Lower Manhattan landmarks and midtown Manhattan attractions are 20 minutes and 30 minutes away, respectively, making Broadway theaters, worldÛÓclass shopping and restaurants easily and quickly accessible options.   An IRT subway

name: Stay in our Charming Park Slope Apartment
space: This charming and spacious apartment is located in the heart of Brooklyn's historic Park Slope Neighborhood, only 2 blocks from Prospect Park and steps away from great restaurants and shops.  This 1200 square foot apartment is comfortably furnished and the apartment's spacious kitchen is fully equipped. There is also a full dining room.  You can enjoy AppleTV and wireless internet along with a DVD player and stereo.  The bedroom you stay in is air-conditioned and there are ceiling fans throughout.  We provide fresh linens and towels.  Easy travel to and from Manhattan - Convenient to 2,3, Q, B, F, G, and R trains.  Enjoy the comforts of home while exploring the neighborhood. TWO MORE THINGS TO BE AWARE OF: 1) a $200 REFUNDABLE deposit is required.  2) CLEANING FEE: There is a $130 cleaning fee for any reservation.

name: Morocco in Brooklyn with the flyest loft, Amazing!
space: Lovely renovated, yet rustic exposed brick 1 bedroom brownstone flat in the historic Bedford Stuyvesant of Brooklyn. Also home to the Legendary Lena Horne. This flat is on the top floor (2 flights of stairs)  with a living room and a skylight, full kitchen, granite counter tops, amazing custom queen loft bed, beautiful bright bathroom with a window, hardwood floors, A Teak Indonesian double bed/couch in the living room and  Wi-Fi.  Near great cafe's and restaurants like Peaches Hothouse and Sincerely Tommy. Nightlife local bars like Bed Vine Brew and Lovers Rock are a stones throw away. There's vintage shopping at Peace and Riot and next door is Stacked Yoga.  There's so much flavor in Brooklyn, you may end up staying local. But if not, you'll be 4 blocks from the G train, a 10 minute bus ride from Downtown Brooklyn and a 20 minute drive or train to the Village and lower East side.  I love to travel and I love to host people who are respectful and adventurous. You'll love supporting sm

name: Perfect NYC/Williamsburg Location
space: I am renting a bedroom in my sun filled very nice, clean, and comfortable Williamsburg Apartment.  Including Private bathroom, Free internet and Air conditioning. Towels and Sheets provided. Also, I have a hair dryer here for your use - so no need to pack one. I also have a few universal power adapters for your electronics.  If you are looking for a great convenient spot from which to explore the city and enjoy all the wonderful things NYC has to offer including wonderful food, music, bars, sites, parks, etc. --this is the place for you! If you are looking for a place to cook meals and hangout on the couch, this is NOT the right place for you ; ).   Transit: The apartment is just steps from the L train, so its super easy to get anywhere: 5 minutes to Bedford Ave, 10 minutes to the East Village or Union Square, 15 minutes to Chelsea or the West Village. The Neighborhood: Williamsburg is cool and filled will great restaurants. The area is very safe, and tends to be a destination spot for

name: My loft, your loft!
space: Come and stay at my 850 sq ft loft on the 4th floor of a quiet and chill building, in east williamsburg/bushwick area of brooklyn: an industrial/residential area. The building is now a residential one occupied by young people like me. You will have the space all to yourself, wireless internet, street parking, 2 queen mattresses (one located on the lofted area) plus one extra full mattress, bathroom with bathtub, fully equipped kitchen, great views of the city skyline, a vast communal roof, nice local cafes and restaurants, and last but not the least lots of local underground live music venues away from the maybe hubris of manhattan! The neighborhood is a safe, very young and dynamic one. Great views of the city, yes!  You will be conveniently located "exactly" on Morgan stop of the L train, 1-2 min walk to the subway station on Morgan Ave and Harrison Pl.  Only 20 min train ride to Union Sq.  Subway operates 24/7.  Notes: 1. No big loud parties as the building is a work/live space, and

name: Room3-Comfy+Clean Queen Bed @TWBGH
space: Welcome to The Williamsburg Guesthouse. Come and stay a while here. Its comfortable, quiet, and convenient to anywhere in the city (you can see the subway entrance from the front door), its a perfect place for a beautiful NYC getaway. *For Christmas and New Years bookings, please read the info at the bottom.  This is for Room #3 (of 3) in The Williamsburg Guest House. This room is for 2 people, but is large enough to accommodate 3 if needed (i can provide a twin side air mattress). A third person is an extra $50 a night. If you would like the air mattress for just the 2 of you, one person on the bed one person on the air mattress, it is and extra $25.  Located in the heart of trendy Williamsburg, Brooklyn, you will love this place. Its a very clean and fully renovated brooklyn style home. Each room is clean and quiet with a queen size bed that sleeps two. Your room is private! The house is duplex style: 1st Floor: Living room, Kitchen, Bathroom, Laundry, and Backyard  2nd Floor: The 3

name: East Village Apartment
space: Experience the East Village just as though you live there! This one bedroom tenement apartment is located in absolutely the best block in East Village. Its up only one flight of stairs and very fortunately in the rear, The streets of New York City can be too loud with fire engines police sirens and "happy" residents are going 24/7  however our place is in the rear  overlooks the back courtyard and is very quiet and great for sleeping. It is also perfectly appointed with brand new furniture and appliances  The apartment has been cleaned thoroughly and looks (exposed brick) and smells great!! It comes with everything you will need. Also there are two brand new  40"  TV,s, a Ps3 Console, NetFlix, HBO, Showtime Amazon Prime streaming are all included and also Direct TV with all the channels and all the sports packages a computer desk with a laptop for your use. You can cook in as it has all the cooking equipment and utensils required, but eating out is way more fun with the best dining  Ea

name: Midtown East Sutton Area Entire Apt
space: Large 1 bedroom apt in prewar doorman bldg w/elevator. 1 Queen bed. One block from Sutton Place- one of Manhattan's premier residential communities with beautiful parks.  Great layout with large rooms, Full bathroom has access from foyer or bedroom. WiFi, cable, inexpensive parking 1 block away or free on street night parking.Subway stops at 53rd & 3rd or 59th & Lex. Buses run on 1st Ave or 57th Street. A short cab ride away from the theatre district, Times Square and shopping on Madison Avenue. Great neighborhood restaurants,PJ Clarkes, Tal Bagels, Jubilee,Le Cirque & Rosa Mexicana to name just a few.

name: GREAT PRIVATE BEDROOM
space: Wonderful Private One Bedroom Sublet in great location in the heart of NYC!  This private bedroom is one of 3, in a 3 bd 2.5 bath duplex. It is located in the Upper East Side/Roosevelt Island area. Upon arrival you will be provide with clean towel and fresh linen. Nearby stores include a Gristedes (grocery store), Duane Reade, a Deli, which stays open late, delicious sushi restaurant and two local cozy bars.   The neighborhood is very clean and quiet, the apartment is the same way as well. The apartment is only a 10 minute subway ride to Times Square and all of Midtown's attractions and only 4 minutes from Central Park and Upper East/West sides. See additional amenities inside this fantastic apartment below:  - Large private living room and dining room. - 100 inch TV screen projector w/HBO & Showtime plus   Hundreds of avaialble movies on Demand.  - Wifi and Cable box available, free of charge  - Fully equipped Kitchen.  - Microwave.  - Laundry Room 3 floors below. Public transportatio

name: Bright & Spacious Greenpoint / Williamsburg Apt
space: Very spacious private studio in North Williamsburg right next to McCarren Park. Room is very large with bed, bathroom and living space (no kitchen access). Fantastic shops and restaurants within 5 min walking distance. Coffee Shop right below my apt. L Train = 7 min walk through McCarren Park G Train = 3 min walk Wythe Hotel 5 min walk ($300 per night) Restaurants across the street or 5 min in any direction Bars 5 min in every direction Laundry across the street

name: 4500sqft  Authentic Brooklyn Loft
space: This (418må_/ 4500 sq.ft.) comfortably decorated loft is located 20 minutes from Manhattan. The large (homemade) dining room table comfortably seats 15-20, is great for gatherings as well as a work area. Lofts of this size are an extremely rare find in New York. Converted from a former piano factory, the space still contains many of its original details and is the quintessential old school Brooklyn loft. From its original pane windows in the hallway to the squeaky hardwood floors, the character lies in its imperfections. The super spacious open plan kitchen and living room provides the perfect opportunity for communal style  living and/or working. This 4 bedroom loft sleeps up to 8 people comfortably. The lounge is furnished with several day bed style sofas which are great for lounging or brainstorming.  The space works great as a live/work space for creative corporate companies or any group living/working in New York for a bit. AMENITIES:  - Washer and Dryer  - Air Conditioners in all

name: Cute east village apartment.
space: A very clean and simple apartment in the heart of the east village. Perfect for a couple or 2 fiends. The bedroom has a full size bed and the "spare" room has a single size air-mattress (if needed) plus wireless connection, bed linens, and towels. The apartment is on a nice block with many great restaurants and close to the L, F, N, R, Q, 4, 5, 6 trains, as well as minutes from Union Square and Astor Place.

name: Private Cozy Quiet Room Center Manhattan

space: Your pied a terre on Sugar Hill.  The self contained garden apartment is directly across the street from the Morris-Jumel Mansion, George WashingtonÛªs headquarters for 1776Û_s Battle of Harlem Heights and home to the infamous grand horizontal, Madame Jumel.  At the time Duke Ellington dubbed the house ÛÏThe Crown of Sugar Hill,Û the immediate neighborhood was also home to W.E.B. DuBois, Paul Robeson, Count Basie, Lena Horne, Coleman Hawkins, Mary Lou Williams, Thurgood Marshall, and dozens of other Jazz Masters. The apartment features a private entrance, full kitchen and bath (tub and shower), a Garden/Sitting room with a trundle/day bed (Charles Rogers), a large bedroom with a full-sized bed that once passed for George Washingon's, and a second larger bedroom with an opulent queen size 19th century French brass bed (see floor plan).
