I live just a few minutes walk from both the L Bedford train and the JMZ Marcy train. A 30 min walk over the bridge into the LES. The neighborhood is extremely safe and savvy at all hours.  *Wifi   *AC / Heat  *Gas range / oven  *24 hour convenience store on the corner, among restaurants and coffee shops, yoga and cafes everywhere.  *Gym half block away. *Pilates studio 2 doors down. *Jazz

name: Zen, Tranquil, Artsy, Sunny Bedroom
space: 1 large bedroom charming flat available in a two bedroom share. Separate Living room, kitchen, bathroom. Wood floors, high ceilings , lots of light, quiet during the week.. It is simple, clean with an artsy vibe.   About me: Photographer, yogi, surfer, easygoing, free spirited, traveler, adventurer.  It is a 5th floor walk- up. The building is over 100 years old and a bit shabby with some of it's original molding and tiles definitely once you enter you will get a vibe of what is like to live as a New Yorker.  It is in a great prime location in the East Village. You will love the neighborhood, it is young & hip with small great boutiques, museums, restaurants and cafes. Convenient to the F, N, R, 4,5,6 train and buses. Walking distance to Williamsburg, Soho, Noho, Chinatown, Little Italy, Lower East Side, Downtown and West Village.  The East Village is known for cool bars and great restaurants. Close to Museum and shops.  The pied a terre is perfect for friends, dog friendly, couple or

name: Bright Luxury in Tribeca & Views!
space: In the heart of beautiful Tribeca this two bedroom, two full baths apartment is perfect for one night or more. A modern-lover's dream, this place is brand new (built less than 2 years ago) and is clean and very bright. The building also has a full gym, 24- hour concierge and gorgeous roof top. The apartment also boast a sweet balcony with soaring views of magnificent uptown. At night the horizon is lit up but the Empire State and Chrysler buildings along with all of midtown. The neighborhood is filled with beautiful cobble stone streets, delicious restaurants, fun night spots and the coolest shopping. 3 blocks from Soho, Nolita and Chinatown this place is truly in the heart of downtown.  ONLY 3 blocks from ALL train lines: A, C, E, 1, Q, N, R, J, Z, 6.  Walking distance to Ground Zero.

name: Room for the Summer
space: Hi guys! I am going to go back to France for the summer, so i am subletting my room. The apartment is in an amazing location, close to the beautiful Convent Avenue, with shops and subway (express and local A, B, C, D lines) just at the corner of the street. The room is not very big, but we just renovated it, and the apartment is huge and sunny. There's also AC now in the room

name: Fantastic 2BR in Brooklyn's Best Area
space: Everybody loves this apartment. Located on the 4th and top floor of a well-maintained small building, this 650 square foot (65 square meter) apartment gets great light and ventilation from its south and north exposures. This is a 2-bedroom apartment set up as a large, expansive one-bedroom that is perfect for a single professional, couple or small family.  It was recently professionally painted and features nice details like wood floors, a bathroom skylight, French doors and a decorative fireplace.  The building has two security doors, an intercom system, and a free washer/dryer in the basement.  NOTE: The apartment is partially furnished: a double bed, shelves for clothes and books, a clothes closet, a nice couch, a table and four (URL HIDDEN) well as cutlery, coffee maker and everything you need for cooking. There's also an a/c unit, multiple fans and a very good iPod docking station. Fast new WiFi is also included.

name: GREAT 1BR/2BA TERRACE & W/D! in EV!
space: THIS IS THE AREA YOU WANT TO STAY IN!  This is truly a unique apartment in NYC. It's on one of the most amazing blocks in the east village, and I should know, because I looked at over 100 apartments before moving in here in March of 2010. It has a private elevator that leads right into your apartment. The entire building is only 7 floors, with 1 apartment per floor. A modern building that is only about 8 years old. PLUS - A washer/dryer in the apt! (almost unheard of in Manhattan). 2 BRs/2BAs (the master bedroom has a bathroom in the room along with a small terrace with a table and chairs). A fantastic chef's kitchen with all brand new appliances. The living room has a 54 in. HD TV, along with cable, and a PS4 for the kids! Also - A LOT of exposed brick! I can't say enough about this neighborhood. It's across the street from Tompkins Sq. Park. All of my favorite restaurants are all within a 5 block radius. It's walking distance from Union Square. Everything you want is right here.  Cur

name: Big Beautiful Brooklyn Apt @ Park!
space: Spacious, beautiful open air apt. 1-2 bedrooms available. Sleeps up to 4 guests (please inquire for appropriate pricing), directly across from beautiful, green Prospect Park.  Minutes away from Brooklyn Museum, Botanical Gardens & Brooklyn Academy of Music (BAM). High speed internet & Apple TV and AC are provided. Full Kitchen, washer&dryer included. I am a great host and take pride in my home. I've made it a warm, welcoming and very comfortable space. Enjoy it as much as I do. The Apartment - Suitable for 1 - 2 Guests. - Enjoy 850 sqft of open "French Style" 1 bdrm. - Queen size Teak platform bed. (Real bed) - Design Within Reach sofa.   - Large living space with Wifi interlinked Entertainment Center.  - 42" Flat Screen TV.  - High speed internet. - Hardwood floors with cow skin rugs. - Free High speed Wifi. - Bathroom with a full size tub. - Large windows in every room. - Plants The Kitchen - Full working Eat-in kitchen includes microwave, all in-one washer/dryer, Kitchen Aid, Omega

name: Perfect apt. above L train Graham stop
space: Beautiful, spacious, and clean room available in Central Williamsburg Brooklyn literally right on top of the Graham L stop. The room is fully furnished with a queen size bed and a large desk. It is located in a very adorable apartment in Williamsurg, Brooklyn (on the corner of Metropolitan and Graham ave.) There are 2 other bedrooms in the apt in which I and one other very sweet, cool, and professional 28 yr old women lives. I am looking for someone respectful, polite, and clean to stay in this room. This price will include everything. Big clean bathroom, all appliances, good lighting in room and through out apt, internet, and cable. Amazing neighborhood, very safe, and ideal location for going out to all the coolest bars/ restaurants in NYC. It takes about 10 minutes from my door to get into manhattan on the L train.....a few blocks from the G and the JMZ as well. Grocery store down stairs.

name: Gorgeous Park Slope, BK triplex 4BD
space: The triplex brownstone is on 7th Street, between 6 and 7th Avenues in Park Slope.  It has been newly renovated to the highest standard, and is 2,200 sq ft. Decorated with a mix of classic and contemporary designer furnishings, it has a lot of charm and elegant high ceilings and original moldings. Natural light filters into every room and double exposure. The house maintains the charm of a classic brownstone with all the modern comfort (central AC in every room, heated floor in the bathrooms, skylights for lots of natural light). The  3br house has a fully equipped kitchen with integrated deluxe appliances, a private wooden deck and a garden area. 2 beautifully appointed bathrooms, washer & dryer, and a TV room that can be used as a fourth bedroom. There is a quiet sunny office space facing the garden filled with books, and a piano for the musically inclined... 2 blocks from Prospect Park, and close to 5th & 7th Avenue shops and restaurants, you'll find this home an incredibly relaxing

name: Master Suite with a Great view!
space: While the room boasts space, a private bathroom and a wonderful view, the apartment itself is a corner unit that faces west so it is very quiet and captures amazing sunsets!   We are conveniently located across the street from the F train, a doorman/elevator/small gym/laundry/court yard building and a true hidden gem in the Lower East Side.  There are plenty of cute bars and restaurants close by, 2 huge groceries, Asian markets and hand pulled noodle shops galore.  We are also in walking or biking distance to everything downtown - FIDI, TriBeCa, Little Italy, SoHo, East Village.  All are within 20 minutes and CitiBike is right around the corner.

name: Beautiful + Sunny Fort Greene 1BR
space: A beautiful 1 BR apartment in the historic and centrally located neighborhood of Fort Greene, Brooklyn.  Apartment is clean, well-decorated and filled with a great art collection.    The entire space is approximately 350 square feet -- a spacious main room and a small, separate bedroom.  Perfect for a couple or solo traveler. Unit is on the 3rd floor of a 4 story Brownstone walkup, located on a lovely tree-lined Brooklyn block.  Kitchen is small but has all basic amenities.  Furnishings have a classic, mid-century look and include sofa (can also accommodate an additional guest for sleeping), desk and reading area and a kitchen table.  Many of the furnishings, artwork and other items in the apartment were found at the nearby Brooklyn Flea.  Apartment gets great sunlight and will provide you a comfortable stay in a great location.

name: Private,Affordable, 20 min to NYC!
space: I live and maintain this two room semi-basement apartment. All my friends that come visit me in NYC usually choose to stay at my apartment.  It should be obvious trade off - take 20 minutes subway  ride to Manhattan and save more than $100 a day in addition of getting 10 times the living space!!!  This apartment has separate entrance, separate bathroom and what really matters to me and my friends - PRIVACY.  There are only few house rules - no parties, no noise, no smoking, no breaking stuff and no pets and no rearranging furniture. Everything else is up to you.  Note: I have it listed as 2 bedrooms because it has 2 rooms with beds. By American terms that is a single bedroom with a living room. Sorry if I got anyone confused ;) Apartment is located in historical Queens neighborhood Ridgewood. It usually takes me 5 minutes (3 blocks away) to the nearest subway station and 20 minutes ride to the center of Manhattan - 14 Street - Union Square. Trains run 24/7. There are multitude of resta

name: Lovely Chelsea 1 Bedroom
space: Hello, I am renting my bright, spacious, quiet 1 bedroom in Chelsea. It's located on a pretty street in one of New York's best neighborhoods. The apartment has hardwood floors, a decorative fireplace, wireless internet (no t.v.), and is simply furnished (not a luxury building or apartment). It has a queen-sized bed in the bedroom and there is a queen-sized air mattress available. It is 2 blocks from the Highline park and the Hudson River Park (which has beautiful plantings and running paths by the river), Chelsea Piers, Wholefoods, great restaurants, lots of cafÌ©s. It's 2-5 blocks from the A/C/E/1/F trains, a 10 min walk to the West Village, Meatpacking district, Flatiron district. Some parking on street and nearby streets, parking lots nearby as well. Single washer/dryer in building basement. Quiet, responsible people only please, no partiers.

name: Classy 2.5 BR Brownstone w/ Garden
space: Situated on a fabulous tree-lined street in a beautiful brownstone, this fully furnished elegant 2.5 bedroom/two bathroom duplex apartment with garden is located just a one and a half blocks from Central Park! The house is also just over a block from bustling Broadway and Amsterdam/Columbus Ave, where an amazing array of restaurants,  trendy cafes,  boutique stores, and other shopping options are always close by.   The spacious home (1600 sq ft plus 600 sq ft garden) has oversized rooms, original hardwood flooring, high ceilings, and two mosaic-tiled fireplaces (non-working). Gorgeous woodwork, exposed brick, wainscotting, and historical detail throughout. Top floor (parlor floor) features a lovely living/dining room and a separate kitchen with a large South-facing window overlooking the garden. Kitchen is equipped with dishwasher, refrigerator, stove, toaster, coffee maker, kettle and all cooking utensils/equipment and dishes. Also for your convenience is a washer and dryer in the bas

name: Upper Duplex in Brooklyn Brownstone
space: The space is a 2 bedroom duplex in a renovated brownstone in the historic Bedford-Stuyvesant section of Brooklyn.  You will have full access to the backyard, wifi and cable. Beautiful and quiet block, only 2 blocks from the J train (subway) 15 minutes to Manhattan, 10 minutes to Williamsburg, which has recently become a center of entertainment, restaurants, concerts, and culture here in the city  The neighborhood is very safe and there are many beautiful historic brownstone and limestone (Website hidden by Airbnb) area nearby has even been landmarked by the New York Historical Society. Furthermore, there are a few excellent restaurants within 5-10 minute walking distance, including Celestino, Saraghina, and Peaches. Look them up on (website hidden) to see their great reviews. You are welcomed to call for more info or so that I can answer any questions you may have. Airbnb will set up a call between hosts and guests without a problem. Thanks,  James

name: comfy room minutes from museums
space: Sunny, beautiful new apartment building in a quiet but vibrant neighborhood. Room is available for couples and single women. Close to subway and bus, minutes from Manhattan.  Your room is quiet and faces the interior courtyard. There are two windows and a generous closet. Apartment has one bathroom and kitchen we will share.  I work from home in the non-profit arts sector and will be in the street-facing bedroom. Filled with books, color and light. **DURING YOUR STAY** Help yourself to coffee, tea and homemade popsicles. :) You will be provided with towels, washcloths and changes of bedding. Please bring toothpaste, soap, shampoo, and other personal items. You are welcome to use my pots, pans and dishes. I ask they are washed after use. Laundry is conveniently available on the first floor of the building. Please bring your own laundry detergent to wash clothes. Pandora and basic TV available (no cable) via flatscreen. Wifi is available. My home is cared for with green cleaning products

name: Bushwick Soul--Veteran Superhost!
space: **Welcome to AirBnB! Just so you know, it's customary for the guest and host to message back and forth BEFORE making booking requests! This get-to-know-each-other process is essential to the trust and safety aspects of AirBnB. :) Also since this is my actual home and I do have a Mon-Fri job, midweek bookings can be challenging on short notice. Messaging in advance help me make appropriate arrangements.** Bushwick today is the Greenwich Village of back-in-the-day, when Simon and Garfunkle were writing the 59th Street Bridge Song and how "$50 pays your rent on Bleeker Street".  Well, the value of money has changed, but the tradition of artists and musicians moving into run-down neighborhoods and making them cool has not.  Bushwick is full-swing in the midst of this change, and when you stay in this lovely, homey apartment you'll be able to check it out for yourself, and tell your grandchildren, "I was there when Bushwick had soul!  Now it's all Starbucks and American Apparel!" My househo

name: NYC!  $85 a Night. March 22nd-April 2nd
space: A studio on W 72nd St, just 4 doors in from Central Park and across the street, from the famous Dakota, 2 buses and 2 subway lines on the corner, in an elevator/desk building.  On the 12th floor with a city view and completely quiet.  Two couches that can be slept on how they are or opened to queen size beds.  Full kitchen on the wall, hidden by French doors; and a nice bathroom with sink, shower and bath. Area doorman safe 24/7. TV, Wifi internet included and of course dishes, glasses, pots, towels and sheets. Air Conditioned to your comfort. After over 8 years of living here I still get a thrill when I walk out the door. Central Park gleams; there are people taking pictures of the famous Dakota; there are dozens of restaurants and shops within a 5 minute walk, and the Museum of Natural History and NY Historical Society are less than a 10 minute walk. The Metropolitan Museum of Art is just a walk, or bus ride, across Central Park, and a Broadway Show is a 15 minute subway ride away.

name: Great 1 BR Apt in Kips Bay, NY
space: One bedroom apt in Kips Bay with Cable and Wireless internet. Air conditioning in living room and ceiling fans in living room and bedroom. Building has an elevator. Washing machine and dryer in building.

name: Artist's 3BR Apt/ Amazing Location!
space: Hello visitor or traveler, We have made available our 3 bedroom apartment.  Each of the 3 rooms is fully furnished with a queen size bed.  It sleeps 6 total.  It also has a fully stocked eat-in kitchen and a living room.   The check-in and check-out times may be flexible.  Just message us if you need to check in early or check out late.  More than likely, we can offer that to you. The location is amazingly central to your NYC adventure! Blocks away from the Williamsburg happenings and 5-15 minutes to Manhattan. 10 mins to the Bedford L train. 5 mins to the Marcy J/M/Z train. 4 blocks from the East River Ferry landing. 2 blocks from the Williamsburg Bridge. Whether by car, train, bike, foot, or boat, you're 10 minutes away from Manhattan :)    The apartment has:  Û¢Super comfy new beds! Û¢Newly installed light & sound blocking window drapery for the light sleepers and people suffering jet-lag. Û¢We provide you with fresh sheets and towels. Û¢A fully stocked and super spacious kitchen!  Û¢A/C

name: Room in manhattan penthouse
space: Private furnished bedroom in modern duplex penthouse apartment in the heart of the East Village, with beautiful furnished private rooftop for your use with BBQ equipment, and panoramic views of New York city and the Empire State Building, great view of New Years Eve fireworks.  Cable TV and wireless internet throughout the apartment.  The apartment is a modern 5 bedroom duplex apartment with open living room and kitchen with full amenities including dishwasher, another balcony, two bathrooms, central air conditioning, elevator building with laundry in the basement.  The available room is furnished with a desk, large closet, and Murphy bed that folds down from the wall.  Pleasant street just 5 mins walk from hundreds of bars and restaurants in East Village, 5 minutes walk to Lower East Side, 10 minutes walk to SoHo and the New Museum. 5 mins walk to the F train 2nd ave station, 15 mins walk to the 4/5/6, N/R/Q/W trains.

name: 1 BR, Book it 1st then write me
space: Clean, quiet and separate room for your stay. Place is close to everything, you name it and you will get it at your door step, 24 hrs a day. Once you stay here you will love this place and neighborhood in NYC. There is queen size bed with linens.  Wifi is included in the price.  Most of the city you can reach in 10-20 min by subway.  2 people can sleep on the bed. For the 3rd person folding cot will be provided.    Lots of tourist places are close by to this place.  Groceries and food, Bar and package stores are on the block.  Light Cooking for microwave food only.  - No smoking in the apartment. Please bring your own personal use stuff like towel, tooth paste, tooth brush etc . I will provide you the toilet tissues, hand soap, Shampoo, so don't worry about those. You are getting what is available in your first floor apartment. You can use anything on 1st floor on your working, sitting or eating area.   Trains, buses, food etc etc is 24 hrs right out side the house.  You will have the

name: No Inq,Read it, 1 BR, Rt of Subway,
space: Pl No Inquiries for availability on your dates and price bargaining please. ( DON'T WRITE ME WITH OUT BOOKING IT FIRST). I will work out with you in all of your matter. I have no problem to talk to the people after booking it. But no just writing few emails every day for non bookers. If any thing is not workable I request to airbnb to give you refund to your booking.  As soon as you book the place site will issue you my phone number and email. You can call me immediately for all of your questions. If we can not manage it then you can cancel your reservation right away.   Thank you to understand my position. If you want to wait for me to write you then once you book it I will write / text / call you with in 24 hrs of your booking to assure you about your comfort.  Read my reviews people who stayed here before you. I take care of guests and now we become friends together. They are always welcome to NYC to stay here again at my place. So now just book it here 1st and then make any inquiri

name: Warm simple modern  Williamsburg bk
space: warm, simple, modern in the best part of williamsburg, close to the best of brooklyn food, music, culture - One of a kind private backyard ...

name: Your home base for exploring NYC!
space: Located in Brooklyn, with a two minute walk to two subway lines.  Located in trendy Bushwick, 10 minute subway ride to Williamsburg or 15 minutes to Union Square on the L train.  The M train is also available if you want to go to the lower east side.  Many grocery stores and cheap shopping nearby for day to day items. Very safe neighborhood, so you can come and go at anytime of day or night.  You have your own private room, with complete 24 access to the entire apartment.   Us:  we're struggling actors making the best we can out of one the greatest cities in the world.  We love to meet people, so come stay with us, and we're more than happy to share all the info we can about spending quality time in New York City! You'll have complete access to basic tv, netflix, PS3, internet, kitchen, bathroom, hot shower, and living room for the day you need to rest up from all the walking and exploring of NYC! UPDATE:  The bunny- he is much better potty trained!  And me and my girlfriend broke up,

name: Full Size Bed in Private Room - Chelsea District
space: Small room with comfortable full-sized bed. The bed is only a few months old! Guaranteed to give you an awesome story about visiting New York & staying in a cool apartment! One Block from the Highline, Subways, Galleries, in the middle of the west side scene, I offer a cozy, but private room in a three bedroom apartment in Chelsea. Wireless Internet included. Apartment shared with professional artistic people. Great for people on the go!

name: Spacious Loft 5 min to Union Square
space: Space is located in the heart of Williamsburg that is the coolest neighborhood in New York. It is located on the quiet street. The place is furnished. One block away to L train on Bedford Avenue station. minutes to Manhattan. Close to the restaurants, bars, and main attractions of New York City. Supermarkets are within 1 block of the place and open 24 hours.  There you can find any type of food you like including organic and healthy products. Also, four blocks away from amazing park on the East River with panoramic of Manhattan. Plus, you can take water taxi that can bring you to downtown Manhattan: South Sea Port and east 34 street; Downtown Brooklyn: DUMBO and Brooklyn Bridge in 15 min for 4 dollars only. Another park & Stadium (for those who have to exercise ) is three blocks away where on Wednesdays and Saturdays farmers sell fresh fruits and vegetables. Your room is large and private. It has a window, personal closet, and heater / air conditioner. In addition, you will have kitche

name: Stylish Duplex in Heart of Harlem
space: Come stay at my stylish, and comfy 3 bedroom duplex apartment located in the heart of Harlem. The apartment is on the ground floor, so no difficult stairs to climb. It is all hard wood floors, new stainless steel appliances, and great sunlight through out the day. I don't have cable, but there is wireless internet throughout the entire apartment, and you may use the netflix account that is set up through the t.v. in the living room. Apartment has 3 separate bedrooms, each with a full/queen size bed. Each bedroom can comfortably accommodate 1 or 2 persons with the master bedroom allowing for up to 3-5 people to sleep comfortably. It has a 1 and 1/2 bath, pet friendly and room mates are wonderful people and rarely home.   Neighborhood has several grocery stores within a five block radius, post office directly across the street, deli convenient stores on every corner. Laundry is on same block. Located 5 blocks away from 3 Major express train lines (2 or 3 Red line, ABCD Blue and Orange

name: Sunny Room, Good Coffee
space: The space you see converts into your space.  A desk is provided with a nearby outlet. WiFi easily accessed.   2 fresh towels will be provided.  There are plenty of cups for the tea's and coffee availble for you. Sheets are usually washed on a Saturday or Sunday...depends on your schedule/preference.  Nearby is a pizza parlor, a grocery market, a Chinese take-out and a laundrymat.   Trains:  F (Manhattan) and G Train (toward Williamsburg, as an example) are both nearby.   A casual walk away is Prospect Park where you can enjoy a walk, run or bike along the under 4 mile inner loop.  Pooches can run leash free, check park guidelines for the off-leash hours. Your host is a native New Yorker, an artist and published author.  who may offer banter or suggest things you might like or might need to know as well. My place has a piano, the host plays it - but only between guests.

name: Artfully Decorated 2 Bedroom Apt
space: Newly renovated and decorated 3 bedroom apt in a 3 family brownstone walk-up building. The apartment is very spacious and it's modestly furnished and have all you need for your comfort. There are exposed brick walls, (non working) fireplaces in the living and master bedroom.  The apartment has a large master bedroom with lots of storage space and a queen size teak bed out looking bay windows, and a junior bedroom with a full size platform bed with a red glass chandelier hanging above. Beautiful hardwood floors through majority of the apartment, and a new stone tiled bathroom with a walk in shower. High ceiling through the apt so you don't have to worry if you're over six feet tall.  The location is two blocks from the #2 & #5 train (Red & Green line), and 4 blocks from the #6 train (Green line) subway stops.  The area is in a historical area of the Bronx and close to the artist area off Bruckner Blvd and is safe and you'll have a sheriff living close by, and within minutes on the #2, o

name: Lavender Joy Room in Duplex!
space: Welcome! Bienvenue! Bienvenidos! Willkommen!! New York City is one of the Largest Cities in the world! Welcome to Canarsie, Brooklyn. Brooklyn has over 3 million residents.Welcome to NYC! It is a very, very, Large City!  So please be prepared to walk a lot.Traveling long distances for 1hr. is normal in a city this size. If you are looking for a warm and family type home away from home, then you are in the right place.  If you don't mind travelling a bit further to Manhattan so you can save money on comfortable accomodation in a safe and residential neighborhood, then you are in the right place. If you want to stay in the center of the city then you can do so and pay premium pricing and have less spending money for your trip. If you like learning how the locals live and getting great tips on great local spots to explore, then you're in the right place. Our subways and buses are very efficient and take you to all parts of the city to visit the sights and attractions and then you return t

name: 1 bdrm brownstone-west 70's-1 block Central Park
space: 19th century brownstone on manhattan's upper west side in the low 70's. 1/2 block from central park and 1 1/2 blocks to subway. walk to lincoln center, movies, museums and more. the living room is very large and spacious. both the living room and bedroom have 13 foot ceilings with 2 double height windows in both rooms overlooking a garden. it is very quiet and private. you don't hear any street noise. the living room has a decorative fireplace and beautiful old wood carvings and molding. the living room has a day bed/couch that has a "real mattress" (twin size). the separate bedroom has a queen size super comfortable bed with a tempurpedic mattress. the bed is made up with a down duvet and a fresh cotton duvet cover and cotton sheets. the apartment is not set up for small children (not child proofed, no window guards, etc) and is inappropriate for children under the age of 12. it is fully air conditioned and has two ceiling fans. the kitchen is fully equipped and has a dishwasher and a

name: Serene Room...
space: Every visitor is treated by me the same way that would like to be treated as guest. I want all my guests to feel at home, away from their home. SERENE BEDROOM  Private, very sunny, clean, located next to the living room and very spacious. It has 3 large windows and it gets lots of sun in the afternoon. This room gets dark when the blinds are down (2 layers in each window), so you can sleep like an angel. In this room there is a ÛÏfull size" bed. There is a flat screen TV. Good heating system in the winter and in the (email hidden), but once you open the windows it gets lots of fresh air.  Free Wi-Fi, fresh linens and towels provided.  APARTMENT The apartment is on the second floor without an elevator in the building (16 steps up to the second floor). There are only two apartments in the building. This is a very large 3 bedrooms apartment (for NY standards) with great sunlight and hardwood floors in the bedrooms and living room. In the hallway, kitchen and bathroom has white ceramic tile

name: E Village Penthouse Private Rooftop
space: Private furnished bedroom available in modern, funky two-floor penthouse apartment in the heart of the East Village, with beautiful furnished private rooftop for your use -- enjoy the BBQ and sunbathe with panoramic views of New York city and the Empire State Building.  Cable TV and wireless internet throughout the apartment. Relaxed, easy going, friendly vibe.  The penthouse is a modern 5 bedroom apartment with open living room, balcony, and full kitchen including dishwasher, balcony, two bathrooms, central air conditioning, in an elevator building with laundry room in the basement.

name: Beautiful and cool 2 bedroom apt!
space: Super nice, clean and comfy apartment on the lower east side, one of the coolest areas in Manhattan. Walking distance to soho, east village, tribeca, noho.  The area is perfect for someone on holidays because is full of bars, restaurants and nice cafes. Also for someone who wants to study or work, because none of these bars are on the block so there is no noise. There are many ways to get to the apartment. The subway lines F, M, J and Z are just a few blocks away. There are buses to go across the city on the corner and because of the location it doesn't take you more than 5 minutes to find a cab. Also close to the Williamsburg bridge.

name: Master Bedroom / ParkSlope Brooklyn
space: The apartment is located in the center of Park Slope Brooklyn, which is one of the most popular neighborhoods in Brooklyn.  The Apartment is a 2 bedroom apartment.  The Master Bedroom is available to reserve.  The rooms are on either end of apartment, so nice and private. The kitchen is full of cooking materials.   I love to cook so pots and pans etc are well stocked.  The kitchen has a gas stove and also two bar seats to sit on opposite side of counter so you can sit and enjoy food or drink!  The living room has a full size sofa/bed couch.  It faces a 42" HD FlatScreen.  I currently have Verizon FIOS for both internet and TV which includes most movie channels.   The Master bedroom has a Queen size bed with chair ottoman/combo which is great for reading by the window.  There are two huge windows in the room which bring a good amount of sunlight in!  One window goes out to the fire escape.  There is a built in desk as well so you have a place to get work done.    I do have a cat.  I kee

name: Spacious 4 bedroom house, New York
space: We live in a detached 4 bedroom house only a 10 minute walk to the F, G, and Q subway lines.  15 minutes from Manhattan by subway. We have a backyard with Weber grill, deck, full bathroom and powder room.  Our home is newly renovated with dishwasher, microwave, oven, stovetop, washer and dryer.  The neighbors are friendly. There are no pets in the home and we do not smoke.  We have cable tv and wireless internet.  Extremely kid friendly with toys and books and colorful decor! Fully stocked with clean linens, towels, and cook wear. Great neighborhood, close to Courtelyou Rd. (Prospect Park, The Farm on Adderely, Flatbush Food Co-op, Starbucks, Purple Yam, Cinco De Mayo, Brooklyn Industries, Sunday Farmer's Market). Too many ethnic restaurants to list. Just come!

name: Brooklyn Apartment Windsor Terrace
space: Feel at home while on vacation in the big city.  This is a quiet, spacious one bedroom English Garden apartment just steps from Prospect Park, in Brooklyn's picturesque Windsor Terrace.  Transportation, great restaurants and shops all within walking distance. This lovely, one bedroom apt. is on a prime Windsor Terrace block. Two blocks from the park and a 20 minute train ride on the F line to downtown Manhattan. Main avenue offers restaurants, coffee shops, bars, shops and movie theatre. Private entrance into this lower level apartment off street.  Fully equipped kitchen with fridge, stove top and microwave and kitchen ware.   Modern, newly tiled  bathroom with large walk in shower.  Linens provided.  Large comfortable living room area.  Large bedroom. Access to television & internet service.  A large play area in the living area which functions as a play space for kids or a second sleeping area for extra guests. Fully furnished apartment.  Linens and kitchen cookware included. Perfect

name: Very sunny 2 bedroom apartment UWS
space: Very secure, quiet neighborhood. 1-2 blocks from Metro stations. Several supermarkets and restaurants close. Central Park at walking distance (-10 min). Fully equipped apartment with (Hidden by Airbnb) phone, cable, Internet, A/C, central heating... Two bedrooms, 1 queen bed, 1 twin, 2 sofabeds and 1 airbed. Aprox. 1.000 sq ft Costs for gas/electricity is not included. (aprox. $100/month, depending on the use of A/C) We have a cat that needs to be cared for. Some basic and very simple cleaning, feeding and cuddling..  She has access to the entire apartment.

name: Bedroom with Garden at the Back
space: Sunny and bright bedroom with direct access to garden behind it.  The room has  a queen-sized bed and three huge windows which face east, west and south respectively.  The bedroom is on the lower floor of a brownstone, duplex apartment in the residential neighborhood of Clinton Hill, Brooklyn.  The bathroom is NOT en suite and is shared with one other person. Though there is no A/C, there is an overhead fan which keeps the temperature in the room during the summer quite comfortable.  The apartment has a chef's kitchen which you are free to use.  Fiber-optic Wi-Fi is available.  There is a French coffee shop called Choice on the corner which is pricey but very good, where you can get your morning cup or breakfast or lunch or dinner. There is a closet in the room though not displayed in the pictures.  There are also many restaurants in the neighborhood, many of which are located on DeKalb Ave and Myrtle Ave.  The apartment is 40 mins from Times Square, 30 minutes from Greenwich Village/N

name: Sunny new condo apt McCarren Park
space: Beautiful 2-bedroom apartment with lots of light is available in the charming and quiet neighborhood of Greenpoint right on McCarren Park.   Our home is ideal for couples and families with kids. The apartment has 2 bedrooms and 1 large sunlit bathroom with a deep soak bathtub.  Sleeps 2 adults with one king size bed in the master bedroom and up to 1 adult or two kids in the smaller room with children bunk beds.  Large wall-to-wall windows in all the rooms and hardwood floors throughout.  A big and comfortable living room equipped with a projector, record player, and a fully equipped open kitchen.   Our apartment also has not one but two terraces where you can relax and drink your morning coffee and read in the sun. One of them is off the living room with a view of the park and the other is directly off the master bedroom.  For your comfort we have a laundry washer and dryer in the apartment.  Also central AC, High-speed wireless internet, iron, steamer, dish washer, and large fridge wi

name: Exciting Lower East Side, Loft Life
space: I am an artist with a studio loft in Manhattan to sublet.  It's big, light, stylish, and comfy. Spacious 2 bedroom on the 4th floor (queen bed, single blow-up, and single sleeper sofa). Spa bath and designer kitchen. Best neighborhood for arts, eating, parks, shopping.  1 block from subway, steps from cuisine and nightlife. AND, Family friendly building.  In 15-20 minutes you can walk to SoHo, Little Italy, Chinatown, or ride the train to MoMa, walk the Williamsburg Bridge and ferry to Dumbo.  It's lively and cultural.  The Tenement Museum and Katz's Deli are nearby landmarks, also Sunshine Cinema with the latest art house films.  Around the corner are cheap eat dumplings, artisan pizza or 4 star restaurants.  Want to jog, bike, or bask in the sun? The East River Park is minutes away with waterfront bike paths connected for miles to the South Street Seaport, Staten Island ferry, Tribeca, Chelsea and upper west side.

name: Private spacious studio available
space: Fully furnished private studio for rent in quiet elevator building, it has a separate kitchen and bathroom and small eating area. Everything you need is nearby...food, grocery stores, shopping, drinking etc. Apt is located off the 2/3 express train at 135th which gets you to times square in 15 mins and downtown in 25. Neighborhood is safe, located next to a famous church visited frequently by tourists and there are some nice restaurants/bars nearby, and a quick walk to everything on 125th st. I have a full size bed as well as an air mattress.   Available Nov 2 to 9th 2014. Thanks, Toni

name: For Cat-Lovers ONLY
space: Very bright, spacious, well communicated entire two bedroom apartment in Manhattan. NOTE 1:  I am renting my whole apartment. I am very flexible with dates, and I can adjust it to the visitor needs (I will book my flight ticket after get your confirmation). The only condition is, and is the reason why I am making a very good price, it should be a CAT-LOVER. The person who stay at home doesn't only have to take care of my three cats (just feed and clean the litter box). Also have to give some attention and love to them. NOTE 2:  The photos on this profile are when I just moved here, few years ago. You can see how it looks the apartment today in the "First Video" below. I am looking to rent the whole apartment, ideal for a single person or a couple (only one set of keys): 3 rooms (two bedrooms). First floor. Yes, I posted two small videos online. Are a kind of tours around my house. Because Airbnb doesn't allow videos from You Tube, here the steps: First Video:  You tube + "FOR CAT-LOVER

name: Sunny, spacious 1-bedroom in Upper Manhattan
space: Stay in a one-bedroom apartment in a pre-war building located on a quiet, tree-lined street in the Inwood section of upper Manhattan.   Guests have access to the living room, kitchen, bedroom and bathroom. Close to public transit, grocery, laundry, restaurants, historic sites including the Dyckman Farmhouse and the Cloisters Museum.  Travel time is approximately 30 minutes by subway to 59th street midtown Manhattan on the "A" line, easy access to all of Manhattan and beyond.  New AC units in living room and bedroom and new smart TV in living room.  Basic cable --bring your own Roku, Firestick or similar device.   Please note: This apartment is located on the fifth floor of a walk-up building. There is NO ELEVATOR, the apartment faces away from the street and is very quiet and private. It has lots of light and high ceilings. Eat-in kitchen with gas stove, refrigerator, microwave, coffee-maker. Dishes and utensils are provided.  Bathroom with shower, sink and tub. Towels, toilet paper, s

name: Hello! Cozy-Singles NYC- Upper Manhattan- Harlem!
space: We're located in a new part of Harlem that has a lot of new cafes/bars, etc.. Apt is a 7 minute walk to Central Park, by a new grocery store, laundry, new bars and restaurants, and a 10-15 minute walk to Columbia University. And just 2 stops to Times Square on the "A" Express train.  We're a 3-7  minute walk to 3 subway stations that include the A,B,C,D,2,3 Subway lines (all are Express except B,C!!) so the A or D trains run express for 8 minutes to Midtown Columbus Circle!  The A express takes you all the way to Williamsburg, Brooklyn too. You can get anywhere you need to go very easily with these subway lines!  Free wifi, Netflix password, blow dryer, towels provided.  **Please tell me if you need Shampoo/Conditioner and I can provide it.  While this room for rent is fairly small and no frills, it has a very comfortable, twin bed and clean linens...with a window that lets in good light. It's priced at such a great rate because it is so simple and small.  ***NOTE***We often get asked

name: Beautiful One Bedroom in Chelsea
space: Large and super cute fully furnished 1 bedroom apartment in the heart of Manhattan. Have the full apartment for yourself! Gorgeous and large living room with exposed brick, flat screen TV (premium cable and Netflix), dinning room table and bar, with stools. Persian rugs and pillows, plus fireplace. Fully stocked kitchen with every appliance you could ever need (pots, pans, food processor, stand mixer, microwave, coffee press), ready to use. Plenty of counter space. Very comfortable queen sized bed with down pillows and quilts and down comforter.  Four closets, including walk-in. Bathroom with bathtub and shower and Kiehl's (website hidden) and heating in every room. We have a comfortable couch that can easily sleep one, as well as an air mattress! Located in Chelsea, and footsteps away from two subway lines (A, C, E, 1, 2, 3), dozens of restaurants and stores, Whole Foods, Fairway, Eataly, and two movie theaters. Quick walk to Times Square, Penn Station, and Port Authority, the West Vi

name: West Village Loft, 1st floor
space: Private floor of bright loft with 14ft ceilings in the heart of the West Village of NYC...1 floor walk-up. Bright living space, eat-in kitchen, and sleeping area with queen bed. Internet access, Apple TV.  Dream location:  Close to famed Bleecker Street shopping, Meatpacking, Chelsea, and subways (Red line 1,2 - Christopher street stop).  Sleeps 2. West Village nightlife is very active and the apartment windows face 7th Ave, so, if you are OK with the "Sounds of the City That Never Sleeps", you will be fine...if you want complete silence at night, this may not be your best choice.

name: Private, Cozy Room! Harlem, NYC!
space: Great deal in a Spectacular apartment!  Both Sergio and I will also be staying in the apartment in our room. The apartment is very large. Room has a desk and is great for a single or couples. If renting the larger room, it has 2 double beds, both real full-sized mattresses - one is a trundle that pulls out from underneath the other.   We're located in a new part of Harlem that has a lot of new cafes/bars, etc.. Apt is a 7 minute walk to Central Park, by a new grocery store, laundry, new bars and restaurants, and a 10-15 minute walk to Columbia University. And just 2 stops to Times Square on the "A" Express train.  We're a 3-7  minute walk to 3 subway stations that include the A,B,C,D,2,3 Subway lines (all are Express except B,C!!) so the A or D trains run express for 8 minutes to Midtown Columbus Circle!  The A express takes you all the way to Williamsburg, Brooklyn too. You can get anywhere you need to go very easily with these subway lines!  Free wifi, Netflix password, blow dryer, t

name: Sunny Apt! A heartbeat to L Train!
space: Hello Friend: For rent, we have a spacious apartment room furnished with a queen-sized bed, closet, dresser and lovely window with fire escape and AC, video projector, and vintage audio system -- throw a record on why don't ya? You'll have 24hr access to the apartment Full use of the kitchen, (which we will provide you some simple breakfast options in).  Naturally, there is a bathroom with shower (Sorry, no bathtub) The place gets plenty of sunlight from all the windows and when you open them up it's like you're outside! For those with allergies, let it be known that a cat normally lives here.  --- You are one block from the Grand St L Train, which can have you in Manhattan in 10mins. Which is great, however, you might just like to stick in the neighborhood because there are about a zillion great bars and restaurants to choose from! Just Yelp it and see! 24hr Laundromat is two blocks away on Graham Ave Free WiFi!

name: West Village Gem - 2BR
space: This listing is for a charming two bedroom apartment on one of the most beautiful blocks in the city.  The apartment comes fully furnished and outfitted with everything you might need (kitchen utensils, TV, fresh linens,internet,etc..).  The C/E trains are a block and a half away, and the A/B/D/F trains at West 4th St. are just a couple of blocks further.  You really can get anywhere in the city really quickly from here.        Inside the apartment you'll find two bedrooms, one with a full sized bed and the other with a queen.  There is, as you can see in the photo, a fully furnished living room and kitchen.  There are air conditioning units in all of the rooms, as well as a blue air filter in the living area.  The television has basic cable, and the apartment gets wifi coverage throughout.  There are clean linens and towels provided and the place will be delivered to you clean and organized.  The apartment gets tons of light and is wonderfully comfortable.              I'm not sure wh

name: SOHO Luxury Loft
space: Luxury 1,200 square foot loft apartment.  Elevators. Best shopping area. The loft is in a very desirable, centrally-located location, in a top-notch building with doorman and concierge. Incredible night views of Williamsburg Bridge. Two bathrooms. Arguably, the best views in SOHO. Building is only 7 years old. Large living room, two bathrooms, one bedroom and one office. Wifi Available. Located in the heart of Soho near Balthazaar. Cable TV. Gym in building. Next to hottest restaurants, shopping in NYC. Clean and large apartment. Spacious and comfortable apartment. On same block as "6" subway line, so easy access to subway and taxis. VERY quite in apartment due to thick windows. Nearly silent in the bedroom.

name: Central Harlem Comfy Bedroom with Private Bath
space: I have a second Bedroom with PRIVATE bathroom for rent.  The Bedroom comes with pillow top full size bed and dresser.  The room is in the back of the apt and is very quiet.  There is a large window so there is plenty of sun light.  The apt is tastefully decorated and is newly renovated.  Apt is kept very tidy and clean. Apartment has all conveniences including adjustable a/c, wireless access, cable, washer/dryer in building, microwave and fully furnished kitchen.  Owner occupies master bedroom and has their own bathroom.

name: Heart of the West Village - 2 bedroom
space: Our fully furnished apartment is located in an amazing location - near Sheridan Square. The two bedroom apartment is quaint, charming and very New York City!  (which means small apartment in a great location!!) Close to many subways, shops, cafes and lots of people watching!! This apartment has 1 double bed and 2 Single Beds in the bedroom.  The building is a walk up building - no elevator but it's just one flight up.  Apartment is fully furnished which means towels/linens supplied & there is a full kitchen.

name: Large, sunny, warm apartment. Great location.
space: The room is sunny, can accommodate up to 3 people: full bed + inflatable mattress. The area is absolutely wonderful and has tons of amazing coffee shops and restaurants! The room is also incredibly quiet... I tend to sleep with the window open and don't hear much more than birds chirping in the morning. But as soon as you step out of the building you feel that you are right in the center of new york city :)

name: Cozy private room, williamsburg NYC
space: Welcome to our brand new apartment, located in the middle of Williamsburg, the perfect base for your New York City experience.  The apartment itself, the amenities and all the furniture in the apartment are brand new!  We are surround by transportation options so you are only a short walk away from a train that will take you into Manhattan in 5minutes.   The apartment is only 3 short blocks to the Montrose Av L train and the same distance to the Lorimer JM and Broadway G train.  All your bases are covered with these 4 trains that service all of Manhattan and the best parts of Brooklyn.  You are literally 5 minutes ride away from Lower East Side, East Village and China Town and 20 minutes to Empire State Building and just a little bit longer to Central Park. Williamsburg is the trendiest part of NYC, full of bars, restaurants, cafes and small 24hr grocery stores (called 'bodegas').  We have both been living in the area for years so we know all the best local spots in our area, not to me

name: Bright Spacious 2 Bedroom/5 Room - wRoof Deck
space: Spacious five room apartment, 2 loft bedrooms, each with private living space below.  Great for couples, families and groups of friends traveling to NYC together. Lofts make it a 5-room space.  Large windows; great light. Building is a former school house converted into apartments.  Shared roof deck.  One block walk to train. 3 stops to Manhattan (Soho). Convenient walk to L, M, J, G trains. Williamsburg restaurants, bars, cafes all walking distance. Large grocery store around the corner, deli, pharmacy, post office, all here. Farmer's markets nearby. Washers, Dryers & Bike Room in basement. Wifi & utilities included for short-term rentals. Clean linens and towels provided. Air Mattress available if you have additional guests. Queen size beds. It's a lovely space! Note on space: There are two queen size beds and a brand new queen size sofa bed. If having more guests I have an air mattress and 2 couches that are very comfortable and cozy for sleeping. There is a lot of breathable space

name: ******AMAZING DEAL IN NYC*****
space: This is one bedroom furnished apartment located in the most prestigious neighborhood in New York City. The apartment is located in the center of the Upper East Side- East 73st, within the walking distance of green line 6 train which connects you to all other subway lines. Points of interests include Central Park, NY public pool, grocery stores, restaurants, Bloomingdales and other major shopping stores. The bedroom is small but cozy, with big closet and queen size bed. The living room has a couch that can be used as a sleeping bed for one person, and there is also a nice bar area with 2 bar stools. This is really an amazing deal for visitors, students, business people that don't want to spend crazy amount of money on hotels and have a pleasant New York experience in one of the most prestigious areas.  The apartment includes Wi-Fi, TV, clean towels and sheets. Please let me know if you have any questions, this is an amazing deal where you can feel like a true New Yorker and you should n

name: Small room in a 2-br condo in Bklyn
space: Hi. My name is JJ, and my husband and I have a small bedroom available in our two-bedroom condo in Kensington, Brooklyn. It's a small bedroom with a loft-style twin bed, so it is for single occupancy only. I have weekly/monthly special rates, but rates are NOT negotiable. We are looking for a guest who is respectful of privacy. Please take your time to go over the details and contact me with any questions you might have.  Apartment - A very quiet apartment with quiet neighbors - Washer/ dryer in the unit (small load) - Private guest bath (no shower) - Shared master bath - Gourmet kitchen with dishwasher and new appliances - High-speed internet included Building - Washers and dryers in the building (large load) - Gym in the building - Recreational room with pool table, cable TV, backyard in the building - New, clean condominium building. Vermin free. - Beautiful rooftop with 360 degree view of Prospect Park, Manhattan skyline, Verrazano Bridge. Neighborhood - A very charming, quiet and

name: Great DEAL Gramercy 1 BDROOM /2beds
space: Located conveniently right in the middle of Manhattan, walking distance to many squares, great bars and lounges, groceries, hospitals, empire estate bldg, grand central, subways, bus transportation .etc. ((website hidden) map)..Laundrymat is half block away.East river is a block away where you can jog/run everyday (evening or afternoon) along the river with the city view and Queens view. This is a NON SHARE with you own private bedroom and bathroom, living room, kitchen Great for out of towners, backpackers, or a last minute plans. Minimum 3 night stays. My apartment is not a 5 star hotel, not a luxury building with all the high end amenities.  My apartment is a typical New york apartment. It is on a 2nd floor walk-up w 12 stairs up...Its an old building but I kept my place clean and comfortable to stay in. Hard floor newly installed. The Kitchen is small in the living room, I do not cook ( I eat out ).. Coffee maker to start your fun NYC day.Fresh fruits and vegetable are right across

name: 1-2 Families! Park Slope Sleeps 9!
space: You will not find  a more gorgeous space at a better price -- easily fits 7-8 adults, a family, or two. Spacious, comfortable 4-bedroom family home on gorgeous, quiet block in Park Slope, rated by NY Magazine as NY's #1 neighborhood.  This three-story home has it all -- four large, fully-air-conditioned bedrooms, (or a working fireplace for winter!) fully-equipped kitchen with all-new appliances, jacuzzi, washer-dryer, front and back gardens, beautiful details.  It's steps from Brooklyn's best restaurants, shops, and bars and convenient to all transit.  Near supermarkets, 24-hour delis, bakeries, wine shops and more.  It's just 30 min from Manhattan attractions like the Empire State Building, the World Trade Center Site, Soho, Chinatown, & great shopping.   Less than a block away there's a brand-new playground with a Sunday farmer's market.  (And movies, plays & concerts al fresco) We are a short walk to Prospect Park with lovely walking, jogging, boating, & a zoo, as well as loads of

name: Beautiful duplex apt in Harlem
space: Spacious two bedroom duplex, recently renovated in Harlem, Manhattan, NYC  The apartment features: - Wood Floors, high ceilings - Spacious Living Room, with original brick wall and comfortable day bed for two - 1 Bedroom  with Queen size bed - 1 Bedroom with a crib - 1 Bathroom with bathtub - 1 completely renovated kitchen with dishwasher, fridge, stove, microwave - Laundry in the basement - Wi-Fi - Window A/C units - Ceiling Fans in every room - Central Heating This apartment is in a small and clean building. All neighbors are respectful and great people. This is the perfect location for someone who wants to be in the city, but in a quiet and up-and-coming neighborhood.  Location: - in front of beautiful Saint Nicholas Park, 10 min walking from Morning Side Park, 30 minutes walking from Central Park - 15 minutes by subway to Natural History Museum, Metropolitan Museum, Upper West Side, Columbus Circle This is a calm and peaceful apartment because it's not facing the street. It's also

name: Beautiful Lower East Side Apt!
space: A tranquil, beautiful, clean shared 2 floor apartment. 1 private-room is available.  The apartment is on the penthouse floor of a boutique apartment. It includes 1 bathroom to share with a female, and 3 decks appended to every room.    The private room is the largest and is furnished, with a comfy queen bed, a deck, a closet, storage and personal space.  LOCATION  The apartment is brand new in the Lower East Side, on Allen Street. Closest to the F/B/D (2nd Ave Stop or Grand Stop) J/M/Z trains (Essex Stop). 1 of 4 apartments (PH floor) in a brand new apartment building. A walk-up, but great exercise. Lots of natural light, exposed brick, hardwood floors and 1 bathroom. Great windows that keep the LES noise out! The apartment is fully furnished. Please note, laundry is right next door to our building.  Everyone who visits us, loves the apartment.  NEIGHBORHOOD We are steps from Chinatown, Soho and the East Village. We are closest to the Williamsburg Bridge which I run weekly! There are m

name: Cute loft space in Williamsburg
space: 1 bdrm in a 2br/ 1 bath cute loft apartment available. Open layout, high ceilings. Cool neighborhood, great restaurants and perfectly situated for exploring.   Room comes equipped with a dresser and full size bed and air conditioner.  Perfectly located close to transportation- we can literally see the JMZ from our roof. 3 stops into the LES.  5 minute walk to the G ( flushing or broadway) for cross Brooklyn adventures- clinton hill, caroll gardens williamsburg etc.  Or the L only a 10 minute walk to the L train ( montrose stop).  any way you cut it you can get into manhattan in under 20 minutes.  Enjoy high speed wi-fi, laundry in building and rooftop access for smoking, Kitchen is equipped with your basics.  No microwave sorry! Enjoy Pandora/ hulu plus and netflix. Street parking is plentiful and there is a mega grocery store just in front of the building.  Close to bars and boutique restaurants.

name: Stylish 1BR in the heart of Nolita
space: Apartment located in the heart of Nolita and steps away from SOHO - one of the most hip and desirable neighborhoods in New York! The place is tastefully decorated and clean. Very large compared to New York standards. Sleeps up to 3 people comfortably - 1 bedroom with tempur-pedic queen bed, one very comfortable couch in the living room.  AMENITIES: Pretty much everything you would need! - Open kitchen with dishwasher   - Uber comfortable queen sized bed in master bedroom (see reviews) - Large sofa that can sleep a 3rd person if needed - Large dining area with a Day bed overlooking the street - best place to have your morning coffee and read - Fully equipped kitchen - Wireless internet - Large flat screen TV with cable - Home theater system - Bose speakers NEIGHBORHOOD: You cannot beat the location! Steps away from the best cafes/restaurants in New York. To name a few, you are minutes away from Cafe Gitane, cafe Select, Uncle Boons, Epistrophy, Balthazar, Grey Dog, Dean & Deluca Great s

name: Charming Studio in Luxury Chelsea
space: Spend your time in Manhattan in the most charming area: corner of West Village and Chelsea, short walks from Union Square, Meatpacking District, High Line, SoHo, NoLiTa, steps away from all the subway lines (ACE / F / LG / 123) on 14th St.  AMENITIES: Comfortable queen-sized bed Crisp soft linens Large walk-in closet Pull-out couch (queen-sized mattress for 2) Fully equipped kitchen Wireless internet service Flat screen TV with cable service, Apple TV, Netflix Adjustable heat (Winter) / AC (Summer) Washer/Dryer Security Deposit of $500 required. AirBnB will authorize your credit card 24 hours prior to check-in, and then refund the deposit 48 hours after check-out. Elevator building with helpful staff. Amazing roof deck overlooking all of lower Manhattan.   No smoking or pets please.

name: Beautiful Private Bedroom
space: The apartment is a three bedroom apartment that you would share with two other house guest. You have a private room. It is a large room with 2 built in closets. The room is fully furnished as well as two big windows the bring in a ton of natural light. You have your own private backyard and a shared rooftop with fellow housemates. The other apartments  in the house separate from your apartment are all really great artistic people. They will guide you through the streets on New York if you ask. It is a lovely room for the summer time in NYC.

name: Sunny plant-filled apartment with 2 balconies
space: The kitchen, living room, and dining room are all new, clean, and open with large windows filling the apartment with light all day. There is a balcony off of the living area with herbs, flowers and a bistro table for two. There is also access up just one flight of stairs to the large shared roof deck.  There is a small and incredibly sweet and cuddly cat named Dandelion who lives in the apartment.  The apartment is in a historic and diverse neighborhood. It is directly off of Franklin Avenue with coffee shops, restaurants, bars, and grocery stores all within quick walking distance, including Hart's, Franklin Park, Mayfield, The Crown Inn, Glady's, Barboncino, King Thai, The Daily Press, Chuko, Weather Up, Little Zelda's, Diamond Reef, and Alta Calidad.

name: W'burg 2 bedroom w/ yard & laundry, 5 mins to L
space: Renovated two-bedroom apartment with private garden for rent in  a quiet corner of Williamsburg Brooklyn (L-train, Lorimer stop. G-train, Metropolitan stop).  Great for adults and adults with kids.  This is a completely private and separate two bedroom unit with three beds (2 Queen beds and 1 twin bed). Brand new kitchen/living room installed in October 2015.  New LED lights in the bathrooms and updated bedrooms as well.  Fun space with charm and lots of eco-friendly materials including reclaimed wood floors and non-VOC paints and insulation.   You will enter the apartment from the street level and descend three steps to a hallway with a coat closet and storage.  The ground floor has a kitchen/living room as well as a door to the yard. The living room has an L shaped couch for relaxing in front of a flat screen TV with attached chromecast.  There is a guitar to play if you know how.  The kitchen has a farm style table and is fully equipped with dishwasher, stove/oven, full size refrige

name: Historic Fort Greene & Clinton Hill
space: Enjoy one of brownstone Brooklyn's finest neighborhoods in our spacious one-bedroom apartment. The architecture is very easy on the eyes and the food will have you ready to transfer everything you belong to Brooklyn (it did for us!). We're a two minute walk away from the busy Dekalb Avenue full of NYC restaurant gems. The BAM (Brooklyn Academy of Music) and Fort Greene Park are each around ten minute walk. Pratt University is a five minute walk. Barclay's Center is about a 10 minute walk as well. There's tons to do and plenty to eat around these parts.  TRANSPORTATION/METRO: The G train is on our our block. The C is about a 5 minute walk and will take you into Manhattan (G to the L might be quicker!). The B and D are a 10-15 minute walk and are express trains to Manhattan. Walk to Barclay's Center (15 minutes) for lines RND2345B7Q. Taxis are easy to get and cost around $20 to downtown Manhattan. NEW: There are three CitiBike stations within two blocks.  WARNING: This is a four-story wa

name: Bright, Bedstuy Gem
space: Welcome to this newly renovated 19th century red brick building, where you'll have a private entrance to a 3rd floor suite full of beautiful details -- for example: the skylights, custom furniture, granite kitchen countertop, marble tiled bathroom, amazing artwork, and high-speed internet. There is basic television service in the apartment (channels 2-22). The express and local trains (J,M,Z,G) are a 10-minute walk from the house, and there is a bus 2 blocks from the house (citymapper will get you anywhere you want to go). There are plenty of good places to grub within the neighborhood, as well as gems that deliver (seamless and grubhub are great food resources). The neighborhood is diverse, we (the owners) are super cool(!) and you'll truly feel like you're at home. The apartment is ideal for two/a couple (or amazing for one)! There are two bedrooms: one is large with a queen-sized bed; the other is small with a futon. Most people like to utilize the small room as an office or another

name: 1BR on the best block of the LES
space: One bedroom with queen-sized bed, as well as a queen-sized air mattress, in a well-maintained pre-war building on the Lower East Side. There is also a twin-sized daybed and a large couch in the living room,  Full kitchen, furnished living room, and bathroom with tub and shower. Windows in every room with southern and western exposures means sunlight from noon til night.

name: yahmanscrashpads
space: - Private house, top floor; two bedrooms , 3 beds;  1 bathroom, kitchen with eating area. Price is per bed per bed.   - Fresh bed linens and towels; free tea an coffee included .  - Homely atmosphere, quiet place to relax and rejuvenate - This is a quiet, and safe neighborhood,   within steps of a 24 hour laundry service; 15- 20 minutes to JFK, only steps away from LIRR service, 30 minutes away from NYC, conveniently located next to  some good restaurants,  shopping malls and  movie theatres. the house is also within walking distance to supermarkets and grocery stores. - Just steps away from LIRR station, Q3 Bus 15-20 minutes to JFK, 20-25 minutes to Jamaica Centre ;  Q5, Q85 bus services to Green Acres Shopping Mall . - Location, Location,  crashpad is properly maintained, you will feel at home, here. - Please feel free to contact me with any questions.

name: Our NY home, Greenwich Village apt
space: HONEST DESCRIPTION: We are offering a share situation for those interested in that type of experience.   It is a two bedroom/one bath apartment.  It's on the top floor in a five floor walk-up (83 steps.  Our 93 year old neighbor attributes those steps to her longevity).  Three rooms total.  Two bedrooms: one queen bed (your room) and one twin bed (my room).  Maximum guests at one time: 2.  A very cozy, comfortable apartment that is a great place to come home to.  Frequently rented out and everyone likes the homey feel of the apartment ("cottage in the sky" "a place I could sit for hours" "most charming Airbnb so far"), and of course, the location is in the best part of  Manhattan.  The apartment is in the back of the building so you won't hear a lot of the city street noise, though there's currently some construction in the building in the back that has been noisy some week days. The apartment building was constructed in 1929, so our home has some of the older NY building quirks: slant

name: Studio Apt. Lower East - Manhattan

name: PRIVATE ROOM NEW YORK
space: ****Important please be sure to message me prior to booking**** $30 Cash cleaning Fee is to be paid on arrival so as not to incur an extra airbnb fee. name: *Unique Master BR in Battery Park!*
space: This is the Master Bedroom of a shared apartment in a secure doorman building. For the price you get access to a living room, full kitchen access and great roommates. All amenities included. You will have your own room, but share the apartment with 2 men in their 30.  We live in lovely Battery Park City. It's the south-west tip of Manhattan, right by the Hudson River and right next to the new World Trade Center. Transportation is very convenientÛÓall the trains meet down here. (4,5). (R). (1). (A,C,E). (J,M,Z); all within a 5-7 minute walk. You can be at Union Square in 15mins, including the walk to the station. You have your own room with windows facing a tree-filled courtyard, and your own bathroom. Full service and very secure doorman building. All amenities. WiFI. Air conditioning and heat. Get away from the noise and bustle of the city, and stay by the water where the air is fresh. There's dozens of green parks here and plenty to see in the new and rebuilt downtown of NYC.

name: Beautiful Brooklyn Brownstone
space: Our guest bedroom is up one flight of stairs, and comes fully furnished with a queen-size bed (very comfy memory-foam mattress), dresser, bookshelves, and a 47" LED flatscreen with movies for you to use (plus towels & sheets). It is an original Brooklyn brownstone, built at the turn of the century.
