Plenty of convenience shopping, restaurants and activity. Some Stores open after midnight. - (( Laundry 1 block away and 2 blocks away))   - (Couples considered at additional cost) add 15 - 20 %

name: Downtown Designer Full Floor Loft
space: Come stay in this beautiful full floor apartment on the north side of the Financial District that is centrally located minutes away from the World Trade Center Memorial, Statue of Liberty, Tribeca, Chinatown, Brooklyn Bridge and much more. This space truly feels like home. Large kitchen and dining room, and design details make this apartment one of a kind. There is 1 queen bed, two comfortable pull out queen couches and 2 twin beds. We also have an aero bed available upon request.  This is a single unit apartment that sits close to three 24 hour convenience stores. Three blocks away from south street sea port, where pop-up shops and awesome  food vendors have brought renewed life and energy into the neighborhood.  There is a TKTS booth one block away where you can get up to 70% off broadway tickets. (This booth opens an hour earlier than the one in Times Square, and you can actually buy matinee tickets the day before!  There is also a MUCH shorter line.) There are free movies outside o

name: Perfect & Stylish Williamsburg Apt
space: This apartment gets tons of light, has a full kitchen with all the latest appliances, has a queen size bed in the bedroom, along with a barcelona day bed lounger, which can provide extra sleeping for a third person.  It comes with wi-fi and a projector that you can hook up to your laptop to watch movies.  The apartment is on the 4th floor, expect to walk up. We also have rooftop access. The bathroom has a full-size bath tub for relaxing after a long day of walking all over the city.... or enjoy the super responsive nearby town-car service that is less than 5 minutes away that can take you wherever you need to go throughout the city. Wireless internet, projector where you can hook up your laptop to play a big screen movies on the wall of the living room. Have your own fully furnished Venetian plastered grey wall apartment in the hip area of Williamsburg Brooklyn through spring! And enjoy the spacious living room with southern exposure which gives you beautiful light pouring in all the w

name: Large home in most desirable Brooklyn hood!
space: Make this breathtaking corner brownstone in beautiful and historic Ft-Greene-Clinton Hill your family's home while you stay in NY. While our family is on school vacation, it's yours! This beautifully renovated, 5-bdrm, 4.5 bathroom townhouse is located on a landmarked, quiet, tree-lined corner (St. James Pl./Gates Ave). The house is within walking distance of top restaurants, adorable cafes, an open-air weekend flea market, the Brooklyn museum/Garden and leafy Fort Greene and Prospect Parks. With two nearby train lines (C and G), Manhattan and other parts of Brooklyn are just minutes away. Perfect for a vacationing family or visiting relatives.  The house is more than 3500-square feet over five floors, with a generous yard, and sleeps 9-10 comfortably. Recently renovated, this beautiful home combines old-world charm and modern simplicity. It's features an all new kitchen and bathrooms, and is fully equipped with an LG washer and dryer, zoned air conditioning and heat, cable TV, wireles

name: Loft-Like Park Slope 3bdr Duplex
space: GORGEOUS fully renovated three bedroom upper duplex in one of Brooklyn's best neighborhoods. This house-like apartment is almost 2000 sqft, with plenty of room to spread out. Located on the top two floors of a recently gut renovated 1890's frame house in trendy south slope, the apartment offers a king bed in the master bedroom, a twin over full bunk bed and a twin-sized loft bed in the two other bedrooms. Separate TV room, bathrooms on each floor, laundry room, kitchen with breakfast bar, microwave and dishwasher.  The TV room has a futon that can be folded down into a full-sized bed. Cable, Blue Ray streaming videos and WiFi included. The house is located four blocks from the F train and five blocks from the R train.  South slope is filled with great restaurants and shops, and Prospect Park is only five blocks away.  This is a perfect location for anyone who wants to enjoy all that Brooklyn has to offer yet still wants space and quiet. We love our home and we know you will too.

name: A Charming Brooklyn Townhouse
space: A sweet, three-story townhouse in the heart of brownstone Brooklyn, our comfortable home is the perfect oasis while you explore New York City. Ideal for a family, the house has been recently renovated and features a large fully stocked kitchen, a full dining room, three bedrooms, a TV/guest room, a landscaped backyard, and two and a half baths. The entire space has been lovingly decorated with a mix of modern and antique furnishings. The master bedroom has a queen-size bed, and the two children's bedrooms each have a single-size sleeping loft. A den/guest room includes a day bed that converts into two single beds. Wi-Fi and Apple TV available as well. Our neighborhood is conveniently located within a few blocks of several train stations, giving you easy access to all of New York City via the A/C/B/D/F/G/Q/N/R/4/5/2/3 lines. If you'd like to stay close to home and explore the best of Brooklyn, you are a few blocks from Smith and Court Streets and Atlantic Avenue, all of which feature TO

name: Cozy and Inviting Sublet Studio!
space: Delightful exposed bricks studio apartment in a well tended building  in Crown Heights, Downtown Brooklyn.   1 block from the LIRR, 2 blocks from the A & C trains.  1 block from B44 which takes you to Sheepshead Bay.  1 block from the B65 which takes you to Barclay's Center ( new home of the Brooklyn Nets)     which is a 20 minute walk from the apartment.   Quiet neighborhood surrounded by cafes and restaurants in addition to the Brooklyn Museum  of Arts, ChildrenÛªs Brooklyn Museum, Brooklyn Botanical Garden and Brooklyn Central Library.

name: Sunny Apt in Brooklyn-Close to Manhattan
space: Please Contact  Host for availability before booking.  I can sometimes be flexible with the check-in/checkout times, just ask. Large apartment with spacious kitchen and living room.  2nd floor in a 4 story, walk-up, 6 apartments total in the building. There is a queen size bed in the bedroom.. It comfortably fits two people. In addition to that, there are two convertible beds in the living room....each fits one person.  This is  a two bedroom apartment (the other bedroom is in use by me). Because, I'm out and about all of the time you will have the apartment to yourself (or selves). Includes:  -heat/air conditioning  -Wifi and internet  -full use of living room/ kitchen  -towels and linens **No microwave** It's hard to tell if I will be around, after you arrive. So, anyone that plans to visit, please have a good knowledge of the city and/or ready to explore and discover on your own.

name: Loveliest apartment East Village!
space: Amazing little studio apartment, big kitchen, gorgeous living space, very well lit... Perfect for a single, a couple (Queen sized bed), or even one more guest on a sofa bed.

name: Local Life, Global City
space: Our TWO ROOM APARTMENT is on the second floor of a four floor WALK-UP on a corner in Bedford-Stuyvesant. It's an old building and to support that, our apartment is raw and character driven. It is professionally cleaned by a  local worker's cooperative before and after your arrival. We have up to FOUR FULL SIZE SLEEPING ARRANGEMENTS that can fit 1 or 2 people each.

name: Modern Spacious Convertible Bedroom
space: Enjoy your stay in this private, shared modern, hip 1bedroom apartment.  This mod convertible bedroom has all the amenities:  Comfy queen size airbed with comforter (same height as king size bed in master bedroom) Flatscreen TV with Showtime, HBO, etc.   All rooms get beautiful light through cathedral style windows.  Books and candles to boot!  Just bring yourself! About the Apartment: This large, modern open floor plan apartment is in a well-kept gut renovated building and in great condition. Apartment gets a lot of light with loft size and cathedral style windows, has nice views of downtown Brooklyn and lower Manhattan day or night. GREAT AMENITIES: WE HAVE OUR OWN LAUNDRY, UPSCALE GROCERY STORE AND DINER.  Other wonderful amenities include: cable, hi-speed internet, shared pots, pans, dining, utensils, linen, towels, etc. There is also a shared breakfast bar space in the kitchen. Come, enjoy your stay in lovely Prospect Heights, Brooklyn.

name: Nice apartment with a deck and an office!
space: One bedroom, lots of natural light, two blocks from the subway, and block from a lot of places to eat and drink. Ten minute walk to Prospect Park. Small but nice office.  Very easy parking. The neighborhood is great and the apartment is really charming. Small, but great for a couple. The subway is two blocks away and it is about 30 minutes to Manhattan depending on where you are going. [Prospect stop on the R/N] On 5th, 6th and 7th  avenues there are a lot of nice places to eat and drink. Greenwood cemetery is a mysterious and beautiful walk, just around the corner.

name: Spacious Apt Steps to Central Park
space: Large One Bedroom Apt in an elevator / doorman building located in the heart of Lincoln Center. 2 blocks from the Met Opera, only several steps to central park and only 1 block from major subway station. This is a very safe and quiet neighborhood.  The apt has incredible natural light and sweeping views of the upper west side.  Enjoy fine dining on Columbus Ave on the Upper West side or a short subway ride will get you almost anywhere in Manhattan on the 1,2,3 train. Only 2 minute walk from strawberry fields and the famous sheeps meadow Internet and cable is included and there are amenities in the kitchen for your use such as a espresso machine and tea. Towels and other bathroom amenities are included so you will feel like you are in a hotel and yet at the same time will have the experience of what it is really like to live in New York. Also you will get use of a very cool folding bike so you can take rides around central park and the city on it.  I love living in this space as you are

name: MODERN, QUIET PRIVATE APT.
space: MORTON STREET - WEST VILLAGE Between Seventh Avenue South & Hudson  Street 1-Bedroom Apartment - 4th flights  walk-up   This conveniently located pre-war building is in the  heart of Greenwich Village with its many  wonderful restaurants, jazz clubs, movie theatres, and shopping. Close proximity to the subway and bus lines, SoHo and Tribeca.  The furnishings of the apartment are a mixture of contemporary  and modern. This one bedroom/one bathroom apartment is modern and  comfortable with all hardwood floors.  The living room has a comfy convertible sofa, Le Corbusier designed lounge chair, work console....25" Cable TV and WiF, and phone. There is a portable air conditioning unit in the apartment. When the water tank fills up on it, you will have to drain it from time to time. The separate kitchen is  modern and fully equipped.The bedroom has a queen-size bed and closet space.  The bathroom is small but modern with  shower and tub.  All fresh linens and towels are  provided. A perfect h

name: Lovely Central East Village 4p Apt
space: INTRODUCTION  Get the local NYC feel with this lovely 1 bedroom apartment with exposed brick walls (in real NYC 30's style apartment building). 2nd floor - walk-up. Awesome location!! Right in the middle of the East Village buzz, but on a side street so without the constant noise. Separate bedroom, open kitchen and living area, separate bathroom with toilet/shower/bath. Total space: 550 square feet/50 square meters. You'll have access to our relaxing garden in the back, shared with neighbours. Read our reviews! we're great hosts :) - clean, communicative, responsible and welcoming. ENTRY / LIVING ROOM / KITCHEN / BATHROOM Entrance hallway leads to the open living room, kitchen to the right and bedroom and bathroom to the left. Coat rack on wall for convenience. Beautiful wooden floor throughout the apartment. Feels spacious and the open plan gives it a social feel. Kitchen has quirky country feeling to it and amenities are supplied, toaster, kettle etc.  Very clean marble bathroom - gr

name: PRIME LOCATION STYLISH COMFORT
space: Amazingly located, Elegantly furnished, Sunny, Sophisticated, Airy 1 Bdrm with Queensize super comfortable bed ( sleeps 2) and single daybed (sleeps one upon request), in the heart of Williamsburg only 1 block form Bedford L Train. ( 10 minutes to Union Square 14th street) Newly renovated top floor apt. ( 2 floor walk up) with great light, beautiful kitchen and bathroom, enormous closet space, small terrace, central air-conditioning, heating, cable tv and internet access. Cotton towels and sheets, laundry drop off around the corner. There is a charge for additional guests after 2 people.

name: South Slope Private Bedroom
space: My apartment is a roomy, garden-level apartment on a quiet street in South Slope/Greenwood Heights. It's located three blocks from the R train at 25th Street, and in a great, very safe neighborhood. Tons of restaurants, bars, and shops are located a short walk away on Fifth Avenue. The best tacos I've had in the city are around the corner from the house.  The apartment has a large living room/kitchen area. The kitchen is stocked with everything you'd need if you want to cook.  The room has a queen-sized futon bed, closet, and shelves used for storage, as well as a window A/C.

name: Upper Westside Retired Teacher's Studio
space: ---Charming retired teacher's studio.  Queen bed sleeps 2.  Complete linens provided, fully stocked kitchen and of course, private bath.  10th floor with great light and view.   Elevator/doorman pre-war building 3 doors from Central Park .  Safe, quiet neighborhood conveniently located near multiple subway/bus. Includes laundry on property, hair dryer, TV and wireless internet connection.  I even provide shampoo, conditioner and soap.  You will be surrounded by numerous fabulous restaurants.  Walk to Time Square, Lincoln Center, Museum of Natural History or jog in Central Park. The B & C trains are 1 block away and the 1-2-3 are 3 blocks with numerous busses nearby. My apt is quiet and in a great, safe neighborhood but be prepared for SMALL; as in NYC small!

name: A Gem in Harlem - Modern Living
space: My lovely 2 bedroom apartment is located above one of the most acclaimed restaurant establishments in New York City. Located in historic East Harlem, the living room and one of the bedrooms offers a panoramic view of the East River and the Triborough bridge. The apartment also has central air conditioning and a laundry room on site.  The building is located directly across from two parks. The parks have basketball courts, soccer fields, a running track, playgrounds and big beautiful trees. There is a lovely cafe down the street, a food market two blocks away and a large shopping area two blocks away. You would be renting the second bedroom that has a great view of the river and bridge with wonderful sunlight in the mornings. The apartment has wireless internet, computer access and washer/dryer access. It is located nearest to the 6 train and near a cross town bus that picks up regularly.

name: Great for families!
space: 2 bedrooms of a furnished, floor-through apartment available for 2-week sublet from July 17th to July 31st on a quiet, tree-lined block.  Air conditioning.  WiFi.  Prime Carroll Gardens block: steps from Court Street.  Can accommodate a family with young kids (1 bedroom has bunk beds), an infant (crib in 1 bedroom), or three-four adults. 5-minute walk to F and G trains: F to Manhattan; G to Williamsburg.  Steps away from trendy cafes, restaurants, and bars and Court Street and Smith Street.  Beautiful cycling/running path and Brooklyn Bridge Park nearby.  Citibikes nearby :) Carroll Gardens has the best pizza in the world!

name: Beautiful Brooklyn Retreat
space: Spacious railroad apartment with one private bedroom, a studio and kids room, a living room and large kitchen / dining area. Near grocery store, cafes, library, convenience store, pharmacy, two parks and the train is a 3 min. walk. 20 minutes by train to get into the Lower East Side of Manhattan. Wi-fi and street parking available.  We have a cat named Stinky. She's an old gal who is really chilled out and super easy to care for. Food twice a day and a quick scoop in the litter box. Can also sleep 2 people on fold out couch in living room.

name: Lovely 1BR - Midtown East by metro!
space: GUESTS MUST READ THE FULL POSTING BEFORE CONFIRMING A BOOKING - NO INSTANT BOOKING REQUESTS ACCEPTED FOR THIS PROPERTY (PLEASE DO NOT ATTEMPT TO INSTANT BOOK THIS LOCATION) Junior 1 bedroom fully furnished apartment in Midtown East (entire apartment to yourself), just over one block from the 53rd St/3rd Ave entrance to the E, M and 6 subway lines, giving easy train access all over Manhattan, or walk to nearby Times Square, the Museum of Modern Art or Central Park.   Hardwood floors, soft lighting and high ceilings highlight the living-room in this cozy walk-up, with junior 1br and small alcove kitchen area (this apartment is best suited for visitors who do not plan to do extensive cooking due to kitchen constraints, although the basics are provided).  Please check out my AirBnB neighborhood guide but I'll also be happy to make recommendations for restaurants or bars in Manhattan in general, or in Harlem or Brooklyn (if you're on vacation I suggest checking out these areas as well if ti

name: Cozy Williamsburg Room with View
space: Good luck topping this, economical, aesthesian traveller. Located 20 minutes (door to door) from union square and all the attractions of NYC, this apartment is on the 5th floor of a walk up in coveted Williamsburg (Lorimer stop of the L or the JMZ or Broadway stop of the G) with a roof that has a 360 view and a room overlooking the glorious NYC skyline. Amazing light across the entire apartment. Excellent heat and hot water.  Quiet, homey, and comfortable. Safe neighborhood.  Easy access to four separate subway lines: the city is at your fingertipsÛ_ Walking distance to tons of awesome bars, restaurants, shops, people watching.... Super friendly corgi dachshund lives here with me.

name: 3-story Townhouse in Park Slope
space: Entire furnished 3-story 1880s brick townhouse in unbeatable location in Park Slope, Brooklyn: a quiet, safe street half a block from 5th Avenue, home to Brooklyn's Restaurant Row and great shops. And 5 minutes walk from the Atlantic Ave./Barclays Center subway hub (9 train lines: 2,3,4,5,B,D,N,Q,R). From there, it's 1 stop to SoHo and the rest of Manhattan. Supermarket around the corner. Cultural attractions like  Brooklyn Academy of Music, Barclays Center arena, and the always-hopping neighborhood of Fort Greene are all within 10 minutes walk. The house: 2 big bright beautiful bedrooms on top floor, one a grownups' room with queen bed, the other a kid's room with twin bed. Extra mattress for second kid or extra guest. Spacious kitchen, small but pretty backyard. Washer/dryer, wifi, all hardwood floors, library. Parlor floor has couch and antique great-sounding upright piano. Kids and dogs welcome. We have a dog and a cat but plan to kennel then. If you would like to take care of eith

name: Cozy Love Nest Prospect Heights
space: The love Nest is a very warm and inviting 2 bedroom, 1 bath, living room and eat-in kitchen . The apartment faces the front with a view of the Museum.  You will feel right at home in this cozy private bedroom. There is street parking in the area. This awesome apartment is across the street from the Brooklyn Museum and the Brooklyn Library.  The apartment is nestled in the Prospect Heights section of Bklyn with lots of restaurants and points of interest to keep you happy during your stay.  We are two minutes away from th (Website hidden by Airbnb) trains as well as local buses.

name: Gorgeous Sunny Simply Stunning!
space: This is a beautiful sunny room in a very big and CLEAN apartment in Manhattan. The kitchen is state of the art, granite counters, convection oven, stainless steel appliances, microwave, dishwasher, ice machine and water filter on outside of fridge.  Bathroom is all tile and granite counter, enormous bathtub, brand new toilet, tile floors and walls. The room is a good size, with a clothing rack and plenty of storage space in drawers, it has a double bed, extremely high quality, and very comfortable! (The bed is new and is not shown in the picture.)  A rug and a full size desk are also in the room.  It has two huge sunny windows, air condition with remote control and adjustable temperature.  The room is super comfortable so our airbnb guest would not need to share the rest of the apartment, aside from heating up food, the guest should have everything he/she needs in the privacy of their room. With access to the bathroom of course.  Since we are a couple sharing our home, when we are in t

name: 3 bdrm family friendly home in central Park Slope
space: Our beautiful 3 bedroom, 2 bath house in the heart of Park Slope is available July 29th-August 27th, one week minimum stay. Great central location. Easy walk to the Q, B, F, 2 & 3 trains. 1 1/2 blocks to Prospect Park. Park Slope was named New York's best neighborhood by New York Magazine. We have a lovely deck off the kitchen with a table that seats 6-8, perfect for a summer dinner party. Also a green and shady backyard, central A/C, washer/dryer, dishwasher, and internet access. Perfect house for a couple, or a family of three or four. $250 per night/$1700 per week includes WiFi, and all utilities. Non smokers only. No pets.

name: Renovated Spacious 1BR Upper West
space: Recently renovated 1BR in the Upper West Side of Manhattan. Several of the conveniences and amenities include: Apartment - Beautiful remodeled and bright with tons of natural night - Bedroom is off the street, making for a quiet sleeping environment - Brand new renovated kitchen with 4 burner stove, dishwasher, etc - Separate living space for relaxing and dining in - Highest-speed internet (though I'll admit, sometimes it can be quirky) - Fabulous host who can provide you with maps of the areas, things to see, and the most comfortable environment for your stay  Neighborhood - 2 subway lines, Express (2,3) & local (1,B,C) within 5 minute walk. These lines will get you anywhere you want on the island including Theatre District, Time Square, Chelsea market, Soho, etc - Central Park is only 2 blocks away and one of the main reasons I live here! - Short walk to the Natural History Museum & the Dakota Hotel - Amazing food in this area from 4star Peruvian to family style Italian to Sushi just

name: Stylish Large 1bd APT in Chinatown/Tribeca NYC
space: Large 1 Bedroom w/ Full Bathroom (750 square feet!!!): - Beautiful hardwood floors throughout  - High ceilings throughout - Interior features classic crown molding / full of charm!  - Large living room w/ fully set-up office area  - 2 large windows in the living room - Queen size bed in a spacious bedroom / super comfortable bed & extremely quiet.  - Separate, fully equipped eat-in modern kitchen w/appliances, pots/pans, spices, etc. w/ 1 large window  - Subway tiled bathroom w/ deep bathtub & shower & space for toiletries  - Super clean & well organized  Other Fun Stuff:   - FREE WIFI  - LCD Flatscreen TV w/ appleTV  - Sonos available  - Bose speakers available (jack compatible w/ most phones & computers) - Air conditioning unit

name: RENOVATED SUNNY LARGE 1 BD WITH ART
space: This is a lovely floor through 1 bedroom apartment in a charming 19th Century brownstone located in Clinton Hill. Sit back and enjoy this recently renovated apartment that is decorated with an eclectic group of artwork.  The apartment maintains the charm of this landmark district with its pocket doors, parquet floors, detailed moldings, and 2 marble fireplaces that are working. There is a very sunny and spacious bedroom that is separated from the living room which has a sofa bed that houses a brand new Queen size memory foam mattress that is very comfortable. There is a large flatscreen TV with cable, apple tv, and netflix.  The kitchen has everything you would need including a refrigerator, stovetop, toaster oven, and bosch washer/ dryer.  The bathroom has a large jacuzzi bathtub and marble all around.  The apartment also has free wifi.  Come back home to this quite tree lined street of Clinton Hill that has minimal traffic or noise.   There is almost always a parking spot right out f

name: Artsy, Colorful & Cute
space: I own this building and this is my personal apartment. I do not reside in the apartment except for a few weeks per year, so you will have the apartment all to yourself. I do store some of my personal items there, but they should not interfere with your visit. It has a private entrance. Apt amenities include: 42" LCD TV, DVD player, microwave, toaster oven, coffee make, electric tea kettle, hairdryer, bed linens, bath towels, alarm clock, basic cable, wireless high speed internet, and utilities. Located in Bayside - a safe, quiet, upscale residential community in the northeast section of Queens. The Long Island Rail Road Bayside station is 7 blocks away. The express train will get you into Mid-town Manhattan's Penn Station in 20 minutes. Shopping, restaurants, bars, and a movie theater are all within walking distance. Located only one block from Crocheron Park which has a 2.5 mile bike and jogging path that winds along Little Neck Bay. Please note - the rental fee is not negotiable. If

name: ONE BEDROOM IN FOUR-BEDROOM
space: One bedroom in a four-bedroom apartment. Share with two, twenty-something gay males and one female. Conveniently located in East Williamsburg next to the L (Montrose) and JMZ (Lorimer) rain stations. $100/night, or best offer.

name: Two Bridges District Chinatown NYC
space: + Comfortable, sunny 1 Bedroom in Two Bridges District of Chinatown. Fully furnished with queen bed. Single and wall closet (website hidden), DVD, Apple TV, AC & internet.  + Tenant no longer lives in the apartment + Southern facing windows to East River.  + 5th floor walk up.  + Quaint & quiet, away from busy Chinatown markets, 1/2 block from **East Broadway stop on F Train.  + Just south of popular Broome & Orchard shopping district and LES. 1 block south of East Broadway with hip bars and restaurants.  + One block south of Dimes Deli & Market for fresh food & organic grocery 143 Division St. 10002  + Nice 15min walk along East River Promenade to South Street Sea Port. + Snacks and basics can be purchased in the neighborhood at 52 Division Street 10002, The Newstand/Grocery  +Grumpy Coffee is located where Rutgers turns into Essex across from Seward park + Easy access to Williamsburg. 10min walk to Williamsburg Bridge/JMZ subway stop which makes it great for riding bikes, strolling o

name: Huge sunny artist loft +roof garden
space: Unique, tastefully renovated 2,000 square foot loft with breathtaking 1,000 square foot outdoor deck. Airconditioning throughout the space in the summer and well heated in winter!!!  Perfect for FILM AND PHOTO SHOOTS. Magic hour on the south facing roof garden is sensational.  Large bedroom with full sized bed, plus a sleeping nook with adult-sized bunk bed. Crib can also be provided. Comfy living room flooded with light with large sofa. Full eat-in kitchen with dishwasher, fridge, freezer. Did I mention the washer and dryer? Outdoor deck is lush with flowers, sun for tanning, shade for breakfast outdoors and later afternoon cocktails. Plenty of room for kids to play as well (Website hidden by Airbnb)  Close to R train (Union Street) and F and G (Carroll Street) subway lines. 10 min ride to Manhattan. Wireless high speed internet, easy street parking. Clean linens and towels provided. Kitchen is fully equipped including gas stove, toaster, coffee maker, etc.  Apartment is by the Gowanu

name: *Private Room in Spacious Loft - Williamsburg NY*
space: Full floor loft with hardwood floors throughout, exposed brick, six windows facing east and west. Classic mid-century decor provides a warm and cozy environment that makes you feel at home

name: Brooklyn waterfront large sunny apt
space: Great deal! Sunny, large, charming 1 bedroom apartment (you get the bedroom), 1 block from the water  and the Manhattan skyline. 5 minute walk from the summer ferry to Governor's Island and to Brooklyn Bridge Park. Fully renovated 19th century warehouse building complete with elevators. Full kitchen (including dishwasher) and a marble bathroom.  Lovely place to stay, you pass tree lined streets walking to the F train or look at the Manhattan skyline if you prefer to take the bus. It's very convenient to Manhattan and other parts of Brooklyn.  Great for walks along the waterfront, walk into Manhattan over the Brooklyn Bridge.  Quiet street but in a wonderful neighborhood full of restaurants, stores, bars, etc. everywhere.

name: Cozy Near Columbia
space: A one bedroom apt in the upper west side/Morningside heights area of Manhattan. Few blocks away from central park & 20mins to time sq. by train.       The area is predominately Columbia university campus and residences  so many think of it as a "college town" part of the city. There are lots of cool bars,restaurants & music lounges. My apt. is close to 2 subway lines  One sectional sofa  in living room & full sized bed in bedroom. Fast wifi & Netflix are also available.      It often gets loud with street/lobby noise (im the first apt on the ground floor & It's New York!) I'm a pretty easygoing person, and the place is great as a basic home base for a person or a couple/friends visiting town.

name: HUGE Full Floor loft in Heart of SoHo (2 Bedrooms)
space: - Fully furnished loft (2 bedroom - 1,200 sq ft) in Heart of Soho one of NYCs most popular neighborhoods - Spacious light filled Soho Loft with 9 huge windows and 2 bedrooms with luxury beds (W hotels) - Listing is for the entire apartment - Top floor apartment with access to rooftop - Brand New Central Air Conditioning that you can control remotely - High ceilings - 1 bathroom - Brand new 55" Samsung HD TV - Washer, Dryer, microwave, toaster oven, plates, cups, pots, pans, and cooking utensils - Included: Towels, sheets, pillows, blanket - Ultra High-speed WiFi and wired internet (250 Mbps) - All utilities, including: electric, heat, hot water, cooking gas (stove/oven) - Iron and ironing board - A personal touch of service and attention for every one of my guests! - Most subway stops within two blocks (A,C,E, 6, N, R, Q, W, J, Z) .... Please feel free to ask any question and I'll happily get back to you as soon as I can!

name: 10min Walk & 15mins to Tourist Spot
space: Spacious room which can accommodate one person with a Queen bed size with a high quality,  moderate firm mattress which is best for your back. The bed frame is hand crafted with high quality material and it has traditional Asian artistry style. Best location to travel Mid town Manhattan and for all tourist sightseeing such as Time Square, Broadway Shows, Central Park, Fifth ave plus many more places.  Please take sometime and look at all positive reviews and pictures plus detail description Its a completely renovated house located in Jackson Heights, Queens with safe and easy access to all the major subway lines (E,F,R,M and 7) into Manhattan (15 mins into Mid-Town) and 5 mins into LaGuardia Airport and 15 mins to JFK International without Traffic. We are also near to Arthur Ashe Stadium , Flushing Meadow Park for U.S. Open. We provide FREE 2 days complementary outdoor private driveway parking.   We are great hosts and take care of our house since being the owners. We provide fresh lin

name: Sunny 2 BR in Clinton Hill
space: The apartment is fully furnished, and sleeps four comfortably: two good-sized bedrooms each have a queen sized bed, with ample space besides. The street-facing bedroom is full of morning light (though get some of the street noise) and the rear bedroom is quieter and darker. Of course, we provide linens and towels for your stay.  The apartment has a nice living room that gets a lot of light during the day. It's quite cozy, with a small dining table, a sofa, and lots of houseplants to recharge you after a great exploration in the city.  The kitchen is large by New York standards, and you will be able to use the fridge and access kitchenware, spices, and utensils for cooking. The bathroom is small but has a full tub and shower.

name: Beautiful, Spacious 4 BR Brooklyn Brownstone
space: Beautiful 4 floor brownstone in the heart of Brooklyn, 15 minutes from Manhattan, on a tree-lined block.  Incredibly spacious 4+ BR, 3 modern baths, charming brownstone details. Full private outdoor garden and eating area with deck seating and BBQ.  Antique brownstone details with full modern amenities - D/W, W/D, central air, jacuzzi tub, internet. Quiet and private, steps from shopping, restaurants, and Prospect Park. 2 blocks from train.

name: Beautiful, clean NYC SOHO loft.
space: Beautiful fully renovated and stylish tri-level bedroom loft on the 10th floor, in highly sought-after 24hr Doorman building. You'll find this apartment exceptionally airy and bright, with high ceilings, light bamboo hardwood floors facing the courtyard and is exposed to eastern & southern sunlight pouring in from oversized windows on the 2nd and 3rd level. The gracious layout of this tri-level home gives it a total openness feel. The entry level features a contemporary renovated marble bathroom with built-in storage, a walk-in closet with overhead storage, a kitchen with  granite countertops and marble pass-thru, stainless steel appliances complete with a dishwasher, fridge, a convection microwave oven and a cozy separate dining area.  The second level is a living room with wonderful high ceilings and a ceiling fan with remote control.  There is also a 48" flat screen TV and a brown leather sofa that can converts into a sofa bed with the comforts of a posterpedic mattress.  The glass

name: Carroll Gardens EMF-Safe
space: Carroll Gardens is one of the most charming neighborhoods in Brooklyn and our home is one one of the quietest blocks with wonderful parks nearby, and the oft written about shopping boutiques and restaurants of Smith and Court Streets just minutes from the front door.  Carroll Park with it's popular children's play area is three blocks away.  We have two separate rooms available with private bath in a modern, renovated 1864 carriage house - it's a single family home located on a super quiet, tree-lined block.  At night it's rare to hear anything and you'll wake up to the sound of birds singing in the tree branches in the front garden.  For more info about Carroll Gardens - (URL HIDDEN) It's a quick one and a half blocks to trendy Smith Street's restaurant row, bars and shops and 2 minutes walk to the F train, ten to the R train.  Soho is 15 minutes away by F-train.  It's a lovely 25 minute walk through Cobble Hill and historic Brooklyn Heights to the Brooklyn Bridge or east through Park

name: Spacious, modern Apartment
space: I live in one of the coolest areas of NYC,.. Williamsburg Brooklyn in a very great location. I'm 1 stop from Manhattan . Great things around here to see and explore . The Hudson River is right down the street from my place with an amazing view of Manhattan. Located near fantastic restaurants , bars and shops , one block to Whole Foods and Apple store . Short walk to Mccarren park with outside free pool , close to waterfront where you can take watertaxi to the city . Summer concerts in the park to really cool Flee Markets on the weekends  There is Retro Fitness gym across the street from me for those who like to work out. You can also walk across the Williamsburg bridge right into Manhattan. As you can see I have a very clean Modern style Apartment. You get a queen and plenty of dresser and closet space to make yourself at home . I have a hair drier , towels , toiletries for you . I am looking forward to hosting You !

name: Times Square-Hells Kitchen Quiet Rm
space: As one of three bedrooms in this apartment, you will have myself available for tips and guidance during your stay. I look forward to meeting you! Details on the space: In addition to the private bedroom listed here, there is a spacious shared living and dining space, kitchen, bathroom, and separate work nook for productivity. The bedroom is furnished with a full-size actual bed, desk, dresser, and features a window. Of course, this is a Manhattan apartment, so space is at a premium - but this is a solid, comfortable, clean, and private room plenty large for long-term stays. We look forward to hearing from you!

name: Lovely, perfectly located 2-br
space: This is a lovely, perfectly located 2-bedroom apartment right in the middle of Greenwich Village. It's well-suited for a couple or a family with one child and/or an infant (but is not available for more than two adults). There are nice views from all rooms, and you can see the Chrysler Building from the living room and the MetLife Tower from the master bedroom. The apartment was fully repainted, brand new appliances were installed, and double-pane windows were installed in 2015. The apartment was gut renovated in 2009. The apartment offers: 2 bedrooms 1.5 bathrooms Spacious (900 sq ft), all rooms flooded with sunlight Full line of kitchen equipment Custom-framed original art throughout the apartment 24h Doorman Staffed mailroom High-speed FiOS wireless Internet Laundry facilities in the basement The master bedroom has a queen-sized bed in it. The second bedroom is set up as a child's room, with a loft bed. There is also a crib for an infant in the master bedroom. No smoking. No pets.

name: BEAUTIFUL ROOM IN BKLYN BROWNSTONE
space: Hello! I have a bedroom for your enjoyment in a duplex in a completely renovated brownstone in Brooklyn.  Large furnished room, new washer/dryer, your own private bathroom. You will also have full use of the living room, dining room, kitchen, deck, and backyard on the lower floor. Beautiful and quiet block, only 2 blocks from the J train... 15 minutes to Manhattan, 10 minutes to Williamsburg, which has recently become a center of entertainment, restaurants, concerts, and culture here in the city .  The neighborhood is very safe and there are many beautiful historic brownstone and limestone (Website hidden by Airbnb) area nearby has even been landmarked by the New York Historical Society.   Furthermore, there are a few excellent restaurants within 5-10 minute walking distance, including Celestino, Saraghina, Chez Oscar, and Peaches. Look them up on Yelp to see the great reviews. name: Private Bdrm & Bath, 30-day min, Weekly Maid Serv.

Starbucks, Dunkin, 24-hour grocery, banks, cleaners, all within 2 blocks. 10-yr old building, lovely park across the street, long term automobile parking one block away and short term parking on the street. Restaurants nearby.

Wifi is available in your bedroom, there is also AC, a fridge, microwave, French press and a kettle. You won't be able to really cook but you can reheat food (there isn't a full kitchen). Clean bed linens and towels are provided for your comfort.  We (my husband and I) live in the building. The neighborhood is very pleasant and super safe at night! name: Beautiful Artists Mini-Loft (LES)
space: Welcome to my home, It is a beautiful mini loft/art studio situated in one of New York Cities most loved neighborhoods, the Lower East Side!  The studio is swelling with character, from it's white wood floors and original brick wall to it's enormous windows overlooking a historical and famous street. The artistic materials are always cleaned up for guests (and there are never any odors) but the easel & canvases will be there for your viewing pleasure. Wireless internet is also available for you (no tv, but you won't need one). The kitchen has been renovated with a modern twist, while elements like original crown molding and vintage radiators make you feel right at home. The full size lofted bed is beyond comfortable, complete with an array of pillows to choose from and soft sheets. It has one of the most unique bathrooms you will find, with a semiprivate room for the toilet and the soaking tub couldn't be more opportune for a relaxing bubble bath after walking for hours on the streets

name: Artist's Ditmas Pk 5 bedroom house
space: This is the perfect property for a large or small group of people visiting New York for whatever purpose. But it is elegantly finished with a comfortable temperature always.  The rooms are small and there are no closets but there is a room off the larger room where you can put luggage and such.  And in the front there is a storage area. This is my home and is not a hotel. Kitchen painted 2016.  * Spacious uptown retreat, perfect home base for adventure or home away from home * Everything you need in a comprehensive guide - you can enjoy your own space and be your own concierge, with free guidance from me! Other features include: - Fully equipped kitchen (bring or buy your own spices & food) - Dishwasher, microwave, stove/oven, coffee maker - all new! - Living/dining room with 32-inch HD television and DVD player  - High-speed wireless internet - Full bathroom with tub & show

name: Gramercy Pk Area, w Rooftop Gdn!
space: This is a one-bedroom apartment in the Gramercy Park area of Manhattan [East 25th St]. It is a sunny, spacious, well appointed apartment. One of the best features is the rooftop garden atop the building. See the Empire State and Chrysler Bldgs and much more, while sipping wine at the end of the day! Very romantic and serene.  The apartment is fully equipped: stereo, microwave oven, air conditioning, cable television, Internet access, 24-hour doorman. It is on the ninth floor of an elevator building.  The neighborhood is pretty, as well as convenient. Within a few blocks we have some of NYC's best restaurants, such as Eleven Madison Park and Gramercy Tavern. Also, three blocks away, there is lovely Madison Square Park, which is surrounded by historic NYC buildings, including the beautiful and iconic Flatiron Building and the new culinary hotspot, Eataly. A fifteen minute walk west brings you into the heart of Chelsea. A ten minute walk south brings you to the trendy East Village. Walkin

name: The best of Brooklyn - bedroom with a private bath
space: Super comfortable bedroom with a private bathroom in 3BR/2BA apartment with a beautiful private yard. Located in the best Brooklyn neighborhood - Greenpoint/Williamsburg.  THE ROOM: studio-like with queen bed, closet, AC. Private bathroom. Wireless internet and wireless printer. THE APARTMENT: modern with open kitchen, fully equipped. Spacious living room, private yard, washing machine/dryer. Free internet. Additional storage space available.

name: Artist Loft @ Bushwick, Brooklyn
space: Feel and enjoy the artistic and trendy neighborhood of Bushwick staying at our place! We have a very comfy and electric loft located at one of the best spots in this area. The bedroom area is subtly divided from the rest of the apartment because we like open spaces but still possess some privacy. We have a kitchen with all the necessary supplies for two: dinnerware, coffee maker, pans, shaker, glassware and chopsticks! The living room/studio area is the best spot where you can relax, have a drink, read a book, check internet (wi-fi included) and enjoy the great light that the big high windows provide. The bathroom has the perfect the size and everything you need. The building has laundry rooms on each floor. No pets allowed. Our place is two blocks away from Jefferson St. Station of the L train. That same train takes you to Manhattan in 12 minutes and connects you to all stations of the Williamsburg-Bushwick area. There are bars, coffees and restaurants around with a very vibrant atmos

name: Wonderful east village floor thru
space: Large floor through over a garden and in the mainstream of East Village. Large bedroom. Large dining room, large living room which also sleeps 3 people.   Warm. Cozy. Near subways. French doors. Wifi available.  Lots of cafes and little shops around. It's a Parisian apartment in New York!

name: Urban Oasis II - gorgeous 3 br. house
space: The ground floor has open kitchen, living, dining room, 1/2 bath and opens out to a beautiful backyard. The 2nd floor has one bedroom with a couch and a full size futon bed, another room that I use for exercise and storage and a full bath with a tub. The top floor has the master bedroom with queen size bed, an office/bedroom with windows over looking the back garden and a full size day bed, a small reading nook, and another full bath with a tub.  The neighborhood is excellent - South Slope, Brooklyn. My house is right off of 7th Avenue and very close to Prospect Park which rivals Central Park in beauty and size. Also close to BAM - the Brooklyn Academy of Music - and the new Barclays Stadium.  I am 7 blocks from the subway (F train to either 7th Ave or 15th St/Prospect Ave) and can be in the city in 20 minutes or to Coney Island/Brighton Beach in 40 minutes.  There are lots of cute restaurants and stores along both 7th and 5th Avenues so plenty of activities to choose from. I have 3 wo

name: Amazing Triplex in the E Village
space: A big loft in the E Village in the best location possible in NY. Quiet street but still 2 minutes walk from Union Square, St. Marks, tens of bars and restaurants. It's also 2 minutes walk from the 4,5,6,L,N,Q,R subways, which makes it easy to get to every point in town. Fully furnished and renovated. There is also communal garden to the building for BBQ.

name: Your own townhouse in Bklyn Heights
space: This charming 200-year-old clapboard house is one of the prettiest homes in Brooklyn Heights.  The whole house is newly renovated, and the facade recently won a prestigious historic preservation award!  Unusual for a city house, we have a driveway with parking for 2-3 cars.  5 bedrooms, 4 full bathrooms and 2 half-baths spread over 3 stories + finished basement.  Sleeps 12 in actual beds, 4 more on excellent airbeds, and if desired can accommodate more with plenty of space for additional air beds, Pack-n-Plays, etc.  Yard with gas grill for summer BBQ's, and a balcony on the third story.  Central air conditioning, laundry, wi-fi, cable TV and DVR/DVD player, piano in the living room, two whirlpool bathtubs.  Fully equipped cook's kitchen with 2 sinks, stainless steel Bosch appliances, kitchen desk nook - and an extra fridge/freezer in the basement!  Gym equipment includes elliptical trainer, yoga mat and block, exercise ball.  The big kid in you will enjoy our Ms. Pac Man arcade machin

name: The Brooklyn Woodworker 3bdrm/2bth
space: Our apartment  is located in historic Crown Heights, a neighborhood with a rich history.  As a designer and woodworker I have rebuilt this space into a welcoming home and filled it with furniture I have built in my wood shop only two blocks away. The apartment is two floors with three big bedrooms and two full bathrooms. Each bedroom comes with a closet and a dresser.  If requested, bedroom #2 in the photos can easily have two twin beds in place of the double bed. If you have a party greater than 6  (7 or 8 maximum), we can accommodate you with another real bed of your choice, placed in the alcove. The alcove does not have a door like the other three real bedrooms.  We have a large TV with cable and xbox 360 in the living room. WiFi is also provided. There is a built in stereo system with speakers throughout the apartment so bring your iPod, iPhone or mp3 and you will have music throughout. If you are traveling with children, our apartment is very child friendly. We can provide a high

name: The Cottage / 1500 sqft. of Privacy
space: Situated just one stop from Manhattan in Dutch Kills, Long Island City, sits a lovely little house that we call The Cottage.       Built in the early 20th Century, this frame house would be like an old story book cottage if it weren't so close to the city. There are 4 bedrooms to accommodate a large group.  There are accommodations for infants also, so just let us know.  All of the bedrooms are on the second floor with a full bathroom to use.       The main floor has a full kitchen with a family size refrigerator. So if you plan on staying for a while, fill up the fridge. There is a dining table that can easily accommodate a large group (six chairs, but can be extended to hold 10). The living room is comfy and cozy and you will always have lots of natural light coming thru the windows. On the main floor there is another bathroom with a standing shower so there is no waiting in line. The main floor has a small bedroom that sleeps one guest. So if you have someone that cannot go up the s

name: Heart of Ft. Greene, Brooklyn
space: Luxury furnished studio apartment on 14th floor of elegant prewar building, quietly situated in the heart of Brooklyn's liveliest neighborhood. Lots of light, expansive view, new kitchen, 24-hour doorman, washer-dryer in basement, internet, air conditioner. One block from Ft. Greene Park (Farmers Market), BAM, and of course, the famous row of restaurants on Dekalb. And four blocks from Barclay's Arena.  20 minutes from Manhattan--close to 12 subway lines.

name: Boerum Hill Brownstone Garden Duplx
space: Private Entrance. Tree-lined block. Family friendly brownstone. Playground on same block. Live the Brooklyn lifestyle. Heart of Brooklyn, restaurants, Smith Street, Fifth Ave, walking distance to BAM shows, Barclays Center, Atlantic ave. Theatre, film, arts and culture, walking distance to all Brooklyn entertainment, Next to 11 subway lines to get you almost anywhere in the city in 20 minutes. Eat in kitchen. Outdoor: Common area yard with treehouse (use at your own risk--we assume no liability for use of any backyard equipment). Private area patio with grill, wood table and chairs. vintage ice cooler. Bedding: We have 1 queen real bed, twin bunk beds,  1 double bed-height Aerobed*, 1 double pull out sofa, 1 pack-n-play* (*pls let us know if you need these items as they are not always out). Kitchen: All dishes, cups, pots, pans, utensils, condiments, dishwasher, blender, food processor, toaster, etc. Freshly ground coffee included.  Kids toys available. (pls let us know children's ages

name: Soho Apartment Stylish & Central
space: If you want to visit New York and experience Downtown this is the perfect place. It  is in the hottest spot of Soho. The apartment is facing a garden so it is really nice . Once you walk down (there is no elevator) two flights you are in the middle of the best bars, shopping, galleries, clubs and interesting international people. The apartment is in Soho with the best shopping possibilities you can imagine but it is also close to China Town and Lower East Side. There you find more eclectic small shops and bars. The New Museum is steps away. The apartment is ideal for 2 guests (but can sleep up to 4 with a sofa bed) it has a fully equipped kitchen and a small bathroom with bathtub, Air Condition and wireless internet. My wife is a interior architect, she did a great job renovating it however it is by no means a 5 Star Hotel but a private apartment in a old building please consider this. The art on the walls are originals from my Gallery. All major Subways are close. The green line is ri

name: Great studio apt in midtown west!
space: Good size studio apartment in the Chelsea/Hells Kitchen area. 30th st between 8th and 9th aves. Very close to the A/C/E/1/2/3 trains and one block from the Highline!  Walking distance to Macy's/Herald Square and Times Square.  Price includes cable tv and wireless internet.

name: Williamsburg Apt, close to metro L
space: Beautiful 1-bedroom + 1-living room in the heart of North Williamsburg (1 minute / 1 block from L train - Bedford Avenue station).  South-oriented, with balcony. 650 sq ft (=60 square meters). Fully equipped kitchen. 1 bedroom with king size bed, 1 living room with convertible sofa (could host up to 2 couples or family with 1 or 2 kids) From Bedford avenue station, you are 5 minutes to East Village, 10 minutes to Union Square, 15 minutes to Greenwich Village.  5 minutes walk to the waterfront (Brooklyn Flea Market, Smorgasburg food court, East River Ferry stop, East River State Park) Supermarket and multiple groceries stores within 1 minutes. Immense choice of restaurants and bars. Perfect for a chilled stay in vibrant Williamsburg. Contact me for more info.

name: Al's Place
space: Newly renovated 3 Bedroom Apt available in a quickly developing area of Bklyn.  About 30 minutes from Manhattan and near the subway stops.  Near the Bkyn Museaum, The Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, The Brooklyn Academy of Music, and the world famous, children's Museam.  Wifi accessible, and the host is a warm and friendly person.

name: Cheerful & Charming Williamsburg
space: Stay in a spacious railroad apartment located on a top (3rd) floor (lots of light!) in a wonderful building in the heart of Williamsburg. Conveniently equipped with wifi internet, a full kitchen and dining area and air conditioning. You will be staying steps away from delicious food, 5 minutes from the subway and 10 minutes away from McCarren Park.  The closest subway stop is "Graham Avenue" off the L train.  Also, my home is about a 12 minute walk from the G train, and a 15 minute walk from the JMZ train.   There is a real neighborhood feel here, people are quite friendly, and it's as safe as can be! A 10-minute subway ride to Union Square, the apartment is nestled in an old-school Italian neighborhoodÛÓjust the right mix of coolness and charm- authentic Italian restaurants, bistros, and the best Mexican in town. Clean, sunny, and roomy, this apartment is perfect for a family or a handful of friends. A comfortable full-sized bed, living room, dining room, 2 great couches that can be us

name: Above Graham stop - L train
space: Charming Williamsburg apartment located conveniently right above the Graham Stop off the L train. Extremely close access to subway and bus stop. Cute bars, restaurants, bodegas, grocery, laundry, and coffee shops. Air conditioned room w/full size bed. Living room, kitchen and spacious bathroom. Internet, easy street parking, and lots of natural sunlight, windows in every room.  10 minute walk to Bedford, Bushwick, McCarren Park and Greenpoint.

name: Beautiful apt 10 min to Wbrg!
space: Û¢ 2 blocks to the subway Û¢ 10 minutes to Williamsburg Û¢ 25 min to Union Square Û¢ 1 master bedrooms (king-sized bed) Û¢ 1 smaller bedroom (single bed) Û¢ accommodates 4 (with an aero-bed) Û¢ light filled, open kitchen, dining and living room Û¢ large deck Û¢ pretty garden Û¢ huge closets Û¢ spacious bathroom Û¢ safe and quiet neighborhood Û¢ beautifully furnished Û¢ clean and bright Û¢ free wifi Û¢ air conditioning and ceiling fans Short train or bike ride to Bushwick galleries and downtown Williamsburg.  Old school neighborhood - German, Polish and Italian bakeries, butchers & hardware stores! New bars and restaurants popping up everywhere. VERY close to the scene, but quiet and pretty. Non-smoking inside or outside on deck. Perfect for a individual, couple or small family.

name: Charming Alcove Studio w/ Terrace
space: Come Stay on the gorgeous Upper West Side of Manhattan! Located on a picturesque block across from Riverside Park, my apartment offers you all the amenities of home. The apartment comes fully equipped with a queen bed (most comfortable in world), linens, towels, WiFi, full kitchen, air conditioning, laundry in the building, large walk in closet, and vintage pink tiled bathroom with a full bathtub and shower. Apartment also boasts a large outdoor terrace furnished with a table, chairs and grill for dining al fresco. The linens and towels are of the highest quality and the decor would be described as mix of traditional with eclectic elements. The space is very clean and if you like I can arrange for housekeeper to come in during your stay. Very close proximity to: Restaurants & Bars Subway Trains (1) is 5 blocks south Columbia University Museum of Natural History Central Park Many places for shopping including Victoria's Secret, Banana Republic, Barnes and Noble and many grocery and drug

name: 3 bedroom duplex apt with backyard
space: Our apartment has 3 bedrooms, one spacious master with a king size bed and a beautiful alcove, 1 kids room with Bunk bed,  and 1 queen size bed in the guest rooms. there is 1 full bathroom at the level of the bedroom floor and one half bath on the ground floor. We live in a brick townhouse built in 1890. We decorated it with modern furniture, our kitchen is brand new, it has a huge counter top, great for receiving guest or cooking with your friends and family. the living room, the dining room and the kitchen are one open space that opens up onto the backyard. We have a huge backyard with dining table, gas grill and play area for kids, ping pong table and bubble hockey.  The bedroom level also has a brand new washer and dryer. We also have a private office which looks like a small house with a skylight, where you can go and work. It's my husband's office, right in the backyard, best place to work from, beautiful view of the backyard. We have free WIFI, deli around the block, parking is

name: Cozy and quiet with secret garden
space: A floor in our charming Harlem townhouse apartment, restored to its former glory, in historic Hamilton Hieghts. Totally private with own entrance, bathroom and kitchen. Free Wifi is available. One full size bed that sleeps two.  If you require another bed (we have a small cot) there is a $35 fee for the extra cleaning and set up. Here are three things people love about our place. 1) A separate entrance to the space : privacy 2) comfortable space: cozy fireplace, fully equipped kitchen, and garden. 3) Convenient location: located near express and local trains that can take you to all the major sites in the blink of an eye. Here are three things people don't like about our place. 1) Tricky entrance. Because this is a historic brownstone, the stairway to the space is a little tight. 2) Our taller guests have told us that the bathroom ceiling is a little low. Again, historic brownstone. 3) The space is small, but perfect for a couple sight seeing and exploring New York City. Come stay in o

name: YOU ROOM IN NYC
space: The perfect place for your in New York ,small cozy room located on the front part of the house where is possible to hear a little bit the train noise when this one is passing but it's not an excessive noise ( check my reviews about the room ) . The  apartment  is located in a quiet neighborhood of Woodside Queens very close to the city and just steps from the train station. there are only 20 minutes of commute to Manhattan . Come and enjoy your stay in one of the most amazing cities in the world in this well appointed space at less than half the rate of a luxury boutique hotels standard room. My room in rent is private, comfortable and cozy perfect for 2 people. Special Features and Amenities *Queen size bed linens and towels supplies *Hi speed wireless internet * TV  VERY GOOD LOCATION Thank you in advance and  I look forward to hosting you  I know you will truly enjoy your stay in your home away from  home. Best Regards

name: 1BR Loft in Brooklyn
space: 1500sf 1BR apartment for two week + rentals. Available April + May 2016. Clinton Hill, Brooklyn:  three blocks from Pratt Institute, two blocks from Steiner Studios. 8 minute walk from Clinton/Washington stop on G train. One block from Flushing Avenue bike path. This apartment has 16 windows/doors on three sides. It is a two-story modernist box atop a four-year-old 11 unit building, washer/dryer in unit, upstairs library, central air, 2 balconies (one with 400sf outdoor space & gas grill), 50" plasma TV, home theatre, high speed internet. This apartment was featured in the New York Times Real Estate section. One block to new supermarket and organic market, lots of great restaurants (Roman's, Speedy Romeo, The Finch, Emily) / shops in area.

name: Cozy room in  2 bedrm apt in amazing Harlem!
space: Need a place to crash while passing through NYC? Welcome to my place! It is clean, bright and spacious, is close to major subway lines (the B,D,A,C, and 3) and is a home away from home! Stop by! The apartment is a very simple two bedroom apartment with a living room, seperate kitchen and a bathroom. It is located on the second floor of an elevator building. It can easily host 5-6 people! The bedrooms are of reasonable sizes and are full of light. One bedroom has a firm queen size bed and the other has a toddler bed and a twin size day bed that opens up into a kingsize bed. So my place is kid friendly! If you rent the apartment, you have it to yourself, so that you can feel comfortable and have all the space you need.  The bathroom is small but not tight. It is stocked with toilet paper, towels and hand towels. The kitchen is the first room you see as you enter the apartment! I had it painted a nice warm yellow, then changed my mind and painted it a soothing blue. Now it is a soothing s

name: Classic Chelsea Apt. near High Line
space: If downtown New York is where you want to be than our stunning Chelsea apartment is what you're looking for!  Why stay in a cramped, overpriced hotel room when you can have all the comforts of a beautiful home!  Our apartment is  blocks away from the international art gallery scene in West Chelsea; blocks from the historic West Village and steps from the newly designed High Line Park.  Shop on Fifth Avenue, have a romantic dinner in a cafe in the West Village then go for a stroll along the Hudson River to watch the sun set.  And when you're ready to explore the rest of the city, our apartment is conveniently situated next to major subway lines so that one can get almost anywhere in NYC quickly.  Our apartment is on the first floor with a large living room that faces south (great natural light all day long and fun for people watching).   Perfect for one person or a couple!    We kindly suggest one send an inquiry first before requesting a reservation. About Us We are a couple who have

name: Beautiful 3 room studio in Brooklyn
space: I've listed this apartment as a "private room" but what you really get is a bedroom, private living room and office. The kitchen & bathroom is shared.  This place is a unique find in Brooklyn. I moved in a year ago and wouldn't live anywhere else. The large windows give this apartment a lot of light, I have a super compfy couch and bed, a large mid-century desk and credenza and a beautiful rustic table I made myself. This place is minimal, bright and homely.  I usually work from home and the leafy street below hums with neighborly activity but is never too noisey. Sweet Wolf & Cafe Regular are excellent cafes within 2 blocks from the apartment and Bar Toto on the corner serves up amazing brunches, dinners and wine. Fonda, 4 blocks away is probably the best Mexican food in Brooklyn.  Park Slope is a bit of a haven; it's safe, cultured, and a total respite from Manhattan, which is only 15 minute away. There are an endless number of cafes, bookstores, local markets and boutique shops and

name: Luxury Loft in Creative & Fun Apt
space: It's a beautifully designed one bedroom + loft apartment - comfortable and modern, with a fully equipped kitchen, free wifi, aircon and a rain water shower and deep bathtub. And its an uber creative house - I work as a performer/drag queen/screen writer so there's probably an art project going on or a wig lying around! The loft space, where you will sleep, features a comfortable Queen bed, and partition for privacy. I sleep and work in the attached bedroom.  IÛªm a very low key/fun/easy going and a lot of fun to have a drink with. I really LOVE hosting fun loving, kind and generous energies in my home. I believe in open communication- if there is a problem, please let me know and weÛªll sort it out. (I really REALLY donÛªt go in for pass-agg- IÛªve had a few through my place and itÛªs not a fun energy for me- or, IÛªm sure, relaxing for my guests.) Please lets have a good time!! Good communication makes that easy! :=)  My space is perfect for those who want a comfortable fun place to stay fo

name: Airy 1BR nice area Queens nr subway
space: A spacious and clean 1-bedroom apartment with a charming balcony surrounded by trees. Rare find in the big city. Nice and safe neighborhood (Rego Park), convenient location with shops and subway 5 minutes walk. AMENITIES: Spacious living-room and bedroom, very small but separate kitchen, bathroom with bath tab and shower.  New hardwood floors, large screen plasma TV with cable. Free wi-fi. You can also use our desktop computer if you'd like, just let us know in advance. There is one queen-size bed (high quality orthopedic mattress) in the bedroom and a comfortable futon for 2 people in the living room. We don't allow kids, sorry (because of the cat). Everything you need in the kitchen: full use of the cutlery, stove, microwave, electric kettle, toaster oven, fridge, etc. There are washing machines in the basement. AREA This is a quiet residential area in Queens (well, as quiet as it gets in New York). A charming street with mostly private houses. Ours is a 2-storey small apartment buil

name: Williamsburg Artist Loft
space: A rare find amongst the ever-changing architectural landscape of Williamsburg, this 1920s former ammunition factory retains a charm reminiscent of Brooklyns early industrial roots. This listing includes access to two private bedrooms, a large open shared space, a full size kitchen, and a full size bathroom. When you enter the spacious apartment, you first see the wall of windows directly across the living room.  There is lots of natural light in the space, making it feel alive, warm, and open.  Open the windows and enjoy the sounds of Williamsburg. In the living area, there is and oversized chesterfield sofa, a comfy faux-leather chair with an extra large ottoman, a hand crafted farmers' table that seats up to 8 people, and the kitchen.  Kick your feet up and enjoy a good movie. The kitchen is modern industrial meets country kitchen appeal.  The open shelving makes access to stemware, dinner plates, and cups not only a cinch, but the design statement is unique.  It feels open and new a

name: Williamsburg, BK - Sunny room!
space: This sunny apartment is the perfect retreat from the city ÛÒ while still allowing you to be close to Manhattan hot spots. Located in the popular Williamsburg Brooklyn, this apartment is steps from the Graham Ave stop on the L stop which is 3 subway stops into Brooklyn from Manhattan. It is also near bus stops, and car services. On most nights, it is easy to catch a yellow taxi right outside the front door.   The apartment itself is a 3 bedroom, 1 bath with a living room and kitchen.  The room for rent has a full size bed and air condition unit. Fresh linens will be provided. There are windows in every room of the apartment, providing a warm, sunny environment. The kitchen is fully equipped if you feel so desired to cook (there is even a microwave!). While there is no cable, there is a television with dvds as well as wifi. You will share the apartment with 2 permanent roommates, both very respectful and quiet.  The apartment is directly across the street from a delicious bagel place, and

name: Guest Room in Art Loft in Chelsea
space: The bedroom is in a large duplex loft in Manhattan/ Chelsea area next to Madison Square Park, few blocks from Empire State building and three blocks from The Highline.   The room is located in the back of the apartment therefore is very quiet.  The apartment has three full baths one of them located next to the guest bedroom, that one is for the guests staying in the apartment, but it is Not totally private as it is adjacent to the family room/ library in the pictures so we use it during the day.  There is a key elevator that opens directly in to the apartment on the upper floor. Yes of course we provide towels, linens, toiletries ( soap, shampoo, toilet paper ),  even toothbrush, toothpaste if you need and also a hairdryer. You are more than welcome to use the refrigerator and use the dishes and utensils if you bring ready made food to eat. For safety reasons, we request that there is No cooking involved, some people have left the gas burner on and left the apartment for the day.  Ther

name: Tranquility & convenience in Bklyn
space: Beautiful spacious duplex apartment, flooded with light. Clean modern renovation with porch and garden. Quiet block, but close to great restaurants and shops, steps from Prospect Park and the subway. Kid friendly (two children's bedrooms; childproofed with toys and books.) Entry way for extra convenience with stroller, bags and gear. Rental includes free wifi, HD TV/DVD/BluRay. Easy street parking. Lovely modern kitchen at your disposal, connected to porch in the back. Washer/Dryer available.  Clean, quiet, convenient and kid friendly. This home was renovated with love and attention to detail and we think it will meet (or exceed) your every expectation!

name: Very cute quiet Studio in chelsea
space: Very cute and clean  studio in the heart of chelsea ,comfortable ,safe ,close to the A,C,E,F,L,M,1,2,3 subways ,restaurants ,shopping all around the place . 2 blocks from "THE HGH LINE" and "HUDSON RIVER" Internet ,TV, full kitchen ,towel ,sheets ,ect ect ..

name: Yankee Nest
space: Two story attached house,two bedrooms,two full baths, kitchen with adjoining, dining area. living room,  finished basement/ all purpose room  with a full bed futon and  the second bathroom w/ large shower.  Walk in entrance from street level. small back yard. fully euipped kitchen, all brand new appliances, and cabinets, with granite counter top. bedrooms are furnished and each has two large closets. master bedroom has queen bed, smaller bedroom has a full air bed with separate electric inflation levels. ceiling fans keep you very comfortable throughout the house.  Cable interrnet  wifi. Quiet low density neighborhood, free street parking  There is no end to food choices, Spanish, Jamaican, Chinese restaurants within three blocks. Hard Rock Cafe  at  Yankee Stadium two blocks. Infamous Yankee Tavern two blocks. Assortment of fast food, Burgher King,  McDonalds  and two Pizza places also within three blocks. Crown Donuts and Court Deli is down the street for morning coffee cake or baco

name: Greenpoint gypset retreat
space: Located in the heart of "cool central" this Greenpoint apartment is 1 block from the east river, where you get the  summer breeze and are surrounded by some of the best restaurants and boutiques. A 10 minute walk to Mccarren Park and 15 minutes to the bedford L stop. You can easily get to Manhattan with choices of Trains, Ferry, Biking, Buses, Car Service. There is a bike rental shop very close and bike paths that go all along the river from Brooklyn Heights all the way to Astoria Queens. The apartment is a typical "flow thru" style with all the rooms connecting. There is a comfy queen size  bed and another room where a guest can sleep. There is air conditioner, bath/shower/ kitchen with full amenities and professional pots and pans. Free wifi. The apartment is located on the top floor and 3 flights of stairs, it's about 50 steps. The light is very nice with big windows in the front and back of the apartment. The ceilings are high with dark hardwood floors and white walls. All of my fu

name: Beautiful sunny Nolita/Soho Apt
space: Beautiful bright cozy 1 bedroom in the heart of Nolita/Soho, the hippest neighborhood in New York. Corner apartment with north, east and southern exposure.   Perfect for 2 but sleeps 4 (2 on sofa bed). Renovated with wood floors, exposed brick wall, high ceilings, track lighting with dimmer switches.  Really more like a square loft than an apartment.   Great shopping, restaurants, indie cinema and subways.  ThereÛªs a Whole Foods close by, a 24 hour grocery and a normal supermarket across the street.    Dean and DeLuca, a gourmet grocery is 2 streets away.   Amazing restaurants including Parm, CafÌ© Havana, Cafe Falai, and Delicatessen.  Great breakfast places like CafÌ© Gitane, the Grey Dog, Noho Star.  Soho, Chinatown, Little Italy, East Village and Greenwich Village  in walking distance.   One of the best bookstores in NYC nearby.  Blocks away from The New Museum, Intl Center for Photography, the Lower East Side and Lower Broadway shopping - Bloomingdales, Old Navy, Victorias Secret, B

name: Comfortable Private Room in Upper Manhattan 2BR
space: The apartment is a two bedroom on 2nd floor of a walkup.  The room is bright with 3 windows looking towards a garden in the back. Noise is minimal.  I value cleanliness and the place is kept in good order.  There's plenty of storage in the bedroom closet.  Fresh towels and bedding are set out for you. The bed is new and very comfortable for sleeping. The second bed is the couch in the living room. There's a table you can work from as well as lounging space in the living room.  High speed Wifi makes streaming your entertainment very easy.  Your room has a screen for streaming entertainment.  I live in one room and I work from home or my office. The living room is suitable for an extra guest in the case of short term stays. We will share a bathroom, living room and kitchen. The neighborhood is vibrant and friendly, close to plenty of restaurants and entertainment.  Minutes to all either upper east side or upper west side dining, museums, Central Park, and shopping.  JUST ONE REQUEST: In

name: Sunny big room in Queens, 40 min to Manhattan
space: My daughter's beautifully airy and large room has three windows, a full size bed and a sofa.  The bathroom is right next to the room. You will share the apartment  (and bathroom) with me and our cat Sunshine.  Our place is on the 4th floor of a clean and beautiful apartment building. The apartment is full of art and light in a very green, safe and family-friendly neighborhood of Queens, about 40 minutes away with the subway from Midtown Manhattan. The subway station is just 5 minutes away from the apartment. JFK and LaGuardia airport are nearby.  I am German and moved from Berlin to this neighborhood because of its good public schools for my kids, who are now both in college. If you are looking for a hip and happening neighborhood, my place is probably not for you ÛÒ but if you are looking for a comfy place that will allow you to relax while you explore or work in "the city," it is.

name: DUMBO MidCentury Modern - sleeps 5
space: 2 bedroom, 1.5 bath Mid-Century Modern home on Main Street in the heart of DUMBO.  1000 feet from the Brooklyn Bridge, family friendly historic neighborhood right along the cool, relaxing water.   Great space and setting to explore NYC! You'll enjoy our outdoor terrace for dining al-fresco in summer or our working fireplace in winter!  Our cathedral ceilings in loft-like great room, our full entertainment, WIFi and office.  Master bedroom has a queen and 1/2 bath.  Smaller bedroom has a full-size bed.  Day bed for 5th guest in living room.   High quality sheets and linens, designer furniture for comfortable, luxury living in DUMBO. Public transport 5 minutes walk.  Next subway stop is Manhattan. Or take a river ferry or a river taxi across.   The neighborhood is considered one of the hot neighborhoods in NYC right now.  Galleries and cafes, gorgeous parks, unbeatable views, outdoor movies, excellent restaurants such as Vinegar Hill House, River Cafe, Gran Electrica and famous Grimaldi'

name: Large light-filled Apt in Brooklyn

Close walk to: Vanderbilt Ave, Atlantic Terminal, Barclays, and Park Slope.   Two blocks from Grand Army Plaza, Brooklyn Library, and the best part of the neighborhood, Prospect Park! Ton of cool restaurants (all types of cuisine), bars, and shops right outside your door. Many grocery stores nearby. It is also a 2 block walk to 2/3 Train Grand Army Plaza subway stop. Subway ride into Manhattan is 15 mins.   Street parking is available. name: Come stay in super comfy and cozy!
space: I am a wonderful host offering our very cozy and comfy apartment in NYC.   One queen size bed and 1 full size bed.  Large eat in kitchen.  We are near so many amazing restaurants and Madison Square Park (Shake Shack).  Close to the Ace Hotel (Stumptown), Eataly and several subway lines (4,5,6,N,Q,R) and the Lexington Avenue bus lines (phone number hidden)).  Great shopping on 5th Avenue  (Flatiron). The neighborhood is very lively and safe and taxi friendly :)!  Right in the middle of "Curry Hill".  Many delicious and authentic Indian restaurants.  Our apartment is very personalized, homey and clean! A security deposit of 350.00 required.  No smoking and no pets.  Wireless Internet...Laundry room in the basement...

name: Large single Room in sunny Park Slope

name: Williamsburg-1 Bdrm-Manhattan View
space: Fully furnished 1 bedroom condo apartment. On the top floor (4th) of a modern elevator building. Westerly view of the Manhattan skyline (amazing at night). We are accepting monthly and longer rentals. Check the calendar for next availability. You will have access to tenant-only washer/dryer in the basement. All utilities, WiFi and Cable HDTV are included.  We live out of town with local contacts available if needed to assist with suggestions or if any issues arise.  This neighborhood is a great spot to enjoy everything Brooklyn has to offer. Not as congested as the Bedford stop and not as noisy as Lorimer which is next

name: Room 2, Victorian House to Enjoy!
space: Come and stay with our family in our 119 year old Victorian home only 35 minutes from downtown NYC. It is a 4 minute walk to the B/Q train station. We have 6 bedrooms, 4 queen size beds, 1 full and 1 small room with a single bed.  Please look at my other listings if you are looking for two or more rooms. There is an AC unit in each room during summertime.  Enjoy using the front porch, parlor, living room, and kitchen on the main floor. Please come and experience our wonderful and diverse neighborhood. You are close to Prospect Park, Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, Coney Island, Brooklyn Museum and NYC Aquarium to mention a few attractions. That is not even considering all NYC has to offer. name: ÷  Central Park - Home Away From Home ÷  2BR
space: This lovely apartment is on the 3rd floor and on a tree lined block (80th street) making it a very quiet and peaceful place. Should you need extra privacy you can always choose to walk around (through hallway) to access shared space. I have lived here for 7 years and rarely ever run into anyone in the hallway when I walk around.  Guest will be provided with clean linens & towels upon arrival & you will NOT be sharing the apartment with anyone else. name: Bright, Renovated 1BR in Brownstone
space: We are a professional couple and we have an extra apartment in our brownstone building that we would love to sublet. It is a completely private apartment.  The living room windows have southern exposure, looking onto the street, while the bedroom windows look onto the very quiet and peaceful backyard. name: Industrial Loft in Williamsburg
