name: Cozy E. Harlem Brownstone PH
space: Get an authentic and lively feel of New York City without the inflated price tag by nesting yourself in Manhattan's up and coming neighborhood of El Barrio/East Harlem. You'll be surprisinly close to all the action and attractions while not being right on top of them.  A humble home to my family since 1977, this brownstone is where I grew up since birth! It's a great place to feel at peace within the sleepless chaos that characterizes the New York experence - Let my home be your sanctuary! The neighborhood has a largely Puerto Rican and Mexican influence to the East (with some hints of the Italian legacy that once defined it) and West African to the West. The apartment itself is large and spacey by NY standards - it is long and airy with high ceilings, abundant natural light from the north and south (including a small roof skylight!), beautiful exposed warm brick wall (everyones favorite), fully furnished kitchen with every gadget your heart desires (Omegaa Juicer, Breville Smart Oven,

name: Beautiful Spacious Room - Manhattan
space: Spacious, private, beautifully furnished room to rent in a 2 bedroom share. Large foyer and hallway separating the bedrooms, kitchen, bathroom.  Located in Washington Heights, 2 blocks to the A-train (express), 18 minutes to Times Square.  Sharing the space with a lovely couple (she's a writer, he's an actor). Laundry in the basement. View of the Hudson and the George Washington Bridge at your doorstep. Safe, family-oriented neighborhood. Grocery stores, cafe's, restaurants close by.  There are towels and of course bedding and if you forgot, say, your shampoo don't worry we've got your back.  We speak English, German, Spanish (okay), Greek (pretty well) and a little French.

name: Whole Apt. 3br Carroll Gardens duplex w/backyard
space: Our 3 bedroom+ Carroll Gardens duplex is great NYC spot for visitors. WHERE? Fantastic location on a tree-lined Carroll Gardens street less than two blocks from Carroll Street F/G Trains (four stops from Manhattan. Half mile walk to R train. HOUSE: Three upstairs  bedrooms (1 queen, two doubles) and extra queen bed in basement. House has WiFi, cable TV, A/C, dishwasher, washing machine & dryer, and backyard for enjoying the summer evenings. And don't tell anyone but on street parking too. And now, with two cats (which can be boarded upon request.) THE HOOD:  Less than two blocks from Smith Street, Brooklyn's best shopping and eating strip (Coffee at Smith Canteen or East One! Dinner Ugly Baby or Wilma Jean! Or head to Court Street for spots like Prime Meats and Buttermilk Channel!) Also short walk to 3rd Avenue and such new dining spots as Littleneck, Dirty Precious, & Runner & Stone (also a great bakery!)

name: Sunny top fl Private 1- BR with garden view
space: Our Prospect Heights place is a lovely one-bedroom apartment located on a beautiful, tree-lined street. It is housed on the top floor of our townhouse,[ two flights up] conveniently located in what is now the center of the cultural hub of Brooklyn. This large sunny apartment is 1000 Sq ft. has a full-sized kitchen that is stocked with pots and cooking items, large living room with dining, a private bathroom, and one queen size bedroom.

name: Central Park Luxury ( BEST DEAL ;)
space: This apartment has many beautiful features including a high ceiling, great old world features, and beautiful decoration. The large bedroom has a queen size bed. In the living room there is a large, comfortable velvet couch that works well as a bed for a single person.  It is in the back of building so it faces a beautiful garden and is very quiet during both day and evening. The apartment comes with all modern amenities : Flat screen TVs,modem with  wifi , stereo, and microwave.  If you are an APRIL renter, there will be a cat  here to watch and take care of. Stroll to Central Park, visit the Museum of Natural History and check out the great shopping, restaurants and entertainment at the theaters. You will feel very happy here! THANKS

name: Spacious 2BD in lovely Ditmas Park
space: This spacious 2 bedroom apartment is enormous by New York standards. Very large living room with a 40" flat screen TV, access to Netflix, HBOGo, and a BluRay player. Eat-in kitchen with great cookware and appliances. Located in the beautiful Brooklyn neighborhood, Ditmas Park. Cortelyou Road, the heart of Ditmas Park, is only a short 10 minute stroll up avenues lined with towering Sycamore trees and gorgeous Victorian homes.  Cortelyou offers several coffee shops, restaurants, wine shops and natural food stores as well as a farmer's market on Sunday mornings. Only 20 minutes from Manhattan on the Q and B subway lines. The train station is a short 3 blocks from the building. The Q and B trains are very convenient subway lines that bring you right to Soho, the West Village, Union Square, Times Square, and many other attractive tourist destinations in the city.

name: Clean Safe & Cozy Private Room Manhattan sleeps 3

space: Brand new studio in the heart of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhood, DUMBO.  Walking distance to all major subway lines (A,C,E,2,3), the closest only 1.5 blocks away at York Street (F train, the first stop in Brooklyn---and 3 minutes from the first Manhattan stop!).  You'll be minutes from all of the best NYC has to offer, and in the heart one of Brooklyn's offering beautiful parks, boutiques and restaurants.   - Doorman Building - Located on the 6th floor of a 7 floor building - Flatscreen, Cable and Wi-Fi - Dishwasher and Washer/Dryer in unit - Air Conditioning/Heater - Microwave - Queen Size Bed (murphy bed/wall bed, so you'll have plenty of floor space) - Generous walk-in closet - Hair dryer, q-tips and cotton swabs - Fresh towels and extra sheets - Stocked with fabulous maps and guidebooks for your visit - Grocery, liquor, drug stores and banks all within 2 blocks of the studio We are happy to answer any questions you may have and will do so promptly. name: Loft Room in Heart of Williamsburg

Walk to Northside Piers and enjoy an amazing view of Manhattan over the water.  Why not see a headline show at the Williamsburg Music Hall?  or check out the myriad of clothing shops, great restaurants, and bars.  Only one subway stop into the city.  What more could you ask for?   Please be thorough when describing yourself and/or your additional guest. ; )  Are you coming with a friend?  Who is your friend?  What is his/her relationship to you?  Is he/she on Airbnb?   The more info the better!   Thanks so much!

name: Enjoy and discover New York Citi

name: 3 Bedroom 2.5  Bath Multilevel Home
space: Entire Duplex Apartment Sleeps 8 Very Comfortably 2 Full Bathrooms 1 Half Bath Beautiful Fully Renovated Kitchen Backyard with mature trees.

name: Luxury Doorman Building! w/Pvt Bath
space: This Beautiful luxury building, is across from Jackie Robinson Park.  This 8th floor Master Bedroom features plenty of closet space, fantastic southern exposure with beautiful sky & city views, adjustable AC and heater, double sets of windows for an uniquely quiet environment (by NYC standards), a private marble bathroom, Queen size bed with plush Memory Foam topper.  Nicely decorated living Room, Granite counter Kitchen, Dining table, Dishwasher, and laundry.   The building features a beautiful outdoor roof top terrace, a small gym, a large laundry facility, a Starbucks, and a New York Sports Club...  Plus, doorman and concierge service.   Located in a community of new buildings, with Grocery and Pharmacy all within a stones through and perfectly situated just two short blocks from the ABC&D trains, which basically can take you anywhere in the city.  It's basically 10 minutes to Columbus Circle and less than 15 minutes to Times Square.   The entire apartment may also be rented (see se

name: Hell's Kitchen, Midtown west!
space: This is a private room, but in a shared apartment, I am living in the 2nd bedroom.  Perfect location for home base for any trip to NYC. 2 Blocks from Times Square, Theatre District.  Private room in 2 bedroom apartment. Quiet (by NYC standards), clean, w/ washer and dryer, Wifi, A/C, Heat, cable, just off 9th ave, near everything!  Closest to ACE Subway, but 123, NRQ BDFM all close enough to walk to.   Just north of us: Columbus Circle, Lincoln Center, Central Park, Rockefeller Center Just south of us: Port Authority, Penn Station Just West: Hudson River, Riverside park Just East: Times Square, Grand Central, Bryant Park, Herald Square  Easy to get to any part of NYC.   Apartment is in the interior of building, so little street noise. Shared Bathroom. always has hot water, Great water pressure, removable hand-held shower head, hair dyer. The bedroom will have full size bed, 1 dresser, night stand and closet, The room is not huge, it's NYC nothing is huge here, but it will be set up nic

name: Private room in brand new building
space: Sunny room available in brand new 2 bed room apt in Brooklyn.  There are 3 subway train stations (G,A,C train) to get you to Manhattan or Williamsburg in minutes. In the evening we have a family dinner family dinner with our son; but it's just as likely we'll be out of the house -- leaving you to this sanctuary full of light and air, relatively quiet (some truck noise, but generally peaceful) -- a great place to stay if you're here on business or need to get any work done, or just to relax. name: Charming 1 bedroom Apt in Brooklyn
space: Quaint 1 bedroom apt in a landmarked building.  Windows on three sides so full of sunlight. Full sized bed in the bedroom and an air mattress for a third guest in the living room if necessary. Full kitchen with stove/oven, microwave and refrigerator.  Non-working fireplace, the flue is locked so you may not use it safely.

name: East Village Hideaway
space: If I deny your request it is nothing personal, it is just because this is my actual apartment and I stay here most of the time.  My apartment is not a hotel posing as an apartment.  :) 2 room apartment with massive loft bed in the heart of the East Village!  This apartment is literally neighbors with some of the best sushi and desert places in the village.  It is fine walking distance from major trains and walking distance to soho and union square area.  Great cafes, restaurants and retail nearby.  This neighborhood is also so safe and surprisingly friendly.   The layout is quirky, the tub is in the kitchen area and the toilet has its own room.  Large refrigerator and full stovetop and oven if you like to have a quiet night cooking at home.  I have a blender, food processor and rice cooker for your cooking enjoyment! The loft area is a combination of two full sized beds together, its basically the biggest bed in Manhattan!  It could fit 1 to 3 people comfortably.  I would not recommend

space: The perfect New York City studio apartment located in the heart of the most exiting part of the the city, the Lower East Side. Located at the base of the Williamsburg Bridge for easy access to Brooklyn via the bridge or the JMZ and F trains, which are located 2 blocks away.

name: Cute, comfortable room in Gramercy
space: We have a room available to rent in our colorful 2 bedroom apt.  (my husband and I have the other room).  Our building was built in 1910, and renovated in 1980; it has retained its character, its older design, and historical look. The room itself is furnished with a queen size bed (firm) which fills a good portion of the room, an armoire, a rack to hang clothes, a small dresser, tv screen w/ DVD player. There is a portable fan for use and a  a two-way fan in the window for a breeze. The room is  6 ' by 10 ' (small), and comfortable for someone who wants to throw their feet up and relax after a day of exploring the city and/or doesn't need a big room.  The room faces a locked courtyard that the superintendent uses to do his work.  I provide clean linens and towels, soap, shampoo & toothpaste, and you can use my hairdryer.  We are big animal lovers, volunteer in animal rescue, and we have 5  cats. They are friendly and interactive, so they will probably try to get you to play with them o

name: Spacious Brooklyn Loft
space: Beautiful open loft in south Williamsburg.  The apartment is on the second floor and the building has an elevator and laundry in the basement.  The apartment has high ceilings, exposed brick, all new kitchen that opens to a big living room and dining room.   There loft has one bedroom, and the living room couch folds out into a bed.  There is also an additional large couch that can sleep one person (all together 5 people). The neighborhood is fantastic.  A 10 min walk to either the L train at Bedford (only 1 stop from Manhattan) or the J/M/Z trains at Marcy which will take you either to the financial district or up to mid-town in 20min. Wonderful cafes, restaurants and bars all within a couple of blocks, and only 1 block to the water.  Incredible view of Williamsburg bridge from the roof.  You can't beat this neighborhood. Note:  We recently got an adorable cat named Gatsby.  She will be here during your stay.  If you are allergic, this is probably not the best fit.

name: Beautiful NYC studio w/ BIG balcony
space: This 19th floor studio is located in a doorman building.  It gets a lot of sunlight as it is West-facing; the balcony, therefore, gets beautiful sunsets - and I often BBQ out there.  There is a separate eating alcove and closed off full kitchen, with a dishwasher. Cable and WiFi are included and there is a laundry room downstairs. It is in the heart of the Upper West Side, three blocks from the 1, 2, 3/red lines at the 96th street station (south of it).  It is also two avenue block away from the B, C lines. The apartment is within immediate walking distance to a multitude of restaurants, cafes, shops and cinemas. It is four blocks from the crosstown bus, taking you to major tourist attractions, such as the Met, Guggenheim and 5th Avenue - all in 10-15 minutes.  It is two avenue blocks from Central Park and three avenue blocks from Riverside Park. Should there be a pair of travelers who don't care to share the bed, I can either make up the sofa (which I find very comfortable - I have a

name: The perfect 1 Bedroom Apartment!
space: One bedroom Apartment available for short or long stay in NY on Huron st. Can fit 3 people, 611sq feet, with internet,cable, HBO, NETFLIX, HULU (and more) and all other amenities you need. One block away from subway, bus and water taxi (beautiful NY view). Right next to Manhattan ave with plenty of bars, restaurants, and walking distance to Williamsburg and McCarren park. The bedroom has a Queen size bed which can fit 2people. Independent drawers for all your clothes. We have a comfortable sofa in the living room which can be used by one more person. It is a brand new apartment with a south exposure in a beautiful street.

name: Studio With Old-World Character
space: I'm going on a trip December 20 - January 10, and am renting out my cozy Crown Heights studio. I'm a bit flexible in regards to length of stay, but since I'm not there to handle key exchanges, I'd like to rent to someone who is staying at least a five days. First, the stats: about 350 square feet wooden floors, very high ceilings full bathroom with bathtub full kitchen good sunlight but not too bright some exposed brick wifi included bicycle usage included I bought a leather sofa-chair - it's standing where the wooden chair is in the photos. 2nd, the location: close to the following subway lines: 3 (goes to Upper West Side) 4 (express, goes to Upper East Side) A (express, goes to Upper  West Side) C (local, goes to Upper West Side) numerous buses 3 stops from downtown Manhattan. The area of Crown Heights I live in is a residential, safe neighborhood. name: 8th Floor Williamsburg Condo
space: Apartment 8th Floor 1 bed/1bath Williamsburg Condo with 2 balconies overlooking all of Brooklyn with great views of Manhattan and Queens as well. The apartment is elevator keyed entry only with 2 emergency stairwell exits.  Apt. is equipped with a great sound system and movie projector that shoots directly above the television.  The Mac Mini system holds approximately 900 movies including all genres.   Our couch is a sleeper sofa, allowing for a 4 person stay.  Neighborhood Williamsburg is a young and trending neighborhood. Our apartment is within steps to tons of amazing restaurants, bars, shopping, parks, and recreation.   Groceries/Food If you are the type that enjoys cooking, head down the elevator and walk 100 feet and you're at the grocery store.  Or, head to the L train (7 minute walk) and take it straight to Union Square (7 minute train ride) for the Farmer's Market on Mondays, Wednesdays, Fridays, and Saturdays.  Or walk to the McCarren Park Farmer's Market on Saturdays.  Subw

name: Rare, elegant, sunny and large loft with sauna
space: SOHO IS EPICENTER OF NYC CULTURE AND ALL SUBWAY SYSTEMS If you are browsing this listing, you already know SoHo is the most stimulating, creative and centrally located NYC neighborhood to live in, work in and visit.   Even if you don't stay at this loft, you should stay in SoHo. Uptown is very 'straight'/generic while Midtown is commercial/business.  The Downtown area (generally anything below 34th Street, or some would say 23rd Street) is where all cultural color is because of the small, unique neighborhoods.  SoHo is at the center of these neighborhood gems, almost all of which are within walking distance.  (TriBeCa is similar in quality and size of apartments, but it's not very convenient to subways and is very residential -- not much retail/restaurant activity.) While SoHo (SOuth of HOuston) has all the well-known global boutiques, two blocks east is NoLiTa (NOrth of LIttle iTAly) which has local storefronts with items you won't find in other cities.  Also nearby is Greenwich Villa

name: Comfortable, clean & quiet in EV
space: Immaculately clean and furnished private bedroom right in the East Village/Gramercy Park area.   Charming and newly renovated apartment with hardwood floors, lots of windows, and a quiet bedroom.   The room comes equipped with wireless fast-speed internet, and a flat screen TV that has Netflix and Amazon Prime (no live channels).  The bedroom has a queen-size bed and lots of closet space. You have full access to the kitchen that is fully stocked. It has a table and two chairs.  Sheets/towels supplied.  $150 deposit through Airbnb + $50 cleaning fee required; deposit is returned on departure if apartment is in its original condition. Standard check-in time is after 2pm; check-out time is noon. Whenever possible, I will accommodate specific arrival/departure times. The apartment is located on the 4th floor in a tenement walkup building. That means 3 flights of stairs. I'm happy to help with luggage up and down!

name: One Bedroom Apartment in an 1879 Brownstone
space: Beautiful one bedroom garden apartment in 150 year old Brownstone in Historic Clinton Hill. Subway around the corner, all buses to downtown at the end of the block. We 10 minutes into Manhattan on the train. Walking distance to the Brooklyn Museum, Gardens, BAM and the Barclay Center. Clinton Hill is the home of Pratt, LIU and St Josephs College. It is a hip and trendy area full of a diversity of cultures, artist, actors and writers and the home of some of the best food in NYC.  Just ask!

name: Midtown West 2 blocks from Times Sq
space: 2 bed broom, one bath apartment in Hell's Kitchen.  Fabulous place in amazing location.   Perfect location for home base for any trip to NYC. 2 Blocks from Times Square, Theatre District. Closest to ACE Subway, but 123, NRQ BDFM all close enough to walk to.  Just north of us: Columbus Circle, Lincoln Center, Central Park, Rockefeller Center  Just south of us: Port Authority, Penn Station  Just West: Hudson River, Riverside park  Just East: Times Square, Grand Central, Bryant Park, Herald Square  Easy to get to any part of NYC. Apartment is in the interior of building, so little street noise. There is a bar underneath us. At times you can hear the muffled sounds of music, most people can sleep right through it. This is Midtown Manhattan, there's gonna be some noise, sirens in the night etc. I have ear plugs in the room. If you are a super super light sleepe

name: Frugal Buddha off the L Train

space: I am French-Canadian, and I speak English and Spanish!  THE ROOM - Big, cozy. - Drawers, queen size bed, desk with closet.  - Clean with freshly clean bed sheets and towels. name: BIG East Village 1bd all the extras
space: This place is in a great neighborhood. Safe, super close to all transportation. Restaurants and stores on the same block. The apartment is large enough for a family , great light, clean and renovated. It has all the bells and whistles too...HDTV with cable in both rooms, WIFI, stereo, air conditioning, full kitchen and bath. Elevator building with laundry and trash compactor. I live on the top floor of the building (6th) so it is very quiet. It is very convenient to live here, everything you could possibly need is within a block radius, cafes, drug stores, supermarket , Chase bank (on my corner). I will be taking two trips one to Paris August 14-19th....then returning for 2 days...then going to Nevada for Burning Man festival from August 22-Sept 6th. building, great area, sunny 750 sq ft 1bd. Apartment has full kitchen and bath. hdtv in both rooms, cable, phone, and WIFI. Great furniture and brand new Tempupedic queen size bed and new couch in living room. This is it!!!

name: THE HEART OF ART IN THE HEART OF NY
space: I am thrilled to share my home/studio. This is a small one bedroom apartment. It is a second floor walk-up in an old Hell's Kitchen tenement that I would describe as cozy and quiet and a taste of real New York City living. Location/Location Start your visit with a jog and/or walk in Central Park, breakfast at Whole Foods, then back to the apartment to freshen up, lunch at any of the fun Ninth Avenue or Tenth Avenue restaurants, then off to Chelsea or to 57th Street to see art or one of the many Broadway or off-Broadway shows.  And how can I forget Lincoln Center, Carnegie Hall, City Center or the Alvin Alley Dance Theatre, also within walking distance? If you're feeling rich, dinner at the Russian Tea Room, or very rich, there is Per Se.  Not to mention shopping. This apartment is a working artist's studio with art all over, including some large, sexually explicit paintings on the walls and pastel paintings in the works.  I would prefer to host mature, open-minded people interested in

name: Lovely 2-room Studio in Crown Hghts
space: Beautiful 2-room studio apt (aka jr. 1 bedroom) in a classic Brownstone building very close to Franklin Ave. district in Crown Heights.  Rear-facing, 3 big windows, lots of light, with huge private balcony. Quiet and private space. Wood floors. Full but small kitchen. Full bath with tub.  Currently set up to sleep 1 or 2 (couple).  It's on a beautiful, tree-lined residential block.  Centrally-located between and near to several neighborhoods and transportation centers. Short walk to great restaurants, cafes. Brooklyn Museum, Botanical Garden, Prospect Park, Clinton Hill, Bed Stuy, Prospect Heights are all walking distance. Great access to subways/buses, which will take you virtually anywhere in the borough/city. Saturday farmer's market literally steps out the front door!!  Includes A/C and wifi.   Parking is always available within a 2 block radius and usually available on the block, often right out front of the building. any other questions, of course, please ask!

name: Chic Luxe 1BR 1.5BA 900sf -Midtown
space: Comfortable spacious SUPER centrally located 900 sf. 1 bedroom and 1 and 1/2 baths in a full service, super safe, doorman, high end luxury building with all amenities. You are truly in the center of Manhattan here, with easy proximity to everything. It's one of the most desirable neighborhoods in Manhattan, a great, lively area with tons going on right outside your door. A few blocks away from the famous Waldorf Astoria, you can easily walk to Central Park, Carnegie Hall, Times Sq, Bloomingdale's, and shopping of every kind. There are hundreds of fabulous restaurants of every type within a 5 block area. The apartment is very comfortable.  The baths are all marble with a JACUZZI bathtub! There is full kitchen with marble floors and granite counters. There is a dishwasher and washer / dryer in the apt for your convenience. The kitchen has a gas stove, all plates, a full set of nice cookware, nice wine glasses, french press coffee maker, etc. I live here full time (except when you're here

space: CAN ACCOMMODATE  2 PERSONS MAX. name: Designer Loft w/ Private Roof Patio
space: Completely renovated modern iconic east village loft right next to the lower east side on Avenue A.  The indoor space is approximately 900sq ft, with 11 foot original refurbished tin ceilings, a full high end entertainment system with hi-fi speakers in the living room, kitchen and bathroom, and a media center with an HD 1080p projector (90 inch screen) and over 400 movies and 500 music albums, updated kitchen with all modern amenities (microwave, dishwasher, multispray kitchen sink, Coffee machine, blender, large stainless fridge, granite counter tops, 1000 watt range and oven, full stainless steel pots and pans set), new hardwood floors, traditional brick walls, floor to ceiling windows. A renovated white tile bathroom with heated natural pebble stone floor shower, new vanity, mirror and Koehler sink and toilet. name: Master Bedroom in Heart of Williamsburg
space: Furnishings include full memory foam mattress with bedding and 1 set of sheets, 2 towels, side table,  dresser.  The living room is spacious and comfortable with a couch, chair, piano and a record player.    The kitchen is quite large for NYC standards with a new gas stove, refrigerator, and plenty of cabinets and counter space.  There's a vitamix blender, french press, pots, pans, utensils, and everything you need to feel right at home.   Please feel free to help yourself to coffee and tea.  Also, there is a deep bathtub that is great for soaking!  Shower is also available.

name: Our Gorgeous 2BR apartment PRIME WB
space: THE APARTMENT:  Built in 1920, this apartment has a lot of character; the 12ft celling's and exposed brick, mixed with our airy light colors give this space a relaxing and homey feel.   Our apartment was decorated with lots of love and purpose. Many of our designed accents were made thoughtfully for this space. With the custom working fireplace in the master bedroom and our cozy breakfast nook booth in the kitchen nothing was forgotten in the designing of our place. The newly redone kitchen and bathroom gives the space a great mix of modern style with a mid-century twist.  Despite being a railroad apartment, our well designed space allows for adequate privacy between bedrooms, with custom retractable glass windows, blackout rollers, and floor to celling curtains.

name: 2BR gem in Cobble Hill, Brooklyn
space: Hotel rooms in Manhattan are expensive, not to mention the size of a shoebox. Why don't you stay in our gut renovated, sunlit, furnished, 2BR room apartment in a safe and family friendly neighborhood? Located in one of the most beautiful neighborhoods of Brooklyn, this 2BR gives you the peace and quiet you need to come home to after a day of exploring the bustling city of New York. Enjoy a glass of wine in our huge private backyard.  The B61 bus (stops at the corner of our street, the bus stop has gorgeous views of the manhattan skyline) brings you in about 5 min to the subway transit hub with trains to all parts of Manhattan (from our stop it's only one stop to Manhattan's financial district). It's a nice 15 min walk. Enjoy our fully equipped kitchen, A/C and Twin bunks beds can accomodate two extra beds in our second bedroom.  We always leave a list for our guest with restaurant recommendation and tips about the neighborhood.

name: Prime location near Central Park !!

Very safe neiborhood . 7 blocks to central park,museums .  Grocery store, coffee shops, restaurants. Quiet street, between York Ave and East End Ave. East River Park is next block . No smoking.If you need special time to check in or check out ( or leave the bags ) - i will do my best  to accommodate Great Coffee maker, tea Netflix  TV Internet, WiFi Fresh bedding , towels Shampoo, shower gel,hand soap Filter for drinking water FAQ THE FOLLOWING ARE ANSWERS TO QUESTIONS I HAVE HAD. name: Bright, Quiet 2 BR in Awesome Area!
space: This lovely two bedroom is in a quiet brownstone building at the heart of Upper West Side, one of the safest, most convenient and beautiful  neighborhoods in NYC.   This apartment is not suitable for elderly people or infants. We just can't take responsibility if there is an issue climbing up the stairs, or accidents of any sort.  It's perfect for couples, students, for active professionals. The apartment is in a residential brownstone building on the 4th floor (walk-up) and features two private bedrooms of approximately equal size. name: Lovely Garden Apt. in Fort Greene.
space: Right in the heart of Fort Greene, you are steps away from the restaurants, cafes, theaters, etc... in undoubtedly the hottest neighborhood in Brooklyn right now. It is a very friendly, safe, and charming neighborhood. The apartment's location makes it easy to get in and out of Manhattan through public transit or by car, and also is convenient to Williamsburg, Park Slope, and Carroll Gardens. I want you to feel comfortable in my home.  I have a fully stocked kitchen with enough room for two to cook AND eat in (what a concept for new york!).   There is a coffee maker as well with fresh ground coffee. Unfortunately, the washer/dryer does not work. The bed has a comfortable pillow top mattress and high quality linens. There is closet space for your coats with hangers in the hallway.  There is a couch/futon in the living room which has the option of pulling out into a flat bed. This can comfortably sleep one person. There is a small but cute desk in the bedroom if you'd like to work on you

name: Modern Lofted Williamsburg 3bd
space: **Commonly Asked Questions** - Can I check in early/check out late?  If no one is staying before or after your stay we allow an early check in and/or check out for a half day fee each, please message us should you need these accommodations and we can see if it is possible. Otherwise, it is very important that you check out by 11:00 am so our caretaker can come and do their thing. We also provide information for a luggage storage and package acceptance close by should you need it. -Do you provide towels and sheets? Yes we provide all towels and sheets. -Do you have spices, oil and basic cooking supplies?  Our spices and oil are on an honor system, you can use some and replace. For food we encourage people to bring what they specifically need. We have all the cooking-wear provided (i.e. pots and pans etc)! We also encourage people to bring their own tupperwear for left-overs if needed. -What happens if I break something?  Things happen and we totally understand. If something breaks pleas

name: Brooklyn's top
space: Spacious two bed room apt,with Internet, cable TV , stainless steel refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, toaster and full functional kitchen.

name: Sunny Retreat Central Williamsburg
space: Sunny top floor of a quiet tree lined street 2 blocks from the center of Williamsburg. Near Bedford Ave L. So much to discover in this bustling neighborhood!

name: Artists Brownstone Bed-Stuy NYC
space: Intentional house for artists, activists and educators located in the heart of Bed-stuy, Brooklyn. Out 10 bedroom intentional house has 4 separate apartments. Our apartment has 3 bedrooms and 1 bathroom. Usually there are 1 or 2 bedrooms available for short-term or long-term rent.  You should expect a quiet, clean and friendly environment in the house. We offer occasional skillshares including traditional herbalism, lamp-making, wood crafts, yoga and writing salons. If you're around during the spring, summer or fall you may be invited to support local farmers/growers via our local CSA Farm Share. We also have coin-operated laundry machines in the cellar.  There is space for bike parking in the front yard. There's plenty of outdoor space; the whole house has access to the backyard, rooftop, and  front stoop..there's a large community park (great for a morning run) and farmers market across the street. There are lots of restaurants and cafe's nearby. There's a outdoor community pool avai

name: East Village Artist's Studio
space: Cozy, artfully decorated large studio with a separate sleeping alcove in the center of the East Village and in close proximity to the best of what NYC has to offer: Soho, Union Square, Greenwich Village and major public transportation routes. Classic tenenment apartment with clawfoot bathtub in the middle of the space with separate WC room- a classic new york experience! Free Wi-Fi complementary with stay. There is a new curtain in the kitchen window to ensure privacy from the construction next door.

name: LEGAL PARK SLOPE 4 BR, ROOF TERRACE
space: A NOTE:  This apartment is NOT an illegal sublet like so many NY rental apartments! This is a two family private house, not a three family or more house or building. Supporting proof for a Class B townhouse is available. Top three floors of a brand new architect built Brooklyn townhouse, with a large rooftop terrace and multiple balconies, under 5 minutes walking to BAM, the new Barclay Center for the Brooklyn Nets basketball, other sports and entertainment events, all major subway lines, the Long Island Railroad to the Hamptons, and to JFK airport via the airtrain in only 30" for around 12$...  The terrace with views of rooftops and trees is enchanting and has a large BBQ grill and table which seats six/eight people. Another smaller table for four can be used there as well for children or adults. 3 bedrooms with double beds (one king, one queen, one full), 1 single bedroom/office with a fold out bed, 2.5 baths, balconies outside every bedroom, open plan kitchen-dining-living room. 1 b

name: Guestroom w/ 2 beds 20 mins to NYC
space: A clean and comfy guest room with two double beds awaits you in a newly built apartment in Bushwick Brooklyn. Perfect for weekend getaways! Sleeps up to 4. Free Wifi all the time. The house is near two main subway lines, L and J trains, just 20 mins to New York City. A and C trains also walking distance for easy access to Barclays Center and Downtown Brooklyn. Washer, dryer and ironing board available. Guest room is on the lower level, is private with a door that locks with a key while you are out. It has bookshelves and a wardrobe. Private full bath with shower to yourself. Microwave, fridge, water kettle included and perfect for late night munchies. Use of living area and cooking in the family kitchen on the main floor is welcome provided you clean up after yourself! :-) Access to beautiful backyard with gazebo for fresh air and sun shine.  C Town supermarket nearby. 24/7 Deli around the corner. A dozen different restaurants Thai, Chinese, Latin, Indian and Soul/American food all del

name: NYC,Brooklyn,Spacious Room,Garden!
space: A conveniently located apartment two express stops into Brooklyn from Manhattans' Lower East Side. Lively, colorful neighborhood with plenty of local amenities. The room available is unique in the fact that it has a private doorway entrance to the garden. Plenty of clean sheets/towels. WiFi access. APT AVAILABLE FROM DEC 01 THRU APR 01/17

name: Stunning 3BR loft in Williamsburg!
space: Live like a rock star local in this extraordinary historic loft in heart of Williamsburg.  A haven for artists, creatives and dreamers, this is old school loft living in New YorkÛªs hottest neighborhood. Three bedrooms,  industrial kitchen off the living room and full bathroom.   Enjoy a friendly village atmosphere and a dizzying array of places to eat, drink and play only seconds from the loft. Williamsburg has all the cool of NYC without the madness of Manhattan.  THE LOFT: * 2000 square ft former dance hall turned loft residence * 3 large bedrooms featuring build-in wardrobes with ample closet space * 1970s inspired interior design featuring original Lichtenstein-esque pop art, unique light and authentic relics from the industrial Williamsburg of yesteryear  * Gorgeous pre-war details including massive windows, ornate pressed tin 14ft ceilings and polished solid wood floorboards * Enormous living room featuring a vintage 60s Bloomingdales circular couch and twin TV viewing chairs sou

name: Beautiful 1 room share for weekend.

Only 10 mins away from the new Barclay Center; The new  home of the Brooklyn Nets. There is one medium size bathroom and quest can use the kitchen area if needed. The place is close to several restaurants, gyms, Movie. Great for shopping and if you like lounges, bars and restaurant, you have several options. The place has a speculator view of Manhattan

name: Manhattan, Great views, Large 1 Bdr
space: Unobstructed New York City views: You can see both Mets and Yankee stadium as well as the GW Bridge and the hudson river. Clean modern lines with modern classic Herman Miller furniture throughout. 800 Sqft of living space. Updated kitchen and bathroom with jacuzzi tub. New Hardwood floors that are not updated on the pictures. 50 inch flatscreen TV in living room; wifi and land line too. Apple TV and cable. 24 hour doorman, garage and gym in the building: I have not used the gym as its not very nice but I think its $15 a day to access it.

name: Bushwick Creative Den of Bliss
space: "Be not inhospitable to strangers lest they be angels in disguise." For SEVEN splendid years, I've been hustling hard as an artist/yogini/bartender here in magical Bushwick---the creative heart of Brooklyn. Lovely souls from all across the globe have shared my roof and my experiences, and it's been nothing short of awesome.  I invite fellow traveling artists, students, and couples seeking an authentic experience to stay a few nights with me on the Bushwick frontier!  THE HOME A second-story hyper-tidy two-bedroom railroad style renovated apartment with awesome lighting. The second bedroom is utilized as a creative workspace, music studio, yoga room, and classroom (equipped with a desk and giant chalkboard). When hosting, the studio is converted into a private bedroom, complete with a super comfortable queen-size air bed with magnificent linens and pillows. I've hosted bands, mothers, fathers, friends, friends-of-friends, and young children alike. Other things that make me really proud

name: Cozy Brownstone for 2 with Backyard!
space: A cozy Brooklyn brownstone apartment in which to enjoy winter in New York! Located in BrooklynÛªs historic Clinton Hill, one of BrooklynÛªs trendiest neighborhoods this completely private one bedroom, one bathroom apartment with exposed brick, offers your perfect home away from home and the complete Brooklyn brownstone experience. Just blocks from Pratt Institute, St. Joseph's and LIU, this exceptional apartment is professionally cleaned before your arrival and offers a full sized bed with luxurious linens, a desk, air conditioner,  ample closet space, and renovated kitchen. The kitchen has a fridge, oven/stove, microwave, stainless steel countertops, cook and dishware, cutlery, and coffee maker.  Enjoy two rare finds in New York City-- access to the brownstone's cozy backyard, as well as access to the building's private laundry room. Enjoy a glass of wine under the stars in the backyard after a day of exploration or soak up a little sun during the day on the lounge chairs. Relax to over

name: Roomy Updated Studio - East Village
space: *Check-In time: 3pm / Check-Out time: 12pm *Other times might be available depending on the previous guests check out and next guests check in. .... "downtown's most livable neighborhood"   The defining characteristic of New York is having anything you could imagine just a short walk away, and the epitome of that experience is in the East Village.      The East Village is like nowhere else.  If you can imagine it, itÛªs probably here.  International cuisine, specialty retailers, historical buildings, music, nightlife, museums, and much more.  ThereÛªs always something happening at nearby Tompkins Square Park.  Union Square is just a pleasant walk or short subway ride away.  Whether youÛªre a professional, an artist, a student, or just someone who loves to experience life, this is the place for you.    But not all East Village apartments were created equal.  This recently renovated studio is roomier than most with space for a full-size bed with headboard and a large loveseat and coffee tab

name: Sunny Elegant and Big Room!
space: This apartment is honestly the best in its category we've seen in all of NYC. It is a huge sun-lit room, equipped with a powerful A/C and a heater. It's cozy, it's private, it's perfect. You will have an access to your own bathroom (there are two in the apartment) and to a professional kitchen. To relax in the evenings, there is a large balcony, overlooking the historical Brooklyn neighborhood, and of course, the gigantic living room, filled with the amazing paintings of the talented Jessica Angel.  The neighborhood is very quiet so have a chat, enjoy a beer, watch a movie - your room is perfect for that. You'll get good sleep and you'll have fun - I am pretty sure about that! We are located 15 minutes away from most of what you might be interested in about the New York City, including Downtown Manhattan and Brooklyn, Lower East Side and Chinatown, West and East Villages and Williamsburg. Upon your arrival we'll provide you with all the additional information you'll need regarding your

name: The heart of the metropolis
space: I have rented my apartment, to guests, from all over the world, since 2007.   In an attempt to avoid confusion and disappointment, I'll start with a cautionary note:  Advanced bookings are more expensive, because of the certainty and choice in dates.  Last minute bookings fetch the best deals. Think about it.  From time to time, the featured price will be low, but can not apply across the board.  The details are in the pricing.  I truly don't want to disappoint anyone.  Look for the devil in the details, which will become apparent, when you attempt to book. The apartment is on the first floor, front of a seven story, old law building erected in 1905.  It has three areas: The first and largest, is a fully equipped front room, the second, is an available study and a rear room is available for extra clothing storage and is also used, to store maintenance equipment, supplies, linen, towels and bedding. The photos are sequenced, as a tour through the apartment, which is about 9 foot wide an

name: Amazing, modern and super sunny!
space: Welcome to my amazing new, modern 1 bd apartment in Williamsburg with expansive views of Manhattan!  It's on par with anything you'll find at any 5 star hotel, and offers even more. Just four stop off the L train from manhattan and Union Square, trend-setting Williamsburg is the hip and artsy place where everyone wants to be. Unique restaurants, shops, Street art & Graffiti playgrounds, parks and sights are all within a couple of blocks, and within 15min by walk you're at Bedford Ave., the buzzing hub of Williamsburg.  This new elevator building has everything you could ever want while visiting the big city. Your on the top floor of the building with super light/sunshine all day, every-day. Top of the line, stainless steel appliances, with dishwasher and microwave and importantly, full-size washer and dryer in the building. The bedroom, is huge with a queen size bed, natural stone floor and big windows that look out to the city of Manhattan with clear views of the Empire State Building

name: Park Slope One bedroom with Balcony
space: Charming 1 bedroom/1 bath available from July 8th to July 29th on the top floor of a great building in the heart of Park Slope.  Elevator building, super in residence, tall ceilings, a cooks kitchen, ceiling fans and a great view of the NY skyline from your own private access to the roof.  Great shopping around the corner and 7 minute walk to Prospect park.  Easy access to the R, B and Q trains.   Absolutely NO SMOKERS or pets.  If you smoke you will lose your security deposit. Rent is $2,345 per month. Note there is a $150 exit cleaning fee and a 50% of the monthly rental damage deposit required upon .agreement.   All utilities are included as well as wireless high-speed cable internet.

name: West Village Fantasy
space: Historic West Village building with garden courtyard on a tucked away, quiet street.  There are two bedrooms each with lots of sunlight. One bedroom has a queen size bed and one bedroom has a full size bed. Both bedrooms have antique furniture and the windows provides an idyllic view of the neighborhood. Each bedroom has a closet and we will make plenty of room for you to hang & store your belongings. For longer stays, we can make room for you in the dressers. The apartment comfortably sleeps 4. The couch is very comfortable and could also sleep someone if necessary! I do not take over 4 guests, but if there is a small child or someone does not prefer to share a bed, it is an option! Living room has couch, hd tv (hbo & showtime), coffee table - all warm and homey. Their is a large farm table that seats at least 6-8 people. Lots of light. The kitchen has oven, microwave, dishwasher, lots of pots/pans and everything else you need to cook anything you want! Please tell me about yourself (

name: Near Central Park (Studio apt)
space: My apartment is located in the hub of the Upper West Side, a few minutes walk to Central Park, Lincoln Center, movie theaters, dance, ballet, music, and cafes lining Columbus Avenue. The apartment is a large studio with a spacious vibe. I keep it clean and uncluttered. The street is residential and quiet. The building is also very quiet and quaint. I am literally a one minute walk to the entrance of Central Park.  The apartment is on the third floor of a stylish pre-war walkup brownstone building. It's clearly labeled Apartment 3F (not the one on the top of the steps; it's the other apartment!). I will be there to let you in, or have a friend do so if I'm away.  Neighborhood has a fine assortment of restaurants, supermarkets, clothing stories, and the Natural History Museum is only a 800 meters away.  Central Park and Riverside Park are great for running and biking. The East Side museums, like the Guggenheim and the MET, are just across town. About 2 Kilometers (1.2 miles) away. About

name: Sunny & Modern in Prime Park Slope
space: The Building: Luxury Pre-war building with elevator, beautiful open lobby, huge interior garden with private access for building residents, and laundry in the basement. Just 1 block from Prospect Park and tons of amazing restaurants, shops, and bars nearby. The Apartment:  -3rd floor, with elevator access.  -Modern open kitchen featuring custom local wood countertop and cabinetry, and all new stainless steel appliances. -Sunny and quiet living room with views to the interior garden. -One large bedroom with queen size bed and flat-screen streaming TV (chromecast) -Window AC Unit -Clean sheets & towels provided in your bedroom The location is very convenient for the 2/3/B/Q trains.  Right by Park Slope Food Co-op, Prospect Park, Grand Army Plaza Farmer's Market, Brooklyn Boulders, Brooklyn Museum, Brooklyn Botanical Garden, and Brooklyn Public Library.  BAM and the F train are a 10-12 minute walk.

name: Cute & Cozy Manhattan Room - Hell's Kitchen
space: Rented Bedroom: There is a full bed in the bedroom. The bedroom is private with a sliding door (pocket door with no lock).  Bathroom: There is one bathroom in the apt. The bathroom is through the rented bedroom, so we will be sharing it. I will need to access that in the mornings and evenings. I need to enter the rented bedroom to get to the bathroom. I will knock prior to entering the rented bedroom.  Common Space: There is a shared common space (the living room/kitchen area is shared; my bedroom is behind the curtains). My bedroom is blocked off by curtain walls. The common space is available to my guests until 10pm (unless we discuss otherwise).  Apartment Layout: Railroad style 2 bedroom apartment.  48th Street between 10th & 11th Avenue in Hells Kitchen (Midtown West), Manhattan, NYC. *Freshly painted apartment. Renters must be clean and respect the space!* I'm open to any renter (ideal for 1 person, but 2 people are just fine). *Minimal luggage preferred.* First Floor apt!  Livin

name: 5th Ave Apartment in Midtown!
space: Amazing location literally in the CENTER of everything in Midtown. 6 blocks from Central Park, right next to 5th Ave and all the amazing shopping, Across the street from the MOMA, 4 blocks from Rockefeller Center, 6 blocks from Times (Website hidden by Airbnb) honestly THE most amazing location. Just about any subway you want is within 5 minute walking distance as well.  The apartment is a beautiful renovated prewar apartment with exposed brick, high ceilings, brand new kitchen, and big clean tiled bath. The room is cozy, is in the back of the building so it is quiet and has a view of the surrounding buildings in midtown. It's perfect for coming back to after a long day of walking around the city. Everything you need is there!  I will be living in the living room space using it as my own little studio (it will be private for both rooms) so you will have the bedroom all to yourself. Please note that it is a walk up apartment with no elevator so you must be able to go up and down stairs.

name: LARGE PRIVATE FLOOR IN BROOKLYN, NY
space: Please ASK for availability before placing a direct reservation request. Note that this is a private home and we live in the house. The recent legislation in NYC against Airbnb is targeted to apartment buildings which this is not and to people who rent and are not present. You will be in a floor by yourself and will not see us unless you have to.  This grand, spacious floor-through is in a classic 1890's brownstone house in the historic Bedford-Stuyvesant neighborhood of Brooklyn.  Located on a quiet, tree-lined street, 25/30 minutes from and to Downtown Manhattan by subway, door to door.  Walk to bars, restaurants & galleries in Bushwick & Stuyvesant Heights.  A short subway ride to Williamsburg.  1 block from market, liquor store & laundromat.  Neighborhood:  Originally built for the Victorian upper middle class in the 1800's, predominantly Dutch & other European immigrants.  In the 1930's, the neighborhood changed socially & economically, like many other areas in New York City.  Unt

name: Comfy apartment, adorable cat!
space: Here's what you should know: -1 bedroom in upper Manhattan, good for one person or couple -2 minute walk to Dyckman St. stop on 1 train; 8-minute walk to Dyckman St. stop on A train -AC, heat always comfortable temperature -about two minutes per day of cat care requested (simply replenish water and dry food, and scoop litter--which is really easy) Notes: I book guests when I travel, and sometimes there will be more than one guest without me being home in between to clean. This means you might have to change sheets yourself, and I expect the place to be exactly as you found it when you leave. The cat always stays in the apartment. She has very long fur, and sheds quite a bit. I do my best with the cat hair, but even so, there is inevitably some accumulation, especially after a few days. If this will be a problem for you, you might want to seek an alternative. I do have appropriate cleaning tools at the apartment--I don't expect you to use them, but you may if it bothers you. Many people

name: On MULBERRY Street - Nolita / Soho
space: AMAZING APT in an the PERFECT area.    - The bedroom is basically a private studio apt with a private entrance on the corner of Mulberry and Kenmare. The bathroom and kitchen are shared with quiet roommate that is rarely around and has his own private entrance on the other side of the apt. The apt is in one of the best areas in the city where you find busy big shopping, nightlife, tourist experiences and 5 star restaurants or quite shopping, cafes, dim lit wine bars and unique experiences. BEDROOM: - Great size - Full bed and dressers etc  - Bedding provided - sheets, blankets - Hardwood floors - tall ceilings  - large windows with a lot of light! - some closet and storage space.  - Original artwork and unique furnishings - Exposed brick - Quiet  APT: - Furnished kitchen -  dinnerware, pots and pans  - Furnished bathroom - toilet paper, soap, shampoo - Hardwood floors throughout - Modern renovated finishing - 2 floor walk up building. - Wireless internet - All utilities included  AREA:

name: Clean Cute Private Room in CHELSEA
space: Hi there!  A little about me: I have lived in this beautiful city for  13 years....time flies. I am renting out a small furnished room in my cute 2BR apt.  A little about the apartment: The apartment is nice, clean and sunny and is located in one of the best neighborhoods in Manhattan, Chelsea. You have the subway A,E,C,L, 1, 2,3, and laundromats, 24hr delis and pharmacies, restaurants and bars just outside the apartment. Union Square, The Meat Packing, Chelsea Market, The Highline, Apple Store, all just 5 min walking distance.  A little about the room: The room is quiet. Plus it is fully furnished with a bed, dresser, a build-in wardrobe and WiFi.  The apartment is great. Very nice and clean, and is located in the heart of Chelsea. & West Village. You are close to everything! Nothing can beat that.  Please contact me if you are interested and for further information!  Have a great day!

name: The Serenity Room in Historic BKLYN
space: Great location in Southeast Brooklyn. Close to east river and Historic Brooklyn heights. Two subways stops from downtown Manhattan. Private sunny room in spacious two bedroom apartment. Multiple Family building. Young professional neighborhood with lots of young families. Third floor walk up. Home to Justin, Devin and baby William. Perfect for a single traveler. Ideal for in laws visiting their grandchildren in the neighborhood.

name: 2 Story Sleeps 4, PERFECT LOCATION!
space: One bedroom in the Upper East Side. Massive king size bed for two, plus room for 2 more on a great couch. High-end art, modern furniture, very clean and great condition. Reduced rate for extended nights. Perfect location for guests. The Upper East Side is a residential neighborhood with high-end restaurants as well as inexpensive dining.We live off the 77th Street stop on the 6 train. The neighborhood also has four grocery stores and 3 pharmacies within a five minute walking distance.  Centrally located, the apartment is only blocks from Central Park, the Metropolitan Museum of Art, Guggenheim Museum, The Frick Museum, Carl Shutz Park, Mayor's Mansion, Cornell Medical University and much, much more.   Taxis are easily available or you can take the subway, which is a five minute walk. Whether by taxi or subway, you are only 10 minutes from Fifth Avenue holiday shopping, Rockefeller Center, Columbus Circle and the Waldorf Astoria. We've been living here for three years and love the apart

name: Historic, Brooklyn brownstone,  Private Rooms
space: Beautiful private room on second floor of three story brownstone.  A second single room next door can be rented by same party only. In double room, two huge shuttered windows look out on tree lined traditional Brooklyn brownstone neighborhood that  is within the Prospect Heights Historic District. (means it was designated by law to preserve the 1900's architecture). Classic antique furnishings, very comfortable double bed with down comforter, (extra wool blankets), dresser, desk, and small table.   If you would like to save some money for other pleasures, it is relatively easy to cook light meals.  And no dishes to wash--simply put then in my little bin, and you will find them returned later in the day clean and ready for your next use.   The room has all tools to make meals, breakfasts, etc., including small fridge, microwave,  toaster oven, hot plates, electric hot water kettle, french press, china, pans, etc. There are tea bags, and freshly ground coffee.   Use of two bathrooms with

name: NYC 1st Shipping Container Home
space: Hi- Welcome to New York City's first (legal) home built entirely of re-cycled shipping containers! We offer sustainable, comfortable, wonderful living in Williamsburg. Our guests will occupy one private container (apartment) on the ground floor with its own bathroom and kitchenette. Enjoy our front yard any time or ask us when you can share our roof top. A lovely community garden practically next door is also at your disposal. Whether you are a singe traveler or a small family, this space will suit your needs! Our legal status .."A class B multiple dwelling is a multiple dwelling which is occupied, as a rule, transiently, as the more or less temporary abode of individuals or families who are lodged with or without meals. This class includes hotels, lodging houses, rooming houses, boarding houses..." Fashionable restaurants, great bars, art galleries in Williamsburg, and Bushwick are within a short walk. There are three small grocery stores on our block, as well as a laundromat. We have

name: Beautiful Spacious UWS Apartment
space: Welcome to our amazing apartment!  Stay in our beautiful One Bedroom apartment (plus pull out sleeping couch) with a spacious living room, kitchen and bedroom. Great for singles and couples. Stay here and get around New York City with ease. All the great things to see are just a few minutes away by subway! 1 bedroom + pull out couch. The Amenities include: * Spacious dinning area  * 100% private apartment all to yourself!  * 1 Block From Subway (1 Train)   * Free WiFi (super fast internet!)  * 46 Inches Flat screen High Def TV w/ ipod hookup and great stereo system.  * Super Comfy Bed  * Fully equip Kitchen  * A/C and heating * Washing macing and dryer in the building * Great restaurants surround the apartment  * Very nice & quiet neighborhood  * Walking distance Central Park (6 min) and Riverside Park  (2 min) * Dates are a flexible (one or two days before or after listed dates) Feel free to message us with any questions! See you soon,  Yael & Tsahi

name: Charming South Village w/ Private Terrace
space: Wake up in the heart of SoHo within steps of world class shopping, dining, and iconic Washington Square Park.  Remarkably quiet, safe, and conveniently located within 5 mins walk to multiple Subway lines (C/E, 1, B/D/F/M, W/R, 6) this airy pre-war studio will be your urban oasis! Amenities include: a well curated galley kitchen, queen bed w/ premium mattress, hair dryer, high speed WiFi, A/C, Nespresso Pixie, Amazon Fire TV, Bose stereo via Bluetooth, and remarkable private outdoor space.

name: Airy Bed Sty Restoration
space: We'd love to have our own retreat like this: Floor-through, garden apartment in reclaimed wood restoration. Bedroom filled with glorious light, facing a foliage filled private garden. Walk-in closet and shower for two. All new stainless steel appliances including washer/dryer and dishwasher. Full counter, and eat-in kitchen. Large flatscreen TV with Netflix, very comfortable couch/pull-out queen-sized bed.  Bedford-Stuyvesant is a residential, tree-lined neighborhood, situated at the highest point in central Brooklyn. Known for 150-year-old Town Houses, home of double-dutch, and the greatest East Coast Icons.  One block to Tompkins Park for concerts, bbqs, and ball games. Adjacent to art meccas, Williamsburg, Bushwick, Clinton Hill and Fort Greene.

name: Cozy Private room in Fort Greene
space: Greetings Travelers, Our guest room features a queen sized bed, bureau/ drawer space, a window that lets in great light, and a beautiful mahogany desk. The apartment is a 2 bedroom 1 bathroom basement apartment with hardwood floors, and a comfortable sized bathroom.  We have 1 cat. We offer use of our kitchen, stove, refrigerator, French Press coffee maker/tea kettle (you will need to supply your own coffee/tea) . We also offer free WI-FI, towels and hand soap. You may also use the bureau drawers for your belongings. The apartment is within walking distance to both Manhattan and Brooklyn Bridges, Fort Greene Park, Clinton Hill, DUMBO, Brooklyn Academy of Music, Pratt University, Long Island University, Brooklyn Hospital and the Brooklyn Navy Yard. We are one stop from Chinatown/Lower East Side and two stops from Greenwich Village and SoHo. Subway Service ( B, Q and R lines) are a 10 to 15 minute walk away, but if you do not fee like walking there is a bus that literally drops you off o

name: Adorable West Village Apt (2 Beds)
space: Hi! Thank you for your interest in our place :)  Neighborhood: Our adorable studio apartment is located in the heart of the West Village, on a small, quiet side street. The neighborhood has great restaurants, bars, micro breweries, pizzerias, jazz bars a world renowned cheese shop and more. The trendy Meat Packing District is walking distance as well as SoHo, NoHo, China Town, Little Italy and the High Line. One of the most convenient things about the apartment is itÛªs a block from 3 subway lines: the A/C/E, the B/D/F, and the 1/9. ThereÛªs a FedEx a few blocks away if you need to print or ship anything. ThereÛªs also parking on the street and surrounding streets. Be sure to read the signs because there is no parking on our street certain days of the week. If youÛªd like to bike ride, there are Citi Bike rentals around the corner next to pizzeria. name: W'burg Hidden Treasure Off Lorimer

Its centrally located in East Williamsburg so you'll have the JMZ about a 5 minute walk South, the G train within a 6 minute walk West and two different L train stations [Montrose 8 blocks East (you would only use it for the morning commute) and Lorimer 10 blocks North]. The apartment will be shared by two male roommates. You would share the bathroom on the top floor with one roommate. The best part of the apartment is our private roof deck with a personal hammock. name: Park Slope Brownstone with Garden
space: Sunny floor-through apartment with private entrance in the Garden Floor of our Park Slope Brownstone with garden access. This is a classic Brownstone in a typical tree-lined block between 5th and 6th Avenues, in the heart of Park Slope.  Park Slope's 5th Avenue - attractive for visitors from all over New York and the Greater Metropolitan Area for its hip boutiques, cafes, bars and restaurants - is around the corner. Our block itself is very quiet and neighborly. Beautiful Prospect Park with Long meadow, Picnic House, the Bandshell, Audubon Center, Zoo and Iceskating rink is 3 blocks up the road. Excellent subway connections to Manhattan (R, N/D B/Q, 2/3).  Downtown Manhattan is a 20 minute subway ride away. Atlantic Terminal with LIRR connections to Long Island can be reached by foot or bus within 15 minutes. The Brooklyn Museum, Barclay's Center and Brooklyn Botanical Garden, as well as bars, cafes and restaurants are in close vicinity.  The apartment is a 1 bedroom plus den / walk-in

name: A livingroom on the Upper W  NY
space: Subletting my living room. The room has no door but is provided a divider for your privacy.   It would be easier for a person who is visiting NY temporarily or staying for a short business trip .  A futon bed (single) cable tv, wifi, and nice closet are provided.  It is a doorman building with laundry in the basement.    The kitchen is very small, just for the breakfast.  There is one bathroom.  I keep my place clean so please respect.  The futon is single bed size so just for one person.  It is in a very lively area on the Upper west side with food, organic markets, clothing stores and all kind of restaurants. All the red lines 1,2,3 are available.

This house is on the opposite side of Park Slope. Convenient transportation. The subway number 2 and 5 is 3 short blocks from the house, 3 minutes walk. 30 minutes to downtown Manhattan. name: Cozy parlor guest room in Bed-Stuy brownstone
space: Enjoy a comfy, cozy guest room on the parlor level of a clean, modern, luxury apartment in a turn-of-the-century (not saying which century LOL) Bed-Stuy brownstone. During your stay, enjoy access to large eat-in kitchen / living area. Washer dryer. Free WiFi and cable. USB ports in the wall outlets so you can charge your devices without a power cord. Only 6 blocks to major subway lines and mere steps away from the trendiest new restaurants, bars, and gourmet grocery stores. Enjoy your morning coffee in our eat-in kitchen, on our stoop, balcony, backyard, or in the community garden. Stay with a Brooklyn native and his award-winning poet husband in a neighborhood that welcomes diversity and individuality of all kinds.  Our fully-renovated luxury home is only twenty minutes from Manhattan by subway, but we suggest you spend time in Brooklyn, visiting the Brooklyn Museum, Botanic Garden, colorful and historic neighborhoods like Williamsburg, Greenpoint, Clinton Hill, Fort Greene, Park Slop

name: Sunny Loft Studio, Fort Greene
space: Extra large sunny studio apartment located in the HEART of  Fort Greene.   THE PLACE Sunny, large 500 square-foot studio.  Perfect for one - two people. It's very comfortable and includes a super cozy (and handsome!) couch, and a great shag carpet and pillows that are perfect for lounging.   As it's a studio, the bedroom is not separate, but I've just hung a really nice set of windows that divide the space nicely without compromising on sunlight.  The bed is comfortable and sheets are soft!  The living room is beautifully furnished, and comfortable. The bathroom is a classic black and white-tiled bathroom with a porcelain sink and cast iron tub.  THE NEIGHBORHOOD Fort Greene is a convenient and very pretty neighborhood in Brooklyn. There is Fort Greene Park - home of a Saturday morning farmer's market, The Brooklyn Flea also on Saturdays, there are a lot of great restaurants and drinking establishments.  I love  the neighborhood.  It has a lot of stuff going on, but it's relaxing and s

name: Chelsea, near Highline and Art galleries, 1 BR

Kitchen is fully equipped-appliances/microwave OTHER DETAILS:  -Queen bed with bedding provided (sheets, pillow, comforter)  -comfortable sofas with queen bed folds out - Internet, TV w/ Roku and Netflix (access to thousands of movies and shows)  - Air conditioner  - Clean towels and sheets THE NEIGHBORHOOD Ah Chelsea mon amour. ItÛªs the greatest for walking, shopping, people watching, enjoying: Arts & Culture: Ideally situated between numerous world-class contemporary art galleries and restaurants Chelsea has a tremendous array of offerings.

name: Rustic Elegant Loft in Brooklyn
space: This lovely loft is at the heart of the East Williamsburg/Bushwick Brooklyn Gallery District of New York.  The neighborhood combines industrial landscape, commercial loft buildings with chic cafes, coffee bars, health food markets, galleries and the now world famous RobertaÛªs, the locavore pizzeria with its own organic garden, radio station and delivery. The loft, which has been beautifully converted with reclaimed wood, douglas fir doors, is 1000q ft and consists of one bedroom with a full sized bed,  an open light filled living room/dining/kitchen space with high ceilings, huge windows and an unobstructed view of the sky. It is located in a building filled mostly with creative artists. The kitchen area with fridge, stove, oven, juicer, 2 coffeemakers [italian and french press] is perfect for preparing your meals. It is well equipped, chef knives, cast iron skillets, pots, pans, dishes, wineglasses, etc.  Looking for a what makes New York City cutting edge. Come stay amongst the artis

name: Classy Brooklyn Studio
space: This fabulous little studio is a typical New York City place. It's tiny but well designed and well located with everything you need for NYC life.  All utilities, including TV, wi-fi, land line phone are included in the rent. The studio is a renovated and fully private space, approx 400 sq ft, in a private house on a typical Brooklyn street. The house was renovated in 2004 and is eco-friendly with no-formaldehyde insulation, low emission paints and varnishes, water filtered on entry, all non-toxic cleaning materials, laundry, etc. There have never been smokers or pets in the house. There is plenty of steam heat and good hot water and water pressure. For summer, there is a brand new super split in-wall air conditioner to compliment a large ceiling fan and skylight. The studio is fully and nicely furnished with a full size wood frame futon sofabed, 20' flat screen tv, a large kitchen table/work space, four 1960s original chairs, a wood dresser and some nice end tables. Steps from tons of restaurants, bars, boutiques and Tompkin's Square park, you will be in walking distance from all that you really need.  A supermarket is around the corner. name: Nice Studio Apt by Central Park and Lincoln Ctr

name: Brand New 2-Level 2-Bedroom Condo
space: This brand new duplex features 2 bedrooms and a bathroom upstairs, and kitchen, living room, and half bath on the main.  Both floors are accessible by elevator, and are furnished with modern furnishings.  The apartment comes with a washer/dryer, dishwasher, air conditioning, stainless steel appliances, free wifi, and great, beautiful sunlight.   Sheets, towels, and cookware are provided. The main floor also has two twin sized Day Beds. There is a large, open plan kitchen with both electric and gas ovens along with a microwave oven and a gas range. There is a laundry room with washer and dryer, wireless internet and cable television and an extensive library. Located on the ground floor of a late 19th century warehouse building, the loft is right off the Bowery in NYC's hottest neighborhood. The space is not air-conditioned but there are ceiling fans and portable fans.

So safe, that you'll feel comfortable sleeping with the windows opened or even sleeping out in the fenced Patio. It's the closest you will ever come to Paradise(See photos). space: Three-bedroom, one bathroom duplex apartment for rent in the heart of Greenpoint, Brooklyn. The closest subway stop is the Nassau Ave. G stop (two minutes walk away) or the Bedford Ave. L stop (10 - 15 minutes walk away). From the house, it takes 20 - 30 minutes to get to Midtown or Union Square in Manhattan. A spacious, lovely place to stay in one of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods!

There are two movie theaters, as well as Off Off Broadway theaters peppered within a two mile radius. There are countless delis providing groceries, sandwiches, day or night as well as a Whole Food's within walking distance.

NO KITCHEN, however, there is a MINI-REFRIDGERATOR in the master bedroom. space: This is a huge room in the east village of manhattan close to many fun bars and great restaurants including the famous Katz Deli. name: Bright & Beautiful Stay in Brooklyn
space: A large, beautiful apartment along the tree-lined streets of Brooklyn. Everything in my apt is in good condition--I have a mix of contemporary and vintage furniture that I collect in and around Brooklyn. The apt is spacious and clean. You will get plenty of sunlight and adequate heating. There is a bedroom, bathroom with bathtub, a large kitchen, dining area, desk/study area, and living room.  The bed is a memory foam Keetsa mattress. I have dual waterfall and hand-held shower heads. I have a cozy desk area. The entertainment system is a 60sq. ft projector and Roku box with access to Netflix, HBO GO, and access to many mainstream cable networks. The sound system is Kardon Sound Sticks. I also have high-speed wifi throughout the entire apt. I will supply blankets, cozy warm slippers, and a selection of coffee and tea.  This is my escape from the city and I hope you will cherish it too.

space: ***INSTANT BOOK*** If you are able to see that the dates are open then they are! Go ahead and book it, no need to wait and see if it is available because it is. BE IN THE CENTER OF IT ALL The heart of NYC surrounds you in this beautifully designed home. Walking distance to: - Time square, Theatre district, TKTS, and the Intrepid  - Central Park - Empire state building, Macy's - Rockefeller Center, Radio City -Midtown THE APARTMENT: A designer's dream: The apt is a LARGE 2bdrm apt with a huge living room, kitchen, and bathroom. It is fully equipped with AC, Microwave, dishwasher, and of course cable TV and WiFi! It features track lighting which can dim and exposed brick walls.  THE ROOM: The room is private, quiet, and on the opposite end of the apartment which provides privacy and a view of midtown. It features southern exposure for abundant sunlight during the day and at night it is dark and quiet.  It comes furnished with a dresser, a queen size bed, AC, Flat Screen Cable TV and free

name: An Oasis in the Big Apple 3
space: Spacious  Two Bedroom apartment on the 3rd Floor, in a three family house located in Woodside, Queens.  The house is newly totally renovated with large windows all around,  which are bringing plenty of sun light into the house.  The apartment is completely autonomous  with it's own  fully equipped kitchen with new appliances as well as cooking equipment. Spa type bathroom, open-plan design living and dining room with high quality furniture. All the bedrooms have hardwood floors and the kitchen and living room floors are from ceramic tiles. Autonomous heating for the apartment, having it's own thermostat. The apartment has a web TV with direct access to internet, that allows you to search the web, check your email and  listen to music. Membership to netflix is provided so you can download and watch movies online. Also local channels and  high speed wireless access to the internet is provided .Iron and board is available,a hair dryer,filter coffee and espresso/cappuccino coffee  machine.

name: Room in Clinton Hill Brooklyn Loft
space: Large room in Loft Apartment.  Utilities included: heat & AC, wireless internet, flat screen TV including cable premium channels. Located in Clinton Hill, a Brooklyn neighborhood with a diverse ethnic and cultural mix of artists, professionals, and lifelong residents that creates a unique and friendly atmosphere. Just blocks away from Pratt University, BAM (The Brooklyn Academy of Music), The Brooklyn Flea and local shopping and restaurants along Fulton, Dekalb and Myrtle Avenues.   The space is private, bright and airy with high ceilings south facing skylights.  Furnished with bed, desk and chair and ottoman/coffee table.  There is a large closet and one armoire.  The apartment is fully renovated with hardwood floors, a shared kitchen and bath with stone floors and large claw foot tub/shower.  There is a shared rooftop deck just one flight up. There is also a laundry room in the building.   The neighborhood boasts an array of restaurants, cafÌ©s and bars. Neighborhood nightlife is clos

name: West Village 2 Bedroom Apt
space: Entire floor, nine hundred and twenty square foot, two bedroom apartment on cobblestoned street in the heart of the West Village.  This newly renovated 2 bedroom pre-war apartment contains all modern cons but has still kept its period charm. High ceilings and oversized windows around the entire perimeter of the apartment make for a beautiful, light-filled space.  Fully equipped designer kitchen with marble island/breakfast bar and stools. Separate dining room with round table that sits 6 comfortably; flows to lounge room with designer furniture and modern art. Wifi included.    Two double bedrooms at opposite ends of the apartment (the main with a Queen size W Hotel bed and Frette linen). Second bedroom set up with a movable Stokke crib/ child's bed for 0-3 years. Room for double inflatable mattress, available on request.  The apartment is two blocks from the Hudson River and seconds to the Meatpacking District, Bleecker St and many of New York's finest shops and restaurants.

name: WILLIAMSBURG 1 private room in shared loft
space: Private Room includes: 1 large Queen size loft bed wilth sheets, pillows and duvet cover, heat, ac, 1 large window, large closet, 1 dresser, 1 table, high ceilings and hardwood floors. (You will need to go up a ladder to access your bed) The apartment has large kitchen if you like to cook, large dinning table to have friends over or to have dinner with your flat mates, hardwood floors, exposed brick walls, high ceilings, and lots of natural lighting and character. Full bathroom, of course, and wireless INTERNET available in the apartment.  Questions: Feel free to contact me if you need more pictures or if you have further questions.  Se habla espaÌ±ol! And deustch Thank you,  Alois and Florencia.

I am very Flexible with Check in check out time.

name: (102) 10min to Manhattan/  Astoria Guest Haus
space: The size of the room is about 110 square feet. The bed is a full-sized bed 137 cm x 187 cm/ 54"x 74".  The room is right in the center of the house on the first floor so it never get too hot or too cold. It's not by the street so you won't hear the noise.  Clean pillow cases, bed sheets will always be prepared.  F.A.Q About the apartment, hope it helps you have a better idea about your future experience with me ;) 1. What is the rental process?
