name: Feel the Brooklyn Love!
space: Classic studio in the heart of one of Brooklyn's most beautiful neighborhoods. This apartment is in a pre-war building with beautiful hardwood floors and an expansive view of the Manhattan skyline and rooftops of Brooklyn. The space is essentially a main room plus a small foyer, big walk-in closet and a bathroom. It is fully furnished with laundry in the basement, TV, DVD, stereo, and Wi-Fi. The apartment has internet, a TV antenna, but no cable TV service. You can easily attach you laptop to the stereo/TV for streaming purposes. The space can accommodate an individual or couple. I'm sure you'll feel the love in my cozy corner of Brooklyn bohemia!

name: Fantastic apartment in Wburg/Gpt
space: I will be out of town, am looking to rent out my spacious and well-equipped apartment in the best neighborhood of NYC - Williamsburg/Greenpoint!   The bedroom room includes a double bed, desk, three chairs, and two dressers.  The windows overlook the street, so it's quite sunny during the day.  The living room has a dining table and full kitchen amenities. We are in a great little house on a quiet street steps from the countless bars, stores, restaurants etc. that Greenpoint/Williamsburg have to offer.  (We live directly on the border of the two neighborhoods.)  McCarren Park is only one block away.  The G train is one block away, and the L train is about 10 blocks away.   We keep a clean house and have a newly-renovated kitchen, which we love.  Our kitchen is fully equipped and available for you to use, although we of course ask you to provide your own groceries. You will be provided with high-speed wireless internet, towels, comfortable bedding...basically everything you need to ensu

name: AMAZING Deal in Heart of NYC!!!
space: This listing is for the Master Bed in a lovely 2 bedroom apartment. The room available gets direct sun all morning and overlooks the garden.  There is noise from the bar next door that is light but if you are a light sleeper it can be a problem.    Everything in my apartment is kept very clean. The beds have new and freshly laundered linens on them and clean/new towels are provided. There is a full kitchen with all the utensils and pots and pans you would need to cook a gourmet meal. 4 burner gas stove and oven. Breakfast nook in the kitchen to sit and grab a quick bite or log on to your laptop and have a cup of coffee. There is a shared living room for hanging out if you want to read a book or just have a chat. The bathroom is also shared. The bathroom is directly located next to the door of the available room so only one step in the common area to the bedroom.  The bedroom: - Full Sized Bed - Fully furnished bedroom with bed, dresser, lamp and closet. - Artisan decor with warm and co

name: Bright 1 BR in Brooklyn
space: Bright 1BR near Prospect Park and Brooklyn Museum.  Several trains (Q, B,1,2,4,6 and C train) to Manhattan close by.  Restaurants, cafes, bars, supermarkets, boutiques, health food stores... close by.  Hardwood floors New kitchen with dishwasher Brand new bathroom with tub Wi-Fi TV This is a very trendy neighborhood in Brooklyn. It is very safe. The apartment is opposite a school and it is very quiet at night; always free street parking available. Trendy restaurants, coffee shops and bars are just a few steps away. The Botanical Garden and Brooklyn Museum are only 7 minutes walking from here. Please feel free to ask any questions.

name: Near Central Park-20m to Times Sq.
space: Room includes bed and space for your stuff. The room is relatively small, but comfortable. You are welcome to use the kitchen and bathroom at your convenience.

name: Charming Harlem Getaway-Women Only
space: Unwind and enjoy this tranquil getaway across from scenic Jackie Robinson park.  Building is a two block walk from historic Convent Avenue and the gorgeous architecture of the City College Campus, and a 10-minute stroll from the residences of Harlem's famous Strivers' Row.   Guests will enjoy the comfort of a spacious, bright, airy large bedroom with a Yankee Stadium view.  Apartment is in an historic Harlem building with an elevator and ramp for guests with disabilities.   The apartment interior is light filled, homey, with artful contemporary design and global accents from host's travels that will help make your b&b stay memorable.     The kitchen is fully equipped with a variety of cooking tools and is available for use for those who prefer to save by eating in. There's also a grocery store (2 blocks away) to purchase ingredients for lunch/dinner.  If a traditional soul food meal is on your "must do" list while in Harlem, the neighborhood has several well-known Harlem restaurants in

name: Nice studio apartment in Brooklyn!
space: Have ease, comfort and privacy on your trip to New York City in this affordable studio apartment located in Crown Heights, Brooklyn.  Great for one traveler or a couple.  Separate kitchen and lots of closet space. 2nd floor, high ceilings, lots of light!  Close to subways. A 20 minute walk to Prospect Park, The Brooklyn Museum and Botanical Garden. Right around the corner from the trendy Franklin Avenue, with lots of restaurants, cafes and stores. Two of my favorite Mexcian restaurants are within blocks, as well as great Indian food and many, many Trinidadian and Caribbean restaurants. A safe neighborhood full of friendly and relaxed people. I have lots of friends who live right around here. Many creative types have been moving into Crown Heights in the last 5 years. Free wi-fi internet. Good stereo. Bedsheets and towels. No TV or computer provided. No smoking, please! I think you will like it here. I do!

name: Large pleasant room nr Central Park
space: Hi, we have a very nice spare room downstairs, on a separate floor from the rest of the apartment.  We have friends (and friends of friends) staying all the time, and we like having people to stay, so we decided to give Airbnb a try. We live 3 blocks from Central Park in the very nice Morningside Heights / Upper West Side neighborhood.  Also near Riverside Park and Columbia Uni, with lots of nice cafes etc.  In the park there's a free pool in the summer, ice skating rink in winter....  loads of shopping on the upper west side and all the museums are just a walk across the park.  We're 2 mins from the 1 train, and Times Square is about a 10 min train ride away; We are a family of 4 (mixed UK and USA nationalities).  Kids are 1 yr and 4 yrs.  We're sociable people with full time jobs.  Totally happy for guests to do their own thing, but always up for a chat. Alex enjoys telling people about sights and activities around the city.  Our nanny Carmen is often around if we are not.   The room

name: Heart of Harlem 1 BR Garden apt
space: This is a 700 sq. ft. 1 bedroom/1 bathroom apartment on the ground floor of a renovated brownstone in the Central Harlem area of Manhattan/NYC. The apartment has a private entrance, full kitchen and access to the yard with a BBQ.   There is a clothes washer and dryer as well as dishwasher.  The bed is queen size and has a pillow top mattress. Also available is a portable crib. The kitchen includes a drip coffee maker with a grinder, blender, toaster and all dishware, utensils and cookware. Towels and linens are also provided. The apartment is in the heart of Harlem close to many transportation choices:  the 2 and 3 subways are two blocks away; the 4, 5, 6 and A, B, C, D subways are all within three to six blocks; and many buses such as the M1, M7, M60 run near our apartment.  There are some great cafes, restaurants and bars close by such as Sylvia's (around the corner), Red Rooster, Ginny's, Corner Social and Lenox Coffee (two-three blocks away).  We also have our favorite spots around

name: Colorful New York East Village Apt
space: I DO NOT BOOK MORE THAN 2 MONTHS IN ADVANCE (It is too far away for me to know my schedule) Colorful cozy apt in the middle of NYC's trendy East Village neighborhood, on 1st Avenue and St. Mark's place. Many boutique shops, restaurants, and bars, it's all right here!!! 4 trains within 10 minute walking distance. The apt has TV, DVD, wireless internet, fully functioning kitchen and bath. The apt has 2 rooms situated railroad style, walk through the bedroom room to get to the living room which also has a full size futon for a 2nd sleeping area. The apt is situated in the heart of an active area of east village, so it's very convenient to everything, but if you're an extremely light sleeper, please be aware. Please tell me a little about yourself when replying, thanks!!!

name: Cozy, Charming Apt. Heart of Bushwick :)
space: What makes this space unique is its location. You would be staying in the heart of Bushwick. Surrounded by delicious restaurants, fun bars and plenty of music venues. It is also located three blocks away from the NY Subway L train station. You are 20 minutes away from Manhattan and 10 minutes away from the famous Williamsburg location.  I have lived in this apartment for over six years and could not mention enough how much this neighborhood is of an inspiration to anyone who visits it. Local record shops, book stores, and multiple vintage stores within a block from the space. There is also a fantastic grafitti scene that can be admired throughout the entire neighborhood. Please read all the amazing reviews all my guests have left. I am thrilled to share that each of my guests have enjoyed staying in my house and have had the best experience here.  There is one bathroom, it's a small bathroom but everything works great and it also has a window (something difficult to find in NY, believe

name: Large furnished room
space: I'm looking for someone to take my room for a month (June 15th -July 1/longer is possible) in a 3-bedroom large elevator building. You would be sharing the space w/1 gay male and 1 straight female who are very friendly and laid-back. There are also 2 cats, who are very low-key themselves. There are a lot of bars, restaurants, grocers, and laundromats nearby. You would be an eight minute walk south on Franklin to the 2/3/4/5 @ Franklin and a 10 minute walk north on Franklin to the C train @ Franklin Ave. Also, right across the street from the front door of the building is an entrance to the shuttle train @ Park Place. The girls work full-time: one as a bartender/waitress in the East Village who is in a yoga training course and the other works in publishing. They are both gay friendly and 420 friendly. We just want someone to respect the living quarters: pick up after yourself. If you have any other questions feel free to ask them.

name: NYC Spacious 3b, new, river view
space: The perfect Manhattan rental.  Enjoy our newly renovated 3 bedroom 2 bathroom New York City- Harlem apartment.  Apartment sits along beautiful Riverside drive  with a  river view. Apartment is fully furnished.  Sleeps 5 but could definitely sleep more.  Current configuration has queen bed in master, twin bed in second room, and bunkbeds in third room(kids room).  Beautiful living room and dining room with all new furnishings.  Brand new kitchen and appliances.  Great and safe building.   All the needs are included.  Plenty of dining space, Internet, tv etc.  We are very clean. Close to transportation.  Close walking distance to 1, A,B,C,D.  Close to Hudson River parkway.

name: Large Private Room in Clinton Hill Brooklyn Loft
space: The room is large and private.  Furnished with a queen size bed.  Closet space available.  Desk space for laptop adjacent to bedroom.  The apartment is renovated with hardwood floors, a shared living room, kitchen and bath with stone floors and large claw foot tub/shower. WiFi available.

name: Bright Spacious Brooklyn
space: Welcome to Park Slope!  Close walking distances to so many  wonderful places like Prospect Park, Greenwood Cemetary,  lovely local bars(including a great new beergarden with outdoor bocce and indoor fireplaces), restaurants, boutiques, cafes!  Very close to the new Barclays Center where you can see great concerts and games! The apartment is a 2 bedroom, one of which will be yours.  The space is bright with lots of windows, a fully equipped kitchen which you are welcome to use.  Cable TV in the common space and internet of course.   Your room has a full sized bed and I will provide you with clean sheets and towels.  The bathroom is shared. If you are renting a car, parking is rarely an issue.  However, you don't need to because it's about a 5 min walk to the F,G,R trains and can be in the city or williamsburg in 15-20 min.  I think there's enough to do around here that you won't need to go very far! I grew up in Brooklyn and have a lot of great insight on places to go, where to eat, how

name: Beautiful 1BR near Central Park!
space: A wonderful, bright and spacious 1 bedroom apartment in an excellent location on the UWS, steps from central park and the 1 local and 2/3 express train!  This lovely home features a bedroom with a queen size bed, a large dining/living room with a kitchen off to the side. It is newly and beautifully renovated in an older building, keeping original charm. Located on the 5th floor of a 9 floor elevator building on a tree-lined street, the apartment is filled with natural light and no building immediately facing. The neighborhood hosts great restaurants and shops just around the corner, and is conveniently located for NYC's major sightseeing attractions, shopping and nightlife. Public transportation is just steps away and will take you all over New York in little time.   Public transit 1/2/3, C/B trains within close distance Central Park and Riverside Park closeby

name: MANHATTAN CHARMER WOW - ALL YOURS!!
space: The pictures speak for themselves. The apartment has a working fire place, is located on 73rd and lexington, which is just blocks from all the great museums and bars and the best of what NYC has to offer, and just minutes from the subway.  The apartment is impecably decorated with a fine mixture of classic and contemporary pieces and is a truely a special place to call home. Warm up by the fireplace, have a coffee or tea on the terrace, and enjoy the natural light from the skylight. There is cable/dvd players in both the bedroom and living room, wifi, and the sheets and towels are allways washed before any guest comes to stay. The apartment has recently been cleaned by a professional who helped me power wash the walls and floors, expect it to be immaculate and pristine on your arrival.  I welcome all guests, help with bags and answer any and all questions you may have. I am on call for the duration of your stay to help in any way I can. This is a one of a kind pre war New York apartmen

name: Modern and Cozy Home - LES
space: Enjoy your vocation at one of the most exciting and trendiest neighborhoods in Manhattan! Lower East side is known for its great restaurants, lounges, bars, many music venues, historical places, boutiques,  art galleries and shopping streets. Its unique style differs from all NYC. There is no shortage of fun things to do.  The apartment available for rent is located in one of the quietest areas of LES on a very well-known Broome Street. Apartment is fully furnished and very cozy.  Many great places around to visit - coffee shops, restaurants, boutiques, spas, bars and health food stores are all within 2-3 blocks radius and just few minutes away.  This apartment features: Û¢Free WIFI Û¢Queen size bed in the bedroom. Also there is two twin size beds in the living room with option to make it a king size bed(if more people) Û¢Iron, hair dryer Û¢Fresh linens and towels included Û¢Shampoo, conditioner, soap Û¢Fully equipped kitchen with pots, pans and everything you need for cooking. Cups, cutlery

name: AMAZING Upper East Side Location!  RARE Find.
space: Studio on beautiful high-end quiet street 1/2 block from central park!   Window views of sky and street life.  Street parking accessible on same block on weekends easily.  WiFi and A/C. Keurig machine available for easy hot coffee or tea in the morning : ) You're coming to Manhattan to enjoy the city. This is in the most luxurious neighborhood in NY.   Unlike most other locations in Manhattan, here you'll exit the quiet building and be amidst the highest end shopping around and Central Park.  Down the block you have Prada, Gucci, Cartier and every other luxury brand imaginable.   In most other neighborhoods it will be laundromat, deli, and countless people running back and forth hectically.  None of the above is within a 6 minute walk away from this building - thankfully ! You will feel 100% safe coming back no matter what hour of the night (VERY IMPORTANT). I'll leave you a detailed list of best restaurants and spots to check out within walking distance, travel tips, and whatever else

name: Best Deal in Hell's Kitchen!!
space: You will have your own room in an awesome fully furnished apartment on the West Side of Manhattan. You will have internet, proximity to Central Park, many restaurants and almost every train.

name: Extra Large Loft in Flatiron for your stay in NYC!
space: A stylish 100% NYC loft apartment is centrally located in the heart of the flatiron district in Manhattan. Decorated in the style of the flatiron. Balcony, great kitchen, washer dryer, queen bed and two TVs w cable and wifi. Good living is important in NYC.  It is a great apartment full of comforts that will afford you a good night sleep as well. The bedroom is located in the back away from the noises of NYC streets. It's very quiet. It is a fantastic neighborhood with great restaurants many you can order in from as well. There are two 24hr deli's that deliver 24hrs a day as well and great places like Mario Batali's Eately store to buy food just a few blocks away. Since it is centrally located downtown,  all the subways you need are within three blocks away. This is a very unique upscale loft that is as NYC as it gets. I want you to have a great experience.

name: Brownstone @ Park Slope
space: Small room w/ full size bed available on the top floor of a brownstone in the prestigious "North Slope" section of Park Slope, Brooklyn.  One block away from the famed Park Slope Food Co-op, Grand Army Plaza, Prospect Park and the main branch of the Brooklyn Public Library.  Accomodations are spare and clean. You will meet my roommate, Jamie, and be in the center of Brooklyn's "in-city suburb" Park Slope.  Shopping and restaurants are along 7th and Flatbush Avenues; mostly mid-to-upscale. Access to the 2/3 trains at Grand Army Plaza stop and the Q/B trains at the 7th Avenue stop, both of which are located on Flatbush Avenue, about five blocks from the house.  The B41 bus goes to Downtown Brooklyn or into Flatbush, depending on the direction of travel. The main selling point for this space is the location of the space.  The neighborhood is crime-free, easily accessible to transportation, and a 10 minute walk from the new Barclay's Stadium, the new home of the Brooklyn Nets Basketball te

name: 3 BR Apartment in Heart of Brooklyn
space: Hotel Style 3BR Suite Apartment.  ItÛªs private clean safe quiet. Pay LESS, Get MORE. In each bedroom there is a Full size bed(to accommodate 2) with additional Air Beds OR Mattresses available upon request. -Wireless Internet & Cable TV/HDTV-HDMI Screen in each BR & LR -Linen, Towels, Soap etc. provided -2 FULL BATHROOMS -Coffee Maker, Toaster, Blender, Hair Dryer, Iron/Ironing Board. -Kitchen with all its amenities: Microwave, Tea Kettle, Dishes etc. -Self Cleaning Gas Range/Oven  -Refrigerator -WASHING MACHINE/DRYER IN APARTMENT -Living room -Air Conditioning ***PRIVATE PORCH WITH NICE VIEW*** If you are a group of more than 12, please inquire. name: Grand Brooklyn Apartment
space: Ten blocks from Prospect Park, Brooklyn Museum and Botanical Garden. Plenty of restaurants around 4 blocks to C train station Beautiful kitchen with stain steel appliances and everything you need to cook. King size Washer and dryer inside the apartment. Amazing huge deck with table and two hammock.

name: _ü of Williamsburg, Private Entrance
space: Room features: - Spacious 11' x 16' (176 square feet or 16 square meters) - Private entrance - 10 foot ceiling - 2 windows which let in bright southern exposure light and breeze - Black-out shades - Wireless internet - Full-sized bed - Closet - Dresser - Table - Electric kettle and an assortment of teas - Ceiling fan and desk fan - Air conditioner (summer) - Central heat (winter) The apartment is on the top floor of a 3-story secure buzzer building (2 flights of stairs walkup). The building is pre-war and railroad in layout, so the apartment has two rooms on either end (guest room in the back end) with their own entrance, with the common areas (shared kitchen, shared bathroom) in between. The apartment is pet-free. Available to a maximum 2 people for nightly or weekly stays, or maximum of 1 person for monthly stays, who: - likes a clean, calm environment - doesn't smoke/do drugs

name: Cozy Corner 2! in Crown Heights
space: Hey Folks!  This is the other bedroom in my apartment that is open for vacationers. Its bigger, more room for two than you could need. Plus its open for sublet when need be. All the other amenities apply and you still get the same awesome service. My building has a laundry unit in the basement, plus there other laundry options right on the block with near by dry cleaners. The bed is full size and the if you need a extra bed, I have an inflatable mattress to accommodate.  I live near Brooklyn Museum, Prospect Park, and The Brooklyn Botanical Gardens and several markets that happen during the seasons especially spring and summer months. There several bars and clubs within your area to explore and get a better feel on the Brooklyn state of mind.  I'm 5 minutes away from the A/C/S train off the Nostrand ave stop, 15 minutes to the city. 25 mins away from Times Square/34th/Empire State Building. I can help you find a great place to eat since I'm a big foodie! Please send me a message before

name: House 10 min from Midtown Manhattan
space: Our house comfortably sleeps five. The refinished basement with a double futon is a separate bedroom with its own bathroom and access to the garden. The master bedroom upstairs is near the children's bedroom with a bunk bed.

name: Duplex Loft @ Box House Hotel
space: Eclectically styled Duplexes @ the Box House Hotel. Located in the industrial chic area of North Greenpoint in Brooklyn, The Box House Hotel features contemporary lofts and suites with large windows. Each apartment-style accommodation at The Box House Hotel is styled with bright colors, hardwood floors, antiques and contemporary art. Select rooms have a terrace and views of Midtown Manhattan. This loft features a spacious living room area with a spiral staircase leading up to a lofted bedroom area with high ceilings. The bedroom is furnished with a comfortable queen size bed. The pullout sofa in the living room area can sleep two additional guests. The kitchen is equipped with a stove top, microwave, mini refrigerator and dishware. There are 42Û LCD HD TVs in both the living and bedroom areas with premium cable channels.

name: Duplex w/ Patio @ Box House Hotel
space: Eclectically styled Duplexes @ the Box House Hotel. Located in the industrial chic area of North Greenpoint in Brooklyn, The Box House Hotel features contemporary lofts and suites with large windows. Each apartment-style accommodation at The Box House Hotel is styled with bright colors, hardwood floors, antiques and contemporary art. Select rooms have a terrace and views of Midtown Manhattan. Carefully decorated to create a warm, comfortable, cozy setting for our guests. These units feature 16ft ceilings, kitchenettes and skylight windows. Fully equipped with everything you need for your stay. This loft has a lofted bedroom area with a comfortable queen size bed and a pullout sofa in the living room area, which in total can easily sleep up to 4 guests. Also equipped with 42Û LCD HD TVs in both the living and bedroom areas with premium cable channels. There are hardwood floors throughout and a full bathroom with shower/tub combination.

name: Pristine Room and Art Experience
space: Ever dreamed of spending the night in an art installation? Welcome to Glasshouse. A serene comfortable room in a minimalist setting filled with contemporary conceptual art to truly immerse in. A quiet tranquil spot in the NY jungle.  Glasshouse in South Williamsburg seeks to blend the gallery and domestic experience in one. By bringing artists and travelers into our home-laboratory dedicated to performance and visual art, we your hosts, follow through on our belief that "art should be experienced in a place that allows staying." Just 3 blocks from the J and M trains at Hewes, 2 blocks from the G at Broadway and a 5 minute walk to the L train at Metropolitan-Lorimer, plus various buses, this place is ideal for single travelers or a couple who would appreciate a clean, inviting artistic enclave in Williamsburg with quick reliable nearby transit to Manhattan. Located close to a health food supermarket, new and old restaurants, cafÌ©s and bars of all price ranges, as well as many cool galle

name: Garden Pl Historical Artist studio
space: Charming, colorful, sun drenched studio in one of Brooklyn's most beautiful neighborhoods in Brooklyn Heights.  It is a fully furnished studio with queen size bed and air mattress for a third person.  Located near some of Brooklyn's best restaurants, cafes and boutiques on a beautiful tree lined block. You even have your entrance and private stoop.  Record player for dance parties, or quiet dances and romantic dinners. Fully equipped kitchen for your use. Become friends with Sergio at the corner deli or Danielle at the local cafe. Close to the 2,3,4,5,R,A,C, F, and G trains all 10 minutes away from Manhattan.  Two blocks from Brooklyn Bridge Park and the Brooklyn Promenade.  An 8 minute walk to Brooklyn Bridge for a scenic stroll into the city. This place is an artsy, music lovers gem... with tons of charm and tranquility.  I cherish my space and hope you will love it too!

name: Huge Room in South Williamsburg
space: Unlike every apartment in NYC, your room, and the apartment are huge. Your room (19'x17') features two windows, a queen sized bed, couch and ample closet space. We're a 5 minute walk from the G train (Union Square in 20 minutes) and a 10 minute walk to the M train (SoHo in 20 minutes). Our neighborhood straddles the South Williamsburg/Bed-Stuy border. While the neighborhood is predominantly Hasidic and unfortunately shuts down sundown Friday to sundown Saturday some of the world famous pizza Brooklyn is known for is open late and delivers to our place. We're not so far of a walk to the "hip" areas of Williamsburg or the better parts of Clinton Hill/Fort Greene. In regards to safety, my partner and I haven't had any issues while living here. Our upstairs neighbors are both women, and when asked, they seem pretty okay with the area (one is the daughter of a cop if that makes any difference). For all you yogis out there, you can pick up the B48 bus (a few feet from our apartment) and take

name: Feel at HOME away from HOME
space: Feel right at home here away from home! New York is fast and busy all the time, so after running around all day sightseeing or working you need to come to a nice and calm place to relax.  The apartment is a 2 bedroom wooden floor with large living room and open kitchen. The room available is spacious with build-in closet and it is located in the back of the apt so it is nice and quiet. There is one bathroom with tub. The apt is clean and there is a dishwasher and a washer/dryer to make it even easier for you! ;-)  The apartment is located in the heart of Harlem, walking distance to 2,3,C,A,D and B metro stations (5-7 mins) and the neighborhood has lots of different restaurants and bars for you enjoy. You are in walking distance to the world famous Apollo Theater, Studio Harlem Museum, Shrine World Music Venue and all stores at the historic 125th Street. Additionally you can find groceries around the block and also you can walk to the newly open Whole Foods in 125th.  There is high spee

name: Top Floor 2+ BR w/ Private Roofdeck
space: BEAUTIFUL PARK SLOPE BROOKLYN PRIVATE APARTMENT  Entire 2+ bedroom flat on the top floor with light-filled rooms, views of Manhattan from the roofdeck, and peace and quiet. It is just a few steps to Prospect Park, a gorgeous 600 acre public park designed by the famed landscape architects Frederick Law Olmsted and Calvert Vaux, who also designed Central Park.  The apartment is well furnished, private, quiet and comfortable 2+ bedroom apartment. Since it is our primary home, the apartment is spotless and beautifully kept. Amenities include wifi, a gourmet chef's kitchen, washer/dryer in the apt, comfortable beds, and private roofdeck garden with table & chairs, outdoor sofa, and stunning views of Manhattan. Bathroom with tub and shower.  It is a walk-up 4th floor apartment, so it is three flights of stairs. But as New Yorkers know, the higher it is, the more light, views, and quiet you have. There is also a full size air mattress available for use in the living room. Additional charge fo

name: COME AND STAY IN THIS COZY GETAWAY
space: Enjoy your stay in a private cozy 1 bedroom apartment with the freedom to come and go as you please.  Private entrance on a quiet block only minutes away from the subway.  Fully furnished with a Queen sized bed for 2, and a full sized futon for 2.   Dining table and kitchen appliances are all ready to use.   Neighborhood:  Sunset Park Highest elevation point in Brooklyn, this park offers a great view of the city and statue of liberty.  Vast open grass fields for picnics, relaxing, and playing.   FOOD OPTIONS:  TOO MANY TO LIST Sunset Park Diner has the best rice pudding (around the corner) 8th Ave Chinatown- Can't find authenticity like this anywhere else 5th Ave- Tacos El Bronco- Infamous taco truck that doesn't come out till sunset and is open till sunrise Transportation: Subway 36th Street & 4th Ave- N,R,D- 5 minute walk Express trains on the Yellow and Orange line get you into the city in just 2 stops, that's only 15 minutes away. name: Clean & Quiet BR in Sunset Park, BK
space: Spacious, quiet and clean fully furnished bedroom in a 2-bedroom apartment. Bedroom contains a full-sized bed (sleeps 2), a desk and chair, computer, television (cable) and free Wi-Fi access (should you bring along your own laptop/device). Guests will have full access to the living room, kitchen and bathroom. You may use the kitchen to cook your meals, but please ensure to clean up after yourself(selves). The apartment is located on the 1st floor of a multi-unit apartment building, in a very calm and quiet residential neighborhood. Very close to transportation (metro/subway and bus), cafes, bars, shopping, laundromat, dry cleaners, hospital (Maimonides Hospital).  You will be steps (less than five minute walk) away from Sunset Park, which is located on the second highest point in Brooklyn, and boasts magnificent panoramic views (namely southern Brooklyn & lower Manhattan). 30 minute subway ride into Manhattan (Wal Street, Chinatown, Little Italy, SoHo, Greenwich Village, Union Square).

name: Sexy Flat !!!!
space: Beautiful renovated apartment with private back yard located in Bedford Stuyvesant Brooklyn. The neighborhood is rich in culture and foot steps away from Williamsburg, Clinton Hills, Fort Greene, downtown Brooklyn and Manhattan. Very close to the new Barclay Arena in Downtown Brooklyn.  The neighborhood offers deli's,  coffee shops,  bars, lounges and full service restaurants all within walking distance.  The "G" train is 1 blocks away at the Myrtle/Willoughby train stop. In 10 minutes with a connection to the "L"  @ Metropolitan. Here you will find Williamsburg or take the "L" right into NYC which will take about 25 minutes total to Union Square. Inside you will find a queen size bed and full size futon. There is also a dedicated office space with big desk and executive chair for those who need to work. Of course cable, internet and wifi connected. Fully equipped kitchen and dining table to seat 4. Cable TV w/ plenty of channels to watch! The apartment can sleep 4 with 2 on the queen

name: Studio Loft in EV Townhouse
space: Charming loft-like studio w/ exposed brick, high ceilings in a pre-war townhouse. This fully furnished apartment features a double bed and convertible Room & Board sofabed. The kitchen is fully stocked for cooking a full meal, even though we are located in the heart of downtown, just a 5 minute walk to Whole Foods and within a 2-block radius of dozens of highly-rated, popular restaurants including Ippudo NY, Momofuku, The Smith, Kanoyama, Apiary, Graffiti Food & Wine Bar, and Motorino. We own (and reside in) this historic building located on a beautiful tree-lined East Village street.  This is a fully renovated and newly furnished large airy studio apartment on the parlour level in a pre-war brick townhouse. This apartment features exposed brick walls and high ceilings. Everything you need is provided from linens and towels to high speed Internet. Located in the East Village with Union Square, including the Greenmarket, just steps away so this is close to most subway lines. This locati

name: Spacious 1-bedroom in Ditmas Park
space: So much space in New York City is hard to find! A roomy entryway, large living room/dining room, full eat-in kitchen, and bright bedroom make this the perfect home away from home. Also includes wireless internet and laundry in basement. The television has a DVD player and Roku streaming box with Netflicks and Hulu. The large bedroom has a double bed and if you need to sleep more than two people, the couch in the living room pulls out to be a second double bed.

name: Gorgeous Apt Heart of West Villlage
space: Hello! This is a gut renovated and spacious one bedroom in the heart of truly the best neighborhood in New York City. Nestled on a beautiful cobblestone block (West 12th Street between West 4th and 8th Avenue), you will walk out every day feeling like you're on a movie set...complete with incredible bars, restaurants and shopping right at your doorstep. The apartment is on the 4th floor of an elevator building with laundry in the basement, fully equipped with a flatscreen TV, cable, Roku (streaming Netflix, etc.), high-speed WiFi, and Westin Heavenly Bed.  It gets great natural light while still being extremely quiet and great for sleeping (a rarity in NYC).   If you've never been to the West Village I truly cannot say enough about it.  One street is more charming and quintessentially New York than the next, and that's not even to mention the incredible food and nightlife.  In my opinion it's by far the best way to experience New York. The apartment is located within walking distance o

name: Sunny Apartment in Brooklyn
space: Modern, airy, and bright, apartment with high ceilings and tons of natural light.  Top floor of a semi detached building, with 2 bedrooms, an office, living room and kitchen.  Super cool Brooklyn neighborhood with excellent restaurants and bars that have a brilliant atmosphere but with prices that won't break the bank.  The apartment is one block away from the R train Subway line which will get you to the rest of New York City very easily. You can get to Manhattan in less than 30 minutes. The smaller room has a proper full size bed big enough for two people with closet for hanging clothes and also storage space.  There is another very large bedroom which is ideal for a business traveller, with a large desk, bookshelf and chest of drawers. This room also has a queen size bed, which provides plenty of room for two people to share. There is one bathroom with a power shower that is shared for all guests. name: NY Winter Vacation
space: This is a perfect vacation spot for a family who want to come to NY and enjoy the city whilst having all the comforts of home.  Two bedrooms are available for Xmas holiday. There is a shared kitchen, bathroom and living room.   Come early (December 11th-20th for a cheaper rate) and stay for Xmas and New Years Eve. Celebrate by walking to one of the many restaurants, cafes, bars or subway to Manhattan one block away!

name: 1 Pvt. Room in Upper West Manhattan
space: I have available a 15' x 9" (135 sq. ft.) bedroom equipped with a Queen-size bed, dresser drawer, desk and cable television. This bedroom is part of a 3 bedroom apartment.  All guests have access to the kitchen, living room, dining room and full bathroom (toilet, sink, bathtub, and shower).   Across the street from Saint Nicholas Park, this apartment is surrounded by notable landmarks in every direction. Whether it's the infamous Strivers' Row, or the architecturally unique Hamilton Heights area once owned by Alexander Hamilton, or the historic City College of New York City campus, or even the legendary Apollo Theater, no landmark is more than a 15-minute walk away. Public transit (buses, trains) is available one block away, and taxi cabs can be hailed in front of the building.  JFK International Airport is about a half-hour away by car or an hour and a half by train. There are delis and restaurants of various cuisines located throughout the area, as well as the typical city spots like

name: Centrally located and spacious apt.

Two blocks from Grand Central Terminal near 4/5 train, 7 train, S train and Metro North.  Citi bike location across the street. On same block as Tudor City and Tudor City Park.  Across from the beautiful Ford Foundation building and near the UN and lots of security on the block as a result.  Close to most tourist sites and shopping areas. You can walk to Times Square, Empire State building and Rockefeller Center.  Some of the best shopping can be found nearby on Madison Ave and Fifth Avenue. space: Thank you and Well Come! A charming, homey apartment on the top floor of my brownstone on a quiet, safe, tree-lined,  street across from a park and 2 trains! name: Homey, Clean studio- East Village
space: Hi traveler:)  Welcome to my clean, cozy studio in the heart of the East Village. The location is incredibly convenient- a 5-15 minute walk to Soho, Chinatown, Nolita and the Lower East Side. See transportation info. below. My house is on a quiet street (not avenue) on the second floor (just 1 flight of stairs) of a small building. I have wonderful, quiet neighbors and the apartment is at the back of the building so no street noise. My bed is delicious and sleeps 2 and I have a couch that can sleep 1- as long as they're not tall.   The studio space is divided with a curtain so that the sleeping and living spaces can be somewhat separate. The apartment has a separate bathroom and kitchen. The kitchen is bigger than your average studio kitchen with plenty of space for cooking.  On my block, you will find 2 bodegas, a laundromat, and a few great restaurants. The greater, walkable surrounding area has all your heart could desire in an authentic, non-touristy neighborhoods including amazing

name: Quiet Private Room over looks yard
space: I love meeting new people and telling them all my favorite spots in this charming neighborhood.  You will make yourself at home in your Beautiful Private Room. It overlooks the back garden, so there's no street noise. Your comfortable full sized clean bed with fresh linens and towels will be waiting for you. Drawers and closet to put your things.  Cute common area, free wi-fi, kitchen and shared bathroom. I love my charming hardwood floor apartment! I have lived all over Brooklyn and find this location perfect.  Close to fun exciting nightlife- also super safe quiet tree lined block. Great restaurants, cafes and bars.  It is located between social/fun McCarren Park and beautiful McGoldrick park. Just 20 minutes from Manhattan. The closest subway is The Nassau G which is about 5 mins from the (Website hidden by Airbnb) next closest train is the Bedford L train, 10min walk.

name: Williamsburg Loft!! Bedford L 1blk!
space: Its TRUE, the Best location to stay in NYC is here in vibrant Williamsburg. Pop into Manhattan {L train subway station one block away} in five mins! -walk all day in the canyons of Manhattan- then escape back to this little village at the end...enjoy the evening light, relax, chill and see if you can keep up with all there is to do right here at night with hundreds of local restaurants and bars! And of course stay in my Large bright and sunny open loft-space; with custom kitchen, queen bed, big bathroom, rainfall shower and lots of storage. Eclectic design is tasteful and the south facing light and sunsets are amazing. The space has old wood floors and wood posts construction- was formerly an industrial building- it is very unique, not cookie cutter new construction like so many other Williamsburg apts. space: 6 bedrooms total  with a basement in 2 family owner occupied private house with 3 private entries (3 bedroom + 3 bedroom + basement).  All X-buses to Manhattan and local bus to Staten Island ferry are across the street from home. 5 min drive or 10 min bus ride will take you to the nearest subway station in Brooklyn (Bay Ridge). Free public ocean beach with life guards and all beach amenities is across the street from home. 6 restaurants and 4 Deli/grocery stores within 5-10 min walking distance. Can be rented partially in any combination (3 bedroom + 3 bedroom, 3 bedroom + basement bedroom or all together). Rates below are for the rental of the whole property. NOT A PARTY PLACE.  This house is located in the very quiet residential area, and no loud parties allowed on premises with respect to the neighbors. Primary renter must be over 25.  This place allows you to accommodate a large group of people without sacrificing privacy of each immediate family.  Its unique location allows you to

name: Couch to surf on
space: If you need a place in NYC, I have an open couch in the middle of the city nicely located between Bryant Park, Times Square, and Herald Square. It's next to all the shopping and tourist destinations you need!

name: Private Room in Manhattan
space: When I host, I give guests my private bedroom for the duration of their visit. I furnished my living room like a studio apartment, so other than having to occasionally get into my closet, the bedroom space will be all yours! My one bedroom apartment is located in Inwood, the northern portion of Manhattan. I live across the street from the 1 train, and just a few blocks from the A train, and BOTH will take you directly into Times Square and the rest of Manhattan.   I do have a medium-sized dog, Pakkun, who is extremely friendly, loves people, and is generally pretty chill at home. I keep my place very clean, but if you have allergies, I recommend that you consider looking elsewhere for a place to stay.

name: Cozy Private Room in LIC
space: Room for rent in excellent area 3 stops from Grand Central, close to most subway lines. Great for a short trip to NY. Small sunny room, wooden floors, 1 shared bathrooms, small kitchen, artsy style. At your arrival you will have clean sheets and towels. There is no room service available. But there is laundry in the building. I am a freelance photographer art teacher with an irregular schedule mostly out in my studio close by. Near La Guardia community College, MoMA Ps1, vibrant neighborhood. The area is full of new hotels, few restaurants, and bars. Train 7, N, W to Queensboro Plaza Train R, E, M to Queens Plaza

name: Railroad style Chelsea one bedroom
space: Railroad style one bedroom with large kitchen, separate dining room, spacious living room and lots of light. Steps away from the entrance of the Highline and in the middle of all of the great galleries in Chelsea. Quiet neighborhood with great restaurants and walking distance to Chelsea market so a great place to cook if that's your thing.

name: Cozy and nice room near Manhattan!!
space: Hey there -WELCOME TO MY PLACE- I live in Astoria - New York - my 2 bedrooms apart is very comfortable,clean and cozy.The bedroom has space enough for two guests.  A confortable full sized bed, with fresh towels and bed set, clean room with tv, air conditioning, heating and space for luguages and a closet, good for couples or a single person.You will be able to use the kitchen, bathroom, refrigerator, coffee maker, etc... I keep the apart clean and organized. I am at the 4th floor and no elevator,a good exercise for your legs ;-). name: Beautiful duplex loft with Skylight
space: Spacious light and airy duplex in Tribeca with north and south windows and five skylights. 1600 square feet of space includes a large living room, dining room, and well-equipped kitchen, a sauna, a Jacuzzi, 3 bedrooms, a contemporary art collection on the walls and antique furniture. 16-ft ceilings in the living room, wood floors, a contemporary art collection on the walls and antique furniture. There is stereo and TV as well as central AC on the ground level and a very efficient one in the upper level bedroom...and a portable one in the smaller bedroom, which has a new double bed in it. Includes air conditioning.  This developing neighborhood is one of New York City's trendy hot spots. Residents find specialty shops, including a wonderful French Bakery, excellent restaurants, galleries and boutiques scattered throughout the area. It is fun to explore and Soho is right up the block. China Town is to the East, South Street Seaport, Battery Park, Statue of Liberty, Staten Island Ferry an

name: "The Country" & the NYC Waterfront!
space: Perfect location on the Northside Williamsburg, Brooklyn Waterfront  scene, my place is a wood beamed classic, with hard wood floors and restored original brick wall. It is the top floor of a 1894 restored house on a very nice semi residential street block. The nicely outfitted place, "the country in the sky" as I refer to it, has a beautiful totally functional "Peerless" antique prewar stove for cooking, generous amounts of pots, a wood burning fire place and a full size refrigerator in the kitchen. The feelings are cozy, warm, cabin like yet elegant. The kitchen and living room are in the same open area. There is a dining room table that seats 4, a beautiful brand new couch that folds down to become a very comfortable queen size bed that sleeps 2. Beyond the living area is the large master bedroom with a queen size bed that sleeps 2 with a large antique dresser and 2 riverside windows. Off the master bedroom is a large tiled classic bathroom with an antique skylight and large tub wit

name: LOVELY 2BR West Village Apt!
space: Amazing tree-lined location in the HEART of the LIVELY center of the West Village!! Impeccably designer decorated, LARGE cozy escape! Washington Square Park is 3 blocks away, Union Square is 6 blocks away, Soho is 4 blocks away! Best location in NYC!  Amazing tree-lined location in the HEART of the lively center of the West Village!! Impeccably designer decorated, LARGE cozy escape! Live like a real New Yorker in our beautiful central West Village neighborhood apartment. Rent this beautiful furnished 2-bedroom apartment by the day, week, or month. name: Luxury Tribeca 1bdr in Doorman Bldg
space: This is a beautiful one-bedroom designed and owned by a high-end NYC interior designer and her financier husband, in an amenity-filled, safe doorman building in super cool and chic Tribeca!  The unit is approx 800 sq ft. large one-bedroom, with a wide hallway, hardwood floors, modern kitchen, 50" "Smart" TV with premium cable, Netflix, and On-Deman movie channels, and squeaky clean bathroom.  The apartment features high end furniture from Restoration Hardware, a beautiful dining area, fully-stocked kitchen,and Tempur-Pedic memory King size bed with Hotel Collection sheets and down pillows. name: sunny private room in dwntn EV 2BR

This is a downtown nyc street-side nyc apartment,  so I can't promise you a quiet fortress of solitude. If you're a light sleeper and annoyed by traffic noises and occasional sirens, etc, you might want to bring ear plugs. Also, street lights and city lights mean its never really very dark, and southern exposure means sunny mornings; if you sleep with blackout shades you might want to bring an eye mask. Thanks for taking a look and please contact me if you would like to stay.

name: 3 separate bedrooms - Lovely loft on the L train
space: It's hard to describe! Entire apartment available off the Morgan stop on the L train (it takes literally ten seconds to walk to the subway stop), lots of light, excellent view of Manhattan skyline and walls of windows. It used to be a sewing factory and has the original floors, exposed brick, and high ceilings. There is also roof access which is magical.  The area is called Bushwick (real estate agents call it "East Williamsburg" ha ha) and is the Morgan stop on the L train, super cool. It's industrial and has graffiti everywhere but there are places to hang out- coffee shops, Roberta's Pizza, Momo's sushi, a new ramen place... it also takes about 15 minutes on the subway to get to Union Square to whatever you need in Manhattan. **Note** this is NOT country living! There is a cement factory across the street that gets going in the day and there are city sounds and street noise for sure. It's not a rural yoga retreat experience... name: Big and open 3 stops from the city
space: Hi:) We are a couple subletting our apt in Central location of Astoria  The apt is 750sqft, spacious, lots of light, 4 min from the subway, 10 min subway ride to the city, street parking, lots of cafes and restaurants (which Astoria is known for!) includes Internet, Heating, Ceiling fan, kitchen appliances, TV and cable. There is an extra air mattress for more people!

name: NYC Historic District Posh Studio
space: Single/double occupancy preferred! We may accept extra guests up to 4 people with extra charge.  Beautiful studio in the Historic District in Jackson Heights, NY.  This area was designed after the British Concept of the Garden Cities, and it is a beautiful, safe and culturally diverse bustling area.  Our place comes fully furnished with all the amenities you need to feel right at home. Nice decorations and electronics make this place a comfortable and convenient choice for the savvy traveler. It comes with Cable TV (HBO/Showtime), VCR/DVD player ,an amazing queen size bed, and LCD 50" TV. It has wireless Internet/cable. Parking is street parking if you dare to rent a car in NYC or if you are driving into the city from nearby cities.  But your car will be safe and sound here, as long as you pay attention to the parking street regulations.  There is no need for a car since most subway lines stop about 2 to 4 blocks from the apartment.  We are 20 min to Pen Station and Time Square by trai

name: Sunny 2BR Penthouse - HUGE Terrace
space: This is what Airbnb is all about. There are no hotel suites like this. You can't even get an apartment like this - I grabbed the last one! But I'll share :) A sunny, spacious 2BR penthouse apartment, hip but warm and welcoming, in the heart of the Lower East Side, perfectly situated on Ludlow Street between Grand and Hester, a short walk from everything fun, but on a quiet, sleepy block. Action when you want, instant peace and quiet when you've had enough.  There are more cool bars and restaurants within a 5 minute walk than you could visit in a month, plus the bustle of Chinatown, for endless adventures. When you're ready to take a break, you're above it all, in a modern building, looking over all of NYC from an enormous, one-of-a-kind outdoor space - it must be seen to be believed. Read the reviews! About me: I'm a lawyer and engineer and I work for a start-up here in NYC. I go out of town occasionally for the weekend, or for longer on vacation, and while I'm gone, this wonderful apa

name: LUXURY BROOKLYN LOFT STEPS TO PARK & SUBWAY
space: Luxurious 1000sq+ foot garden floor loft. Sunlight floods in from the backyard and lights up the gourmet kitchen (stainless steel appliances, Wolf stove and oven, dishwasher), beautifully designed interiors.  Check out NYTIMES article on the neighborhood called: ....Windsor Terrace: Less Way Station, More Destination.... Steps away from the F and G trains and ample space for two but an additional small person could also use sofa or twin size air mattress. Huge loft-like space  - Open floor plan (i.e. true loft) - New Beautiful Kitchen and Bathroom - Wi Fi Internet Included  - 10 foot high open glass doors onto backyard - Half block from Subway (F and G) - Half block from 2 great restaurants & cafes and more just a few blocks further - 2 blocks from Prospect Park! - King size very firm bed with luxury linens  - hardwood floors  - exposed brick wall  - AC included - 2 ceiling fans - dishwasher in the kitchen  - plates, glasses, wine glasses, linen, towels, etc. are all included  - No TV,

name: Classic, Impeccable SoHo Loft
space: Classic, well appointed loft in the HEART of SoHo. This 3,000 square foot loft is located On Broadway just between Houston and Prince St in SoHo. It is in the heart of all the action, but also serves as a sanctuary where you can find refuge from it too. This Loft is well decorated, and lived in... It will feel like home, and will also feel extremely exotic. Most say it feels like a movie set, but a very comfortable one! If you are looking to stay in your dream loft in the heart of SoHo NYC, this is your spot!

name: 1 Private Bedroom / East Village
space: Flat is conveniently located in the heart of the East Village, Manhattan - 14th Street on 2nd Ave. Electricity & WIFI is included. This is a 5 day minimal sublease to 8 weeks max. Amenities: 2nd Floor Flat - conveniently next to the Lift / Elevator 1 Small Private BDRM - Bedroom has a TWIN size {great quality} bed. A writing desk is in the room and also draw space and closet space for your belongings.  I provide clean sheets and towels, along with toiletries such as soap, shampoos and conditioner. I have a blow dryer and curling iron.  Small {shared} clean Kitchenette - you are welcome to use and please do help yourself to any food that is stored in the fridge.  1 {shared} Bathroom - very narrow, long, roomy, and very clean. Laundry room is in the building {on same floor - NOT FREE - you must pay using your "cc"} Super on premises {he's very attentive and gets the work done quickly - on point!} Free WiFi in the Unit No rodents or roaches at all in the flat. Very clean and well kept, co

name: Mitchell Manor
space: Beautiful one bedroom apartment located in a historic Brooklyn Brownstone neighborhood. Prime location 20 minutes from Manhattan. One block from C train, 2 1/2 block from A train. 10 minutes from Barclay Center, we are also conveniently located to a multitude of restaurants and shops. Additionally, there is a grocery store conveniently located around the corner from the property. Apartment has hardwood floors throughout the bedroom features a regal sleigh bed and a slate fireplace. The room was built for relaxation. The kitchen is fully equip with all the necessities. The living room features a queen sofa bed couch, love-seat, flat screen TV and coffee table. The bathroom has an antique claw foot tub and petal stool sink. PLEASE NOTE:  7 nights (weekly rate) $800. Monthly Rate (28 Nights) $2800.     Refundable Security deposit $250.  Check-in time is 3pm check-out is 11am.  Should you need to check-in before 3pm there may be an additional charge.  Check-in before noon is an additional

name: Studio with Bedroom Alcove
space: Furnished. Small but nice - has character.  Exposed brick wall, polished hardwood floors. Double bed. Clean sheets and towels. Wifi. Compact but fully functional kitchen.  Hair dryer, umbrellas, maps available for guests to use. Note: This is a walk-up apartment, on the 5th floor.   The apartment is for couples or very good friends who want to share a double bed.

name: Super Cute Upper West Side Apt!!
space: This is a cute cozy 2 bedroom apartment :) it is the only apartment located on the 1st floor so there are no stairs to climb once you get here! I live in one bedroom and you will rent the other room. The room for rent has 2 twin size beds in a loft style room. (PLEASE NOTE: the room is quite small. it sleeps 2 but there is not a ton of extra floor space)  *please view pics* You will have the room, and we will share the bathroom and kitchen. There is no common area so feel free to sit at the kitchen table whenever you like:-D There is Wifi but there is not a television. I look forward to meeting you soon:-D

name: Elegant Stuyvesant Heights Retreat
space: * English-language description is followed by write-up in French & Spanish * Un texte franÌ¤ais suit celui en anglais * Una descripciÌ_n en espaÌ±ol sigue las otras THE LODGING Gorgeous two-bedroom parlor floor apartment with 10-ft ceilings in a renovated and restored 1800Ûªs brownstone on a quiet block of historic Stuyvesant Heights.  The apartment is very private and occupies the entire parlor floor of the house.  It offers a grand living room with original carved wooden window trimming and the original parquet floor beautifully preserved; a complete kitchen with plenty of cabinet space; and two bedrooms equipped collectively with three full-sized beds ÛÒ an individual bed in one room, and a bunkbed in the other.  The bathroom is equipped with a tub and shower and generous cabinet space.  Closet space is ample, augmented with plentiful overhead suitcase storage space.  The place is fully furnished with tables, comfortable seating, and good lighting.  Kitchen is stocked with coffee maker,

name: Sunny Modern Studio in Chelsea
space: Hello! Our studio apartment is on the top floor of a walk-up building in Chelsea. Apartment: -Fully furnished with double bed and full-size futon -Full bathroom with tub shower -Full kitchen equipped with new appliances -SIXTH FLOOR WALK-UP (no elevator) -Clean and nicely decorated -High ceilings (12 ft) -Five windows, lots of natural light, nice view -High-speed wireless Internet -Heat and Air Conditioning Location: -Beautiful, tree-lined block in the heart of Chelsea -Near restaurants & bars, art galleries, the High Line, 5th Avenue shopping, movie theaters, Starbucks, banks, five markets including Whole Foods, delis, bakeries and convenience stores, and many laundry/dry cleaning options. -Subways: 1, A, C, E, L, F, M Chelsea is very centrally located within close walking distance of Times Square, the Empire State Building, Bryant Park, Greenwich Village, Meatpacking District, SoHo, East Village, Flatiron, and Hells Kitchen.  We would love to answer your questions - please feel free

name: Airy Bedroom in Lefferts Garden
space: This spacious bedroom has a closet to store all of your belongs. The apartment is shared with me, a graduate student and my friendly shih tzu.

name: PRIVATE BATH/TONS OF SUNLIGHT/SAFE
space: Beautiful private studio with in tons of Sunlight,  Private entrance. Located in one of the safest Bronx neighborhoods.   Walk to Botanical Gardens, Bronx Zoo and Bronx ParkÛ_..  Minutes from the Fordham University Bronx Campus , Famous Arthur Avenue little Italy and Pelham Parkway. Two blocks from the Subway (Train 2 and 5) and Express Bus to Manhattan.  Top Kitchen Appliances and  wood cabinets, granite counter top  WiFi Available 3rd Floor Apartment Closet in the Room There is TV which picks up about 15 Digital Channels in the room. If you happen to be a Die Hard Soccer Fan and must watch Barcelona-Manchester United game well there is always the TV located in the Living room..... If the Yankees are playing at the same time .. then we have a problem...well I will let you use my iPad instead. Walking distance to Arthur Avenue, Botanical Gardens, Bronx Zoo. I am very Flexible with Check in check out time.  Email me any inquiries you may have . NO VISITORS

name: Cozy Soho Studio Loft Apt Bleecker
space: Charming soho studio loft apartment located in prime location on BLEECKER ST in Soho/Noho, NYC. Southern exposure with GREAT light and view. Apartment is very cozy and nicely decorated with high ceilings. Original hardwood floors. The apartment itself has a living room with sofa bed, desk, cable tv, full bath, and kitchenette. Fully furnished with loft bed upstairs.  Right in the heart of Noho/Soho. Many options for subway. Right across the street is the 6 Train, BDFM Train. 2 blocks away on Prince st is the N,R Train. 360 degrees from other great neighborhoods. 10 minute walk north to Union Square. Going east 10 minute walk to East Village and 5 minute walk to Greenwich village/NYU. Washington Square Park is 10 minute walk. Super markets and pharmacy are around the corner. Brown bag Laundry is across the street- they deliver. This is great location surrounded by lots of famous restaurants & bars and tons of shopping! Happy to give tips and suggestions about the neighborhood and other

name: Room: King size bed + private bath
space: Hi there! Room Details: - 1 large bedroom with a King Size bed, WIFI, TV, AC for the summer and heating in the winter, several lamps, desk table and chair, and a closet - 1 private bathroom (not shared with roommates) - Large Living room and kitchen, shared with roommates (a guy from New Jersey, a girl from California, and a girl from Switzerland/Cuba)  - Second floor apartment Couples are welcome! Drop me an e-mail if you are interested, even if you cannot stay the full period.  Good luck with your search! P.S.: Just to be transparent: All reviews for the place before April 2015 were for a different yet very similar room in a different place that was close-by nevertheless. The room now is a little further from the train, but in a nicer and quieter area.

name: ULTRA LUXURY DESIGNER GLASS LOFT IN THE SKY.
space: This is the ultimate New York living experience with soaring views from a high floor, high ceiling, glass  loft like one bedroom space perched on a two corners overlooking Times Square, from over 42 stories high. This is a luxury apartment complete with world class decor and artworks from around the world. This is a rare listing for a stunning luxury one bad apartment in one of the newest, tallest and most prestigious buildings and at the heart of Manhattan. It's above the busyness of Times Square and Penn Station, but so high up it's a serene glass loft to view the world with soaring views over Manhattan. ----------- PLEASE READ ALL OF THIS BEFORE WRITING TO ME. Not because there are any hidden things, but because it will answer most of the questions people have. The Apartment. name: Light-Filled Prospect Height Apt.
space: Beautiful, modern one bedroom apartment with tons of light, an elevator, cable TV, Wi-Fi, dishwasher, washer/dryer in apartment, and it's just steps away from Vanderbilt Avenue. Enjoy all of the restaurants, bars, cafes close by. Also close to the Brooklyn Museum, Prospect Park, Botanical Gardens, LIRR, 2/3 B/C/Q trains and Barclays Center. Also direct elevator access to a roof deck with Manhattan views, including the Empire State Building. Sofa turns into a large bed quite easily. All towels, linens, and kitchen utensils are here.

name: Clean Bright Midtown Studio by Park
space: Hi!  Adorable, clean, bright studio in a Midtown East DOORMAN building for rent! Great price! Especially if you're looking to stay in the heart of Manhattan.  Summer is a great time to be in the city ÛÒ and my precious apartment is a perfect place to be when you're not out indulging in NYC.  Very centrally located. Cool, quiet neighborhood. Full compact kitchen w/dishwasher, nice bathroom, extra-comfy full-size bed, record player, closet space, free wi-fi, flat screen TV with cable, Keurig coffee maker (with K-cups!), library, hair dryer, clean towels, clean sheets. Perfect for one person (maybe two)!  Highlights:  10-minute walk to Central Park.  Whole Foods 1 block over.  1.5 blocks to N,Q,R & 4,5,6 trains.  1 - 2 blocks to Starbucks, Bloomingdales, H&M, movie theaters & so much more.  Nice stroll to the East River.  Not too far from Columbus Circle, Rockefeller Center, Times Square, the Empire State Building, Radio City, Broadway, MoMA, the Met, etc.  The apartment is super-close to

name: Colorful LES bedroom
space: The room: This sweet little bedroom boasts lots of personality. Aqua walls, a vintage wire bed with full-size memory foam mattress, and colorful furniture make this room a happy oasis. There is a window overlooking Ludlow street, so you can fall asleep to the sounds of the city. The apartment: This is a real 2 bedroom apartment with a living room, a kitchen and a bathroom with shower and toilet (no sink in the bathroom). All very colorful, the whole apartment looks like one giant Pinterest board. The living room has 2 couches and a TV. The kitchen has a table with 4 chairs as well as the usual--oven, microwave, refrigerator, etc. The building used to be a tenement so the layout provides for a larger apartment than others in the area.

name: Your OWN Private Garden Apartment
space: Hello!  My studio apartment is available throughout the year when I'm away for work. Perfect for someone looking for a quiet place to call home on your vacation. A spacious, beautiful studio garden apartment in the historic, tree-lined neighborhood of Clinton Hill Brooklyn. The apartment has sole access to the backyard. The main room has been furnished in such a way to include both a living space. There is a full bed with plenty of blankets and fresh linens for your stay. The subway is less than a block away, making it easy to get into the city in less than 20 minutes. The kitchen is fully stocked and perfect for making breakfast or dinner if you want to stay in. Otherwise, there's a wide selection of amazing restaurants and bars minutes away. Subway Details 1/2 a block from the G Clinton/Washington Station 4 blocks from the C Clinton Washington Station 7 minute walk to Atlantic Terminal (2,3,4,5,B,D,N,Q, R trains and LIRR)

name: Zen Holiday Getaway
space: Quiet, 1bdrm Apt on 5th floor of elevator building available during the Holidays .  High-Speed Internet, 47" flat screen Smart TV with 3D BluRay player, separate kitchen, powerful shower right in the heart of Brooklyn. (Right on the border of Clinton Hill and Bed-Stuy) Straight friendly.   Apt. can easily accommodate two people, but no more then two.  There is a 10% discount for a female writer/artist who needs a quiet place to write.  Two desk spaces.  One looks east, the other looks into a mirror where you can contemplate your ideas and smile at your insanity and wisdom.   But whether one or two persons, this apartment is a great getaway for vacation travel.   There are amazing coffee shops, a vegan bakery and restaurants within blocks of the apartment.  Popular YMCA gym right around the corner!  I'll even throw in a couple of guest passes.  Spin AND Yoga studios minutes walk away. A train express and C train local very close walking distance and will have you in the city within 20 m

name: Brooklyn Charm in Clinton Hill
space: Located on a wide, tree and brown stone lined street in Clinton Hill, Brooklyn back this space is very close to the C, G and A trains and a few short blocks to Pratt, Brooklyn Flea Market, Fort Greene, BAM and farmers market .  The well lit space has new rugs, a large closet, faux leather sofa bed, desk and its own private entrance. As part of a spacious one bedroom with its own, garden level entrance this space comes with full access to kitchen, bathroom and lovely back yard with garden and gas grill. Great hip location on a great block. The space includes wireless internet service, a large closet and access to bathroom / shower and back yard as well gas gill. Smoking is permitted in the yard and guests are welcome.  Kitchen use is available at no extra cost. Private entrance to garden level shared only by you and me.  I am open to one, two and three month stays. Price is negotiable of course.  Car service to La Guardia and Kennedy airports gets you there in half hour or less. Space i

name: Perfect Midtown Apt E. 50th St
space: Friends!   Welcome to our listing. _______________________________________ This apartment is a treasure! We are happy to host you in our  very cozy and clean apartment, free of any personal belongings or nicknacks. Each bedroom has a comfortable high quality full size mattress [double bed.] Each bedroom also has windows, ceiling fan, speaker to plug into your music source, and closet with 2 sliding doors. The living room has a sofa that folds open to make an additional double bed. The apartment has a small kitchenette with full stainless steel fridge and  electronic stove top which is not the easiest to use.  There are hundreds of affordable restaurants in the neighborhood! One of the apartment's best features is that it has a washing machine  and dyer for doing your own laundry, this is rare in Manhattan apartments! There is very high speed Wifi. space: WELCOME TO THE BRONX as featured on CNN's Anthony Bourdain's : Parts Unknown Season 04 Episode 02!  Hello Guest, Thank you for visiting our listing. This listing is for a Private room in our parents three bedroom house. You will share 1 1/2 bathrooms with my parents.

name: UES Manhattan Quiet Nest 1 Bdrm
space: Delightful one bedroom apartment with double bed and queen/sofa sleeper. WiFi and TV and fully equipped kitchen and domestic phone included in rate.  Apartment supplied with lush towels and crisp fresh linens.  Minimum of 5 nights rental.  Great Subway & bus connections.( 3 blocks from subway and 1 block from bus-stop).   Totally Safe Neighborhood. This is a one flight walk up building .. no elevator. Great food shops and restaurants. Within walking distance from Central Park and Museum Mile and two Cinemas. Perfect place to explore Manhattan and Museums.

name: Private 2-Bedroom. Cozy and quiet.
space: This 2-Bedroom apartment that has everything you need for a comfortable stay in New York. The apartment is quiet, bright, clean, and cozy!  The living room has a comfortable leather couch, 42" flat screen TV, a custom built home theater system, Apple TV. I do not have cable TV, but you can use my Netflix account to watch TV shows and movies.  You will have access to the roof deck with amazing views of Manhattan. If you're a smoker, this would be a place for it, since there's no smoking inside the apartment. I have a cat, that wonÛªt be there while your stay, but it might affect you if youÛªre allergic to cats. The apartment is located in Astoria, which is only 15 min away from midtown Manhattan by subway. There are 2 subway stops 5 minutes away - N/Q and M/R trains. Astoria is a fantastic, safe neighborhood with endless restaurants and a great vibe. Within 3 blocks radius you have close to a hundred restaurants, including French, Thai, Greek, Spanish, Italian, Japanese and really any oth

space: This apartment has a very special layout, and is in an awesome location! name: Dreamers Sanctuary ! Artist Abode
space: Located in the heart of Lower East Side in an old gothic building,this apartment is filled with light and character, with a spanish/moroccan charm. It is a Studio/1bedroom and accommodates 2 people Comfortably. Facing away from the streets it is incredibly quiet (for NY) and a cozy, perfect place to come home and relax after spending a busy day out and about in the city. Its quaint and simple in its entirety  and perfect if your looking for a space in the thick of it. Located on Ludlow and Houston your a 10 min walk to china town and East Village, 15 to little Itally and Soho, 7 min cab to Williamsburg.This is an old apartment so you can expect the character that comes with it. If your staying long term it gets dusty fast so you have to take care of it. It's not modern by any means it has hundreds of years worth of character. Not for the modern folk.
