name: 1 Bedroom Apartment in quiet area.
space: Renting out my apartment while I'm gone for the holidays. It is average sized 1br with private living room kitchen and bathroom. Queen size bed, nice bathroom comfortable sofa. Close to Manhattan but safe and very good food nearby. Perfect for 1-2 people visiting for the holidays.

name: Beautiful 3 bedroom apartment!!
space: And then the longer description... :) We are offering our beautiful guest apartment for your vacation home! It's a private guest apartment and you don't have to share it with anybody else during your stay (we will stay downstairs). PLEASE NOTE! ELECTRIC BILL is NOT INCLUDED in the monthly rental and will be about $100/EACH MONTHLY for tenants MORE THAN 28 days! (Not for shorter stays) THE APARTMENT: In the apartment there is one bigger bedroom with a queen sized bed (sleeps two) that is united with a smaller bedroom with a twin sized bed (sleeps one). These two bedrooms are next to each other and for example to go to the bathroom or to the kitchen from this small bedroom you would have to walk through the bigger bedroom. There is another small room on the other side of the apartment, right next to the living room, that has a full sized bed that sleeps up to two people. There is also a sofa bed in the living room that can sleep 1-2 people. There is a kitchen with basic pots, pans, plate

name: Art Lover's Abode Brooklyn
space: Are you looking for a beautiful, clean, quiet, safe, and fun place to stay? You'll have plenty of privacy at night where you will sleep on a comfy twin size sofa-bed in our living room. You'll have access to our balcony (for smokers), modern full kitchen, full bath, roof deck, and gym. It's a beautiful modern building. Share this apartment with my adult son, my boyfriend and our sweet friendly cat. This is a 2 bedroom apartment; we all have our own bedrooms, so you'll be alone in the living room at night. We are a quiet household & we all work full time, so we usually do not stay awake too late. Sometimes we work from home. Our walls are covered with art. There is work station for you to setup a laptop with access to a printer. We have wi-fi and Apple TV for streaming entertainment. Close to L, G, J/M trains and B60, B43 bus lines - 10 minutes to Manhattan. Plenty of grocers, coffee shops, bars, and restaurants. Near the shopping street Graham Avenue. (The sofa-bed fits one person but

name: Bed & Bathroom in Williamsburg Loft
space: For our guests, we have a large private bedroom with its own private bathroom in our gorgeous loft in the heart of the Southside of Williamsburg. The bed is a low platform and the  mattress is a Sleepy's Coolsense Posturepedic Memory Foam, California King size, extremely comfortable, and we provide clean towels and linens. We have a super fast WiFi connection, and you'll have your own 42" HDTV, full cable TV access,  BluRay Player with a huge indie film library available, and unlimited outgoing calls within the US and Canada.  Our loft overlooks Continental Army Plaza and is conveniently located between 3 train lines: J,M, Z at Marcy Ave.  L at Bedford Ave,  and G at Metropolitan Ave.  We are only 15 minutes away from Soho, the Village &  Union Square in Manhattan. We're also in very close walking distance to all types of restaurants, bars, shopping, and entertainment. A smart way to move around is by bicycle. Keep in mind that just across the street from our loft you will find a citib

name: Big Comfy Beds & Breakfast on the Deck
space: THIS IS A FULLY FURNISHED & EQUIPPED HOME Fully air conditioned & every bedroom has a separate AC Very Large fully equipped kitchen 2 Full Bathrooms Laundry Room Private Deck Grilling Patio Private Fenced Yard Private Driveway holds 3 cars Unrestricted Street Parking  The home is located in lovely Bayside, Queens, New York City on a quiet, tree-lined, one block long street.  The Driveway parks three cars plus there is unrestricted street parking.  We have a lovely, landscaped private back yard and deck, outdoor table & chairs and a grilling patio with an outdoor Brinkmann Smoker 'n' Grill. Free internet. Piano in living room. Queen Beds in all three bedrooms and the Living Room Sofa opens to a fourth Full/Queen size bed.  This listing excludes the attic, owners storage, one of two closets in the Master Bedroom and the basement.  Outdoors: Deck, backyard, porch, driveway Guests normally have two or three parking spots in the driveway The home features a large gourmet kitchen with a semi

name: Brand New, Boutique Brooklyn Condo
space: Enjoy a unique boutique condominium in Downtown Brooklyn/Vinegar Hill!  Open the door into the large livingroom with a wall of windows from floors to ceiling providing amazing light.  Just steps to the Manhattan and Brooklyn Bridge, this 2 bedroom condo is close to every train- N, R, Q, 2, 3, A, C, 4, 5, and only one stop to Manhattan, and close to great Brooklyn neighborhoods- Fort Greene, Dumbo, Brooklyn Heights, Boerum Hill.  It is steps away from trendy shops, restaurants, Brooklyn Bridge Park, the Brooklyn Promenade, and the Barclay Arena.  Walk 5 minutes and you can stroll over the Brooklyn Bridge into downtown Manhattan. The master bedroom is well portioned with a queen size bed.  The second bedroom has a CB2 double bed futon, and is an entirely second private room. I recently added an air conditioner into the second bedroom to address concerns about it being hot in the summer. The apartment has all new energy efficient appliances, including a washer and dryer, recess lighting,

name: Family-friendly, Beautiful Brooklyn House
space: 3 separate rooms available, with 3 queen beds,  2 twin beds, crib, 2 extra twin mattresses.  Single family victorian home in beautiful hip Ditmas Park Brooklyn.  Large light rooms, private bathroom.  Quiet treelined block.  Eat in kitchen, living room with wood-fire stove for cosy nights and roasting marshmellows in winter, backyard and front porch for outdoor time.   Children welcome - we have 2 kids under the age of 10, so we have baby through big kid needs covered, lots of toys and games available.   1/2 block from subway (B/Q) line - 30 minutes to Union Square Manhattan, 10 minutes to Park Slope Brooklyn, walk to Cortelyou shops and restaurants.  International shopping and restaurants nearby (Latin, Turkish, Russian, Pakistani, Bangladeshi, Jewish, Middle Eastern, Bukharin, Tibetan, you name it!). Minutes to Prospect Park and Zoo, NY Aquarium, beaches and boardwalk, Brooklyn Children's Museum, Brooklyn Art Museum, Brooklyn Transit Museum, Brooklyn Botanic Garden, Carousel.

name: Designer apt. in Williamsburg, NYC
space: The apartment is located in the heart of Williamsburg in Brooklyn, close to trendy bars and restaurants. It is very spacious and has 4 different rooms. There is a bedroom with a queen size bed and there is a single sleeper sofa, so 3 people can sleep very comfortably.  The location is ideal for anybody visiting or working in New York. It is 3 blocks away from the 'Bedford L' station, which takes you in 10 minutes to Union Square, and about 25 minutes to Times Square. The 'G' is a 7 minute walk away, which connects you to Queens.  All around you will find many trendy and charming bars and restaurants with great food. There is tons of art and events in this area as well to experience. The apartment comes fully furnished and has everything you need:  linens, towels, dishes/cookware, flatscreen TV, hair dryer and complimentary wifi.

name: big loft in prime Williamsburg
space: Huge 1600 ft exposed brick wall industrial loft with lots of light only 3 blocks from the Bedford L train stop in Williamsburg, Brooklyn.  Our lovely apt has a big open kitchen, 2 bedrooms (1 king/ 1 full) 1 bathroom (amazing shower!), central a/c + heat and absolutely no noise from the streets ; ) We also have high speed Wifi, cable television and a movie projector that you can connect to your computer/ipad.  The neighborhood is only one subway stop away from Manhattan/East Village and is filled with trendy restaurants, cafes, galleries, shops and a lot of artists.  We can also offer an extra mattress for a 5th person at a small additional fee.

name: Adorable Midtown West Studio!
space: Enjoy my midtown west studio apartment (complete with doorman) for a steal of a price! There's a full sized fridge, huge bathroom, walking distance to groceries, laundry, and super cool restaurants and bars... Being a few blocks from the theatre district, it's ideal for entertainment folks in town for a gig or leisure!

name: Intimate 1BR Apt near Columbia Univ
space: ABOUT THE APARTMENT:  This beautiful, easily accessible and clean apartment is located Manhattan's Morningside Heights/West Harlem neighborhood close to Columbia University. The fully furnished, fourth floor walk-up apartment is great for a leisurely or sight-seeing trip to the city, due to the proximity to the subway. The 1 Subway line is a block from the apartment! The corner apartment unit with windows in every room, features a full kitchen (with a microwave and coffee maker), a living and dining space (with a couch and two person dining table) and a bedroom area with a queen size bed. PARKING:  Street parking is quite accessible in the neighborhood and easy, since street cleaning only happens twice a week.  AMENITIES:  Free wifi, great sound system you can connect your iPod or iPhone to but no TV. The apartment has everything you need for a fun NYC experience! Just contact me to get your trip started!

name: Huge Sunny Room With a View in Hamilton Heights
space: Very very Large Sunny private room in spacious apartment with wood floors, tall ceiling, large windows in pre-war building is available just in time for the perfect New York City vacation. Very convenient to city buses and trains, shops and restaurants. Shared bathroom with myself and one roommate only. If you don't like close quarters and need your space, this is the perfect place for you. This is perfect for a couple with plenty of room to spare.  Our building is located on Riverside Drive across from Riverside Park and Riverbank State Park in a safe neighborhood, convenient to public transportation: a few blocks to the #1 train which takes you to midtown, Times Square in 15 min, M11 bus stops across the street on Riverside Drive, M4 and M5 are one block up on Broadway. We have a large 24-hr bodega on the corner, shops on Broadway, one block up for all your needs (Supermarket, hardware store, phone stores, Duane Reade, Banks, ATMs, Burger King, McDonalds, local restaurants, bars, cof

name: Last-Minute Bookings 1-Bedroom Apt
space: you can rent my bedroom in a redone one bedroom apt. upper westside...elevator building...a couple of blocks from whole foods....2 blocks from westside market...and a great health store 'round the corner...food paradise..3 blocks from 96st. train...express and local stop...the apartment is uncluttered and clean...bedroom quiet and great for sleeping...long hallways separates bedroom from living area...bathroom next to (Website hidden by Airbnb) there is (Website hidden by Airbnb) night or more available....$90....last minute bookings are fine with me

name: Large Harlem condo, feel like a real New Yorker
space: Live like a real New Yorker and explore New York City starting with the coolest neighborhood!  Spacious and new apartment in an elevator building in historic Harlem. Master bedroom available for your use, with ensuite bathroom. Living room also features a wide leather couch, which can comfortably sleep a third person, and second full bathroom is also all yours! Families traveling with an infant or toddler are very welcome, and we can provide a crib and toys for your use if helpful. We love to cook and the apartment features a huge kitchen, Boos block, all stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, and everything you need to prepare food. There is a washer and dryer for your use, high-speed wifi, and Netflix. Fresh and soft towels and linens provided, as well as basic toiletries. If you like music and reading, please feel free to enjoy our record player and record collection, and anything off of our bookshelves! You will be walking distance to Strivers Row, St. Nicholas Park, City College,

name: Beautiful communal house Bushwick
space: A beautiful big room available to share with a great bunch of people in the late 20's. If you want a family away from home and a true NYC experience then this would be the place for you. We are also very gay friendly  It is only 15 minutes to Manhattan and 5 minutes to the funky Williamsburg. We are off the L train I am also an ESL teacher so my place would be perfect for students who are trying to learn English

name: Best location! Clean soho 1 bedroom
space: Cozy apartment in the heart of Nolita (Soho). Just steps away from the restaurants and boutiques in SOHO, Greewich Village, lower east side, Little Italy and Chinatown as well as easy access to Brooklyn.    1 Bedroom with a Queen size bed allows you to relax after a long day of exploring the city. The kitchen has a full refrigerator, oven & stove as well as a living space with a couch and 32 inch flat screen  television. Full closet with towels and sheets provided. The apartment is clean, has a fully equipped kitchen, cable TV (Cable), A/C, heat, and wireless internet and new mattress. You have the place to yourself-better than a hotel!  You will be minutes away from the 6 train, BDFV and NRW giving you fast and affordable transportation to all destinations in the city. The neighborhood has the best new restaurants and bars just steps away from my front door! Boutique shopping, people watching and exploring the neighborhood on foot are necessary. You will never want to leave!

name: Gorgeous Williamsburg Apt + balcony
space: Fully furnished, brand new 1 Bedroom apt in the heart of Williamsburg! Absolutely PERFECT for a couple looking to stay in NYC for a holiday. There's also an additional single bed/couch in the living room. Available December 16th - 30th The Apartment: very nice size (about 550 sq feet), with french doors opening up to a very beautiful balcony. It's tastefully decorated with a mix of dark wood and glass as well as designer furnitures. The apt is very clean and brand new with new appliances including a dishwasher, washer /dryer, central AC & heat, gas stove, microwave and big fridge (all Frigidaire brand).  A common roof top is accessible via 2 flights of stairs or elevator.  The Kitchen/dining room is spacious and comfortable with a glass table, designer chairs and open kitchen. The bedroom: very cosy and full of natural light coming from the glass door leading to the balcony. Furnished with a full size Summerfield bed, 2 chests of drawers and a massive mirror. The brick wall adds a lot

name: Gorgeous apt. steps from subway
space: huge sunny private room woth king sized bed. laundry in building. well behaved small dog ok w deposit

name: Room for rent in East Village
space: 1 medium-size bedroom in a 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom duplex apartment in the East Village. We share a living room, well-equipped kitchen, a huge roof deck, and WiFi. There is a laundry room and small, but usable gym downstairs. The apartment is a block from Tompkins Square park, there are cross-town and downtown buses within 3 blocks, and three major subway lines are a 15 minute walk away. The neighborhood has great bars, loads of parks and community gardens, a great assortment of restaurants, and easy access to grocery stores.

name: Bedford Loft, Williamsburg Prime
space: This beautiful loft is centrally located in the exciting neighborhood of Williamsburg. The surrounding area is home to a variety of restaurants, bars, music venues and is two blocks from the Bedford L stop. Within 10 minutes you can be in Union Square with access to all Manhattan has to offer. (There is also a ferry that can take you to Wall Street in under 10 minutes, and a car service across the street.) But why go to Manhattan when there is so much nearby! Whether you are looking for fine dining or something more casual, there are many options all within 1-2 blocks. A quiet plant tank provides the apartment with the soft sound of running water, and the 50 different house plants, each chosen for its ability to purify air, create an almost garden like feel to this urban oasis. There are three private bedrooms each with their own queen sized bed. Two of the bedrooms have windows but the third bedroom, which is centrally located, does not. In the Summer, each room has its own private ai

name: The Pagode Lofted Bedroom
space: Before I moved to Brooklyn, I always dreamed of staying in a space like the one I live in now.  My partner and I have created an original, jaw-dropping urban oasis together and want to share it with other creative souls and global adventurists. Come experience the unique character of living like a Brooklynite, only cheaper than a hotel and so much cooler!! Our cozy custom-built Asian/Buddhist temple inspired room is open for rental from 1 night up to a month for 1-2 people. We have a corner unit on the 4th floor of an old sewing factory-turned loft/warehouse building with 2 walls of 8' windows facing Northwest and Northeast. BEAUTIFUL sunrises and sunsets each day. With tall 12' ceilings and all three bedrooms built against the wall, it leaves the entire common area open for use and enjoyment. Amenities include: -large kitchen (9'x11' that opens into a 40'x15' open living room) -Tardis bathroom (larger on the inside) -WIFI -laundry on the floor -rooftop access with views of Queens, Bro

name: Studio in FlatIron, NYC !!
space: Large, renovated studio on the 9th floor in Flat Iron, right near Madison Sq Park available on select dates.. It is 600 Sq feet. Amenities include alcove kitchen, plenty of furniture including, queen size bed, large couch, flat screen 48inch TV. Large windows with a lot of natural sunlight. I am a clean working professional so I keep it very clean. Please no smokers. Thank you!

name: Williamsburg Penthouse Retreat
space: My penthouse apartment is a beautiful expansive duplex- situated 2 blocks from the epicenter of Williamsburg, but secluded from all the hustle and bustle- 6 floors up on the top floor of a newly built mid-sized apartment building  (Elevator access of course)  The Bedroom for rent is on the lower level of the duplex- very spacious and clean...A comfortable full sized bed with hypo-allergenic pillows-approximately 150 sq ft. with a walk-in closet, AC/HEAT unit in the room, and a private entrance to a clean, modern bathroom.  New to the room is a flatscreen HD TV with full cable access. The Kitchen is modern and clean including a dishwasher and Microwave   Guests are welcome to use all appliances including the Washer/Dryer in Apt. The Bathroom has a huge tub, wonderful water pressure, and a private entrance from the guest room. I live on the upper level of the Duplex.

name: Cozy 1 BR in Prospect Heights
space: A very spacious 1BR apartment in a great location! We can accommodate up to 3 guests comfortably with 1 large BR with queen sized bed and a blow up mattress can be setup in the living room. There's a very separate and comfortable kitchen equipped with lots of utensils and appliances for those who love to cook (a grocery chain and liquor store at the end of our block, a smaller more "gourmet" food shop around the corner, and on Saturdays from April till November an excellent farmer's market three blocks away). There is even a desk and office nook if you need to attend to some work while visiting.  We have a Playstation hooked up to our TV with Netflix and Hulu Plus available to you. We have bunny ears for the basic channels (no cable). **We have made a several improvements to our apartment since these photos were taken**

name: Luxury / doorman building with gorgeous rooftop.
space: Gorgeous New York apartment conveniently located in Midtown Manhattan, steps away from Grand Central, the United Nations, plus many subways, restaurants, and bars. Gourmet grocery and 24-hour deli (with 24-hour delivery) right downstairs. Virtually everything you could need within half a block. Minutes away from the Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade route. Apartment features two bedrooms plus a queen size pull out couch. Sleeps 3-6 comfortably. Spacious but cozy. Breathtaking views of the Chrysler building from all rooms. Two large flat screen TVs, entertainment system (Xbox 360 Kinect and Nintendo Wii, with Netflix), cable TV, wireless internet, brand new heating system, air purifier, modern high end appliances, gas stove/oven, subzero refrigerator. 24-hour doorman security, laundry room, rooftop access with sprawling views of NYC. N'Espresso Machine with Pods.  World class water pressure.

name: 3BR/3 Bath House in Astoria
space: Three bedroom, three-bath house in the Ditmars section of Astoria in Queens, 5 minute walk to the Ditmars station on the N/Q subway, 25 minutes to Times Square.  no cable but large screen TV with Wifi The neighborhood: Very safe area with on-street parking always available. Our block is row houses, and we're just 5 minute walk from the subway station at Ditmars and 31st St. In that area there is a Starbucks and several very good restaurants including Taverna Kyclades, Trattoria L'Incontro, and Wave Thai. The subway provides very convenient access to all the top tourist destinations in Manhattan, e.g. you don't even need to transfer trains to get to Central Park, Times Square, Union Station, or Chinatown. We are very convenient to both La Guardia airport ($10 ride by local car service) and JFK (~$25-30 by the car service we use) Second floor:  1) Master bedroom with queen bed;  2) Our son's room with a twin loft bed that includes a reading nook underneath that kids love 3) Our daughters

name: TIMES SQ/THEATRE DIST STUDIO
space: An ideal location!   Located on 9th Ave. between 47th/48th St. - this fully furnished studio is just a few short blocks away from everything you came to enjoy: Theater District, Times Square, Rockefeller Center, Central Park, Columbus Circle, countless dining options along 9th Ave and Restaurant Row, Shopping, Museums and much much more...!  Subway access to: A,C,E,N,Q,R,S,7,1 & 9 trains - all within a few blocks away This clean and comfortable studio apartment is located on the 5th floor of a walk up building. There is no elevator. This studio has bright natural sunlight by day and picturesque skyline views from its its two windows facing east! The studio is furnished with a: - Queen Size Bed  - Table and chairs - 40" flat screen TV w/ cable - Free Wireless Internet - Separate fully- equipped Kitchen   - Bed linens and bath towels will be provided

name: Sunny West Village Fantasy
space: Historic West VIllage building with garden courtyard on a tucked away, quiet street. You truly can't beat the location. Check out my other listing with the name 'west village fantasy' to see reviews. It is the same apartment, but I've created a separate listing for when the whole place is available.  This listing is for 1 Private Bedroom in a 2 bedroom apartment. Beautifully furnished with Queen-sized bed, antique dresser, desk, & mirror. Casement window w/idyllic view of the charming street.  Lots of SUNSHINE! The closet/dresser will be partially open for you - msg me for your space requirements. Large living room with tv (hbo &showtime), Large kitchen table and kitchen w/all the necessities. Wifi. The living space is in the process of being refurnished, but is essentially the same minus the red wall (there will be a media center) and a couch change.  You will be sharing the common space and bathroom with a 32 year old professional, warm female so you must be kind & respectful.  While

name: Nice beautiful room In the Bronx
space: Located in one of the safest Bronx neighborhoods.  Walk to Botanical Gardens, Bronx Zoo and Bronx ParkÛ_.. Minutes from the Fordham University Bronx Campus , Famous Arthur Avenue little Italy and Pelham Parkway. Two blocks from the Subway (Train 2 and 5) and Express Bus to Manhattan. Brand new Three Bedroom apartment with Top Kitchen Appliances and wood cabinets, granite counter top. WiFi Available There is TV which picks up about 15 Digital Channels in the room.  If you happen to be a Die Hard Soccer Fan and must watch Barcelona-Manchester United game well there is always the TV located in the Living room..... If the Yankees are playing at the same time .. then we have a problem...well I will let you use my iPad instead. Walking distance to Arthur Avenue, Botanical Gardens, Bronx Zoo.  I am very Flexible with Check in check out time.  If you happen to arrive very early and the room is occupied with a guest, you can still drop off your stuff and your room will be ready when you return f

name: Great spot in Brooklyn
space: Room in Brooklyn available in 3 bedroom apartment.  Living room and kitchen available for use. Outside Patio. Internet available.  2 rooms are in use, 1 is a bedroom the other is an office.

name: Upper East Side Oasis!
space: This serine and calming, Zen style 11X11 room on 77 Street and 1st Avenue furnished with a queen size bed.. The apartment has a large kitchen, cute bathroom and living room. There is also a washer/dryer in the apartment. Small yet lovely but simple living room. Great for a couple looking for a place to stay that is near all the interesting and fun sites in NYC. This large kitchen has a large stove/oven, coffee maker, blender and microwave. Fully stocked with cooking and eating utensils.  The bathroom is a small yet tranquil space with a rainfall shower head and full bathtub for a relaxing soak after all your exploring. ABOUT THE AREA: This apartment is located on the Upper East Side of Manhattan. 3 blocks away from the 6 Train and M15 Buses along 3rd Ave, 2nd Ave and 1st Ave and the M31 on York Ave. Close to many great bars and restaurants, Central Park and the East River Promenade. Supermarkets,pharmacies and great clothing stores are all located nearby as well. All in walking distanc

name: Very clean bed room in queens NYC
space: Big window quite neighbor convenience shopping center, Queens, 6 mins subway 7 , to Manhattan Time Square 45mins-1 hour. Also  van service to Chinatown cost same as subway, post office, library, supper market all in 2-10mints, compare with location and price u pay, it is truly treasure in NYC, enjoy, by the way my home only 1 person occupy But Pls know that we r old pre-war apartments building, each building have there own character may show un clean. check in between 2-11pm, any early 2pm or late after 11pm will kindly charge $20, check out before 11am. If u have any question pls feel free contact to me. 100% cotton bed sheet comforter, we recommend bring ur personal staff as shampoo shower gel or your tower, but if u r lighter traveler, u can use mine, we have all kind quality shower gel & shampoo. Tower of course we have.  Near our neighbor 10mins walking was Target, Best Buy Macy's, plenty of Asia restaurant, super market all personal staff u can grab from there so don't worry if u

name: Unique West Village Loft with Deck
space: Besides being one of the few loft buildings in the historic West Village, this apartment has a private outdoor deck.  Located short blocks from mass transit, the Hudson River Park and the Highline, the apartment also has boutiques and fine dining nearby. There's a fold-out bed in the office that comfortably berths two. The larger living room has a day-bed and a trundle that stores underneath -- as well as a separate futon. You have your own bathroom and use of all common areas including the kitchen and deck, as well as the building's rooftop garden. Spaces can be made more private using the shoji screens. The entire apartment, EXCEPTING my separate bedroom, is available for your enjoyment.  I travel occasionally so you might be left alone, but I try to at least get you settled in and oriented with local tips.

name: Reggae Den Sub Level Apartment
space: Come visit our three room apartment in Historic Bedford Stuyvesant Brooklyn. Private entry. Fresh towels, clean and safe space. Microwave, plates and kitchen utensils available. Walking distance to the A and C trains to Mahattan only 15 minute ride! Stroll beautiful Brooklyn in this electic neighborhood of modern shops, delicious eateries with old fashion charm.

name: Fantastic East Village Location!
space: This is a spacious Pre War floor thru apt on a great block in the East Village, steps to many of the best restaurants, bars, cafes as well as the 6, N/R, F and L trains.  The apartment has an eat in kitchen with modern appliances and granite countertops with a view of the Freedom Tower.  The space for rent has an office/2nd living room with a large desk, couch and TV and then there is a semi private sleeping LOFT bedroom with a full size futon mattress. The other end of the apartment is the master bedroom and living room with Empire State Building Views. There is wireless internet and basic cable.  The apt is on the 5th floor (4 flights up) but worth the walk up. Staying here you will be exposed to the essence of all that the East Village has to offer. Steps to the 6,N/R, F and L trains, Thompkins Square Park, Lower East Side, SoHo and the West Village.

name: New-York Family Friendly 2bdr/2bath
space: DÌ©but du message rÌ©expÌ©diÌ© : Kid- an Family- friendly apartment in Harlem, 20-minute walk from Central Park. Ideal for a family with up to 4 kids, 2 couples or a few friends. 800 square feet, 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a nice american kitchen/living in an apartment just for you in our house PLUS, a backyard! :) We provide sheets, towels and WIFI plus guides of New York. From good mattresses to Nespresso coffee machine, everything you need is in the apartment. If you travel with a baby or with young kids, you have to know that we provide foldable crib, baby tub, changing pad, toys, books, stroller, carrier, baby cook so everything to make you happy and keep your children busy. Make your trip easy, light and nice. We are living in the apartment upstairs so get all the tips you need about New York from me! The apartment is well located, 4-minute walk to the subway ( line 2/3, station 135th street). This subway line brings you everywhere in Manhattan. Times square is only 15 min by subway

name: Cozy Room in Artistic Brownstone
space: General info and location: This cozy and bright room is located in Long Island City - Queens, an area across the river from midtown Manhattan.  We are close to the Queens MOMA PS1 museum, which also hosts outdoor dance parties on Saturdays in the summer. We are five minutes from a Jackson Ave, which has a bunch of restaurants for you to enjoy. There are also many places right around the house, if you just need to pop out for a quick meal. There is a 24-hour diner across the street where the food is decent, and uniquely New York! The room: The room is an annex to our living room. It is furnished with a "Murphy" bed, which folds into an armoire, putting it away during the daytime of you so choose. There are two windows that face the street, so you will hear some noise from the subway station, which is nearby (but that also means your travel time to the city will be short!). There is an air conditioning unit available for the summer months. Looking forward to having you stay with us!

name: GORGEOUS Condo STUNNING Park View
space: Top 3 reasons why we love our NYC Condo     - BREATH-TAKING VIEW of Central Park and Manhattan     - CONVENIENT LOCATION - near many museums, Columbia University, bus and trains     - PEACEFUL AND INSPIRING home that is filled with beauty and light Tasteful zen-inspired decor, our light-filled home has a stunning view of New York City and Central Park. It has two real bedrooms (1 with queen size bed, and a full sofa bed) and a spacious living room (with two additional twin sofa beds), with views from all the rooms.  Kitchen is fully equipped. This home will feel like a mountain retreat above all of the hustle and bustle of Manhattan.   Conveniently located at the peaceful and safe Northeast corner of Central Park, and the beginning of Museum Mile (The Met and Guggenheim is walking distance away), and it has easy access to 4 bus lines, express trains (#2 and #3, and #6 trains).  It is just a short distance to Botanical Conservatory, swimming pool, skating ring, museums, Harlem Jazz club

name: Large One Bedroom in heart of North Williamsburg
space: The space is 700 Square Feet with an Open Kitchen and plenty of sunlight throughout the day.     The apartment is in a small brownstone building with clean high end sheets and towels, granite counter tops and all the amenities of a well furnished home.

name: Trendy 1 bdr in hip BKLYN hood!
space: This space screams coziness and home-comfort. Large corner living room with plenty of sitting space that is bathed in warm sunlight by day. By night, you can get a glimpse of midtown Manhattan sparkling over the horizon. In the warm months, the large windows elicit the most effective, yet gentle cross breeze due to the coveted corner location. The living room has a rustic/industrial feel. It is inspired by old family roots in the upstate Adirondacks and our love for historical Brooklyn. The apartment is a two-bedroom: one we stay in and one guest room that is entirely detached from ours so their is optimal privacy.  Full walk-in kitchen. Guests have full access to cook wear, as long as it is cleaned. We will make sure there is adequate fridge space for any guest use. Full shared bathroom. I love a comfortable bathroom, so the decor and coziness of the bathroom was not taken lightly. There is a super lovable toy poodle (hypoallergenic) and a cat. The apartment is kept spotless at all ti

name: Northside Williamsburg Loft
space: Private Room in Loft Heart of Willamsburg, Brooklyn Dining and nightlife right out the window. About the Room: Large private space in two-bedroom Loft.  The room I offer is for the person in need of a clean/quiet space to rest or work while visiting the city. What's included: *Clean linens  *Clean towels  *Closet *Dresser *WiFi *Electric/gas/hot water  *Laundry in building About Transit: The apt is 5 blocks from the Bedford Ave L train which is one stop from Manhattan.   About Me: 40, making my own work (art) and working in architectural photography. I've lived in the space for over a decade and care for it very much. It's important to have a place to come home in the city that allows you to unwind, rest, and gather your thoughts. I have a cat.

name: Stylish Duplex in posh West Village of Manhattan
space: This duplex loft style apartment has quite a few unique features. The extra height of ceiling creates an airy feeling and two huge windows provide full of daylight. The apartment remains extremely quiet 24hrs. Occasional church bells and horns of the ships on neaby Hudson River add to the sense of tranquility. The main floor level consists of living area, study, kitchen, bathroom and foyer with the closet. The mezzanine level has the sleeping area with the full size bed.  The total space is about 500 sq feet comfortably accomodates two persons. The apartment has lots of charm filled with arts and decorative items. It is ideal accomodation for someone seeking an unique real NY life experience. - Secure elevator building  - Extremely quiet & tranquil  -  Plenty of light - Extra high ceiling - HD TV -  Kitchen w/microwave  - Bathroom with full bath tub  - Ionic Hair Dryer - Linens&Towels supplied. - Closet space provided - Cozy cocoon like sleeping area    w/ full size bed   ( Please note

name: Family friendly home in best hood!
space: We've got a 1000 sq ft loft available while we're traveling.  It's in the heart of Williamsburg - arguably the most happening spot around for endless food, art, shopping, and music options. You could spend your whole trip here, but since you'll probably want to explore, you'll be happy to know that we're just a block and a half from the L train @ Bedford Ave, which is just a few short stops from the coolest parts of Manhattan as well. Even if you're going all the way to the west side (stop 5) that's about 10 minutes. There is plenty of free street parking as well. The apartment is a classic loft conversion with brick, exposed beams, and 12' ceilings. The kitchen is great for cooking, and fully stocked with coffee, a juicer, and all the regular cooking supplies you might need.  The living space is big and open. There is a new couch since these photos were taken, and it has a comfy chaise that is close to the size of a twin bed. There's also another couch that's also roughly the size of

An elegantly furnished apartment with wood parquet floors and long hallways.  Release your inner iron chef in the ample-sized kitchen. You can really cook here! Entertainment system: Plug-in your devices or connect via Chromecast.

Both have similar work schedules, I work from home and use the living room as my work space.  I travel a lot, so I may or may not be around when guests arrive. However, my roommates are great and can assist my guests with anything they may need :-) Apt description:  There are 2 bathrooms. Shared guest bathroom is next to room. The 2nd bathroom is for my roommates, we may use the guest bathroom from time to time if the other is occupied.  Heat and central air. Wifi. Superintendent and building manager. Security cameras. We live near quite a few cute restaurants, cafes, bars, laundry (across the street), groceries, pharmacy, bank etc.  This area is near Pratt, so there are a lot of student

In addition, a sofa  that opens up to a full size bed (sleeps two adults comfortably)   There is a love seat that can sleep a smaller child or a short person.  Open kitchen, dining room seats six and extension for two more chairs (more chairs can be added).  Stove, oven, refrigerator, blender, toaster, George Foreman grill, juicer, food processor available.  There are several subway lines close by. The closest subway station is a 10 minute walk from the house.  It is approximately 15-18 minutes away from midtown Manhattan.) The apt is also a short drive from Laguardia and JFK airports. Astoria is a very diverse neighborhood!  There are bakeries, churches, playgrounds, delis, restaurants (many deliver!), laundromats, libraries, and shops in this multicultural neighborhood. Towels, linens will be provided.

name: Experience New York - A Locals Way
space: Nestled in the uptown Manhattan neighborhood of Hudson Heights, a sub-neighborhood of Washington Heights, the room has a total of three (3) twin size beds which sleeps up to three adults comfortably. Room is perfect for those who want to have a place in Manhattan, get the most out of their New York City visit, and want a comfortable place to rest their head after a day of touring New York City.

name: Oasis in the city
space: As an interior designer having spent time in Asia  I was inspired to create a space that feels like a meditation. Everything is modern and simple.  The location is perfect as it is walking distance to Soho, Little Italy, East Village and Greenwich Village. The space is petite but spacious with a tremendous private garden. Glorious in the season and nice to view in a snowstorm. If you have questions I am available for  support . The building is in the heart of Nolita with part time doorman. The New Museum is just  across the street. Spring and Delancey is the new hub of cafes  and restaurants with Butchers' Daughter and Black seed just around the corner. A cool Artistic Neighborhood with world class boutiques  on Elizabeth street.  Whole Foods is on the corner for shopping  Wine merchant on Mott street and Bowery . Everything you need for a perfect getaway or to escape your work schedule.

name: For cat lovers - East Village 1 bdr
space: Located in the heart of the East Village, the apartment looks right across Tompkins Square. It is a one bedroom apartment on the 5th floor of a prewar building with an elevator.  The apartment is fully furnished and if you desire to treat yourself with home-cooked food during your stay you will find everything you need in the kitchen: oven, microwave, fridge, toaster, cooking utensils etc. The kitchen is separate from the living room that looks right over the park. It is furnished with a sofa,  book shelves and a stereo system but no TV or dining table. The spacious bedroom is furnished with a queen-sized bed that sleeps two and an additional airbed can be inflated in the living room if needed. The bathroom has a shower and bathtub. All rooms have windows and washer and dryer can be found in the basement of the apartment building. The apartment gets plenty of sun in the morning until around 2 pm.

name: Sunny Rm #2, A/C, Park, express Q train

This up-and-coming neighborhood is culturally diverse, with a mix of people from the Caribbean islands and young professionals.  The neighborhood still has a  very "real Brooklyn" vibe--it is the last neighborhood on the park to remain so culturally diverse.  This means that it is not full of cute cafes and ba

name: Big Brnstn Grdn Apt 2 stops to 59st
space: The apartment is on a beautiful block in stylish Hamilton Heights (Uptown Manhattan) and convenient to 5 subways to get anywhere in NYC easily. We have had so many very happy customers who love the decor, the generous size of the apartment and the coming "home" to the neighborhood . This beautifully renovated apartment has a king bed, a double bed and and single plus an extra large mattress that can be deployed in one of the two very large rooms separated by a modern kitchen and a large all tiled bathroom with gleaming high quality fixtures and a lovely stone floor. The apartment retains original details such as a deco fireplace, woodwork and nice wood floors. There is plenty of room in each of the rooms The area is full of history and charm, and is bustling on Broadway at night so as safe coming home late on public trans as any other place in NYC. Small restaurants, cute coffee shops and several new, lively craft beer pubs nearby cap this off as a great NYC destination. In season (or

name: NYC Special Occasions Room #2

As of me, I am European and rather curious about almost every culture there is under the sun. I am an easy-going and very friendly host. name: 2BR/2BA Best MANHATTAN Neighborhood HUGE TERRACE
space: Two bedrooms, two full bathrooms in this two level apartment in the incredible Lower East Side neighborhood of Manhattan!  Walk out the door and within a block you will be able to go to restaurants like Clinton Street Baking Company, Cocoa Bar, Pig and Khao, Donnybrook, and Ivan Ramen.  Walk a few more blocks, and you'll be at the famous Katz's Deli, the Meatball Shop, Stanton Social, Spitzer's, Essex Street Market, Wassail---and the list goes on and on!  And, those are mostly restaurants--the bars and galleries are just as plentiful--with one of my favorite live music venues Rockwood Music Hall just a few blocks away, too!  Newest additions to the restaurant and bar scene include: Simply Hooked, The Burgary, Speedy Romeo, Suffolk Arms, Paloma Rocket...and new places going in all the time! The Essex Street subway stop with the F, M, J and Z lines at Delancey Street is just about three blocks away, and the 2nd Ave. subway stop is about the same distance.  Get to almost any neighborhood

name: Cozy and Spacious Living Uptown

It's close to the train station which takes you mid-town in 15 minutes and you'll have the pleasure of having the Beautiful Hamilton Grange National Memorial a few feet away from you.    The sleeping space is spacious and consists of a queen size bed that sleeps 2 people comfortably.The is an air bed or a large and super comfy couch in the living room with can sleep a 3rd person   The living room will serve as an entertainment and general relaxation area, where you can sit back on the large couch or love seat  to enjoy the use of a 40" Flat screen HD TV, a Playstation 3 console, with complimentary NetFlix service (free movies) and an internet ready Desktop computer connected to the TV. name: Room in 2 Bdr Apt in Nolita/Soho LES
space: Available to rent immediately is a very nice sized bedroom in a huge loft style 2 Bedroom Apt in the Nolita. The apt is on the seventh floor of a modern building on Bowery. The apartment is in an elevator building, with great views of downtown and a terrace.  Located in the heart of downtown on Bowery and Spring, Nolita is one of the most scenic and hippest areas in all of NYC. The apartment is within steps of some of the best and coolest restaurants in NYC: Carbone, Parm, La Esquina, Cafe Select, Rubirosa, Mother's Ruin, Cafe Gitane, Cafe Havana, and Tacombi at Fonda Nolita.  In addition, within steps of the apartment, you can shop at some of the best boutiques NY has to offer, Rag & Bone, Helmut Lang, Vince, RRL, Gant, Sandro, and Tory Burch are all located less than a few minute away from the apartment. In terms of culture, the New Museum is right across the street, and you can be enjoying some of the best contemporary art in the world within 2 minutes of leaving the apartment. The

name: Cozy and bright UES Studio near Central Park
space: This is a 450 square foot studio, totally furnished with two closets.  Clean sheets, blankets, pillows and towels are provided, as well as dishes, dishwasher, cable and wifi all included. There is also washer and dryer in the building. The kitchen is well equipped with everything you need to make from a simple to a very gourmet meal.  The bathroom is pretty decent size, bright and clean. It has a nice shower with good pressure and bathtub.  Located on the 6th (and top) floor. And not to worry! The building has a very well maintained elevator. Neighbors are friendly and respectful.

name: Room With A View of Central Park
space: Private Bedroom with full-sized bed and armoire Full Kitchen Shared Bath Wireless Internet Air Conditioning (available upon request) Elevator Coin Laundry in basement On-Street Parking This large bedroom (10' x 15') is complete with a full-size bed and southern facing window that frames Central Park. The apartment is shared with 01 fabulous roommate (creative, clean, non-smoking).

This is a fastidiously clean, 1 bedroom luxury apt with new furnishings. The building is high end with all amenities.  Fantastic location - great vibe.  Very quiet; no city noise at night so great sleeping.  Neighborhood has everything - great restaurants, bars. Across from Riverside Park; near Lincoln Center, Central Park and Columbus Circle.  Subway is close and so are the parks.  Easy access to everywhere; everything is close! Pet friendly with pet day care next door. Lots of great restaurants in the neighborhood too!

name: fully furnished room in Bedstuy

name: Cute & Quirky Private Room

space: The apartment is in the heart of Williamsburg on N. 5th st and Bedford. Williamsburg is one of the most vibrant neighborhood in New York City. I'm steps away from the 6/N/R trains with easy access to all the sights - Union Square, Washington Sq Park, Thompkins Sq Park, NYU, Greenwich Village, Alphabet City and the Lower East Side. The apartment faces a court yard in the back so although it my be chaotic outside, it is quiet and comfortable inside. Enjoy your stay! P.S. Because I live here, some of my personal belongings will still be visible.

space: Perfect for a family visiting New York! Charming 3 bedroom house available in the heart of Brownstone Brooklyn. The house can accommodate a family of up to six people. The apartment has, new wooden floors, central heating, AC,oven, microwave, refrigerator, sound system, super high-speed internet, vintage espresso machine and a beautiful large bathroom with a bathtub. You will find a lot of new and good restaurants, cafes, parks and historic buildings in walking distance.  The A/C-Train (3 min walking) connects you quickly to Manhattan and the G-Train (10 min walking) brings you to Williamsburg, Greenpoint and Queens. The citibike station around the corner also allows you to

name: Historic Brownstone Private Garden
space: Greetings!!!!   "Welcome and enjoy your stay in the Parlor floor's Garden Room!"  There's plenty of space for a single, couple/family, or friends traveling together for a few nights, week(s), or month(s). Two small single bedrooms, and one main bedroom.  NY/European style size bedrooms.  Would be appropriate for a family with two children. Bluetooth music sound system pairs with your iphone or smartphone.   The entrance to prospect park is directly across the street in front of the house.   The subway is the "F or G" line and only 1 1/2 blocks away, a two minute walk along a well lit and traveled street. There are food shops, a dry cleaner, restaurants, live music, bars within a few minutes walk.    A safe, quiet, family neighborhood. Plenty of available street side parking for a car.   Cooking cutlery, maps and guide books to help you have the

name: Beautiful apartment nr Central Park
space: Hi there, this is a big apartment in a lovely area, close to Central Park, Columbia University and the Upper West Side.  The apartment itself is beautiful - 12 foot ceilings and lots of old dark wood (chair rail, window shutters, floors, fireplace, etc.). (one has a double bed and the other has a single / twin and a child size bed), and a large bedroom downstairs, that currently has one twin (although we also have another twin mattress).   We starting renting the downstairs room on airbnb a couple of years ago. It has a private bathroom (toilet and basin, not shower) as well.
