name: A great big place in Brooklyn
space: The apartment is minutes away from Manhattan.  All major trains are a 10 minute walk or a short bus ride away.   Your right next to Williamsburg, Park Slope and your in Fort Greene, which is fast becoming THE borough to be in.  All of these are great neighborhoods to go and have adventures in. With great one of a kind shops, restaurants, bars, coffee spots and parks you can't go wrong.  The apartment is not super luxury living.  What it is, is an affordable, clean, big 2 story apartment, with your own room, plus a full kitchen and bathroom.  I have two roommates who are friendly.  There are 2 grocery stores within walking distance.  An organic store just next door. A great wine and liquor store(Gnarly Vines)  across the street and a laundry mat.  If you want some culture then you can't go wrong with BAM(Brookly Academy of Music) and the Brooklyn museum.  Both of these are walking distance or a short a subway ride away.  Staying here means having more money to enjoy yourself in NYC whil

name: Cozy Apt in Bushwick, Brooklyn!
space: A cozy apartment in Bushwick, close to Manhattan and right off the Jefferson L train.  There's a living-/ dining- room, small bathroom and cozy bedroom (Queen bed), plus a small walkthrough bedroom with a twin bed. We also have a full kitchen with a gas range and oven, plus all the utensils/ cooking wares and dinnerware. Perfect space to explore NYC and still enjoy a few nights in or cook vacation brunches. The apartment is in a 6 family home on a fairly residential street.  There is on street parking, with minimal parking restrictions. We will leave you with clean linens to use during your stay - bed linnens, blankets, towels and bathmat, etc. The apartment has Wi-fi access. We also have a small backyard (complete with window access, in true brooklyn style), good for sneaking out for a patio drink or looking at the early season snow! Located in the heart of Bushwick, it's close to lots of great Brooklyn bars and restaurants: Tandem, Dear Bushwick, Roberta's, Northeastern Kingdom, Mile

name: Monthly discount - 2 bedroom  - upper east side
space: Enjoy an excellent and much more reasonably priced and comfortable alternative to a New York City hotel. Our newly renovated 2 bedroom is located on the charming, tree lined, park block of 77th Street between York Avenue and John Jay Park -  right in the middle of the very safe (gated and night security patrol), Upper East Side. The apartment is a 5th floor walk-up in a beautiful Historic Old World style building with a central courtyard. This apartment can sleep 6 people.  The apartment is clean, and looks great. It has high ceilings, floor to ceiling windows (lots of light) and hard wood flooring throughout. Very quiet, and close to subway, bus and hospitals (Sloan, Special Surgery and Cornell) for those of you looking to rent during a residency. 15 minute walk to Central Park. The master bedroom is large with a brand new Queen sized bed, dresser, closet and two windows and HD Roku TV. The second bedroom is smaller, but has a floor to ceiling window, closet and brand new Queen bed as

name: Apartment in Manhattan
space: My one bedroom apartment is located in Inwood, the northern portion of Manhattan. I live across the street from the 1 train, and just a few blocks from the A train, and BOTH will take you directly into Times Square and the rest of Manhattan.   The main room has a regular queen size bed that accommodates 2 people. In the living room, there is a futon that unfolds into a queen size bed. There is a Japanese style room screen divider that transforms the living room into another room, giving the extra couple full privacy.

name: Park Slope House -private room -1 block from metro
space: Welcome to iconic Park Slope Brooklyn! This is a single private room with bathroom and kitchen available in our floor-through brownstone. My roommate Mark is easy going, friendly, and quiet. He will be able to assist should you have any needs or questions. Original pre-war brownstone details like tin ceilings, refurbished hardwood plank pine floors, turn of the century moldings, pocket doors, and arched doorways. It's a truly charming space in the center of Park Slope. It is two flights up with bright sunlight on the south side and beautiful green treetop views on the north. The bathroom has a charming, original claw foot tub. Large bedroom gets fantastic light and is  quiet and peaceful. There is a large, windowed, eat-in kitchen with a beautiful handmade table, coffee maker, and blender. Plenty of storage space should you need it with room for a bike. F, G and R trains are right around the corner and Cvs, grocery store, liquor store, laundromat/drycleaner and 5th Avenue shops all nea

name: Prime Williamsburg location with private deck
space: Our apartment is spacious and clean, with high ceilings and a private outdoor deck and access to a shared backyard, featuring with all sorts of eye-pleasing plants and flowers, as well as squirrels and the occasional neighbor cat. Your little plot of paradise in the city!  The room has a queen size bed, desk, closet space, and A/C. Our 4-family townhouse (with a classic fire escape) is situated in South-Williamsburg (South 5th St between Keap St & Rodney St), a few blocks from an assortment of restaurants, bars, shops, etc. One block from the J, M, Z Marcy Ave subway stop, a few blocks from the L and G lines (Lorimer St station). So any part of Manhattan and Brooklyn is easily accessible.  The apartment features a full bath, living room, hardwood floors throughout, and kitchen.

name: Spacious 1 Bdrm in BEST location!!
space: 1 bedroom apartment available in the heart of Union Square (2 blocks to all the action).  42" inch flat screen TV with cable  Wifi Internet  iPod Dock in the bedroom Bedroom with Queen Size bed (pillow top) and window. Cushions on the couch come off an can accommodate one extra sleeper for those that need separate sleeping arrangements. Fully equipped separate kitchen with coffee maker Location, Location, Location!!!  -1 block to all subways (L, N, R, Q, 4, 5, 6)  -next door to the best supermarkets (Trader Joes, Whole Foods, Food Emporium)  -3 parks  -tons of shopping  -endless bars and restaurants Elevator building Very clean and quiet and best of all you are all alone -- no share!   Clean towels/linens, shampoo, etc all provided.  Amazing price. . .. . .Book it today because I know this will go fast.

name: Hancock Town House!-Stuyvesant Mews
space: Hello, my name is Fred.  This is a 20 year old town house located on a picturesque tree lined street in Stuyvesant Heights, formally known as Bedford Stuyvesant.  A safe and racially diverse neighborhood.  There are markets, local shopping, pharmacy and popular fast food eateries within walking distance. The J train is located at the Halsey Street station - about a 5 minute walk from the house.  The A and C trains are located at the Ralph Avenue station - about a 10 minute walk from the house.  All transportation will get you to Manhattan in under 20 minutes.  Trains, taxi and buses run 24/7.  Relax in a clean room with wood floors, flat screen tv, blue ray dvd player, access to closets and dresser draws accented by modern decor.  Feel free to enjoy the comforts of a garden back yard space.  There will always be someone available to assist and/or answer any questions.Transportation can be hectic and costly-After booking with me we can coordinate the time of your arrival and I WILL PICK

name: Home Away From Home
space: If you want to have a perfect experience when you are in New York, it is important to stay in the perfect neighborhood. Renting out my cozy, beautifully stylish room  in the best area in New York City - Soho (located on the boarder of Greenwich Village and 3 blocks away from West Village, consider that you are in the coolest +trendiest neighborhood of Manhattan, best shopping, restaurants, art galleries, Meatpacking district, super fast commute to any destination point in New York, all the train stations are located minutes away). Perfect for singles or couples. Û¢Flat screen TV with Cable and DVD Û¢Amazing Queen size  bed with a great mattress (you will sleep like a baby) Û¢Bedding and towels Û¢Free high speed WiFi Û¢Separate Kitchen Û¢Small dining table Û¢Full kitchen with Dishes, pots, pans, silverware Û¢Note: this apartment is on the 4th floor of a walk up, really is not that difficult. There is a roommate who is barely ever home. She is a sweet girl who is always either at work or in her

name: Large one-bed apt Upper East Side
space: This spacious one-bed apartment is finished to a high standard with modern furnishings, a fully equipped kitchen, and wireless internet. The apartment is situated in the beautiful Upper East Side area, which is widely considered to be one of the safest neighborhoods in Manhattan, with many bars, restaurants, grocery stores and Central Park, located within walking distance - the apartment is on a quiet street, off 1st Avenue (noise is not a problem).  The 4,5 & 6 trains are a 10 minute walk away, with Grand Central Station and Union Square, both central hubs for subways/trains, shopping, restaurants, entertainment etc., only a 10 minute train-ride away. - 1 Bedroom Apartment: 1 queen bed, recently purchased. - Large couch, recently purchased. - All modern utilities & utensils; heating, cooker, fridge, freezer, silverware, plates etc. - Wireless Internet. Feel free to contact me with any questions.

name: Enjoy an Oasis in Hamilton Heights/Harlem!
space: Are you looking for a weekend or more in the Big Apple? How about a clean, quiet 2-bedroom apartment, spacious with plenty of windows and natural light?  Only 20 minutes from midtown and in the heart of Hamilton Heights/Harlem, check out our apartment!  ÷É THE APARTMENT ÷É The apartment is sunny, spacious and on a safe street. The apartment features two (2) bedrooms. My female roommate Amanda's room is available upon request. A fully equipped kitchen and a living room. It is located on the 3rd floor of a renovated and privately owned building. Each of the two rooms available for rent need to be booked separately. The bedrooms can accommodate 2 people and for additional guests, there is a futon couch in the living room, which pulls out to be a full size sleeper. ÷É THE NEIGHBORHOOD ÷É Located in Manhattan in an area known as Hamilton Heights, just north of Columbia University with variety of cafes, restaurants and grocers located within walking distance. The neighborhood is safe, friendly a

name: Modern 1-bedroom in Harlem Heights
space: A 550 sq. feet (50 sq. meter) 1-bedroom on the 4th floor in a 6-story residential building on the historic street, Hamilton Terrace, with both bedroom and living room turning toward west and leafy 144th street, which gives plenty of light during daytime. The apartment accommodates ideally a couple with two kids on the queen-size sofa bed in the living room. Two couples living in the apartment works fine. ThereÛªs an eat-in-kitchen with all amenities, including a microwave oven, toaster, small TV and radio.  The living room has a desktop in glass, which seats 5 people, a sofa bed, which is equivalent to a queen-size bed plus television, stereo and DVD player. There is wifi as well. The bedroom (the largest room in the flat) has a queen-size bed, chest of drawers and a work area with book cases. There is a large closet for clothes in the hallway between living room and bedroom. All equipment, furnishing and decoration is 6 years old, most of it purchased in Ikea. ThereÛªs an elevator, the

name: Peaceful Garden Sanctuary
space: About my sweet home:  Welcome to your Brooklyn GARDEN sanctuary! First of all this is a great DEAL! Come stay in charming, safe, beautiful and super friendly Fort Greene, the most desirable and lovely neighborhood in all of Brooklyn! My apt is in the heart of Fort Greene, just 2 blocks away from the park. From my apt, It's a short walk to all major subway lines and once on the subway, just 10 to 15 min to downtown manhattan.  My adorable 1 bedroom apt has an amazing PRIVATE BACKYARD so you can sip your morning coffee while hearing the birds sing in the trees, or enjoy a nice glass of wine in the evening, Now that Summer is here, it's absolute heaven to have an outdoor garden in Brooklyn!! My living room area is reasonably spacious (for NY) and the kitchen is fully equipped with a brand new stove and quiet refrigerator.  I always provide breakfast food, coffee and tea for my guests. I also have high speed wireless internet. The apt is peaceful, warm, clean and truly QUIET. You will feel

name: Small Town in the Big Apple!
space: Our two-bedroom northern Manhattan home is located in the quiet and pristine Hudson Heights section of Washington Heights just north of the George Washington Bridge.  Our place can accommodate 3-4 guests comfortably, 2 in the master bedroom and 2 more in the second smaller bedroom. We are located in an exclusive apartment complex on a high cliff with breathtaking views of the Hudson River with many parks nearby. Roof access allows panoramic 360 degree visual enjoyment of the entire area! The building has a doorman, a laundry facility in the basement, and  24-hour security. There's also a Subway line (A-train express) just a five-minute walk away that can have you in Central Park or Penn Station in 20-30 minutes. The two-bedroom, one bathroom place is great for a couple (+1 or 2) and we are dog friendly. The master bedroom is quite large with a spacious Ikea closet, while the second, smaller has a great wraparound window with a view of the Hudson River. The kitchen is small but adequate

name: Amazing home near museum, gardens & park!
space: My amazing apartment will be available while I travel for work! I've decked out the room with all vintage and flea market finds, beautiful chandelier, 100 year old secretary deskette, and retro dresser! Its been painted in a calming robin's egg blue. The bedroom has great speakers if you like to listen to music or watch movies in bed. I also have subscriptions to New York Magazine and the New Yorker so you will be able to get the latest information on what's going on in NYC! Wifi included. The living room has a lot of seating, a great couch plus bench. The office is a fully functioning office that me and my employees use every working day. Feel free to use it as your office while you're staying here.  The location cannot be beat which is why I've lived here for 8 years already. Just a three minute walk to the Brooklyn Museum, the Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, Brooklyn Public Library and Prospect Park (at New Years they have a big celebration with fireworks at the entrance (otherwise know

name: Big Loft in Bushwick: Unfurnished, longterm sublet
space: It's located a few blocks from the Morgan L, and a 10 minute walk to the JM Flushing station. Morgan L gets you to Union Square in 15 minutes. It's a great location, as anyone can tell you, near to amazing restaurants (Roberta's, Momo, Blanca) coffeeshops (City of Saints, Sey Coffee, Kave, Supercrown) and shops. Thanks! -t

name: Small Private Room, Historic Brooklyn Townhouse
space: The Room The room available is small but very cozy. It has a full size real bed (upgraded since the pictures of the space were taken), and a window facing the main avenue. It is on the second floor of a three story brownstone and around the corner from the beautiful Fort Greene Park and it's Saturday Farmer's Market. The full bathroom is shared and also on the third floor. The Property Right on the center of Fort Greene you will be sharing a house in a three story, 4-bedroom and 2 bathrooms very charming classic New York brownstone. The house has a full open kitchen, a dining and a living room, an outside deck and a back yard with a vegetable garden. All of this on the first floor. The second and the third floor have 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom each. The laundry room is on the third floor too. You will be sharing the entire brownstone with other young professionals, mostly architects in a very creative and quirky household. The Area Fort Greene is one the most beautiful and after sought

name: Beautiful Chelsea Studio
space: My studio in the heart of Chelsea is currently available for short term sublets. Everything you could want in a home away from home!   Super-quiet Beautiful hardwood floors Lots of light Cable TV and wireless Air conditioning Closet/Drawer Space Towels/Linens provided Complete working kitchen No additional fees   The neighborhood of Chelsea is one of the safest and most desirable locations in the City.  The apartment is on a quiet tree-lined street that is around the corner from great restaurants, art galleries, and several subways that will take you to Rockefeller Center/Times Square/Central Park/Greenwich Village in just minutes.  It's also just blocks way from the famous High Line, New York City's new elevated park!   The apartment is in a 6th floor walkup (5 flights, no elevator).  On the plus side, this means you won't have to worry about going to the gym during your stay!  On the minus side, the climb might be tough for some travelers (though I'll bring up your luggage, so at lea

name: Williamsburg: Safe, Artistic, 15 mins to Manhattan
space: Located in, hands down, the hippest neighborhood in New York: Williamsburg. You will get the real New Yorker experience: Artists, Great bars, restaurants and venues.  5 Blocks from the L train Bedford Station. You will get anywhere in 15 minutes. The L train crosses manhattan connecting all train Lines.  The apartment is beautiful, sunny, quiet, cosy. Internet and full kitchen.

name: Cozy Modern LES Apt-Prime Location
space: Full 1 Bedroom apartment mixes all new furnishings with the transnational LES rustic feel . Separate lounge with open plan kitchen and breakfast bar. Location is PRIME. 1 block away from F, J, Z , M Subway trains. Across the street from Schillers bar and all the best restaurant, bars, and shopping in the Lower East Side. As well as Essex Market and Union Market for food shopping. Short walk to Soho, Houston Street and East Village. Apartment is fully furnished and includes: 50'' Samsung HD TV with soundbar. Apple TV, Netflix, Wireless Internet (15 mbs). Queen Size Bed. Sofa couch with queen size pullout. West facing with plenty of light. All stainless steel appliances: Dishwasher, large sink, gas range with double burner, Fridge freezer, ceasarstone counter top with bar stools. Full A/C The apartment is comfortable, cozy, and has all the modern touches. It also gives you amazing access to all the hot spots in the city.

name: CBG HelpsHaiti #5 Suite
space: CBG Owner Suite is available on selective dates. The owner suite description is the same as the main description for all of CBG rooms at Park Place.  Welcome to CommunityBeGood,(URL HIDDEN)    $30 per day donated to HAITI relief groups;   informal Brooklyn guest house in Park Slope, Brooklyn for people seeking accommodations tied into local neighborhood of Park Slope and to have their fees help support local and global social projects. We offer free wireless, cable TV in each room; Located 20 minutes from Manhattan by close subway, and steps from  Brooklyn's Fifth Avenue trendy cafes and shops/ BAM Brooklyn Academy of Music; ten minutes from Brooklyn Museum and Botanic Gardens.

name: Manhattan *SuperHost* Luxury Master Bdrm PRIVATE
space: PLEASE READ THE WHOLE DESCRIPTION SO YOU KNOW WHAT TO EXPECT & THERE ARE NO SURPRISES WHEN YOU ARRIVE *Infants DO count toward the total person count.  Please list any infants as children. ABOUT THE APARTMENT - This 1,100+ square foot apartment is a beautiful, clean, stylish TRUE 3- bedroom unit with high ceilings. The maplewood paneled windows face North so it stays cool but still brings in a lot of light. This apartment was very recently gut renovated which means EVERYTHING is brand new including beautiful hardwood floors, granite/stainless fully prepped open kitchen with brand new stainless steel appliances. Our apartment is also equipped with High Speed wireless Internet for your use. - This listing is for a SHARED apartment, and your exclusive use of the MASTER BEDROOM.  Guests are welcomed with a basket that includes Fresh towels for each guest, hair dryer, Subway Map and take out menu options. - This MASTER BEDROOM has a raised queen size captain bed with a memory foam mattress

name: Large & Elegant Pre-War One Bedroom
space: Enjoy a fantastic Summer in the heart of NY's classic Upper West Side. 3 blocks from Central Park and the Natural History museum. 2 blocks from Riverside Park and the Hudson River. Restaurants galore including Cafe Lalo and major retailers. Short walk to the 1 and 2/3 (express) subways.   Beautiful Pre-War spacious yet cozy and comfortable one bedroom apt. The queen bed sleeps 2 and the large L shaped couch can sleep 2 as well. High ceilings, great southern exposure lighting, quiet, large bathroom, full kitchen with separate dining room, queen size bed, 37" flat screen tv w/Apple TV including Netflix on demand, fast wi fi Internet .

name: 2-Bdrm Apt, NYC Upper West Side
space: This is a very spacious (1100 sq. feet/100+ sq. meters), sunny (8th floor, open views, southern exposure), 2-bedroom apartment, perfect for a family. Large bedroom has king-sized bed, small bedroom has twin-sized bed and crib (and a second twin bed can be set up). Full bathroom and kitchen with dishwasher. Laundry machines in the building. Access to lovely, sunny shared roof deck. One block from Central Park and a B/C subway stop, grocery shopping across the street, short walk to Columbia University. A couple of people have asked, so we just want to clarify that we don't have a television. We have WiFi, so bring your smartphones, laptops, tablets, Netflix subscriptions, etc.!

name: Duplex with two terraces and a view
space: I am renting my beautiful 2 bedroom convertible duplex in up and coming Prospect Heights/Crown Heights, Brooklyn. The apartment has two full bathrooms and each floor has it's own terrace. It is sunny, quiet, spacious and can comfortably accommodate 2 couples (there is an inflatable mattress if necessary). There are many bars and restaurants a few blocks away and you can have access to either the 2,3,4,5,A, and C trains.   Fully equipped modern kitchen, washer and dryer, wifi, and LED TV. Gay friendly a must! If you have questions, please feel free to contact me.

name: Luxury Loft Noho New York City
space: This is a large, spacious two thousand square foot loft with two bedrooms, two full bathrooms, a dining room that can be converted into a third bedroom with a queen futon and floor to ceiling heavy linen curtains to enclose the space for privacy, a very large living room, kitchen and balcony. The loft is above a world renowned Spa which is three floors of state of the art massage and facial rooms with a pool size jacuzzi, enormous sauna and steam room ((website hidden)). The guests can access the entrance to the spa without leaving the building.  The loft is  is half a block from the Bowery Hotel. It is also directly in front of the famous Herzog and De Meuron loft residences.  The neighborhood is now Manhattan's most expensive zip code.  Dotted by celebrity inhabitants, the loft is in the center of the most desirable restaurants in the city. It is three blocks from recently opened critically acclaimed New Museum.  Minutes from all downtown attractions Meat Packing District, Chinatown,

name: 1 BR In the Heart of Hell's Kitchen
space: A cozy, private bedroom in a great 3-bedroom apartment in Hell's Kitchen. Five minute walk to Times Square, Central Park, and surrounding area!!   THE ROOM:  New, comfortable full bed with fresh linens.  A/C unit included. Small Closet. Personal TV connected to AppleTV. THE APARTMENT:  Large 3 BR, 1 bath. CLEAN, very sunny, airy, great energy. Full kitchen with anything you would need (including a dishwasher!), living room furnished with flat screen TV, and a very nice, big bathroom. Nice neighbors.  NOTE: the building is a walk-up, so be advised if stairs are not your thing :)

name: Large but cosy Bushwick apartment
space: Our unusually large Brooklyn apartment (1200sf ÛÒ 110m2) is the perfect opportunity for a family or fiends to share over the holidays.  Two large bedrooms are placed on opposite ends of the apartment, each with a full size bed with high quality mattresses.  Additionally, we have a crib, baby chair, play mat etc. if you're bringing a young one.   The Kitchen is open and very bright with a southwest exposure and has access to a huge private patio.  The dining room table fits 8- 10 people as well as the outside patio table.  You will have access to all the basic cooking and baking appliances you will need including: Kitchen aid mixer, variety of pots and pans, a rice cooker, microwave oven, toaster and electric water boiler.  The kitchen also holds a dishwasher and washer/dryer. Our living room consists of a cozy TV area with a new 32" flat screen television and apple TV (Netflix  and hulu included).  Our couch fits 4 people and can double as a sleeping area for one person if need be.  Con

name: HUGE PRIVATE STUDIO IN BOWERY LOFT
space: Hi everybody! :) We have a large studio available at the front of our artist loft on Bowery. The space has loads of natural light (but the curtains are black out for anyone who likes to sleep in!), tonnes of closet space, a california king size bed, dinner table/ workspace and a wonderfully comfortable couch that folds out into a queen sized bed if needed. There is a separate entrance to the room to ensure your privacy, however you will share the kitchen and bathroom. We're located in the center of trendy downtown nyc, where you will find limitless restaurants, cafes and shopping! Easy walking to SoHo, Chinatown, Little Italy, East Village, & subways to all neighborhoods and boroughs are a quick 5 minute walk from the apartment. WeÛªd be happy to give recommendations on restaurants, galleries or bars, anytime! :) Looking forward to hearing from you! Mike and Carey.

name: Cute Studio Apt in a Mansion (1882)
space: Supercute, furnished studio with a bay window and built-in, dark-wood cabinetry -- in an 1882 mansion. Set in Fort Greene/Clinton Hill on a street lined with mansions.  Minutes from DeKalb "restaurant row", Vanderbilt restaurants and bars, and the C and G trains. A 10-minute walk to the 2/3/4/5/Q/B trains at Atlantic/Barclay's, the Brooklyn Academy of Music, and Fort Greene Park, and a 15-minute walk to Prospect Park.  There's a record player and the place is covered in Marimekko. Full bath. Generally: adorable! Available for 10/21-30. Message me if you're interested in a shorter stay (6 night minimum).

name: Washington Heights homestay
space: Lovely room in nice neighborhood right off the C train. The room has a queen size bed, dresser, and closet.  Located on the quiet side of building.  20 mins from midtown and 42nd street.  Great, affordable place! You have access to a large kitchen, bathroom and the living room.  I don't use cable but do have Hulu, Sling and a couple of movie apps.   We have a part time doorman in the building.  It's a quaint little neighborhood in Manhattan that gives you a historical feel to the city. Pets may be considered on a case by case basis. Parking is on street no meters on streets surrounding building, however there are alternate side parking rules that must be followed so you don't get a ticket.

name: huge duplex in brownstone (1bd)
space: The most spacious lovely duplex two bedroom lovely apartment on the garden and parlor level of a brownstone.  On a unique, quite tree lined block in Clinton Hill. The kitchen is oversized.  There is a dining room table. Two separate living room areas. The bedroom has a queen comfortable bed with views of trees and sky.  There are two bathrooms.  One is a full bathroom with two sinks and a shower as well as a jacuzzi bathtub. Access to the private garden.

name: Sunny apartment in Carroll Gardens
space: We have a nice, clean apartment for sublet in the beautiful neighborhood of Carroll Gardens. It is a one bedroom, very sunny with two exposures, and views of the Manhattan skyline. Note it is a walk-up on the fifth floor. It is located one block from the Carroll Street station on the 'F' and 'G' lines. Very near lots of restaurants (Frankie's, Lucali, Buttermilk Channel, etc.), bars and across from a small park. You will share the apartment with a nice cat. Full description: This is a corner unit with two exposures - this means great light and a nice cross breeze. The apartment is on the fifth floor, with no elevator. Maybe surprisingly, this is one of the highest apartments in the neighborhood. The views are fantastic. From one side of the apartment there is a great view of the Lower Manhattan skyline and a beautiful church. From the other side of the apartment, there is a view of low-rise Brooklyn and the massive Verrazano Bridge in the distance. The kitchen is partially separate, fu

name: BOERUM HILL, Entire Home / Loft
space: Our unique, modern, large 3 level loft in a turn of the century former beer brewery. Located 15 minute subway ride from Manhattan. The neighborhood is one of Brooklyn's best - fantastic restaurants, coffee shops & shopping. 1000 sq. ft, 3-level Ground Floor Loft connected by a spiral staircase -- 15 minutes from Manhattan!  - Comfortably fits 2 couples.  - One full master bedroom plus loft space with a sleeper sofa.  - 2 1/2 blocks from Subway (Atlantic Ave/Barclay Center) N/R/Q/W/D/B/4/5/2/3/M.  - Minutes away from Barclay Center, Carrol Gardens, Park Slope, Dumbo and Brooklyn Academy of Music.  - 1 full bathroom off of living room. 1/2 bathroom in master bedroom.  - Clean sheets and towels provided.  - Washer/Dry(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) per load) located right outside of master bedroom.  - Utilities/Free Wireless Internet/42" Flat Screen TV/Vinyl Collection with record players and mixer/Cable(HBO)/Air-Conditioned/Heat/Surround Sound System/Very Clean Bathroom/Fully Stocked Kitchen ready

name: Private Room in Converted Loft
space: Our loft is often described as a haven, tall ceilings, a skylight in the main living space, comfy decor & a big dining table. I love hosting, cooking and being a designer and I believe that is expressed in my home.  Details: -  Private 12' x 12' Room with 12' ceilings & two windows in our 1300 sq ft loft available for short term & semi-long term stays. The room is furnished with a new full sized bed with pillow topper, a large desk, large chest of drawers, hanging rack for clothes, bedside tables & lamps.  The room is for a single person or for couples (couples - short stay only), clean sheets, pillows, duvet & towels are provided. The room is equipped with a window a/c unit in summer. - The loft is a 2nd floor walk-up in Greenpoint & I would describe the decor as "Eclectic Modern". The bathroom is shared with us (our bedroom is on the opposite end of the 560 square foot living/dining room). The bathroom is a typical older bathroom for a nyc apartment, but a bit more spacious than most

name: Stylish Park-View Apt with King Bed
space: Overlooking Marcus Garvey Park, this large 1 bedroom apartment has ample space and charming decor. It is situated in a historic Harlem building on 5th Ave at 120th Street, just 10 blocks from Central Park and minutes by foot from the 2/3 or 6 trains on 116th Street or 125th Street. It is also only a five minute walk to the Metro North train station at Harlem/125th Street.  The apartment is very easily reachable from both La Guardia and JFK airports. Use this apartment as your home away from home in trendy up-and-coming Harlem or your temporary office in New York. It has two large rooms, a living room overlooking the park and a large bedroom with king-size bed and full bathroom, as well as a kitchen with all amenities. There is a Laundromat in the building and some good places to eat all around including some of HarlemÛªs best. You can reach the Upper East Side shopping and museums (Metropolitan Museum, Guggenheim) or the Upper West Side by train or a five minute cab-ride. Mid-town shopp

name: Charming Astoria/NYC Studio Sublet
space: -Charming studio apartment in Astoria, Queens. (I'm not sure why this site is listing me as Long Island City...) -Queen sized bed; L-shaped sectional couch. -Wireless (and plug in!) internet; no television (I watch all of my TV online. I can give you a list of free TV websites!) -Small (but updated) separate, clean kitchen. -Extremely clean, odor-free, well-decorated and well-maintained little place. I love it. :) -Quiet, safe, tree-lined street. -Cute, safe, clean building; laundry facilities in-building. -Quiet, dog-friendly building, but requesting guests traveling WITHOUT pets. -NON-SMOKING apartment. -Three blocks from the BROADWAY stop of the N/Q Trains (Subway/MTA). The N/Q Trains run from Astoria directly into Manhattan- no transfers. Once in Manhattan, the N/Q Train run directly down the middle of Manhattan. Attractions off of the N/Q Train: Bloomingdales (at 59th and Lexington), Central Park and the Apple Store (59th and 5th), Times Square (42nd Street/Times Square), Macy's &

name: Home Sweet Room-SAPPHIRE-Queens NYC
space: Hello!! Thank you for checking our listing! We have 3 other listings available so please take the time to look at them to see which one better suit your needs. name: Charming, Bright Village Duplex
space: Hello!  PLEASE do not submit a booking request IF YOU HAVEN'T WRITTEN TO US FIRST!  Availability for this apartment is rather limited, and it's best to see if it's open for you before you submit cc details, etc.   Live like a New Yorker in our little hideaway from the hustle and bustle of Greenwich Village!   At the moment we are offering rentals in the duplex starting 1-2 months before an open date.  If you need to book ahead of that, we do have our two guesthouse apartments (info below).    To get an overall idea about the space -- A space this size in a Village hotel would cost at least $600 a night.  Our price reflects the fact that this is a permanent home to a family with pets.  We offer it for rent when we are out of town.  It is clean and charming and homey but it is not pristine and modern and full of amenities as a hotel would be!  And the price reflects that! name: Great 2-BR apt in the Heart of the Lower East Side
space: Greetings! My name is Peter and I'm excited to offer my large apartment in the Lower East Side of Manhattan.  The apartment is modern and clean, and you are of course welcome to use all the kitchen amenities and treat my home as if it were your own! There is a full sized bathroom and shower as well. You are steps away from the building's roof access, which offers great panoramic views of the city. The two bedrooms are on opposite sides of the apartment, with a living area and kitchen in between, so there is a great deal of privacy if you are traveling as separate couples or for business.  There is a fully stocked kitchen, with tons of cabinet space, and you are free to cook to your hearts desire. I'm a musician and have lots of instruments and vinyl records which you are welcome to use as well! The neighborhood is, in my opinion, the best neighborhood in all of the five boroughs. name: TASTEFUL DESIGN + SPACE FOREVER
space: Absolutely adorable two-bedroom on the second floor of an historic 19th century building on the Mansion Row in Bushwick. You'd be a block stumble away from the J Train (20 min into Manhattan) and the B52 (20 min to Downtown BK). The L is also within walking distance! The street is tree-lined and arguably the quaintest street in Bushwick. You can take a stroll in the evening and look at the old mansions on the avenue. The apartment is furnished in lots of Mid-Century Danish fun as well as Deco and Nouveau. The Master Bed has a queen and the second bedroom accommodates a twin. The couch in the living room accommodates an additional guest. The kitchen is fully-equipped with Le Creuset cookery and there is also a Kitchenaid mixer and food processor with butcher block surface for baking. The floors were just redone and cabinets painted. There's a skylight in the bathroom, which is always fun. The shower has great pressure and there is a towel warmer that dries linens in a snap.  Free hi-spe

name: Central Park North Guest House
space: We are located right above Central Park- convenient to the B,C,2,3 trains as well as many buses . The apartment is a private studio- private entrance- queen size bed and a pull out couch. There is a full kitchen and bath. A cozy studio flat in a townhouse at the top of Central Park. Private entrance, full bath and kitchen.  Close to many subways and buses. A quick 10 minute subway ride to times square. There is wifi- with Netflix and Apple TV as well network television. I live upstairs with my family. If there are any problems you can reach me at anytime.  I respect all my guests' privacy so often times guests do not see me or my family unless they need to. Our neighborhood is a beautiful retreat from the busy NYC days. WE are located so close to the upper part of Central Park- take a walk or rent a bike and enjoy the beauty. In the summer there is a large outdoor pool and in the winter it turns into an ice skating rink. Public transit is incredibly convenient.

A comfy queen-size sofa bed (for 2ppl) and an additional single memory foam bed are available for your use to guarantee a quiet  night.  Located in a quiet, awesome building that has been carefully maintained, 1 block from the 40th Street station on the 7th Line, you can be in the city from 10 minutes (Lexington-59th) to 20 minutes (Times Square) and also explore Brooklyn easily using the G line and the new Court Sq connection. Sunnyside, is considered one of the most diverse neighborhoods in the US and rated by New Yorker magazine ((website hidden))

name: Very Cool Entire Apartment | BUSHWICK

Located conveniently one block from the Myrtle/Broadway express JMZ in the heart of Bushwick, one of the coolest neighborhoods in Brooklyn - the apartment is surrounded by great cafes, restaurants, bars, and music venues. Easy access to SoHo, LES, Chelsea, the West Village, Chinatown, and Williamsburg via the JMZ; plus a scenic view from the train over the Williamsburg Bridge. Only a 15 minute walk from the L train, with fast and easy access to the East Village, Union Square, and every other subway line. name: Amazing Prewar East Village Apt
space: Short sublet of beautiful East Village apartment --It's close to Union Square, and is the perfect location for your summer vacation to NYC -- Great area for nightlife, restaurants, and close to several subway lines --  Prewar tenement building, 4th floor with view of 13th Street, recently renovated, lots of original details  -- Impeccably clean and attractive bathroom with washing machine -- The kitchen has high-end, green appliances  -- Wireless Internet -- No television but lots of books -- We've listed this for 2, but no problem sleeping more if you're a family traveling with children (we'll provide an air mattress) -- We don't have pets, but you're welcome to bring yours -- We belong to the NYC bike share program, Citibike, and you're welcome to use our keys (free 45 minute rides in Manhattan/Brooklyn--we'll be happy to show you how it works) If it's your first time in New York City, we can assure you that the East Village is one of the most exciting, historic and convenient parts

The window overlooks our backyard which no one besides us has access to so you don't have to worry about safety because there are walls all around. The bathroom has a shower and a toilet. There is also another bathroom right out side the bedroom that is a full bathroom. The bedroom has a full size bed, towels,  and a desk.

name: Bright Loft One Stop from Soho
space: Large, open and airy loft on the 5th floor in a former factory building. The building has part-time elevator service (11am-11pm M-F, 12-10pm S-S), so you may have to walk up in the late evenings and mornings. There are seven train lines in the area and most go to lower Manhattan in one or two stops. The trains are A/C/F/N/R/Q/B/G/4/5/2/3. The building is walking distance to the Brooklyn and Manhattan Bridges, DUMBO, Carroll Gardens, Fort Greene and the Nets Stadium. Cabs are easily found on Flatbush Avenue around the corner. The apartment is 1000 square feet and has 12 foot ceilings. There is also a shared roof deck with lovely Manhattan views. The couch can accommodate a third guest, if needed. name: Central Williamsburg Fab Large Room
space: The apartment is in the heart of Williamsburg, one of NYC's trendiest and liveliest neighborhoods. It's on a quiet street, just a few blocks from the water and park so you can enjoy the sunset with a beautiful view of Manhattan. There are tons of amazing restaurants, bars, art galleries, coffee shops, and boutiques just around the corner.  It's a 3 minute walk to the L train and just one stop from Manhattan and three stops (Union Square) from all major trains. The G is a 10 minute walk, connecting you to South Brooklyn and Queens. The apartment is on the 3rd floor and overlooks the shared backyard so it's very quiet and away from any streets. The room has large windows, a very comfortable queen-size bed and a large closet for ample storage. space: Our 1300 square foot apartment is in the heart of Williamsburg seconds from the subway and minutes from Manhattan. It can be all yours for Labor Day Weekend! Our Apartment Features: 30 second walk to subway- 1 stop to Manhattan (Less than 10 mins to Union Sq Door to Door) 3 Bedroom, 2 Bathroom, 2 Balconies, Living Room, Full Kitchen- Sleeps 6  12 Ft Ceilings Gym Roof deck with view of Manhattan skyline Brand New Elevator building Outdoor Courtyard with Fireplace Washer/Dryer Bathtub Dishwasher Verizon Fios Wifi 40 inch Flat Screen TV with connection for laptop New Appliances Sheets/Towels included Wood Floors Complimentary Champagne Included :) Subway- First stop in Brooklyn off of the L train Less than 10 minutes from Union Square 15 minutes to the Village 20 Minutes to Penn Station 25 Minutes to Times Square

name: Loft with daylight & Manhattan view
space: Bright and sunny loft with big windows facing Manhattan. The loft is in a nice area in Bushwick between Dekalb and Jefferson stations on the L-line. It takes 1 minute to walk to the subway station and 15 minutes to get to Union Square in Manhattan. We love our neighbourhood because it has all the cool stuff without being too hip and it's still a peaceful place. Great restaurants and bars, big keyfood supermarket on the corner and a healthfood supermarket down the street. and very important, the best taco place in bushwick just around the corner (los tres hermanos). We have a new very comfortable king size bed (the journey to dreamland takes 3 wonderful minutes) and a sofa bed that can accomodate 2 adults.

name: Brooklyn House-20 min. to Manhattan
space: We have been lucky enough to completely renovate our 3-story townhouse in the summer of 2014!  That means it is all new and full of design charm even though it dates back to 1853.  It is three stories with a very large kitchen and dining room in an open design.  The upstairs bathroom has a very large tub and the downstairs shower has a built in steam room.  The kitchen has all of the modern appliances you could want including an induction stovetop in the kitchen island.  The back of the house is almost completely glass (two 4-panel sliding doors) on two floors looking out on two patios/decks, one above the other.  AND the house is 2 blocks from the subway that can take you to Manhattan in 20 minutes and 1/2 block from Brooklyn's biggest, finest park! Great restaurants, cafes, and amenities within walking distance.

name: Gorgeous Modern Williamsburg Loft
space: A steel factory  converted into condos. 650sq ft, first owner (bought 20111). Many of the original building structures are preserved. The space includes high ceilings, a full bathroom (with a great deep tub), a large kitchen with an island/bar (all brand new appliances: dishwasher, espresso/coffee machine, etc), a laundry closet with washer/dryer, and the rest of the space is divided into the bedroom and living room. The living room has exposed brick, on which is a mounted flat screen Smart TV. The view out the window is of the Williamsburg Bridge and the Domino Sugar Factory. I have electric blinds that completely block the sunlight from coming through the floor to ceiling windows if you want to sleep in. Queen size bed.  As seen on episode 206 of the Hulu original series Deadbeat (Matthews apartment).

name: Brand New Bay House
space: Newly constructed  spacious 3BR/2BA home in Queens, NY for a perfect getaway while still enjoying the warmth of your home! Enjoy WIFI, 2 flat screen TVs, charcoal BBQ, fully equipped stainless steel kitchen and full size washer and dryer. Maximum occupancy 6. Private walled yard. Waterfront view of Powell's Bay, 5 minutes from LGA airport and 10 minutes from JFK.  Public transportation two blocks away. Free shuttle service to and from airport and complimentary daily housekeeping.   Master Bedroom ÛÒ Queen Bed, 55Û_ flat screen, Cable 1 Guest Bedrooms ÛÒ Queen Bed 1 Guest Bedroom with twin bed Living Room with comfortable sectional, 55Û_ flat screen TV/DVD, Dining Room ÛÒ Large modern table seats 6 Kitchen ÛÒ Granite, newer appliances, breakfast & table for 6 overlooking. Video security system Alarm system $200 Security deposit 6 GUEST MAXIMUM!

name: Sun drenched West Village Apartment
space: Located in the heart of Manhattan our charming apartment is right in the middle of everything. We are 2 blocks from the subway and 50 meters from the best coffee in New York. We are surrounded by an amazing array of bars, restaurants, cafes, comedy clubs and shops. Walking distance from Soho, East Village, Meat Packing District and the High Line. Set off the street the apartment also offers a quiet and tranquil setting amongst a very lively neighborhood and the bedroom overlooks a beautiful old lane way.  The apartment is spacious, with high ceilings and big windows, clean and very comfortable. The kitchen and bathroom are pleasant, practical and functioning with everything you'll need. There is a shared laundry in the building. The bedroom is large and open and great place to wake up in NYC! We expect all visitors to respect our neighbors and our property.  We know you'll enjoy our beautiful apartment and it's amazing setting.

name: Beautiful Cozy Bright Artsy West Village Loft
space: Perfectly located in the heart of the West Village, only a couple blocks from two major subway stations (1, A, B, C, D, E, F, V, M) and Washington Square Park, this renovated, bright, stylish and spacious studio apartment is located on the 6th floor of a beautiful converted factory pre-war building with doorman/elevator, high ceilings, a full wall of mirrors and white brick, as well as a fabulous direct view of the Empire State Building. Complete with a dishwasher, 4 burner stove and fully equipped spacious kitchen, shower/bathtub and laundry facilities on the same floor. Super clean and cozy, very functional and comfortable space, you will want to move in!  A lot of added decoration love has been added to the apartment since those photos, so expect some more plants, interesting objects and nicer lighting fixtures. At night, dim the overhead, turn on the 20 electric candles with a switch of a remote as well as a red and black light in the corner and get a really awesome nighttime sexy

name: UES APT- NEAR CENTRAL PARK, MUSEUMS
space: This is an entire 1-bedroom apartment located on the beautiful and scenic Upper East Side of Manhattan.  The apartment is within walking distance to a lot of public transportation- the 4/5/6 subway and the M15 busses can get you downtown within 15-35 minutes.  You can also walk to Museum Mile which includes the Metropolitan Museum of Art and Guggenheim Museum among many other noteworthy museums.  The Natural History Museum is a short crosstown bus ride away.  There are also drugstore, 2 gourmet supermarkets, dry cleaner, launder, and post office within walking distance of the neighborhood.  The apartment is very quiet and it is fully stocked in case you were interested in cooking or hanging out if it's too cold to go outside.

name: Spacious Loft in heart of Tribeca
space: Spacious studio apartment with queen sized lofted bed and queen sized pull out couch. Quiet building with rarely seen neighbors, secure keyed elevator, and 20' ceilings.  Super also available on site during regular business hours. Amenities include: -Secure floor w/ keyed elevator -Washer/Dryer in unit -Cable/Wifi -Kitchenette w/ electric stovetop & microwave -42" Flatscreen Sharp Aquos TV -Blu-Ray DVD player -Electronic drumset for use upon request/agreement -Full sized work desk/space below loft -Walk-in closet -Electric floor heating_A/C_Ceiling fans -Video/Audio Intercom secure entry system -Ample weekend parking (restricted 7am-7pm Mon-Fri but alternate side parking on surrounding streets) Best location in NYC, family friendly and just footsteps from 100s of restaurants, bars, lounges, art galleries etc.  Walking distance to the World Trade Center Memorial, City Hall, Wall Street, shopping at Century 21 and fabulous TriBeCa restaurants including Nobu, Locande Verde, Mr. Chow's, Fe

name: Ground Floor Studio With Backyard
space: This cozy and quiet ground floor studio is the perfect place for a couple to stay during their trip to New York.  Designed (and usually lived in) by two East Village artists, the apartment is wonderfully unique--the walls are colorful and full of interesting art.  The back door of the apartment leads out to a beautiful, spacious, and private backyard.   The apartment comes fully equipped with everything you will need during your stay--it features a full bath, complete with a nice-sized tub and shower.  There is a small kitchen where you can cook and make coffee (we have a coffee pot, juicer, and lots of other kitchen utensils and supplies!), and a large refrigerator that can be used to store drinks, snacks, and leftovers.  The apartment also comes equipped with high speed wifi. Only a block or two from the apartment, you will find an assortment of wonderful restaurants and cafes, an art gallery, a wine store, and a selection of great local bars.  Transportation from the apartment is ea

name: _üFeel@HOME Brooklyn Clinton Hill _ü
space: I am HAPPY to say I have 161 POSITIVE REVIEWS!! Welcome to my home in Clinton Hill/Bed Stuy. This is an entire flat all to yourself. My creative 1 BDRM apartment boasts 9 foot tin ceilings and just the right amount of space for your stay. By Brooklyn Standards this is a decent sized apartment and from my awesome reviews you can be sure that this apartment is quiet for Brooklyn standards. My place is right on the second floor of my building so you do NOT have to walk up a ton of stairs. I am a designer and always try to make my apartments feel like my home so anyone who stays at my place will have a unique experience and feel comfortable while traveling! I have high expectations for the people who stay at my apartment. Essentially I would like people to use my space just as I do. I take my shoes off at the door, and keep my place extremely clean to keep any NYC pests out. I have filled every hole in my walls to make sure that the only guests that stay are ones that pay! HAHA. My apartme

name: Brooklyn Apt: 1 Bedroom w/Garden
space: Really nice 1 bedroom floor through with a private back garden.  Our house is quiet and serene. Upstairs are two small studios, both rented to quiet and respectful people. Apartment has hardwood bamboo floors, a ceramic tile bathroom, granite countertops, solid wood furniture. It was recently renovated and has new kitchen appliances: refrigerator, stove, dishwasher and washing machine (no dryer but a line in the backyard). There are big front and back windows, an all glass door to the back garden and a skylight in the entry hallway ie, pretty good light for a fully attached building. The apartment is fully furnished with high quality stuff: a full sized double bed, night tables and lamps, wood dresser & wood wardrobes, lovely 1940s original loveseat in the bedroom: gorgeous Amish dining table, original 1960s chairs and lots of cabinet space in the kitchen; desk on filing cabinets and a storage bench in the entry/office; a futon couch (opens to a full sized bed for guests), end tables a

name: Bohemian Loft: 2 Beds+Patio
space: A glimpse into the lifestyle of a real Brooklynite! Enjoy our entire first floor apartment to your self with a private yard. This high ceilinged artist style loft offers windows on both side of the apt (front and back).  A back door off of the kitchen brings you out to a small private backyard.  The apt feels airy and creative.  There is one bathroom (shower and bathroom split), one lofted bedroom (low ceilings so watch your head;), a full kitchen, and a HUGE living room with a TV to connect your laptop for streaming movies or shows.  The whole place is painted white, with whitewashed hardwood floors.  We've decorated it with pieces of art we've been given or bought.  There are a lot of indoor plants to enjoy as well! The bedroom is lofted above the kitchen, in a comfy nook (albeit not much headroom).   Our white couch doubles as a second bed to allow for extra guests to stay. We also have an air mattress available. The kitchen has plenty of counter space if you like to cook!  While th

name: ***HOT SPOT*** 2 blocks to L Train
space: Welcome to Williamsburg! The hottest neighborhood in NYC! Enjoy a spacious, bright and modern apartment, located just 2 blocks from the Lorimer L train subway station (2 stops from Manhattan), 4 blocks to the vibrating Bedford Avenue loaded with great restaurants and boutique shops, and 3 blocks to McCarren Park- great for picnic or exercise. The apartment is very large, sunny and modern. It can easily accommodate 4 (or 5) people. Featuring a separate den (currently used as a nursery), a fully equipped kitchen including a Nespresso coffee machine for you to enjoy (!), a dining area, a modern bathroom, and a washer/ dryer in the unit. Cable TV and Wi-Fi internet included. Also, the building offers a 24 hr gym & rooftop deck access with stunning city views! Enjoy the sunset overlooking the Empire State Building and Downtown Manhattan...

name: Quiet, 1st Floor w/ Backyard & Art
space: The skinny: The Unit: Upper East Side, first floor (no stairs to climb), clean, non-smoker, with a private backyard and grill Private outdoor space in Manhattan is incredibly rare.  I have also taken the time to curate the unit with one-of-a-kind art and photography in an effort to transform the unit into an oasis in the city.  I find the tranquil personality of the apartment to be incredibly restorative after a long day of work or play in NYC. The Neighborhood: Quiet, great bars and restaurants, 5 minute walk to the East River (great for running), 10 minute walk to Central Park Subway: 5 minute walk Comes with fresh linens and towels It's quiet, great bars and restaurants, big space, close to EastRiver (great for running), 10 minute walk to central park Public tranport is 4 blocks away

name: 1 Bedroom Apartment in Ditmas Park
space: We've got a big 1 bedroom, a living room with a window seat, a kitchen and a bathroom with a bathtub. Its always warm and bright, so we are relaxing or having dinner parties as often as possible. We can offer you a dresser and a closet to use while you stay here. We've got a really strong Wifi-Router and super sweet neighbors if you plan on being a homebody. The two of us have a whole lot of space, so we've recently hosted a couple just in our living room, but you'll have the whole apartment!

name: comfy artsy cottage garden studio
space: Located off-street in the rear, we have quiet, privacy, a garden and bbq and yes, stars at night! We sleep in the room facing the garden, to hear the birds, awaken to sun, and in summer, enjoy the night air. The back room is cozy for reading,  watching movies or quiet talks.  During the summer, we eat outside unless it rains or we want to step out for dinner. It's all good in Prospect Heights!!  Our neighbors are quiet, and Prospect Park is up the street! Culture abounds and all forms of transportation are within walking distance.  The farmers market is up the street every Saturday at Prospect Park. You'll find the Central Library,  Booklyn Botanic Garden and Brooklyn Art Museum nearby. You may be overwhelmed by the choices of restaurants and you will find plenty of other cultural venues.  After all that, it is a relief, and a luxury, to relax in the backyard, read in the hammock, enjoy your breakfast or dinner or just look up at the stars you forgot existed here in the heart of NYC!

name: Midtown Lux Manhattan by 5th Ave
space: Contemporary modern one bedroom apartment with furnishings and artwork from around the globe.  My apartment is perfectly located to most famous Manhattan sites, including Central Park and 5th Avenue, and a 2 minute walk to all subways.  Only minutes walk from Bloomingdales, Central Park, 5th Avenue, Grand Central Terminal, and  Rockefeller Center.  The apartment is a very large 1 bedroom(approx 1000ft2) located just off 57th street.  Style is comfortable modern.  There is a canopy post king size bed, full bathroom with separate bathtub and 'rain' shower.  You will have full access for 2 closets in the apartment, 1 in the bedroom and 1 in the living room.  The kitchen has a 4 burner gas stove, dishwasher, microwave, large fridge and beautiful marble countertops.   The living room has a U shaped couch with chaise lounge that screams comfort.  A large flat screen TV with Time Warner Cable, high speed internet with access to my IMac 27, printer, etc.  I have a super comfortable AIR mattres

name: AMAZING 1 BR- TIME SQUARE-SLEEPS 4
space: AMAZING  ,ENTIRELY FOR YOU, 1 BR -TIMES SQ/ THEATER DISTRICT   This apt is located in the heart of Midtown west NYC/ Manhattan Times Square/ Theater District area-Safe and exclusive neighborhood, A lot of restaurants from all around the world. Broadway shows,  5 min away form main subway/bus station ( Port Authority ) ...10 minutes walk to Central Park, Rockefeller Center.. This neighborhood is known to have the best nightlife in NYC and best restaurants row in NYC. The apartment is very comfortable, functional, clean and organized, located on the 2nd floor. Enjoy a private bedroom with a double size bed, LCD HD TV ,and free  Internet  wi-fi. The floor to ceiling tiled bathroom has a bath tub, hair dryer, and fresh towels  for your convenience. The kitchen has a large refrigerator,a dishwasher, a brand new stove, a toaster, a coffee maker( coffee, tea and condiments included),electric kettle, a microwave and pots, pans, utensils etc...  The living room has a full size sofa bed, stereo

name: Awesome, Unique EAST VILLAGE LOFT!!
space: One fully furnished room available in a 3BR loft in the East Village. One of the only true lofts in the East Village, this amazingly spacious apartment (2,000 square ft) has exposed brick, hardwood floors, high ceilings, and huge windows which let in tons of sunlight! The gigantic living room features two leather couches, a flat-screen TV, BOSE stereo, full built-in bar, track lighting and a sexy disco ball!  Full kitchen (furnished with dishes/pans/glasses, etc). Marble bathroom with excellent water pressure in the shower. The available bedroom is large and has a window facing a courtyard so it's very quiet (no street noise). It is furnished with a super-comfy queen bed, wardrobe closet, desk, dresser and a lounge chair.  A stereo and LCD TV is in the room as well.  Linens/towels can be provided, but please ask in advance. Fantastic location in the heart of the East Village near tons of amazing restaurants (think every type of ethnic restaurant you can imagine within a 3 block radius,

name: Charming, huge BR, nr Prospect Park
space: Come stay in my gorgeous, large (140 sf) sunny bedroom in the heart of Prospect Heights, Brooklyn. Room has a double bed, 3 windows, HUGE walk-in closet with dresser. Room and apt are furnished very attractively with a mix of Danish modern, vintage 1940s blonde wood (Heywood-Wakefield) and  contemporary furniture.  You will be sharing this 2 BR apt with my roommate, who is nice, quiet, sociable and courteous. You should be the same. Shared bathroom has tub and shower; cute kitchen has workspace for food prep and small table for two or three. The location could not be better. We are a 5 minute walk from the Q/B at 7th Avenue, and the 2/3 at Bergen. Any of these trains gets you to Union Square in 20 minutes. A fifteen minute walk takes you to Prospect Park, BAM, Brooklyn Museum, Park Slope boutiques, Fort Greene shopping and bars; a 10-minute bus ride gets you to Cobble Hill/Carroll Gardens and fun, trendy Smith Street. 10 minutes walking  to Atlantic Avenue and the new Barclay's Center.

name: NYC Apartment in East Village
space: The apartment is in a pre-war building on a quiet street off Avenue B. The restaurants and nightlife of Manhattan's east village and lower east side are right outside the door. It's 2 blocks from the F train and close to union square, making it convenient to all parts of the city by public transportation. Modern furnishings, exposed brick walls, wifi, easy roof access (nice perk for smokers), microwave + dishwasher. Grocery stores and a 24 hour pharmacy a block away.  Please send a message for more details.

name: Designer's Haven, 2-Bedroom, East Village
space: Fashionable two-bedroom apartment in nice building, beautifully furnished and centrally located downtown, in ManhattanÛªs popular East Village.  APARTMENT: Spotless (very clean), Newly Painted and Decorated, Beautifully Furnished and Designed.  Comfortable and Welcoming (NYC Fashion Photographers Hideaway). APARTMENT FEATURES:    2 Bedrooms (2 Queen Sized Beds), 1 Bathroom, 1 Kitchen, 1 Living Room, 1 Foyer EXTRAS:  Electric Guitar, iMac Computer &  High Speed Wireless Internet Connection, 60in LG Plasma TV (high definition) & Time Warner Cable Programming, Fan, Microwave, Pots and Pans & Kitchen Amenities, Air Conditioning* BUILDING FEATURES:  Contemporary/Recent Construction, Elevator, Doorman, Roof Access, Laundry, Gym, Beautiful Lobby, Courtyard, Great panoramic Views of entire City can be seen from the roof (Downtown - Ground Zero/Financial district. Midtown - Empire State Building, Chrysler Building). NEIGHBORHOOD:  With its low slung buildings East Village of Manhattan is home to

name: Historic East Village Brownstone
space: This classic East Village 2 BR, 2.5 Bath Brownstone is ideally located just blocks from Union Square and will give you access to the best of New York City. You will have complete access to the entire first, second and third floors of this historic home (the top floor is an art studio), including a full kitchen, a bedroom/office with full bath, a garden terrace, another half bathroom, a large, sunny 2nd floor open living room/dining room with a huge L couch, and the third floor bedroom/full bathroom.  The house is classically furnished with a combined collection of antique and contemporary decor. A great place to spend a few days in NYC any time of year, but especially the summer!  Just a short walk from many of the city's major subway lines (4,5,6,N,Q,R,L) easy access to most others (B,D,F,M,1,2,3), and close (15 minute walk or less) to Greenwich Village, Gramercy, Alphabet City, West Village, Lower East Side, the location could not be more central! And despite the prime location, the

name: Big one bedroom located in Brooklyn
space: I would love to sublet my place for a month and a half. If you are looking for a sublet that long please touch base with me.  I'm subletting my apartment in Prospect Heights Brooklyn. It's within a 5 minute walk to Prospect Park, Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, Brooklyn Library, and Brooklyn Museum. There are four different trains that you can take to this neighborhood. The Q and B or the 2,3 trains. It's very accessible and easy to get the city.  Brooklyn Barclays and Atlantic Terminal is a 20 minute walk and is the hub of Brooklyn and almost all trains stop there as well as the Long Island railroad. There many great restaurants and bars within walking distance as well.  Basically a great neighborhood. My apartment is a large one bedroom with full kitchen and bath. No cable but I do have wifi. It's a modest no frills apartment but, very spacious, clean and convienent. I live in a big beautiful brownstone building. Any questions please feel free to get at me.  Thank You

name: Spacious Centrally Located Apt!!!
space: If you are looking for a good time in NYC our apartment is the place for you!  We are working professional men in our late 20's with active social lives.  Our apartment has 2 TVs, free wi-fi, and plenty space to relax.   There are four bedrooms here and 3 are occupied.  There is a kitchen, one bathroom with a huge living space.  There is both an elevator, and a stairwell that you can use to enter our apartment. If you are here during the weekend expect some late nights and fun in New York City.  If you are here during the week expect a relaxed atmosphere, however be respectful as we are all working professionals. Local area has nice places like Madison Sqare Park, and a short walk to Penn Station and Madison Square Garden.  It is only a 10 minute walk to Grand Central Station as well.  3 minute walk to the Empire State Building, and a short cab to just about every bar in New York City. One block to the NQR.  2 Blocks to the 1. Less than a 5 minute walk to the 4-5-6, and the F train. Ea

name: cozy charming apt - Lower East Side
space: Cosy, romantic, sunny 1 bedroom apartment in the middle of Manhattan's historic Lower East Side / East Village. Tastefully remodeled, w/ full kitchen, full bathroom and queen-size bed.  Set on a quiet street in the middle of the happening Lower East Side. Conveniently located just 2 blocks to the F/J/M/Z trains at Delancey/Essex. A few minutes walk to Katz's Deli, the Sunshine theater, and on to all that the LES / East Village / Chinatown / Soho & Little Italy have to offer.   Friendly neighbors in relaxed & diverse coop building in safe neighborhood. Includes : free wifi DSL, TV, A/C, microwave, etc. Perfect for 2, but can easily accommodate up to 4 via a large and surprisingly comfortable pull-out couch.

name: 1 BDR in Heart of Lower East side
space: The Place: Fully furnished, sunny and calm -- Friendly building. Two bedrooms with full bed and a sleep sofa -- sleeps up to 3 people comfortably with. I usually rent the apartment has a one bedroom except if asked - the second room is closed with personals so guest can have more space in the apartment. The Living Room:  Comfy large couch with room to spread out. Small dinning bar separating the kitchen from the Living room. You will get most of the light in the late morning. WIFI available in all apartment.  Bedroom #1: Cozy full size bed (2 pers.) with two windows and closet on demand.  Bedroom #2 (NOT ACCESSIBLE): Usually used as a 'screening room' with a small full size sleep sofa (1pers.) and closet. This room will be closed except if asked for a third person.  The Kitchen: Fully furnished with kitchen stencils, fridge and freezer & oven stove. No dishwasher. The kitchen is part of the living room. The Bathroom: Bath tube, toilet and skin.  The Location: New York's Lower East Side

name: Cozy Room in Williamsburg Loft Apt
space: We have a furnished bedroom available in our spacious two bedroom apartment. The building is a spacious loft in a converted knitting factory with extremely high ceilings and nice natural light. We have a dishwasher. Coin laundry in building. There is an abundance of great restaurants, cafes, bars and shops around, and a grocery store 1 block away. We are a 15 minute walk to Williamsburg's Bedford Avenue. No pets.

name: Sunny West Village 1BR
space: This West Village apartment is close to everything, sunny, clean, fully furnished.  This is an incredible downtown location. There are restaurants, shops and bars in every direction, and you can't do any better for transit. A block away from the 1 subway line, three blocks from the West 4th station with A,C,E,B,D,F,M lines. Fourth-floor walkup. Laundry across the street. Wifi, and high-quality studio speakers.  Good for a couple, though the couch also has a full sized sofabed so two more can sleep there in a pinch (though it would be crowded in the apartment.) No pets, no smoking, water the plant daily, and please keep it clean -- otherwise enjoy!

name: Charming Studio Near Central Park!
space: Stay on the heart of Upper West Side of Manhattan just blocks from Central Park. A true "uptown NYC" living experience. Only available July 1 through July 10.  Charming & tasteful studio available for $150/per night.   BUILDING: Wonderful Emery Roth landmarked, historic pre-war building with a gorgeous, pristine lobby.. Immaculately clean, two elevators, 24-hour doorman, great laundry room in basement of the building..  Very quiet & tasteful environment with excellent maintenance. APARTMENT: Perfect for one person or a couple only as it only sleeps 2.  Tastefully decorated, bright & move-in ready.. Two windows with nice view of West End Avenue.. Queen bed with TV, DVD, small kitchen, great bathroom and internet access.. Sheets, towels, dishes, cookware, etc available for your use.  All utilities & cleaning fees included.   LOCATION: - Prime UWS location, serene & beautiful block in a gorgeous pre-war, historical neighborhood. - One block distance to Riverside Park, the Hudson River and

name: Great 1 bedroom- awesome location
space: 1 bedroom apartment. Location is great for tourists- close to Times Square, Broadway, Central Park. Very clean apartment within walking distance to all subway lines. I am going out of town and looking for respectful people who are in search of a reasonably priced place to stay. Apartment has cable and internet, brand new bed, couch and other furniture. Fully stocked kitchen, great for cooking your own meals. **Please do not reserve the apartment without contacting me via email first**

name: Modern 2 Bedroom Balcony Apartment
space: Welcome to this beautiful, spacious, modern two-bedroom apartment, located just around the corner from the train station, which is only a 1 minute walk away. From there, it takes only 10 minutes to reach Manhattan by train. The apartment is large in size, as it is about 850 square feet. There are modern furniture and fixtures throughout. There is also a private balcony. The spacious living room has a modern sofa, which turns into a bed for one. There is also a classic Pierre Paulin lounge chair, modern walnut coffee table, and a set of ottomans. Also (not yet pictured), we added to the living room a large sectional sofa, which configures into a queen size bed.  The large flat-screen television with cable tv sits on a beautiful solid walnut media cabinet. There is also a George Nelson wall lamp and modern floor lamp in the living room. The kitchen is equipped with all pots, pans, and utensils needed to cook a meal. The kitchen opens up to a dining room, which has a modern solid walnut d

name: Clean 1 bedroom with private bath :)
space: ** nice furnished room with a private bath. ** 30 minutes train ride into Manhattan on 7 train  ** 5 minutes walk to Long Island Rail Road and 20 minutes ride into Manhattan Penn Station  ** Safe neighbourhood. Close to everything in Flushing. Food is great here.  ** A large kitchen with stove and a HUGE refrigerator.  ** Extremely Fast 150mb fios internet speed. Both wireless or wired connection.  ** Rooms are equipped with standalone wall unit heater/air condition besides standard heating. In case you are too cold or too warm.  ** Each room is installed with ventilation for air circulation ** Paid laundry services and grocery stores are within walking distance.  ** Sunny room. Lots of sunshine.  ** All college students are welcome!

name: Large sunny room 10 min to Midtown!
space: I'm subletting my lovely room in my GORGEOUS 2 bedroom apt! The room is fully furnished including a full size bed and shelving units. Two large windows in the room streams in plenty of sunshine all day long! The apt is big and fully furnished. We have a flat screen TV and a DVD player as well as an extensive movie collection. Plus WiFi too of course. This place is a steal - its size, its location, its beauty, its price... We put our hearts in this place and it's become a true warm home to go back to.

name: A Little Palace in Brooklyn for Shoots and Events
space: Note: We are only renting our space as a photography location and small party and event space at this time, with no overnight availability. These rentals occur at the rate of $200/hour for all time in the space (from setup to breakdown) with a 4 hour minimum ($800) - or alternatively, $1800 for a ten hour day. Also note: We have a brand new HEPA Alen Breathesmart Air Purifier specifically to eliminate dander and other allergens, which is always running. So most people with allergies don't have a problem in the space, even though our three babies live here. :) As featured in Time Out magazine: Our 1000 square foot loft has two life-size dollhouses and many other delightful touches!   Welcome to our one-of-a-kind human dollhouse lofts.  There are four unique small rooms to shoot in/cosy hangout spaces, in addition to the open plan kitchen/living room, the main white space with the wall of mirrors.  The Egyptian Room (dark blue room) and the Boudoir Bedroom (all sexy pink) are permanently

name: Fifteen minutes to Times Square!
space: Come stay at my beautiful apartment in Astoria!     It's a two-bedroom apt, and each room has a PRIVATE bath/shower.    15minutes to Times Square.   Very quiet neighborhood.   2nd floor, and only 2 blocks from the subway.      Did I mention the Steinway Grand piano in the living room?  It's the love of my life.   :)   So if you don't feel like exploring all the amazing Greek cuisine in our little neighborhood, or slipping into the city to see a show, you can hang out here and play some Chopin! For those of you who don't know Astoria well, it's playfully called "Act-oria" around town because there are so many actors and musicians living out here.   It's not a "scene" like Williamsburg where you can't escape the crowds, but it's a young vibrant neighborhood that still has a lot of old world charm. Come check it out! best,  Xander

name: Artist Little Italy/Chinatown  1BR

name: Sunny Studio on Orchard Street
space: When running around the city, you'll want to come home to peace and comfort. This studio is on the top (4th) floor of a modern building with no immediate nightlife - so it'll be quiet when you need it most. The studio has windows on two sides with unobstructed light from the east and north and is sunny all day. It features an original red brick panel, a kitchen, living space, a comfy full-size bed, a couch for your plus-one, and luxery bathroom. Plus, it has a rare interior curved wall, which makes the space quite unique.  The space is decorated with minimalistic details - feel free to make it your own! If it's your fancy, you're also welcome to play my guitar! ;) This is the perfect spot for someone who wants to explore the city but come home to a respite! Please note that this is not a great space for children and teenagers. Three guests can definitely fit, though the space is most comfortable for two people. Notes: I recently repainted by green walls to blue -- they're beautiful! --

The big apartment consists of a a Living room with Big Sofa Bed,  one Bedroom with 2 Beds,  Kitchen and Bathroom, Windows, Wifi , flat TV and AC, Elevator, Laundry in the building You will sleep on the SofaBed in the semi-private living  room, with full access to the kitchen and the bathroom.   This is a nice and warm place in a safe area (*)  with all services , shops , close to park and historic area.  Would prefer a woman (*) Although in the past Washington Heights was a cheap suburb, it has currently been re-evaluated, many professionals live here and has among the lowest reported crime rates within neighborhoods in Manhattan  ((website hidden))

name: Sunny and spacious room in Brooklyn
space: This apartment is on the second floor of what was once an old school and then old fake pearl making factory. The street is quiet and in walking distance to great neighborhood bars and restaurants. There is a grocery store and 24 hour deli on the corner. It's half a block from the R train and half a block from the historic Greenwood cemetery. If you enjoy biking or jogging you can easily walk to Prospect Park in about 15 minutes or Sunset Park in about 10 minutes. The apartment itself has high ceilings, wood floors and large sunny windows where you get an amazing view of the statue of liberty and lower Manhattan.The bedroom is very large with a big closet, storage space and dresser. Our kitchen has brand new cabinets and is fully equipped for cooking. There is a washing machine and dryer, record player and t.v. with a Roku for your use. The bathroom has a full bath perfect for relaxing in. If you have a car, there is always free parking right out front. There are two cats Minerva and St

name: CHIC 1 BEDROOM IN MANHATTAN (UES)
space: If you like stylish, quiet, spacious apartments with 10 foot high ceilings, a king size bed and fireplace in a location thriving with chic restaurants, museums and art galleries, then make yourself at home here. My one bedroom apartment is located in a cosy boutique building featuring modern furniture, exposed brick wall with fireplace and new appliances. Apartment is facing private gardens and it offers a unique sense of tranquility, something you will enjoy a lot after coming back from NYC's hustle and bustle. The apartment is located on Upper East Side, Manhattan, a thriving location boasting chic boutiques, a long list of cocktail and wine bars, and enchanting dining experiences. Whether you are looking for the best steak, an amazing cocktail or a vegan treat, places like Arlington Club Steakhouse, Penrose, Candle Cafe and many more will whet your appetite. Transportation to other parts of Manhattan from here is easy. The subway is only 3 blocks away (6 train / 77 Street stop) and

name: Designer's spacious Manhattan apt.
space: You will love our cozy and spacious 1Br Scandinavian-style apartment with one king bed and one queen bed (sleeps 4). This is the perfect place to come relax in our giant king bed after a long day sightseeing or working in NYC. Relax with a bath or fix dinner/order takeout and eat with a bottle of wine. If going out to dinner is more your thing, we have some really amazing restaurants close at hand. There are also several grocery stores, cafes and bars. The 1 and A trains are close, the post office is a block away, and drop-off laundry is around the corner. We are blocks from Yeshiva University, two rivers, a world-class museum (The Cloisters), beautiful parks, tennis, running, biking and hiking trails. Nice!

name: Spacious 3 Bedroom Prospect Brooklyn near subway
space: Located in hip Pro-Cro Brooklyn; steps from the Brooklyn Museum, Botanical Gardens, and Prospect park..not to mention cozy & delicious cafes, bars, and bistros.(And a wonderful Yoga studio!).
