My room has a queen size bed, desk, great sound system, and 3 sunny windows. There is storage space in the wardrobe, and handcrafted dresser, and plenty of floor space. name: Large 1bdrm in Historic Harlem
space: The New York Times Magazine cited Lenox Terrace as 'Harlem's Best Address'. Since construction was completed on the first of Lenox Terrace's six residential buildings in 1958, Lenox Terrace has been home to a who's who of local and national politicians, entertainers, and businesspeople, who value the community's commitment to, as the Times put it, "respectability without sterility and security without conformity."Today, the Lenox Terrace community is more vibrant than ever. In many ways, Lenox Terrace is a quiet oasis, in the heart of the metropolis. Once home, residents and guests are greeted by uniformed doormen, renovated lobbies and spacious apartments. When you reside at the Lenox Terrace you have  a perfect vantage point from which to witness the renaissance of Harlem. Location: The apartment is located just 5 blocks from the F, Q, and R trains in South Park Slope and is an easy 15 minute subway ride into lower Manhattan and a 35 min subway ride into Midtown.  The apartment is situated in the industrial part of South Park Slope, however, is in a very safe location.  We are

name: Well Appointed Park Slope Studio
space: A hop and a skip from Prospect Park, our studio is fully equipped, and ready for your visit!   A complete renovation was completed when we launched this rental, including a brand new bathroom and kitchen, fresh walls, and refinished original hardwood floor.  There is a queen sized bed and a pullout sofa, a new dishwasher, and internet access.  There is a large south facing exposure, and a separate entrance on the ground floor of the house. It's two blocks west/south of Bartel Pritchard Circle--that's the south west entrance of Prospect Park, with a movie theater and many small shops and restaurants.  Seventh Avenue, at the other end of our street, also has dozens of restaurants and specialty food and clothing stores. We are two blocks from the F train, and the 7th ave. bus is at the end of our block. The space is ideal for up to two, but we can accommodate up to four, for monthly, weekly, or shorter term rentals.  Please check my calendar for availability, and feel free to be in touch

name: A Happy Place
space: Situated on the upper west side.   Can become a sublet apartment for as much as six months or more with two week's notice.  The apartment has one bedroom and a living room.  The apartment is only a couple blocks from Columbia University in Washington Heights.  This is Manhattan and you are surrounded by the A, C, B, D and 1 trains within a two block area.  You are connected to the sites of New York City without paying the high price.  Washington Heights is the upper west side of Manhattan.  Great shopping area in the day and dining at nights.  Stay on Broadway and everything comes to you.

name: 2 Bedroom Loft Ceilings

name: Welcome Home! Prime N. Park Slope
space: This sweet one bedroom apartment is in the heart of prime North Park Slope, Brooklyn. It's a one bedroom w/a comfortable queen sized bed. Small but adequate kitchen with full refrigerator, great for all the great food you'll find at the farmer's market. Park Slope was named New York Magazine's Best Neighborhood, which is easy to understand once you've spent any time here. There are tons of great restaurants and cool shops on 7th avenue and 5th avenue, just down the street. You will be a couple blocks from 2,3,B,Q subways, one block to the stunning and historic Prospect Park and Grand Army Plaza (where there's a farmer's market on weekends),  the beautiful Brooklyn Library, another couple blocks to Brooklyn Museum. name: Cozy Space

Bedroom has three windows facing south; full of light, wood floors. Room includes; full bed, huge closet and 6-drawer dresser, desk and chair. Use of IMac computer, free wireless, laundry bag, towels, sheets and bedding, basic toiletries and umbrella included. Laundry and bodega on same block. name: Nice quiet room on a backyard
space: It's a cute room with a large bed and a large window on a garden view, in a two bedroom railroad apartment with two separate entrances and a full equipped kitchen, located in Huron street, two blocks from the East river ferry, one block from Greenpoint avenue stop (G train) and a short bus ride or walk to Bedford av (L train, Williamsburg).  The neighbourhood is fabulous, full of awesome stores, and totally safe and calm at the same time. Working musician, I am looking to share my home/space with an open minded, clean and responsible person .  If you're interested, contact me for a viewing - available March 1rst.

name: Private Garden Apt on Eastern Pkwy
space: This spacious railroad apartment, full of wood and warmth, combed to domestic perfection, seeks your temporary companionship. Relax in the hammock overlooing our container garden, or in the light-filled sitting room after practicing yoga (or similar) in our Studio-for-2. Return from the farmer's market through our private entrance and cook up a storm in our well-equipped vegetarian (and vegan/kosher-friendly!) kitchen. Finally, bed down with space to spare nestling around the queen-size bed ÛÒ well-heated and ventilated by the season!  Outside is a major through-street with a bike lane, subway line, and caribbean and chassidic local spots. A short walk or hop takes you to the major Brooklyn attractions surrounding Grand Army Plaza. 45 minutes to Midtown Manhattan. We generally offer our apartment when we're going out of town and, schedules permitting,  we'll give you our best scoop on Brooklyn before departing. For high-occupancy, the studio has curtains to seclude a 2nd bedroom perfect

name: Victorian Home 1 & Express Train
space: This apartment is one half of a Victorian house.  The other side is also sometimes available for rent. This apartment has 5 bedrooms (sleeps 10 in real beds), a full kitchen and 4 bathrooms.   I am temporarily listing the full capacity of the house, about 16, because we have some additional vacancy coming up. The apartment has a mix of the old and the new.  It retains its beautiful hard wood floors from its construction in 1902 yet it has lovely new bathrooms, kitchen appliances, washer and dryer and skylights.   The master bedroom has its own bathroom and a laundry room with washer and dryer.  The 2nd bedroom gets southern light.  The 3rd bedroom overlooks the tree-lined block and the 4th is nested behind it, looking south.  They share the 3rd floor with a full bathroom and shower.  The 5th bedroom is a lofted space with a window and a skylight and is accessed via the 4th.  There are 2 full bathrooms and two half baths. The house has both a front porch and a rear deck overlooking the

name: A Bright, Fun, Artist Conservatory
space: It's a beautiful two bedroom apartment on the 5th floor in a brand new steel and glass building in a cool area in Brooklyn. The North and South walls of the apartment are floor to ceiling windows that leave the apartment bathed in sunlight. The living area is a large open-floor plan with a fully-equipped kitchen, dining table, and comfortable sitting area. The kitchen appliances are top of the line and include a Bosch dishwasher and washer-dryer, a Bosch stove and Siemens professional oven. The bathroom is white and grey stone with very modern fixtures and a large bathtub. The apartment has a built in stereo system throughout which connects directly to your iPod. The apartment has a 280 square foot balcony that overlooks Manhattan (you can spot the Empire state and Chrysler buildings). The apartment has central heat and air conditioning and the building has an elevator. All neighbors are young professionals and artists. The neighborhood is right in the middle of the prime Pro-cro area

name: Comfortable Modern Room in Bed-Stuy
space: As you enter this lovely apartment you will notice high ceilings and rustic exposed brick, which continue throughout. Turn right and you will be greeted by the living room, which is a comfortable combination of homey and fun modern decor. The open floor plan leads you to a cozy, fully-equipped, kitchen. Down the hallway are two bathrooms for your convenience. The first is a private WC, the second is a full bath with a spacious tub and beautiful modern fixtures. You can also enjoy the rooftop access which showcases a lovely view of Manhattan!  I hope you choose my home for your adventures in NYC !

name: Mod Brooklyn Apartment 2
space: Hi, I am offering a twin-bed bedroom in a light, airy and clean 3-bedroom apartment. The bed/mattress is very comfortable. The linens are 100% cotton. Wireless Internet is included. The apartment is on the second floor of a newly (and tastefully) renovated turn-of-the-century brick building on a tree-lined block that is know for its artist lofts. It is located east of Williamsburg in a safe family-oriented neighborhood in Bushwick. (Other parts of Bushwick can be more industrial and/or sketchy.) A community garden blooms next door. The apartment has lots of characterÛÓexposed brick, wood floors, wood trim and good light. It also has a great layout that works well for sharing the space. All bookings require a minimum of 2 nights and could be long term depending on your situation and what we negotiate. Brand new finishes, just converted from factory to loft space, new hardwood floors, tile bathroom (huge tiled shower). This is great for a couple or 3 friends. If you're young, artsy and hip, you'll love this neighborhood: across the street from the SHOPS AT THE LOOM including the best coffee in the hood at Kave Cafe, 4 blocks from Roberta's famous pizza place, 5 blocks from 983 diner, 3 blocks from the Morgan L train stop, 3 blocks from Narrows bar, 3 blocks from all the restaurants and bars on Wyckoff Avenue! name: LARGE 2 BR w/Dining Room, Balcony, Echo
space: The First bedroom has a queen bed and can sleep 2 people. It has cable TV as well. The second bedroom has a twin bed and can hold 1 person. If you have a fourth person, the couch is really big, and might be an option for you but you'll have to use your judgement.  It's an old house and has its quirks but has tons of space, sunlight, and beautiful woodwork. There is internet/wifi throughout of the apartment and on the balcony.  The apartment also has 3 Echos/Alexas throughout the space, which can control the most used lights, tea kettle, music etc via voice control. Very well stocked kitchen. All the basics like salt and pepper plus lots of extra spices.  Great quality cookware.

name: Williamsburg One Bedroom
space: There is a studio/one bedroom available to sublet for the summer, fall and winter of 2015.  The apartment has a private bathroom, private kitchen,  living room, and bedroom.  The apartment is very simple.  It has a bed, couch and a few cabinets.  It is basically empty, and it can store lots of luggage.  There is plenty of storage space and it has two closets.   It is located on South 4th st. in Williamsburg, Brooklyn.  A short walk to all the shops, bars, and restaurants in Williamsburg.  It is two blocks from the Hewes Stop on the J,M,Z line and four blocks from the Lorimer stop on the L, G train.

space: I am an Asian artist resides in the United States. I've been taking care of this guest house since 2012. There are 2 private Airbnb rooms in this triplex apartment (3 floors) with separate bathrooms on each floor. I look forward to meeting people from all over the world. You will have this small private bedroom on the upper floor, as well as the shared living room and kitchen (my place is never crowded). You have options to sleep either in the loft bed or the pull-out sofa underneath it. Both beds are full sized. The mattress in the loft bed is memory foam, more preferable. However it would be perfect for 2 people who travel together but don't want to share bed. There is also a decent sized closet included in this bedroom. Your bathroom would be shared with only me. You will immediately notice how clean I am as a responsible host. Both of the bathroom and the bedroom are fully equipped, including a hairdryer and a steam iron (if it's needed). name: 3BR 1400SF APT FULLY FURNISHED NEAR CENTRAL PARK
space: The three bedroom apartment is found on 81st Street between Amsterdam and Columbus Avenues. It is part of the Upper West Side, where you will find great restaurants, bars, shops and best of all: parks! Three blocks west of the apartment is Riverside Park with its beautiful flower gardens and impressive view across the Hudson River. Even closer is iconic Central Park, just two blocks east from the apartment. Walk through the woody area of The Ramble, rent a rowboat at the lake, or just stroll to one of the lawns to enjoy a lovely picnic. Culture-wise, you will find the impressive Museum of Natural History just one block from the apartment. Numerous restaurants line Amsterdam Avenue and Broadway, both of which are close to the apartment. A great place for brunch is Sarabeth's West, just down the block. There are also many shops nearby on Broadway. To explore other neighborhoods in New York City, you can catch the 1 train at the 79 Street / Broadway subway station, or walk to the 81 Stree

name: Chic, quiet 1BR with patio (steps from the subway)
space: Huge chicly decorated 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom with large private garden/patio and eat-in kitchen on one of the most charming blocks in Brooklyn.  This art filled floor of a brownstone features a large bedroom with its own bathroom, a large living room with a flat screen TV with a Roku (with Netflix and Amazon Prime for you to use) and a large well equipped eat-in kitchen. Out the back door of the kitchen is the private sunfilled patio/back yard. Both bedroom and living room have ceiling fans and the bedroom has an air conditioner. The bedroom has a comfortable queen bed as well as a cozy reading chair.  The living room couch folds out to a full bed. All linens and towels are provided.  The apartment is right on the border between Prospect Heights and Crown Heights and a block away from the fabulous Franklin Ave strip which features such awesome restaurants as Mayfield, Barbinco and Dutch Boy Burger as well as some of the best bars around. It is also one block away from the Brooklyn Botan

name: Sunny, large room near Central Park
space: Looking for a very neat, clean and responsible renter for one good-sized bedroom in my very sunny, top-floor, two-bedroom apartment. The bedrooms are on opposite sides of the apartment, so you have plenty of privacy.  I am a full-time journalist, and cover pop culture and food for magazines, newspapers and digital. I'm also originally from the West Coast, so I try to keep a little California in my home: a lot of plants, and a relaxed, open atmosphere. Would be great if you could help water my plants if I happen to go out of town during your stay. Safe walking distance from Columbia University; Central Park and Morningside Park are both only a block away. Very convenient to major public transportation: 1 block from the B, C lines; 2 blocks from 1 train. Hardwood floors, high ceilings, window in the kitchen, fire escape, laundry in basement, safe building. AC. There are also very lovely cafes, a creperie, taquerias, Frederick Douglass Blvd Restaurant Row within a few blocks radius. Whole

name: Spacious Private Bushwick Room/Bath
space: Peace meets cool chic in this lofty Bushwick duplex in the heart of Brooklyn's newest artistic enclave.  This home away from home has much to offer: A private bedroom and ensuite bathroom, stocked with amenities like artisan soaps and fresh linens. Free WiFi Satellite Cable TV Access to Manhattan--only a 15 minute trip away on the J/Z train at Gates Avenue or the L train at Myrtle Wycoff With the world-class food fare, bars, art galleries, yoga and music venues blocks away, you might just decide to stay close-by. Cool galleries, and cooler bars, makes living here always interesting. 3 lines all within walking distance can take you from home to the center of the universe in 15 minutes.

name: Fully Updated Modern 1 Bedroom Apartment
space: Welcome to a completely renovated, spotlessly clean, spacious and modern one bedroom garden apartment just a few blocks from Prospect Park.   Everything is updated.  Queen size bed in bedroom and sofa bed in living room.  Kitchen with full size stainless steel stove, refrigerator and microwave.  Flat screen television, office area with desk, cable and wireless internet all included.  Complete with dishes, utensils, coffee maker, towels, extra pillows and linens. PLEASE NOTE THOUGH THIS IS NOT A TRUE BASEMENT APARTMENT, IT IS 3 FLIGHTS BELOW GROUND.  IT IS WELL LIT AND RECEIVES NATURAL LIGHT FROM 3 LARGE WINDOWS ALONG THE BACK OF THE FLAT.  PLEASE DO NOT BOOK IF THIS IS UNSUITABLE FOR YOUR NEEDS. Your wonderful hosts Joan and Fred will provide continental breakfast items for your enjoyment during your stay.  Many delis, grocery and restaurant options within walking distance.    Walk to subway.  20 - 30 minutes to Manhattan by train.  You have a choice of two trains - the Q or the F line

name: The Stylish Boutique W.Village Apt
space: This stylish apartment is located in a beautiful land marked West Village building which offers amazing charm and character. It is doors away from sweets mecca Magnolia Bakery and across the road from Carrie Bradshaw's Sex in the City apartment. If you are looking for location- you won't find a better address in NYC. This month Vanity Fair termed The West Village the ÛÏGILDED GHETTO":   this is the description of the neighborhood everyone, including foreigners, Uptowners and Downtowner's, agree is the ultimate New York living environment. The area's unique combination of low lying buildings providing the best light in the city, charming tree lined cobbled streets with their eclectic mix of apartments, chic townhouses and mega-mansions, a superb mix of retail and restaurants, and it's proximity to the Hudson River Park and Meatpacking District make it the kind of utopian Û÷bubble' that seems to be a trend around the globe. Whether it is your first visit to NYC or you are a frequent visito

space: This apt. is in a typical nyc urban area.  It is a 3 bedroom but sleeps 9.  It features 7 real mattresses, a very thick mat like 8 to 9 inches thick and a blow up bed.  We welcome groups and families with children.  We also speak french and spanish. This is a 3 bedroom apartment totally renovated.  There are 2 large bedrooms and 1 smaller sized bedroom.  The master bedroom, has a queen sized canopy bed.  The sleigh bed in the photo is a full sized bed, The other room consist of a twin sized bed,  The kitchen is newly renovated with granite counter tops and trash cans that roll in the cabinets.  Their are two  bathrooms that are decent sized for New York City but  by no means a huge bathroom.  There is a separate living room and a dining room.  The flooring is the original antique floors.  It is for that reason that we ask that all hard shoes be removed.    Guest should expect a warm inviting host.  You should know that Airbnb has been a great part of my life in the past year. name: Designer Apt Near Subway/Ctrl. Park Boutique Style
space: My place is a large, designer studio just 2 streets from the subway at Columbus Circle/59th (A/C/B/D/1 subways), the most convenient subway on the west side! It's full, private apartment with comfy queen bed, pull out couch and gorgeous, marble bathroom with shower and tub. You're within walking distance of Times Square, Central Park, and the shopping on 5th Avenue. My apartment was featured on Apartment Therapy for its clean, art filled, and boutique hotel like style.  It features: - A very comfy queen size bed on a brand new wingback bed frame (Gus Modern) -  Beautiful, marble tiled bathroom with full tub and shower  - Crate & Barrel pull out couch - 46" flat screen TV with Apple TV, Blu-Ray DVD player, and surround sound. There is no cable/antenna, but you're welcome to use my Netflix :) - Full kitchen with refrigerator, 2 ovens, and dishwasher - Eat in kitchen area with 2 Restoration Hardware stools - All of the plates, glasses, and All-Clad cookware you could need - Air conditioni

name: Cozy West Village Studio Apartment
space: Cozy and bright little studio apartment with a kitchenette and full bath, A/C and Internet connection. My place is very quiet and peaceful, a bit bohemian yet simple and basic. The building is safe and located in a lovely neighborhood. Nearby are the cafes, restaurants, shops and boutiques and the narrow streets and little gardens that are characteristic of the West Village. The entrance to the High Line is a few blocks from my door, and Chelsea's art galleries are within walking distance. The Meatpacking District may be your favorite with its trendy clubs and outdoor cafes. Buses and subways are two blocks away. Non-smokers only, please.

name: Cozy & Convenient in Bushwick
space: A lovely private bedroom  on a quiet street in Bushwick. Only a few blocks from L train or M train in Bushwick, Brooklyn. Experience the artistic, foodie enclave that is now my beloved neighborhood. Wander our mural filled streets, dine at any of the famous eateries within a few blocks or hop on the subway and be in Manhattan - it's only 25 minutes away! The room is spacious with a full sized bed, storage, and a desk available for use. The apartment has a large kitchen and living area, and a nicely remodelled bathroom. Laundry is on site, just 2 doors down, and there is free WiFi access throughout the apartment. The room is on the 3rd floor in a code secured apartment building.

name: Luxury One BR Apt NYC
space: Amazing luxury apartment in Brooklyn! Only one subway stop away from Manhattan, making it the ideal location for your next vacation as you can experience all Brooklyn (BK) has to offer whilst having easy access to Manhattan. In BK there are hundreds of delectable eateries and all of the shopping venues and boutiques you can handle. Visit the famed Brooklyn Public Library, Prospect Park or Astroland while exploring the endless things to do in the city by hopping on one of the five different subway lines that are within short walking distance. The good news is if you want the convenience of a taxi just step out the front door and there are yellow cabs 24/7. The apartment and building has a wide range of amenities including: Û¢	large gym  Û¢	stylish resident lounge with pool table Û¢	floor to ceiling windows Û¢	Washer/Dryer in the apartment There is a supermarket literally across the road as well as other options in on neighbouring streets should you wish to cook meals in the fully equipped k

name: Spacious Comfy Bedroom in Bed-Stuy
space: As you enter this lovely apartment you will notice high ceilings and rustic exposed brick, which continue throughout. Turn right and you will be greeted by the living room, which is a comfortable combination of homey and fun modern decor. The open floor plan leads you to a cozy, fully-equipped, kitchen. Down the hallway are two bathrooms for your convenience. The first is a private WC, the second is a full bath with a spacious tub and beautiful modern fixtures. You can also enjoy the rooftop access which showcases a lovely view of Manhattan!  I hope you choose my home for your adventures in NYC !

name: Entire Apartment 15 min. to Manhattan
space: Large Apartment with Private Room ÛÒ 15 minutes to Manhattan This is perfect for anyone who is visiting Manhattan for a few days on vacation or for a business trip. No need to pay $300 a night when you can stay in your own private apartment for less.  I would like to offer you a place to stay - my cozy one bedroom apartment in the heart of Astoria and only one block from the 30th Avenue Subway stop.  Trains N, Q will take you to Manhattan in 15 minutes.  You will have the whole apartment to yourself! LOCATION  The neighborhood has everything within walking distance: great restaurants, bars, nightlife and shopping. You can be in Manhattan within 15 minutes.  APARTMENT  The bedroom has a queen size brand new bed with fresh linens provided for each guest.  Kitchen is equipped with stainless steels gas stove, microwave, toaster, dishes & glasses, etc.  Full bathroom comes with fresh towels. The apartment has wireless high-speed internet(Wi-fi) and cable TV (40 inch LED TV). There is free pa

name: Williamsburg 1br APT
space: Amazing cozy entire APT in center of Williamsburg!  The APT: * Super comfy and bright one bedroom entire APT  * Completely furnished bedroom/living/kitchen area with lots lots of light. * The entire APT is furnished with unique art-decor style and decorated with great art pieces. * FULL SIZE BED(Casper, Yes it's very comfy) * 3rd floor walk-up/ no elevator. * Live in Super in the building. * Security camera in the building * It's full Bathroom but doesn't have a wash stand, please contact me only if it's okay. * Please NO Party or Visitors. It's really tiny tiny apt so be respect max two people staying.  The AREA: * Right off L @ Graham - you can see the building from the station(1min walk from the station)    (Also you can take L @Lorimer and G @Metropolitan ave in 3min walk) * Full of great restaurants, cafes and bars,vintage clothes shops around * One of the most coolest/safetest parts of Brooklyn * Ultra popular neighborhood filled with creative energy Please shoot me message if yo

name: Modern and Artsy Gem on the UES!
space: Located on a quiet city block this UES gem is the perfect space for a responsible single looking for a stay in exciting NYC. Seven minutes from the Q train at 72nd Street which can bring you downtown, to Brooklyn, or crosstown. Same distance for crosstown bus M72. Large and modern in nature, the space provides a tranquil feel and during the evening is quiet for sleeping! The space comes equipped with WIFI, Cable, Washer/Dryer, Dishwasher, Bed, Inflatable Bed (please request), Linens, dishes, towels, and beautiful partial views of the Hudson. Space feels artsy and building is five stars. Within walking distance to 5th Avenue museums, Madison Ave. shopping, and iconic Central Park. Plenty of delicious restaurants nearby at Lexington Avenue or Madison Avenue (approximately 4-5 avenues away) such as Daniel, The Mark, San Ambreus, and The Carlyle. I look forward to speaking with you!

name: Beautiful Williamsburg Apartment
space: A gorgeous, furnished 1BR apartment in the heart of Williamsburg. The apartment is extremely spacious, with beautiful furniture throughout. There is a massive outdoor space, that is private and attached directly to the apartment. Large Walk-In Closet in the bedroom, and fairly new appliances as well. There's also huge windows that let in lots of light. It's furnished with a very large desk to work at, dining room table w/ chairs, couch + coffee table, king size bed, patio furniture. It really is a wonderful place to launch your Williamsburg and Manhattan explorations from. The location is fantastic - steps away from the Bedford L train, the Williamsburg Bridge, fantastic restaurants, groceries, and night life.

name: Beautiful Trendy 2br Harlem Apt.
space: This amazing, trendy, and unusually spacious 2-bedroom apartment is perfect for your stay in NYC. My place is big enough to invite friends over and enjoy a pleasant social gathering. Everyone is always surprised at how much room there is considering NYC apartments are usually quite small.  Located in the heart of a cultural and continuously blossoming neighborhood, The apt. has 2 beautiful huge bedrooms that sleep 2-3 people in the Queen size room and up to 4 people in the King room. It also features full modern kitchen with all of the usual amenities, utensils and cookware. The living room is sprawling with a sectional sofa with two ends that recline! (Also good for sleeping). The couch seats six people and couldn't be a more comfortable way to enjoy the amazing entertainment system. The Entertainment system is featured with DVD and Surround-Sound. The bright colorful walls, the finished hardwood floors and the exceptional space make this a true find with both style and comfort. Guest

name: Sophia's Paradise
space: This is a spacious, peaceful room, almost like having your own studio or hotel.  Located in an up-and-coming neighborhood in Brooklyn, our apartment is also only a *two-minute* walk to the subway (Q train) and gorgeous Prospect Park, and a short trip to Manhattan. The room is part of the three-bedroom apartment where we've lived for four years (and we've been hosting guests all this time!).  Your room is an expansive 210 square feet and is fully furnished with a King-size bed, armoire, desk, dresser, and your own mini-fridge.  The room faces east and gets a lot of great sunlight through the two large windows.  Our building is located on a quiet street, away from heavy traffic, and the neighborhood is safe and generally quiet as well.  --Fast Wifi --Fully equipped kitchen --Your own minifridge --Coffee & Espresso Machine --$15 Gift Certificate to our awesome local Blessings Cafe (included in stays of 4+ days) --A great bicycle for your use --Clean, sunny bathroom with full-sized bath/sh

name: Apartment in Harlem/w park views
space: One bedroom apartment with breathtaking views of a park right across the street. The building is a pre war style that has a marble lobby complete with a fireplace two chandeliers and elevators. The apt sleeps two but can sleep three comfrotably at an additional fee. Private bedroom and bath. Living room has couch. (does not pull out to a sleeper) Kitchen comes complete with a stove,convection toaster oven,coffee maker,juicer,microwave, stand mixer,washer/dryer combo. wi-fi available upon request at an additional fee. The neighborhood is somewhat quiet although because of the park across the street, sometimes it can be lively. In the summer months there is an Ampitheater that puts on plays, concerts,dance parties etc. The dance parties are ESPECIALLY fun and always crowded. Close to shopping and restaurants in the area with connections to all major public transportation, a few blocks in each direction east or west. A few of the main attractions to this neighborhood are 125TH STREET,THE

name: UWS Queen Bed Private bedroom
space: I have a beautiful large, bright two bedroom apartment steps from Central Park and Riverside Drive, views of St. John the Divine church, a 1 minute walk to the subway for convenience traveling anywhere downtown Manhattan, Brooklyn, etc! The apartment is homely, spacious and beautiful! There are doorman 24/7 for safety. Please say you're a friend visiting Elizabeth and either ring me up! There's a wonderful eat-in kitchen and a wonderful grocery store across the street for convenience. I'm looking for women or couples for now. There is a shared shower, though, your private king bed room with closet has a private sink for convenience. The neighborhood is laced with lovely cafes and the beauty of the upper west side ambiance of sprawling space and parks. This place is unique because it's a home, not just a room and it feels very open, clean and safe because the GORGEOUS entrance and doorman lobby. Truly Stunning!

name: Gorgeous Williamsburg Apartment
space: The room is perfect for one to two people. The apartment is a two bedroom apartment that you would share with one other house guest. You have a private room with all natural light and beautiful ancient pieces from all around the world. The room can be used as a great studio or gathering space. The room feels extremely comfortable and it looks out to the streets that are filled with trees. You also can hang out in a living room that is filled with organic instruments that I was given throughout my travels and your welcome to experiment and play with them.  You are also welcome to enjoy the Brooklyn famous backyard garden for you and your friends.

name: Experience New York Like a Local!
space: Located in the heart of Manhattan (theater district), close to all subway lines( 1,2 3,N,Q,R,A,C,E,B,D,F red yellow Blue and orange lines), and a block away from Times square. 5 minutes walk to Rockefeller center, Columbus circle and Central Park, the museum of modern art - Moma, Lincoln Center and the Hudson River.  Walk just 3 minutes to see  "The book of Mormons" or the amazing "Kinky Boots".   Enjoy the variety of international food in the city best restaurants on 9th av. Enjoy New York's best night clubs and bars withing 5 minutes walk from the apartment.  It is very easy and simple to get here from NYC area airports. If you like theater, night life, central location, amazing food,  cozy and quiet place to rest, the best NYC experience you can have on a budget, this is the place for you. Amenities: Television, Wi-Fi, Dishwasher,  Washer & Dryer(for your use upon request) , all available for you to use. The room is not big, after all its Manhattan.  very comfortable queen size bed,

name: World Travelers to Couchcrash in BK
space: Hello, I have a space available in the Bed-Stuy area of Brooklyn NY. There's also a comfortable couch that converts into a sofa bed. I share the apartment with a female roommate. You'll be provided with fresh sheets, comforter, pillows, blanket, and fresh towels. We offer free internet/wifi, have a washer and dryer, and terrace. We also have a basketball court across the building.

name: 1  Bedroom in Clinton Hill Share
space: One room on the 1st floor of a 2 floor apt. There are 3 rooms and they are all airbnb. The kitchen is fully stocked with cookware. We have one of the best water filters installed to come out of a spot in the sink. All sheets for bedding are organic and there are air purifiers throughout the house. We also have a whole tea drawer full of various teas which you are welcome to along with an electric kettle.  I live downstairs with my best friend.  On the average day you might not see either of us because we work and travel a lot. The room for rent is a nice sized room in Clinton Hill Brooklyn with a window and a large closet. It has a full size bed, towels,  and a desk.

name: Soho One Bedroom Apartment
space: One bedroom apartment located in the beautiful and very centered Nolita/Soho area.  This is a quite and very pretty apartment great for one person or a couple, and the  convenience of living  two blocks away from main line subway stations N, R, 6, B, Q. the Broadway shopping district , the colorful fruits and vegetables markets of Chinatown, the picturesque  Little Italy and surrounded by the best bars, clubs and restaurants. The bedroom has a Queen bed and living room has a fold-out Single mattress . Perfectly equipped kitchenette, TV, AC, wireless internet, home phone, bathtub. Cross the street washer and drier.

name: Clean space in Carroll Gardens
space: Fabulous renovated garden level (no garden access) floor-through space with brownstone charm and modern convenience.  On garden level open plan with bedroom area, 1 bath and a spacious kitchen, dining and living area complete with an eat-at granite counter.  There is a queen size bed (no sofa bed) so it is perfect for a couple.  The space is in a private home.  Our family lives in the home on the floors directly above sleeping area and we have 3 children.  Children can be noisy.  Please be aware, that as in most brownstones, noise travels.   If you are looking to sleep in past 6:30 am this is not the place for you.  The space is available when our extended family is not in town, so while the space is fully furnished it is free of personal clutter.  You will be supplied with linens, towels and enjoy the use of top of the line stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher and microwave.  WiFi, A/C and cable TV are included. Carroll Gardens is one of NYC's top destinations.  This wond

name: Beautiful, large, Morningside apt
space: Beautiful apartment, in an excellent location on 110th and Amsterdam, near Columbia University, 3 blocks from Central Park and 2 blocks from lovely Riverside Park. The building faces lovely St. John the Divine church. Easy and quick transportation with your choice of three subway lines (1,B, and C) gets you to Times Square in 15 minutes.  This listing is for long-term sublet only (ideally 6 months or longer - though I would consider shorter-term). This apartment is bright, large and comfortable. It is on the second floor in a walk up (no elevator).  Clean, all new appliances, every comfort (flat screen TV, beautiful kitchen). It has a/c in living and bedrooms to keep cool in summer. Large, flat screen television with apple TV, internet, and a fully equipped kitchen. It has 2 small bedrooms but a large living room separated by French doors (the second living room can be used as a second bedroom).  One bedroom has a queen size bed and faces a quiet courtyard.  The second bedroom has a tw

name: 3 Bedroom Upper West Side Gem
space: Fully remodeled contemporary 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom gem in the heart of the Upper West Side.  Two blocks from major subway line, steps to the best markets in NYC including Zabar's and Fairway, blocks to the Museum of Natural History and fantastic shopping and boutiques. Charming apartment located on a quiet historic corner of Riverside Drive, in an elevator, door man building.  It is across the street from Riverside Park, great for runners, bikers and outdoor enthusiasts, with two playgrounds two blocks in either direction.   The apartment features a large modern master bedroom and bathroom, with a queen sized bed and flat panel tv and DVD.  The second bedroom features a bunk bed and half bath.   The galley kitchen is brand new and very contemporary and opens out to the entry way and dining room.  The kitchen also features an extended countertop complete with two bar stools for some company when the chef is at work.  The dining room and living room form one large open space over 30 feet

name: Beautiful 1Bed! Near 34st Macy's!!
space: This is an entire private 1bed room apartment in a secure front main door building. My place(this midtown area. and opposite side is Hilton hotel) is secure so you can look around even night time(many people walk around) . This unique apartment features one bedroom and one full bathroom with a all the comforts. Included is all your basic necessities, including everything you need to cook, flat screen 42" cable TV and WiFi, fresh linens and towels, etc.  Shower is very strong and nice hot. Location is key: Strategically positioned right in the center of Manhattan, you are just a stone's throw away from Times Square(8minute walk), Empire State Building(8minute walk), Javits Center(10minute walk), Hell's Kitchen(5minute walk), Fashion District, Madison Square Garden, Chelsea, great shopping, transportation and everything you need.  Only one block away from 34st subway station(3minute!!) so you can easy to go anywhere in NYC!!!

name: Free Metrocard*, Safe & Affordable
space: Private room (81 sq ft) on the 2nd floor of my classic American Foursquare in Flushing, Queens, NYC. This room has a bed, wardrobe, bookcase, and desk. Two other family bedrooms are also on this floor.  You will share the main bathroom and half bath with me, and possibly 1-2 others. Feel free to cook in my spacious (by NY standards) kitchen, and pick vegetables, raspberries, and blueberries from my garden in the summer, and enjoy my outdoor patio and barbecue.  Bike use, laundry, and WiFi available by request. Are you looking to visit your children who have moved to the "big city" but have no room for you in their tiny apartment? My home is the perfect place to stay comfortably, with plenty of parking. I'm a native English speaker with passable German skills and reading knowledge of French and Spanish.

name: No Frills Budget Traveler Crash Pad
space: 2 bedroom apartment with 1 room share available. Perfect for the right person on a budget! Railroad style apt. with high ceilings and windows. Multiple transportation options ONLY 5 minutes away: 2,3,4,5,Q,N,R,D,B train at Atlantic/ Pacific St Station. 5 min walking distance to at least 10 bars, plenty of restaurants and cafes, 10 min walk to The Barclay Center, 5 minutes to The Atlantic Mall, BAM (Brooklyn Academy of Music)!! 15 min into midtown Manhattan!! Catch a yellow cab  or go next door to the 24 Hr Car Service! Room: appx.10X11ft - small Furnished bedroom with dresser w/mirror, fullsize bed,ceiling fan and wardrobe rack and bookshelf, PERFECT for the right person traveling with 1 pieces of luggage. Room is small. Room is lightly furnished,  which consumes the space... High ceilings gives it some air.  The room is cozy and has a nice window right off the kitchen with access to the fire escape.  There is a spacious shared kitchen, bathroom and open area that you will have access

name: Private Suite, Free Metrocard*
space: The space has its own entrance and very small bathroom so you have privacy but we are upstairs if you need anything. This is a private part of my primary residence. We use the room for relaxing when we don't have guests. Room size: 500 sq ft/47 square meters  The room is located in the basement and you must be able to walk down 5 steps to enter. THERE ARE THREE SLEEPING OPTIONS BUT NO "REAL" BEDS. The full-size sofa bed (450 lb limit) and twin-size chaise (250 lb limit) fold down to accommodate three guests. There is also a footstool that folds out to a bed for one (300 lb limit). The room size is ideal for 1-2 persons, but a 3rd can be accommodated. 1 closet, refrigerator, kitchen sink, hot pot, microwave, and toaster (For safety reasons, there is no stove/oven).  The small private bathroom has a toilet, sink, and shower. Towels and toiletries are in the cabinet above the toilet. It is a tiny bathroom.

name: Comfortable and Large Duplex with Private Terrace
space: This apartment is a truly unique find. Built in 2007, it's about 800 square feet with all brand new appliances including microwave, dishwasher, gas stove, refrigerator, washer/dryer, floor to ceiling windows, and wifi. Walk up the skylight staircase to the bedroom which has a giant king sized bed and doors opening onto your own private terrace showcasing views of the Williamsburg bridge and NYC skyline! It's a 4 story walk up, but well worth the climb. Venture out into the neighborhood for some of the best shops, restaurants, bars and lounges Williamsburg has to offer all within a 3 block radius. In addition, make some time to check out a movie at the  Williamsburg Cinemas literally one block away.  Feel free to reach out with any specific questions you may have!

name: 2 Bedroom Bushwick Apartment
space: 2 bedroom 1 bath railroad type apartment located in the Bushwick section of Brooklyn. This apartment is located on the first floor of a 6 family unit. It is a short 2 blocks walk to the train station and is a short 15 train ride into 14th street Manhatten.. The L, J and M subway lines is 2 blocks away and is near a shopping district. Unit is for 6 people. Each additional person $30

name: Gorgeous Greenpoint Railroad
space: Beautiful, large, entire 900 sq foot railroad apartment in Greenpoint. 3rd floor walk-up, one block from the Greenpoint Avenue stop on the G-train and easy walking distance to Williamsburg. Apartment comes with wifi, full kitchen/appliances, towels, Queens sized bed with bedding etc.

name: Sunny, 3-bedroom next to subway and Central Park
space: Very sunny, fully furnished three-bedroom apartment with a great location. (My short-haired cat normally lives in the apartment, but he will not be there during your visit.)  The apartment is renovated and has Cable and High-speed wireless Internet, hardwood floors, high ceilings, large kitchen with marble floors, exposed brick entrance. It is on a 6 floor walk-up (no elevator), *what's considered the 5th floor in Europe, but there is roof-top access and the apt. gets terrific sunlight as a result. The Apt. is half a block from the 6 train stop, two blocks from Central Park. From the 103 St. stop it takes 12 minutes to 42nd st., 18 minutes to Union Square on the local 6 train, so commutes are very fast. Supermarket, laundromat, pharmacy, casual food places to nice restaurants, bars, Bally's fitness, are all located within the immediate area. ** NOTE: The previous reviews on this listing are in reference to when the listing used to be a Single bedroom within a shared place.  You would h

name: NYC Charming Upper West Side Apt.
space: This is a typical, 100-yr-old building, 4th floor walk-up, hard wood floors, high ceilings.  The apartment is a two bedroom apartment with one room available for guests. I stay on the second room.  Room for airbnb guests is private,  with king size bed. Complimentary WiFi, coffee and tea.

name: Chelsea 1 Bedroom in Art Deco Tower
space: Chic one bedroom apartment, large (800 square feet) with glorious light and stunning views of classic NYC.  This aerie is located on the 14th floor of an art deco elevator/doorman building on the border of Chelsea, Greenwich Village and the Meatpacking District, three of NYC's most interesting and walkable neighborhoods.  Corner apartment faces North and East with open views of landmark Gotham skyscrapers all the way up to Midtown, including a glimpse of the spire of the Empire State Building.  Have breakfast at the famed Cafeteria Restaurant (one block away), then tour the Rubin Museum of East Asian Art across the street.  Perambulate through Greenwich Village, a five minute walk away.  Two blocks from the newly opened High Line elevated park.  Apartment is tastefully decorated with mid-Century furniture and art, as well as vintage light fixtures from the 1930's to the 1960's.  King sized Poliform platform bed; bathroom with bathtub w/shower; spacious living room with large flat scree

name: Cozy- bedroom in Jackson Heights!
space: ---Please look up in trip advisor under tittle: Elegant and nice bedroom in Queens, NY. Your bedroom is private and it's furnished with a nice and comfortable queens size bed. Most importantly it is well located among several public transportation options! * Just 10 minutes away from LaGuardia Airport and 25 minutes away from JFK * Just minutes away from the main subway hub ( E,F,R,M and 7) trains that take you to Manhattan in about 15-20 minutes! *On top of this, Jackson Heights has been recognized as the most diverse neighborhood in New York! Experience New York like a local, just like a Real New Yorker. / (Please DON'T book directly, email me first. Thank you.) *FREE WI-FI* 100% free-smoking apt. ================== Read my guest reviews from other site: From London: ÛÏGreat stay with Louis and his family in Queens NYCÛ My boyfriend and I stayed with Louis and his lovely family for 10 days in January. Before we arrived Louis emailed me with a map of queens with directions to the apart

name: Sun-Drenched Studio in Clinton Hill
space: Hello!  My studio apartment is available throughout the year when I'm away for work. Perfect for someone looking for a quiet place to call home on your vacation.  Perched on the top floor of a 100 year-old victorian, sunlight fills the space from sunrise till sunset. There's a queen sized bed with plenty of blankets and fresh linens for your stay. The subway is less than a block away, making it easy to get into the city in less than 20 minutes.  The kitchen is fully stocked and perfect for making breakfast or dinner if you want to stay in.  Otherwise, there's a wide selection of amazing restaurants and bars minutes away.   Subway Details 1/2 a block from the A,C Clinton/Washington Station 4 blocks from the G Clinton Washington Station 6 blocks from the 2,3 Bergen Station

name: Private Bedroom Manhattan
space: New Update: Premium bed. Bed is not soft in the middle and hard on the ends. You will not sink into the bed. Bed is comfortable and expensive. No headboard and footboard so you can easily get out of bed without waking person sleeping next to you. New York is exciting and in this apartment you can meet people from all over the world. I have INSTANT BOOK so there is no need to ask if the place is available. If it is free on the calendar then it is free for booking. Also the price is exactly what comes up when you enter your desired dates. Best deal on Airbnb Manhattan! I live in the apartment and you will live here also.  I have many guests giving me their input and I have everything from rubbing alcohol to band-aids to scissors. Do not go to a hotel where you must purchase all these items at an expensive gift shop. Your room is live in ready. Please let me know if you need me to purchase any items before your stay. Many travel plugs, so your devices will work in the room. Two surge prot

name: Furnished Private Bedroom.
space: Close to the subway and to the JFK airport. You share bathroom with 2 people and kitchen .

name: Ideal Location + Shower In Kitchen!
space: It's a cute, sunny 3-room apartment in the perfect location on between the West Village and Soho.  This coveted neighborhood is filled with trendy restaurants, independent film theaters, and an array of coffeeshops and boutique shopping. Located in a converted tenement building, this 3rd floor walkup (two flights up from street level) has new hardwood floors, tons of morning and early afternoon sun, a great view down 6th Avenue, and only-in-NYC charm like a shower in the kitchen! Although you're only a short walk from the Lower East Side, Chinatown, SoHo, Tribeca, The West Village, The East Village, Union Square, NYU, Flatiron, Meatpacking District, Chelsea and more, the apartment is less than three blocks from 3 subway stops... that covers the A, B, C, D, E, F, M, 1, 2, 3 trains.  There are also convenient bus routes along 6th Ave and Houston St. There's a large kitchen with full gas stove and large counter/prep area;  you'll have a stovetop espresso maker and a Nespresso Aeroccino fr

name: Enjoy Brownstone Brooklyn!
space: Spacious 1-bedroom apartment with access to a shared backyard on a classic, "Brownstone Brooklyn" block. The apartment includes an open Kitchen/Living Room design. Kitchen cabinets are fully stocked with dishware, pots, pans and other cookware. Fresh, clean bedding, towels and toiletries included. Continental breakfast ÛÒ fresh orange juice, organic milk, New York-style bagels and cream cheese, dry cereals and coffee ÛÒ are all provided for you in the rental unit.  Hand-made herbal teas can also be made available. With regards to sleeping accommodations, the master bedroom has a queen-sized bedroom set and in addition, the couch in the living room area is a sofabed and folds out to an additional full-sized bed. The iconic central Brooklyn neighborhood of Bedford-Stuyvesant has gorgeous 19th century architecture and plenty of local restaurants, shops and bars (see our guide). Just a ten minute walk to the subways, which will get you to downtown Manhattan in about 20 minutes.  Our house is

name: Architecturally Stunning Former Synagogue
space: Spectacular townhouse in Historic East Village that was formerly a synagogue! One of the city's last tenement Shuls, now a chic landmarked building, this former synagogue was brilliantly transformed into a magnificent home in 2005 by world-famous designers from the Ian Shrager Hotels ÛÒ earning recognition in Architectural Record for its extraordinary transformation, and attracting the likes of press, politicians and entertainment figures. Yours to rent is the exquisite result of their top-of-the-line gut renovation: an immaculately-designed, 3 bedroom (possible 4), 2.5 bath fourplex that boasts 3 wonderful outdoor terraces, the finest finishes and fixtures, plus the most advanced automated central audio/visual, lighting, HVAC and integrated security systems. Other distinctive features that make this sun-drenched residence such a unique work of art are its custom-made windows that are exact replicas of when the building was a synagogue (including the Star of David!), and luxurious touch

name: Best Deal in Hells Kitchen/Midtown!
space: So this is a private room in Hell's Kitchen. You will be steps away from Times Square, theaters on Broadway, Central Park, almost every train and a ton of great restaurants! This is your own room with a closet in a converted apartment. Thiat means there is no common area, just two rooms a kitchen, a bath and a hallway. I would be your roommate in the other room. The rooms are on opposite ends of the apartment so you will have your privacy. There is a kitchen and a bathroom we would be sharing. FYI, this is not a huge room but just fine for a short stay in the middle of NYC so you are paying for location. About me I am a professional in his 30s and I am rarely home. Though I am sure we will get along just fine should we bump into eachother:)  The main thing I require is that you clean up after yourself and do not smoke in the apartment. Other than that feel free to use my dishes, etc... and everything will be great! I look forward to hearing from you soon! -Eric

name: Best Location btwn Un Sq/ Chelsea
space: Updated studio apartment in amazing location.  Studio features one queen size bed and a single pull out with full kitchen and updated bath! Space is suitable for a couple, a small family, or a few friends that are looking to explore the city with access to a true NYC apartment! Nestled between Chelsea and Union Square this unit has it all.  Awesome food, fun and culture at your finger tips.  Guests can expect to be in the middle of the action, have access to all a home can offer (cable, TV, kitchen, laundry in building), amazingly close to public transportation (1 avenue to the ACE 1 block to the 123 and BDF and L (Brooklyn), and 10-minute walk to the 456 and NQR)  Please reach out to set up time to stay in this incredible apartment. We hope to hear from you soon!

name: Boldera: Your Home Away From Home
space: Welcome to Boldera. Your home away from home  Relax and enjoy a peaceful stay in our private 2-bedroom apartment, located on the 3rd floor of Boldera ÛÒ our charming Brownstone.  Located on a quiet, tree lined street in historic Stuyvesant Heights, we are centrally located a few minute's stroll from: the subway ÛÒ the A and C lines; great places to eat and socialize ÛÒ Peaches, Saraghina, Trade Union, Chez Oscar, Manny's and Therapy Wine Bar; and lots of other amenities ÛÒ grocery stores, laundry, etc. You will also enjoy the tranquility of staying on one of the Greenest Blocks in Brooklyn ÛÒ according to the Brooklyn Botanic Garden.  With a private entrance, this bright and spacious penthouse apartment can accommodate six people very comfortably. The apartment has two bedrooms (one master and one junior); a large lounge/living room with a dining area ; a kitchen; and full bathroom  Bedroom 1 has a Queen sized bed and can sleep 2  Bedroom 2 has a Queen sized futon and can sleep 2  The Loung

name: Penthouse patio,city view,BIG bed
space: Sunny apartment with sunset views of entire city - you can see the empire state building from the the king size bed!  The most famous Brooklyn bars, restaurants and dance clubs that put Williamsburg on the map are by Bedford L stop and walking distance from here. We JUST switched the bedrooms around and redecorated the whole apt! The new guest room is the bigger room with a KING sized bed and large space. We tend to be away, so you can often have the place to yourself. Short term or long term OK - be in touch for long term deals. If you want to rent out the whole place that is an option too. One bedroom is a huge king bedroom (huge by NYC standards). We charge a little extra cleaning fee for a third person FYI. Families are welcome. We have a spare twin size insanely comfortable memory foam mattress in case you travel with children or need two beds. The apartment is 2 blocks from the waterfront and located half a block to the main shopping/restaurant street, Bedford Avenue, in the hear

name: Cozy room,only 2 blocks from subway,10min to City!
space: Cozy private room 10 min to City!. Very safe convenience neighborhoods with supermarkets, 24/7 delis, banks, restaurants,and bars. It is located in Astoria, Queens. Definitely in a family-friendly neighborhood. Safe to walk around any time of the day. Less than 10-min walk to tons of local restaurants(some nice ones are 24/7) and grocery stores. Subway station is only 2 blocks a way. By taking M60 bus, you can go to harlem area in 10 min. By taking Q18 bus, you can go to woodside area in 10 min.

name: NYC Living- Private, Couples, Groups!
space: Great deal in a great apartment!  Room is very large, great for couples or small groups. The room has a double bed that fits two with another double bed with a real mattress that pulls out from underneath. (These are not air mattresses.) Please note, you're renting a room, not the entire apartment.  We're located in a new part of Harlem that has a lot of new cafes/bars, etc. Not ritzy-glitzy Soho, but we love our neighborhood and so have countless guests. Apt is a 7 minute walk to Central Park, by a new grocery store, laundry, new bars and restaurants, and a 10-15 minute walk to Columbia University. And just 2 stops to Times Square on the "A" Express train.  We're a 3-7  minute walk to 3 subway stations that include the A,B,C,D,2,3 Subway lines (all are Express except B,C!!) so the A or D trains run express for 8 minutes to Midtown Columbus Circle!  The A express takes you all the way to Williamsburg, Brooklyn too. You can get anywhere you need to go very easily with these subway lines

name: Hip, charming sublet-- entire apt!
space: Living room has a cozy sofa and a non-working fireplace. Large kitchen is great for cooking. Large bedroom has a queen-size bed and beautiful morning sun.

name: Light and Airy, Prime Williamsburg
space: We have a one bedroom apartment and office in the artistic and culinary enclave of Williamsburg, Brooklyn. We are on the 6th floor doorman building with an elevator. Our apartment features an open concept kitchen and living room with floor to ceiling windows and a terrace with views of the Williamsburg Bridge and the Wiliamsburg Savings bank.  Our bedroom has large windows and has a very comfortable queen bed. We have a daybed in our living room can also be used for sleeping. We have lots of books to read, super fast wi-fi, cable television, and a well equipped kitchen. There is laundry in the building. Our place is open and filled with light, our friends love staying here and we find it calm and very comfortable. There is also access to a roof deck with lovely views of Manhattan from Wall Street to Midtown, and reasonably priced parking in the building.  We love our neighborhood and are located very centrally, right off of the main thoroughfare of Bedford Avenue, 2 blocks from the Eas

name: share a bedroom / have your own private bedI
space: Hi I'm am renting a bed in a 1br apt  Fully furnished apt You'll have your own bed and share a large bedroom close to subway  20 min from Manhattan If you have any questions feel free to email me  Thanks for looking have a great day!

name: Hip Modern West Village Apartment
space: Location! Location! Location! Sunny, bright, clean 1 bedroom apartment in Manhattan's historic Greenwich Village available for nightly rentals. Apartment is on the corner of historic Christopher and Gay Street and is one block from the famous Stonewall Bar. The apartment gets great light, has original wood floors and a large working fireplace. All the furniture is classic, original, and modern (no knock offs). The bedroom is snug requiring you to enter the full size bed from it's foot. The apartment is on the second floor facing the street providing not just a front row seat to Village charm but also a certain amount of street noise. Things you can count on: High speed wireless internet connection. Clean towels and sheets. A newly renovated kitchen with a two burner stovetop, microwave and a cool Kohler faucet. There is no oven but I have a coffee press. Just in case there is an iron if you need a freshly pressed shirt. House Rules: No smoking, no pets, no parties. Apartment is perfect

name: Private One Bedroom Suite, 45 min from City
space: THE HOUSE Our home (a 3-Story 2-family Colonial) is located  in the Briarwood section of Queens. Available for rent is our newly constructed basement suite [5'11" (1.8M) maximum height in one small area of apartment] The suite consists of a bedroom, a full bathroom, and a living room . The suite is accessed by way of a semi-private side entrance (we use occasionally to access backyard and basement storage).  The suite has another door for your privacy.  The bedroom is furnished with a Full-Size Bed with drawers.  The bed measures 54 in. (1.37m) wide x 76 in. (1.93m) long.  There is also a wardrobe and a night stand in addition to some shelves for your luggage and/or personal items, as well.  Main Bed dimensions Mattress length: 76 " (193 cm) Mattress width: 54 " (137 cm)    Sofa/Bed Measures Mattress length: 74 " (188 cm) Mattress width: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) cm) Mattress thick: 3 7/8 " (10 cm) The living space includes a 40" LCD T.V. hooked up to the Internet for unlimited N

name: Brooklyn-Bedstuy-1 bedroom
space: I have a 1 bedroom apartment in one of the best locations in Bedstuy (I think anyways!). There is a few restaurants walking distance on Bedford, Nostrand, and Fulton Street. I am 2 blocks away from the A/C/S trains. A 15 minute walk to Atlantic Terminal where you can take all the NYC subways and LIRR. Also, it is a 5 minute walk to the Nostrand LIRR station. I am 4 miles from Manhattan and ample street parking can be found. My 1 bedroom is large enough for a couple to be comfortable on their vacation. I also have a queen size air mattress that can fit 2 people and a sofa as well. The apartment will be freshly cleaned by a service before your arrival (bed will be newly made with clean sheets) and there will be plates/pots/pans etc at your disposal. This is NY, please be aware that the walls are thin. Bedroom: Full size bed with clean sheets and linens. There is a 32" TV with a DVD player in the living room with no cable.  Kitchen: Fully working refrigerator, stove and oven (no dishwash

name: Stylish 1897 garden duplex oasis!
space: This stylish, lofty, white-washed 1300 sq ft duplex in an 1897 brownstone building underwent a recent labor of love gut-renovation & is described by friends as an oasis of calm, creative luxury and pampering comfort.  We've fallen in love with Clinton Hill, an artistic neighborhood featuring some of Brooklyn's best bars, cafes & restaurants.  And with 3 decorative fireplaces, heated floors, a beautifully refinished claw foot tub rescued from a goat farm upstate NY, an all white garden level bedroom sanctuary and a 1000 sq ft ivy-covered private garden with a  40' screening wall, we hope you'll love it too! Wake up to birds chirping in the garden, the smell of lavender and rosemary out your windows in summer, or snow falling lightly on the river birch tree in the wintertime, and a flood of southern facing light year round.  In the summer, put a blanket out to sip cocktails in the grass or grill dinner, snipping fresh herbs from the garden & dine al fresco. The garden level features an o

name: In the Heart of Downtown Manhattan
space: 2 Bed room apartment in the heart of downtown, near Canal street subway stops, steps away from Nolita, Tribeca, Chinatown, Lower East side.  Centrally located and fully furnished.  The apartment is also child friendly, with the second bed room set up with a large crib.  Full internet and Apple Tv included.   *There is one full sized bed in the adult room.  The smaller children's room has a large crib, and an air mattress that can comfortably accommodate one adult.  The sofa also turns into a flat bed, though this is not as ideal.  In total we recommend max 3 adults and 1 child* The apartment is quiet though in a very busy and dynamic area.

name: Brooklyn gem by Prospect Park & Museum
space: Thanks for checking out my place! I LOVE my studio and wouldn't want to live anywhere else in all of New York, and happy to share it with others when I'm not occupying it.  About my place... It's in a prime part of Brooklyn - Prospect Heights -  right across the street from Prospect Park, the library, Brooklyn Museum, Botanic Gardens and less than a mile from the Barclay Center. Not to mention, loads of restaurants and bars to suit anyone's taste. It's also close to many train lines to allow easy access into Manhattan (if you really want to go there). 20 minutes to lower Manhattan. The bed is a queen memory foam mattress, and the couch pulls out into a queen size. Full kitchen and bath, which are separate from the living/sleeping area.  My unit is on the 4th floor in an elevator building. My TV is connected via Chrome Cast, which you can connect to with your mobile device to watch Netflix etc. You need to download the Chromecast app and connect your mobile device to the wifi and can pr

name: Modern E. Village 2BR w/Roof Deck
space: Great apartment in the heart of the East Village furnished with internet, 42" flat-screen TV, dishwasher, washer/dryer, modern kitchen & bathroom, full set of cookware, premium cutlery and dishes, hardwood floors, 12' ceilings and exposed brick throughout. AND...a roof deck! The deck is a dedicated section of the building roof just for my apartment and that has a table, chairs, umbrella and BBQ with views of the Empire State Building and the Freedom Tower. I have also recently added (not in photos) cushioned lounge chairs that are perfect for relaxing in the sun. Sightsee in the morning, tan in the afternoon. Location is perfectly located a block from the subway and within a five minute walk of roughly 100 bars and restaurants. Recently ranked 37th best restaurant in the world, Momofuku Ssam Bar, is a 3 minute walk. I'm more than happy to make many bar and restaurant recommendations or suggest sightseeing activities. Apartment is up five flights of stairs, so unfortunately it's not han

name: Large Oasis,Designer,15min Manh
space: Large 1,000 sq feet apt. Totally private space--nothing is shared. Great for couples. My boyfriend and I are interior designers by hobby and built this place from scratch, with love. Seriously, one of the nicest interior designs we've seen in Queens. Great to relax, cook, and really feel at home. We moved to Boston for school so looking to rent it out while my boyfriend and I are up there. Bought it 5 years ago.  It's decorated with vintage, and cool stuff from around the world.  8 large windows letting in lots of natural light, living room foyer, beautiful hard-wood floors throughout, drop-leaf dining table,  Big bath tub,  super comfortable queen-sized bed,  customized closet and dresser.  2 full wall bathroom mirrors,  stereo system & speakers throughout apartment,  eat-in-kitchen with booth seating,  bosch dishwasher, high end bertozzni gas stove.   Work desk area, Aeron charis free wifi,  Very safe building, with double doors and security cameras.  Garden in back. Located in histo

name: Entire floor off Montrose L train
space: An enormous fully furnished floor steps from the Montrose L train stop! This is the lower level of a ground floor duplex complete with a half bath, full size bed, a full size futon, and air mattress upon request. The space is large, about 400 sq feet, and is palace for the lone traveler and comfortably fits four guests. Upstairs you'll find a full bath which is shared with myself. I asks that guests refrain from using the kitchen but they're welcome to plates, bowls, cups and utensils.

name: charming house on family block
space: This is our family home.  It has three bedrooms upstairs and a open plan living, dining and kitchen on main floor.  There is also a garden.  It is ideally located close to Prospect Park, multiple subway lines, shopping, great bars and restaurants.  The owner/family speak English, French, Spanish and Italian and are happy to help you enjoy your stay in New York. The neighborhood is friendly, safe and fun!  The apartment is ideal for a family.

name: Beautiful Bedroom Manhattan
space: Premium bed. Bed is not soft in the middle and hard on the ends. You will not sink into the bed. Bed is comfortable and expensive. No headboard and footboard so you can easily get out of bed without waking person sleeping next to you. New York is exciting and in this apartment you can meet people from all over the world. I have INSTANT BOOK so there is no need to ask if the place is available. If it is free on the calendar then it is free for booking. Also the price is exactly what comes up when you enter your desired dates. Best deal on Airbnb Manhattan! I live in the apartment and you will live here also.  I have many guests giving me their input and I have everything from rubbing alcohol to band-aids to scissors. Do not go to a hotel where you must purchase all these items at an expensive gift shop. Your room is live in ready. Please let me know if you need me to purchase any items before your stay. Many travel plugs, so your devices will work in the room. Two surge protectors (not
