name: Beautiful Modern apt in Brooklyn
space: Introducing a great place to come home to in Clinton Hill after taking in all of the sites of NYC. Clinton Hill is known to have some of the prettiest brownstones in Brooklyn and is worth a nice walk around its tree-lined streets. Plus it's surrounded by some amazing sites all within a short walking distance. If you are not into the walking thing a car service can get you to most places under 10 minutes. The living space is a modern year old building decorated with the color and fun. The living space features extremely high ceilings (16 ft.). This combined with the glass doored French balcony makes this place glow with amazing light until sundown. The leather sectional and glass coffee table help complete this giant sun room. I am a big fan of art and have the work of my friends across the walls. Feel free to browse my cataloged vintage magazines and books.  If you get bored with the written word or had a long day of exploration in NY watch the 47 inch Flatscreen TV on the wall with ov

name: Great location - heart of Manhattan
space: Great location in heart of Manhattan on Upper east side where  a lot of movie scene . Walking distance to Central Park where you can ride on bike . This is cozy apartment  in a lovely, quiet,  building with friendly neighbors in a safe neighborhood where all shopping .You are steps away from everything!  Subways( 1 blok to 6 train).. Bars.. Restaurants.. Cafes.. Shopping.. Museums.. Central Park. 10min to Time Square by train Fully furnished 1 bedroom with a kitchen. I have air conditioner extra heater. I  provide hairdryer, towels, iron, etc. I live on a 6 floor with no elevator . I live in NYC 5 years. I'm student. I'm very friendly caring person will help you in any questions, will suggest you some places to go some stuff to do. I'm going away for June 16- July 8.

name: Sweet Sunny Apartment
space: Our apartment is located on a brownstone, tree lined block in Clinton Hill, 1.5 blocks from the subway.  It is a spacious top floor flat full of light throughout the day, 2nd floor walkup.  There is an empty desk open for working.  Fast wifi is included, we do not have a television.  The bedroom has a queen size bed and empty dresser.  The living room couch or single airbed is  a cozy sleeping option for a 3rd person if needed.  The kitchen is equipped with most cooking items you would need: gas stove and oven, good pots and pans, pots, knives, vitamix blender, toaster.  The apartment is warm, uncluttered and tidy, it's peaceful space to be within the city.  Our neighbors are respectful and quiet, we ask the same of our guests.    No parties, no pets and no smoking please.  No one other than the agreed upon guests may stay at the apartment.

name: PAINTERS PARADISE / GREENPOINT
space: ARTIST SPACE / One Bedroom / Rustic Aesthetic Hi there, from time to time I rent out the studio part of my live/work space.  In your inquiry message please include the reason for your visit and a little bit about yourself.   Also, please read fully the description below before contacting me with questions. My studio is ideal for anyone with an interest in painting and music and who might be working from the apartment multiple days in a row.  I have an extensive record collection that spans jazz to electronic, rock to experimental.   Listening to records in the studio is wonderful.  My paintings decorate the walls and the space is open. I have a collection of art monographs as well. The main space has a flat screen TV with Netflicks and a DVD player. Greenpoint has become a destination all its own, with restaurants, coffee shops, and bars everywhere.  It's away from the hustle and noise of Manhattan, and has that "secret hideaway" feeling. There is one bedroom in the studio with a full

name: Huge Sun-Drenched W. Village w/ Balcony
space: Massive loft-style living and dining room, huge bedroom, with terrace, in the West Village (10th Street). Beautiful street, close to the river and Hudson River Park, convenient for subways, the Highline, Meatpacking district and Chelsea, great shops and loads of awesome restaurants.  I am looking for the right person to sublet my apartment. ItÛªs a very large, airy, sun-filled, clean and well furnished one bedroom. Two bathrooms, great kitchen, balcony.  About: Approximately 900 square feet 1 BR / Queen size bed (large bedroom and master bathroom) 4th Floor elevator Large living room/dining room Balcony  Faces south One block from Hudson River Park Guest bathroom Washer/dryer in the apartment Subways: Christopher Street, West 4th Street, and Christopher Street Path train Sun-drenched, spacious living room, large bedroom, huge master bathroom and a guest bathroom. The terrace faces South, looking toward Christopher Street and river. One block from the Hudson River with its parks, jogging

name: CHIC ROOM IN BROOKLYN BROWNSTONE
space: SINGLE Private Room with Separate Shower-Bath (on lower level) in Sunny, Gorgeous Brooklyn Brownstone.  Located on the border of Flatbush, Midwood and Ditmas Park where you can experience authentic New York with a Caribbean twist.  Approximately 5 minutes from subway, 30 minutes from Manhattan and close to the bustling Flatbush Avenue.  Walking distance from Target, Starbucks, laundry and independent shops on Cortelyou Road/Newkirk Plaza.   House is colorful, chock full of antiques, art and cool objects that I hand-picked myself.  During summer months, you can dine al fresco in backyard herb and flower garden.   Kitchen is available for coffee/tea and preparing light meals only.   Kitchen, Dining Area, Private Bath, Sitting Area and Wi-Fi I live on-site and am here to answer questions/make local recommdations.   We love our neighborhood and can't wait to share it with you!  We are very conveniently located - close to subway/bus and walking distance to supermarkets, coffee shops, restau

name: Central Pk West-Convenient 1 BR
space: THE APARTMENT: This is a sunny and comfortable apt with picture windows facing New YorkÛªs historic and glorious Central  Park.    The living room, dining area, books, entertainment, fold-out sectional couch (queen sized bed) and plenty of seating.  The private bedroom contains a queen-sized bed, 25" TV, dresser, night tables and lamps, closet, wing-back chair, books and is very comfortable.  The kitchen is small but well organized and equipped with lots of kitchen tools and spices.  The bathroom has full tub and shower. THE LOCATION: The apartment building is located across from the northern end of the park  and is one of the best neighborhoods in the city.  It is bounded by Harlem to the north, Central Park to the east, and blocks and blocks of interesting amusements (museums) to the west and south.  Just walk across the street to enjoy Central Park; venture not far north to historic points of interest including Columbia University,  The Cathedral of St. John the Divine,  GrantÛªs Tomb

name: Columbia area room pvt bath & entry
space: This private room, with its own entrance and private bath, is on the top floor of pre-war coop. There is an elevator for the building, and one flight up is a shared roof deck with trees, seating, and river view. At 200 sq ft, this sunny space with a DOUBLE BED provides a quiet haven for visitors amid the bustle of NYC. It includes: Shower and full-length tub   Cotton sheets and towels  High speed wireless internet Electric kettle The room is best for a single person, or 2 people sharing a bed. There's also an inflatable mattress and bedding available for a younger person to sleep on the floor. Preferred guests are people who have a reason to stay in this particular neighborhood -- with family nearby, or business at one of the many educational institutions in the community. There is excellent access to public transportation, restaurants, groceries, music, parks, and coffee shops. The room has a shelf of NYC guidebooks and maps, as well as novels and mysteries set in the city. My daughte

name: Studio apartment in Bensonhurst
space: none

name: Private 2BRs, Near Park and Metro. Sleeps 4!
space: SMALL GUEST ROOM with Full Size Bed (Sleeps 2) Clean, modern, clutter free private room with three windows, super comfy full size bed with memory form topper, a chair, a small table, a full length mirror, a chest of drawers and hangers. MASTER BEDROOM with Full Size Romantic Canopy Bed (Sleeps 2)  Memory Form topper.  Ceiling Fan (No AC)  Perfect for people who doesn't like AC, who likes to sleep in the dark.  (One small window) LIVING ROOM & DINING AREA  Cozy living room with Chaise, Coffee table, and lots of floor pillows. Dining Table extends for larger parties. KITCHEN  NYC size, Fully equipped kitchen with Microwave, feel free to use our spices, utensils, dishes etc.  Sorry for coffee drinkers, we have no coffee machine at this time. BATHROOM  Simple bathroom with a tub. Filtered shower.

name: 1 rm @ 3BR artist loft williamsburg
space: Hello I am a fashion and celebrity photographer who lives in Brooklyn near McCarren. The loft is right on the border of Williamsburg and Greenpoint. One of the best area. The room is newly repainted and with a brand new air conditioner.  The room has a Full Sealy Hosta Plush Mattress with Sensor Pedic Memory Foam pillow with cool Technology.   Very spacious bathroom.  It is a room in photographer's loft, high ceiling, and i shoot models here from time to time or do castings. So it is best if you are not a creep. The loft is 5 minutes to Berry Park and about 10 minutes to the bedford station and 5 minutes to Nassau and Greenpoint station. The building is full of young people. and its newly renovated and clean. the apartment is near stores and convenience stores.  Loft Features - High Ceiling	 - Hardwood floor	 - Refrigerator - Stove/Oven - Pans - coffee Machine	 - Laundry within the building - Amazing Rooftop view - Large Bathroom - Very Fast Wifi It is 3 blocks from Manhattan Avenue wh

name: Spacious, Cozy, Williamsburg Room
space: Good luck topping this, economical, aesthesian traveller.  This apartment is on the 6th floor of a walk up in Williamsburg (lorimer stop of the L or the JMZ) with a roof that has a 360 view and a room overlooking the glorious NYC skyline. Amazing light. Tons of plants. Safe neighborhood. Easy access to 3 subway lines. The city is at your fingertips...Very close to tons of awesome bars, restaurants, shops, people watching - it's just about the best place you can find in Williamsburg.

name: Lovely 1 bedroom in Gramercy area
space: Very safe and quiet building with a doorman located in lovely Gramercy Park area. 6-minute walk to Union Square. Access to 4,5,6,N,Q,R,L subway trains on Union Square. You can also transfer to F,V,1,2,3,A,C,E trains from L train which is 5 minutes away from the building. There are north-south and east-west bound buses in the immediate area of the building. This way you have easy access to all the areas of NYC. Plenty of restaurants, food and clothing stores and bars in the area.  There are a number of cinemas in the proximity and within walking distance.  Bedroom features a double  bed that can accommodate two adults. There is a small work area with a desk and printer. Central heating  in bedroom and living room. Living room is featuring eclectic Moroccan design with nice options for ambient lighting and exotic atmosphere. Living space is consisting of two areas - for socializing and meditation/reading. In the living room one of the sofas pulls out to accommodate additional guests. Bat

name: Under budget? (Glendale)
space: This is a small room, big enough to accommodate your dreams and luggage. Twin bed. Space for storage.  The room belongs to a 4 (I built the 4th one) bedroom apartment where I live with my son, my dog, and my roommate, so yes you must love young adults and dogs.  We are a zone of ZERO tolerance for racist/homophobic/sexist/xenophobic jokes/comments. ZERO. WiFi and kitchen for use. Bathroom has to be shared with my son and myself, third person has his own restroom. One set of sheets included. Towel, shampoo, and body wash ONLY if staying less than a month. Safe neighborhood. Manhattan 40 minutes away. Closest trains L and M, within walking distance (10 minutes (M)), or by bus (Q55 (L)). No smoking in the house, and we prefer NON-SMOKING people. You can have visitors, but not sleep overs. Malls, restaurants, delis, movie theaters, and some bars within walking distance.

name: Charming East Village Studio
space: This studio is right in the heart of downtown Manhattan, surrounded by bars, coffee shops and destinations like Xi'an Famous Foods, Big Gay Ice Cream Shop and the real-life Oddities store. Fold-out futon sleeps two, plus there's an air mattress and a couch for friends if you are traveling in a group. This apartment is steps to the N/R/Q and 4/5/6 subway lines, as well as the F train.

name: Clean & Cozy in Flatbush Bklyn
space: Unwind from a day of conferencing, sight-seeing, or otherwise in a clean, attractive apartment in a recently renovated walk-up building with an awning.  Given the size of my apartment, this is ideal for a stay of up to 6 days. You'll sleep on a sofabed--covered in clean sheets--that can accommodate up to 2 people, if necessary ( i.e., a parent and a child under 12 yrs.).  Clean up in a full-size bathroom with electric outlets, fan, & a window.  You can keep food & beverages in the refrigerator.  There are several clean, moderately priced Halal, Chinese, Latino, New American, and Caribbean restaurants to choose from. The building is located in between the B/Q and 2/5 subway lines and minutes from the Flatbush Ave. bus and the fun dollar vans. I'm willing to give you a short tour of Flatbush, Ditmas Park, or East Flatbush if my schedule permits.  I have a cat that's friendly but not intrusive and the same is true about me :-) Non-smoking women are preferred. All people welcomed.

name: charming luxurious house, NY, Brooklyn
space: Our place is located in the neighborhood of Park Slope in Brooklyn, New York, on a beautiful landmark street, 5 minutes away from several subway lines going to Manhattan, Brooklyn and Queens (a subway ride to Manhattan is 15-20 minutes). Park Slope has a lot to offer: great restaurants, beautiful architecture and a very kid-friendly environment (Park Slope has been voted one of the best places to live in New York City). It is located 5 minutes away from Prospect Park, which was designed by the same designer as Central park (it is half the size of Central Park).  Our apartment has three floors (2 full floors--ground floor and parlor floor- and an English basement with windows) and the apartment is part of our house.åÊOur house is from the end of the 19th century and has recently been renovated by us. The apartment has 4 bedrooms that sleep 7 people (1 bedroom with a king size bed, one bedroom with a queen size bed, one bedroom with a sofa bed and the last bedroom with a single bed). Ther

name: Private 1br Apartment in Williamsburg!
space: The apartment gets great light year round and the high ceilings keep it cool in the summer. Aesthetically, it's an artsy take on classic Brooklyn architecture. When I was renovating and resorting the space, I discovered the amazing interior windows.  Details: - A big kitchen - A large bedroom with detailed antique molding, high ceilings  - Bathroom with shower (plus heater/towel warmer) - 1 full-size bed and 1 pull-out sofa bed - Cozy living room - Lighting fast Wifi - Heat + AC, with individual unit thermostat for temperature control  - 100% cotton sheets and towels provided

name: Avenue A Apartment
space: One bedroom on a vibrant chic East Village street.   The apartment is ideal for 2 but can accomodate up to 4. The bedroom has a comfortable full size bed with sheets replaced  before and after stays. The couch in the living room converts into a full size bed. Air mattress is also available.     The kitchen contains all the basics (skillet, pot, knives, dishes, cups etc...).  The bathroom is loaded with towels and maintained with the utmost care.  The apartment also includes: - Wireless Internet (WiFi) - Flat screen tv with all basic channels - Music speaker (bluetooth and aux-in wire connection) - Roku box for watching streaming internet on the television (hulu, netflix, etc) - New York City guide books and magazines  The price is inclusive of all utilities and internet. name: Prospect Park Front Apartment
space: GUEST ROOM (Private Room) Clean, cozy, modern, clutter free, private guest room in our Jr. 3 bedroom apartment.  Three windows, super comfy full size bed with memory form topper, freshly changed linens and a bath towel, a chair, a small table, a full length mirror,  free WiFi access, a chest of drawers and hangers.   KITCHEN (Shared) small but fully functional kitchen with Microwave, No oven. (Sorry!) feel free to use our spices, dishes etc. BATHROOM (Shared) NYC size Tub and Shower.  We have a deep tub!  taking a bath would be amazing after walking around the city all day.  LIVING ROOM/DINING ROOM (shared) There is a drop leaf dining tables that opens up when you are eating in.   * Please note that you can lock the room from inside, but there is no lock for all the rooms (including my room).  We are blessed, never had issue with missing items!   ******Please check out my other listing in the same Apartment: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/2389738

name: GORGEOUS APT IN HEART OF SOHO!  1BD
space: Beautiful, quiet, well-kept 1-BEDROOM apartment in the center of Soho (real Soho).  Apartment is on the first floor (but one floor above street level), is clean, comfortable and designed with high-end furniture. It is a very relaxing apartment to be in. Great for one person or a couple.  The apartment is situated on a lovely street in Soho. Just across the street are two of the best restaurants in NY. Scattered within 1-3 blocks (all less than 5 minutes walking) are great restaurants, high-end shops and hotels.  If you are visiting, this is truly the best spot you can be.   Fresh linens, towels and toiletries are prepared in advance for your arrival.  Bed is full-size. * PROVIDED to guests: clean linens, towels and shampoo, conditioner, body wash, pots/pans, dishware, hair dryer, clothing iron,  WIFI access.  * Laundry in building * Standard check-out is at 11 am - checkin-in is at 3 pm however check in/out is flexible - please write to host to confirm time.       I would be happy to a

name: Room in cool Bushwick loft!
space: Room available in large 3 bedroom Brooklyn loft available during the summer. Live with two lovely hip gentleman and two handsome cats. There is a full kitchen, lots of Le Creuset. Long bar table in the kitchen great for eating, preparing and working on your laptop. Free fast Wifi all over. There is a shared living room and bathroom. Netflix on the TV. The cats are friendly but also keep to themselves for the most part. There is also a large roof deck with huge rooftop adjacent. Your room is in the back. Please note that the door temporarily is a curtain and needs to be reinstalled but since the room is in back it is still very private. The decor is very rustic bourgeois. Lots of plants. You will full sized bed in a fully furnished room with a dresser and  hanging space for your clothes. Central heat. Can also provide bedding if needed. The loft is located on the M train at the Flushing stop so two minute walk to the platform. Despite its proximity the place is surprisingly quiet though

name: Lofty 71 må_ Apt + Private Garden
space: Enjoy a hidden oasis amid the bustling cityÛÓour airy flat is just the place to unwind after a day of sightseeing, window-shopping, and people-watching here in Brooklyn or anywhere else you choose to roam. With high ceilings, exposed brick, and a backyard garden, you will have a spacious, comfortable home base during your travels. Step inside our 150-year-old brick rowhouse and relaxÛÓcurl up on the couch while you plan your activities for the day, or duck into the yard and enjoy the seclusion of an urban garden. Want a great meal? Our neighborhood is filled with restaurants, cafes, and barsÛÓsomething for every palate and budget. Or snack your way through one of several weekend farmers' markets. Or pick up gourmet groceries from one of our nearby markets and make your own feast in our thoughtfully appointed kitchen. It is well-equipped, with a dishwasher, blender, toaster, food processor, coffee press, kettle, etc.  Want to shop? Stroll one block to Smith Street's stores and boutiques. G

name: NYC Apt in the Heart of the West Village!
space: Hello Fellow Traveller!  If you're looking for a beautiful, CLEAN, private getaway in the heart of NYC, then look no further!!! I have a very large, 2-room studio that I rent alone. I am a VERY clean freak (almost O.C.D.  LoL) and appreciate a nice living space. I keep my apartment in nice condition and clean all the time because I love having guests come stay here!  Two giant windows inside the living area of the apartment allow you to sip your morning coffee (Starbucks Verismo plus regular a Cuisinart Coffee Maker) and look out at other New Yorkers as they pass by on the tree-lined street below. The apartment is located on the 4th floor of a beautiful historic building in the heart of the West Village, steps from where Bob Dylan laid his head for a few years during his career here in NYC (His album cover was actually shot on my street and you can see my building on the left side of the album cover; see photo). It is well above street level, giving you privacy and sunlight throughout

name: Stunning Balcony Apt- Heart of NY!
space: This is the true New York experience! I love my apartment and I love the location. It's laid out very well with modern furniture and an open kitchen that is fully appointed with coffee machine, pots and pans, etc. But cooking is completely unnecessary with hundreds of restaurants within walking distance! The apartment is on 12th Street between University and Broadway, only two blocks from Union Square- literally the most convenient destination to get anywhere in the city! Walk to East or West Village, Soho, Chelsea, take a quick subway ride to Times Square, Upper East, Upper West, Williamsburg or anywhere in Brooklyn. There is a balcony directly connected to the apartment with a table and chairs great for morning coffee (or cigarettes for those so inclined- no smoking indoors). There is a humongous 52" flatscreen TV, DVD player, and wireless internet. It is on the 6th floor of an elevator building. The apartment is on the rear of the building, so there is no street noise! The bathroom

name: Gorgeous Waterfront Luxury Apt!
space: *** INQUIRE ABOUT SPECIAL SUMMER 2016 PRICING FOR EXTENDED STAYS! *** Very unique & beautiful loft 2-bed, 2-bath apt in a newly renovated building that sits on the waterfront in the hot neighborhood of Williamsburg, BK. I mean GQ magazine calls Williamsburg "The Coolest City on the Planet", so clearly its awesome. My boyfriend and I have been living in our apartment building for over 3 years and in NYC standards that's a lifetime. We recently moved within the building to upgrade from a 1-bed to this gorgeous/huge 2-bed/2-bath. I wouldn't live anywhere else! I would say the best way to describe our apartment is "cozy/rocker chic". We both have a passion for music, and my boyfriend happens to work in the industry. I actually work in the hospitality industry so it's important that my home feels inviting to all people. I host countless dinner parties and LOVE cooking in my kitchen (stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, huge countertop/bar space). The apartment is 1400 sq ft, and the livi

name: Prvt Bedroom / with Shared Backyard Access
space: 1 bedroom Furnished in Bed-Stuy with Shared Backyard space. Hammock and BBQ but no Parties for you and Guest Only. We're on the boarder of Bushwick/East Williamsburg.  The Room is Cozy. One block from JMZ trains that take you to the city in 15 minutes. 10 minutes to Williamsburg.  Neighborhood is chill, there's a 24 hour deli 3 blocks away,   Delis next door also Bars and Restaurants everywhere.

name: Perfect for NYC stay! COZY STUDIO w/ WASHER/DRYER
space: Taking a trip to NYC?  Then pack lightly because this alcove studio comes complete with a large capacity washer/dryer in the closet.  SPACIOUS STUDIO APARTMENT TO SUBLET for New Years Eve weekend! Close to the Q train, the 6 train, the M15 and M15 Select buses, and/or hail a cab right at the door. The Q train will get you to Times Square in about 20minutes to see the ball drop. Happy New Year! Great for Business people or Actors/Writers, etc. who need temporary housing. Ideal for single occupant, ok for a couple. Max capacity: 2 people (couple) to sleep in one Queen sized bed.  I own a cat, but he will not be here during your stay. You will get the apt to yourself.  Intercom System Walk-Up Pre-War building, great neighbors, very clean, quiet and safe. First floor WALK UP Fully-equipped eat-in kitchen with granite eating counter For the coffee lovers: Use of my Nespresso espresso machine with coffee pods.   Fully- equipped bath Towels and extra bed linens Washer/Dryer including detergen

name: Garden Apartment in Park Slope
space: Guests have a private entrance to this garden level flat in our 2 family home. The townhouse style home is typical to this neighborhood and dates from the 1880's.  My husband and I live upstairs and are available to answer questions about the neighborhood or other "tourist tips" during your stay.  You have 2 rooms and a private bath and access to our lovely garden.  The front room has an efficiency kitchen  suitable for light cooking and a seating area with a daybed.  The back bedroom has a comfortable full size bed with plenty of space to unpack a suitcase or 2.  There is a walk-in shower in the bathroom, which makes the apartment ideal for guests with mobility issues (2 steps down to enter the apartment).  Comfortably accommodates 2 guests (extra charge for a 3rd person).  Please note that the apartment does not have a tv.  Check out the amenities tab to fully understand what the apartment is equipped with.   Park Slope is a lively neighborhood filled with restaurants, bars and shops

name: BROOKLYN EXPERIENCE-Sunny Apartment
space: Large Sunny apartment on tree lined block. This space is on the second floor of a charming Brooklyn Brownstone (check out this link for a history of brownstones (website hidden) ) and borders two popular neighborhoods....Bed-Stuy and Clinton Hill with easy access to Fort Greene, Williamsburg and Manhattan.åÊThe "G" train is just around the corner (3 min walk). 35 minutes to Manhattan by train and 15-20 minutes by taxi. Cost of a taxi to midtown Manhattan is $25-$35. The fare for all train or bus is $2.75. The apartment includes everything you'll need as a guest to enjoy your stay. Fresh clean linens, towels, cookware, dishes & utensils, iron, hair dryer, television and free wireless internet.åÊOne (1) full sized bed, one (1) twin bed and futon sofa in the living room which opens to a full sized bed. name: Room in Spacious East Village Apt.
space: Private room in a quiet two-bedroom East Village apartment on 7th St. Between Avenues B and C. Half a block from Tompkins Square Park. 6th floor of a 6 floor walk-up. Renovated bathroom and kitchen. Tons of light.

name: 1 Bedroom in 2 Bedroom apt in HK
space: The apartment and bedroom can comfortably fit 2 adults. Lots of natural lighting in living room and bedroom. Please note that the pictures are 2 years old and I have since redecorated, painted, and got some new furniture.  Guests have access to everything in apartment. The bedroom, living room, kitchen, bathroom, and downstairs laundry room. Also, fire escape outside bedroom to hang out on which is great if you are a smoker. Basically, Consider it your home while you stay. I enjoy playing host so if guests like to partake in my extracurricular activities, but also fine if guest has their own things going on. I'm a very easy going person. In the past, I've invited certain guests to a Mets Baseball game, Atlantic City trip, and numerous events with my friends. This is usually when guests show interest and we seem to get along well. I'm also content with guest/guests doing their own thing and keeping to themselves. name: Union Sq European Serene apt
space: Beautiful, extremely private 1 bedroom apt located in the heart of Union Sq. If you are looking for location and convenience this apt simply cannot be beat. The apt is located 1 block west of Union Sq between 5th and 6th Avenues. Proximity to fantastic shopping, great restaurants, numerous cafes and 3 cinemas. Union Sq is also host to the fabulous Farmers Market 4 days a week as well as Trader Joes' and Whole Foods. The Apt is a short walk away from Chelsea and Greenwich Village. The apt is convenient to transportation with all major subways located within a block or two. The F and V trains are just on the corner. The apt is bright and colorful with hardwood floors and various art works  gracing the walls.  It opens up onto a large plan living room/kitchen with many areas separating the space, offering guests ample room to relax and unwind. Old-world charm (moldings, etc.) but in great shape.  Room is adjacent to another guest room; walls are not thick but all guests are asked to keep noise levels reasonably low (and if you make internet calls, be sure to have a microphone head-set to avoid loud talk).   Guest access: bathroom; back deck and backyard; daytime use of common space (living room, dining room, kitchen - light cooking & small storage) but preferably not in evenings when my daughter & I need our privacy.   All other general information

name: Live-In Tour Guide Scenic West Side
space: ATTENTION: I only accept reservations from those who have a profile photo of themselves AND an offline verified ID, I live in the apartment and need to feel safe and comfortable, thanks for your understanding. Stays for more than one person will be considered on a case by case basis. I'm a Native New Yorker with a room to spare! I'm a licensed tour guide with a deep passion for food, beverage and sharing my love of my home with others. I've been living in my apartment for 10 years now. This is my home, and I'm happy to share the space with you for a fraction of what you would pay at a hotel. It's a classic pre-war New York apartment, which is great for the full Woody Allen-style experience (minus the predatory creep). ;) I'll be sure to have coffee/tea available for you every weekday morning (8am-10am) as well as a continental breakfast (cereals, toast, yogurt, local fruit). You're also more than welcome to use all appliances, as long as you do so with respect. Whatever it is you're lo

name: Park Slope Private Bed+Livingroom!
space: 2 Large rooms on the 1st Floor!  I always enjoy when my guests arrive because they are constantly impressed by the size of the space! The bedroom and the living room are both included and are separated by French doors with thick curtains, which allow for a dark and quiet sleeping experience. The sizeable living room has 3 enormous, south facing windows that let in the sun, sights and sounds of Park Slope (the best neighborhood in NYC). There is a queen bed in one of the rooms and plenty of room for an air mattress which I have on site. *Check-in/out time is  very flexible, and if your departure is late, feel free to keep your luggage at my place while you take your time in the city!  * I will give you keys so you can come and go as you choose. name: 1br in a 2br apartment in Chelsea
space: Pictures say it all. I have one spacious living room and kitchen, and one bathroom that we share. Your bedroom is 14ft x 10ft and it has a full bed, one desk, and some cabinet space. I provide one towel for your stay and you are welcome to use my bathroom products if you want to. There is one window AC unit for the common areas and one portable AC unit for your bedroom. Please be mindful of using your bedroom's AC unit only when you are present. I also provide a fan for your bedroom. I keep the apt pretty organized and clean, and I expect you keep the common areas in good state. If you cook, you are also expected to clean up after yourself.

name: Furnished Luxury Apt with Balcony

space: ***INSTANT BOOK*** If you are able to see that the dates are open then they are! Go ahead and book it, no need to wait and see if it is available because it is. Welcome to your private home in the Heart of Times Square/Hell's Kitchen. This 2 bedroom, one bathroom is perfect for a group traveling together who do not want to share with other guest. Enjoy your kitchen and relaxing on your couch and private backyard.  This apartment is designed for the traveler who wants to feel like a true NYer! The apt is FRESHLY painted, clean, and quiet.  The Home Features: *2 High Definition LED TV and FREE WiFi * Air conditioning for the warm summer! name: 2 Bedroom Apt in Caroll Gardens
space: Hello, thanks for visiting our listing! Welcome to our cozy apartment in Caroll Gardens.  The apartment has 2 bedrooms. The first bedroom is sunny and spacious with a queen sized bed. The second bedroom is cozy and has a  comfortable full size bed.  The large and bright kitchen is complete with everything you need to cook a full meal or just for a quick morning bite. The peaceful living room is waiting to be lounged in, hang out with friends, or a mid day nap on our large couch while listening to records.  This neighborhood is absolutely amazing! Filled with lovely families and young professionals and walking distance to all of the coolest restaurants, shops, cafes/coffee shops, bars etc.  The space is fully furnished with full sized beds, linens, towels, dresser, closet, hangers, shelving, and lighting. In addition, you'll also have access to the rest of the  apartment--kitchen, bathroom, living room, and dining area.  Big windows, lots of natural light! Great space...Quiet building.

name: Backyard BBQ in Brooklyn Brownstone
space: Welcome to your home away from home! Located in a beautiful, historic Brooklyn Brownstone, your private apartment is a perfect and affordable getaway alternative to the expensive and impersonal Manhattan hotels. A true one bedroom apartment with a king sized bedroom and lots of closet space, you also have a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, stove, oven, refrigerator, dishwasher and kitchen basics and a living room with a convertible sofa bed should you need to sleep 4. We also have wifi access in the apartment as well as the backyard should you need it. We are within walking distance to the supermarket, cafÌ©s and restaurants and near the G, and J/M/Z Subway stops and the B38, B15 and B43 bus stops. An easy 30 minutes takes you right to the heart of Times Square. Whether you are a small family, a couple or a group of friends, this is a safe, bustling neighborhood and as you sit in the garden enjoying your afternoon rosÌ©, you won't even believe that you're in New York City.

name: Artsy Bedroom/Office in WaHi
space: I am a professional freelance musician in New York City. I have one spare room in my apartment that I rent out short term from time to time to support my classical music habit. The space is relaxing, clean, and very welcoming as is the rest of my home. The neighborhood is lively and colorful, near Columbia Presbyterian Hospital and both the 1 and A trains.

name: Fabulous Townhouse in Williamsburg
space: *Clean spacious large townhouse * Large bedroom equipped with a  full size bed *Plenty of closet and shelf space *Desk, chair and bedside table * Hardwood floors and two windows with street view. *Full size mirror

name: Cosmopolitan Brownstone Sanctuary
space: Gorgeous classic Brownstone Duplex on one of the best blocks of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhood. This house has been meticulously and lovingly restored by its owners, who just relocated overseas. Amazing high ceilings, beautiful hand carved moldings and brand new modern kitchen and bathrooms (2 full bathrooms plus washer/dryer). Huge private garden (shared with downstairs tenant who hardly ever uses it). Spacious 2 bedrooms function like 4: L-shaped Master Bedroom has pull out double couch that can be separated from the main bed area with Japanese screen; also upstairs is a 2nd large bedroom. Downstairs is an enormous living area  that can be divided off to create a separate bedroom area as well as ample living space with large TV and cable; plus formal dining room and fully stocked kitchen. space: Rare large loft-style 2 bdr duplex apt with double height ceiling and private roof terrace in the heart of Williamsburg, Brooklyn, right off Bedford avenue, 2 blocks from the Bedford avenue L stop. **Note that the 2nd bedroom--the master bedroom--has bunk beds for kids and that the mezzanine space / 2nd bedroom connects with and is only accessible through the master bedroom**. space: Spacious, bright, Williamsburg railroad apartment located in safe neighborhood close to train and all the best that Williamsburg, Greenpoint and Manhattan have to offer. name: Sunny, private room in Brooklyn!
space: Looking for a bright cozy bedroom?    I've got just the space for you!  There is a place to read, study or sleep on the very comfortable bed.

name: Bright, airy room share in Brooklyn
space: Share a room with a friend or another Airbnb guest in my bright, friendly home.   The private room has 2 beds, 2 closets a desk and has a door to the bathroom that you share with other housemates.    My home sleeps 4 and  typically has other international visitors. I have an open kitchen and living room that you can share with other guests.  Feel free to prepare your meals for the day to save extra funds. I know the city well and can give expert advice on places to visit with a flair for inexpensive options!   Please note that I have a dog and can not host people who smoke inside. I'm within walking distance of the A train at Utica and the J train at Gates Avenue.   30 min to Grand Central Station or Times Square.

name: Beautiful East Village Apartment
space: Beautiful 1 bedroom (king size bed) in the heart of the east village (close to all gourmet shops, restaurants, live music venues and transportation), all amenities (wifi, cable, laundry on floor, 1200 sqf communal deck)  This is a family home and we will be closing up our daughters room thereby making it a one bedroom for those times unless you are a family and need the extra bedroom for your child(ren). Guests will have the entire apartment and access to the communal deck For any issues I will just be a phone call away Best neighborhood in the city. Close to the subway and crosstown buses

name: SoHo Suites with Shared Bathroom
space: We are a hotel with two different styles of rooms, a deluxe suite for 4 people & a European-style suite, for up to two (2) guests.  THIS AIR BnB Listing is for a lockable room with a shared adjacent bathroom European-style suite, for up to two (2) guests. Private locked bedroom with two twin beds, LCD flat panel TV, air conditioning, and a personal digital safe. The full kitchen and large bathroom are SHARED with an adjacent suite, if occupied. The Deluxe Suites are spacious private apartments. They have a private bedroom, private living area, LCD tvs, AC, a safe, a full kitchen with equipment, and a private bathroom.

name: Sunny Loft Style Apt-Great Location
space: Location, location, location!! What an amazing part of the city to be in, ESPECIALLY during the holidays.  This romantic place is conveniently situated on 45th street between 8th and 9th avenues, in the heart of Hell's Kitchen, where there is an abundance restaurants, bars, theaters and night-life, right at your finger tips.  The Hirschfield theater and Broadway Dance Center are just across the street.  The apartment is literally right around the corner from the A, C & E subway lines, and 3 blocks from all the cross-town shuttle train (S train), 1,2,3,N,Q,R,W & 7 subway lines in Times Square, as well as the 8th  and 9th avenue, uptown and downtown busses.  It's a 5 minute walk to Broadway theaters and Times Square; a ten minute walk to Central Park and Rockefeller Center, a 15 minute subway ride to Union Square, Soho, the Meatpacking District and the world trade center, and 20 minutes from the Lower East Side, East Village, Little Italy and Chinatown.  This place is basically within 20

name: Artist Loft - Union Square
space: Beautiful 1000 SF artist loft centrally located on 4th Avenue, 2 blocks from Union Square. It's an ideal location for work or for vacation. Walk to East Village, West Village or Soho and all major train lines run through Union Square. Wholefoods and Trader Joes are only two blocks with a fabulous wine shop across the street. Apartment Details: This is a loft style apartment so there are no enclosed rooms except the bathroom. The apartment is roughly 1000SF with a 200SF private terrace. The apartment gets lots of lights but the windows in the bedroom area do have black out shades in case you want to sleep in. In the bedroom area, which is separated from the main living area by a large bookcase, there is a queen size bed with down comforter and designer linens. The bedroom area also includes a large stainless steel desk with a Herman Miller office chair. The living room area includes an extra large 102" designer sofa with 52" HDTV (Direct TV, Bose entertainment center with blue tooth). T

name: Large studio all to yourself
space: The apartment is full of light, with hardwood floors, high ceilings, and kept very clean. Located in the center of downtown NYC. The neighborhood is fantastic. With access to nearly every subway in the city; 6,N,R,B,D and Q are all nearby distance. Many excellent bars, restaurants & shops. Laundromat with complete service and full grocery store, both halfway down the block. A $75 one time cleaning fee applies for periods of 7 days or more- to be paid upon arrival. Security Deposit T.B.D. will be required on or before check-in. Check IN time is negotiable but Check OUT time is noon and bags can be arranged to be held until needed for flight.

name: Charm w/amazing city view by PS1
space: For those who appreciate real New York old world charm,  this apt is located in a very convenient area of Long Island City only 1 stop away from Manhattan.  Located on a corner across a park with tons of sunlight drenching the apartment, we have 4 subways all within a short 2 block radius from us.  The 7 train right on our block, E and M which is only 1 stop away from Manhattan, G if you want to travel to Greenpoint or Williamsburg or other parts of Brooklyn.  Supermarket, diner, deli, restaurants all nearby and the beautiful LIC waterfront only a short walking distance away.  Our neighbor MoMA PS1 is across the way from us, you can see and hear all the great events they throw during the summers.  Also has a new amazing cafeteria style restaurant inside called Dinette, great for nice lunches. We are a couple, subletting our biggest room of 3.  Our apartment is warm, comfortable and spacious with a lot of character.  Best of all, has big windows to an amazing view of the city skyline wi

name: Large Cozy Room #1, Landmark Home 1 block to PRATT
space: Welcome to Brooklyn! Newly renovated, this spacious bedroom is on the third floor of a five floor historic brick home built in 1899. It features a small en suite bathroom with shower, three closets (one walk in) as well as a writing area alcove with two large windows overlooking a courtyard. The bedroom is furnished with a double/full size storage bed with 4 drawers and 2 doors, 2 bed side tables, a small chest of drawers and a comfy chair that converts to a twin size bed. The alcove has a desk, chair and bookshelf and gets good light. There is also a small 13" television with roku internet television that features dozens of channels streaming hundreds of shows, movies as well as pandora music. The very pretty, but non-working fireplace adds warmth to the room as does the original wood floors and old world Brooklyn achitectural details.  The home is a two-family brick house on a tree-lined, safe, vibrant, landmark block of Clinton Hill, one 1/2 block away from Higgin's Hall at Pratt In

name: Bright Doorman One Bedroom on Upper East Side
space: My place is a light-filled, well-appointed apartment on top floor of a luxury doorman building. Apartment is located in the heart of the upper east side-- close to tons of cute restaurants, three blocks from the subway (4-5-6 and Q lines), close to Central Park and an 8-10 minute walk to museums on 5th Avenue. You are perfectly situated to enjoy Manhattan like a local! Apartment has granite kitchen, is neatly furnished, and gets great light on top floor of a 12 story elevator building. Fully equipped with all kitchen appliances, wifi, 50" TV, etc. The master bedroom has a comfortable queen size bed and is very cozy.

name: LARGE Cozy & Private! BROOKLYN HEIGHTS convenience
space: ENORMOUS & BEAUTIFUL BEDROOM in a GREAT AREA!!    (Montague Street /   Brooklyn Heights Promenade ) Extra large bedroom especially by NY standards.  The  bedroom is in a 3 bedroom apartment. There is no living room area; the apartment functions as three studio apartments. Spacious bedrooms and a comfortable kitchen and bathroom make this an outstanding alternative to a hotel. The room offers a queen bed, two couches (one is a pull out), a small closet, reliable Wifi, and most importantly  a very comfortable and relaxing space. The apartment is located on Montague Street in the middle of Brooklyn Heights. Everything you need is nearby: two blocks from the Promenade, Parks nearby, 5 min from Brooklyn bridge, plenty of restaurants and coffee shops,  farmers market, gym, shopping, etc., etc.. Subway access couldn't be better: red, yellow, green and orange line are ALL convenient and within 10 minutes or less walking distance. CitiBike and G line also available. You'll have a lot of space,

name: Cozy Private Room in the Center NYC
space: This is a cozy room  fully furnished with high speed internet. Located in Midtown Manhattan just minutes to Central Park and Subway.  Share with Artist and his two small super friendly dogs. Neat and clean with a real at home feeling. Many restaurants (every type of food) all around the neighborhood with lots of grocery stores if you want to cook (Whole Foods Market is just 3 blocks away). Major banks , Chase and Citi-Bank) , convenient stores/pharmacies, and Starbucks all within 2 blocks of the apt. In the courtyard of the building there is a colorful and interestingly  decorated garden for your enjoyment, there are tables and chairs to have a meal or just relax.

name: Dumbo | Spacious private room w/ private bathroom
space: I'm renting out my private bedroom while on vacation. This a master bedroom with a private bathroom and balcony. Almost like an actual studio!  We are 3 people in our early 30s living in that stunning loft. The apartment has a very spacious living room, dining room area, and kitchen.   You all share the communal space and kitchen, including a television, washer/dryer, and appliances.  You will feel right at home with WiFi and in-room AC units. The neighborhood is pretty quiet although there is a fantastic restaurant next door. Check them out, it's the Vinegar Hill House. They have amazing food. Three blocks from the house is the neighborhood of DUMBO and there are grocery stores, restaurants, dry clean, etc.  The subway is 4 blocks away. The station is York Street on the F train. Three blocks further down is the A train. Dumbo (which stands for Down Under the Manhattan Bridge Overpass) is the closest neighborhood to Manhattan. The Brooklyn bridge starts right there and it's a very nice

name: PRIVATE ROOM FOR SOLO TRAVELER
space: I just love my apartment, it is a really charming , big , peaceful, safe and super clean...the location is perfect, one block away from the subway , 3 stop from the city ... Broadway and 30 Av are plenty of nice restaurant, supermarket , coffee shops, bakery, banks, Dry clean, gym, vitamin shop, pharmacy everything you need is here ... Others attractions: Noguchi Museum - Sculpture In Long Island City, Richard Meier Model Museum, PSI Art Museum Long Island City, museum of the moving image, Bohemian Hall Beer Garden, Watbuddsatsai,Geeta Temple, Queens County Farm Museum,Queens Museum of Art. The apartment is one big bedroom ,second floor in a Pre-war building probably around 1930 ,the walls are in Victorian style, you will feel back on time, you will enjoy the charm and peace that this place can give you.  The kitchen is in the middle of the apartment ,that separate the living room and the bedroom ,in the living room ,it is another queen size bed .the space can accommodate 4 people . Re

name: Lovely Private Room in Bushwick! :)
space: We encourage guests to make themselves at home during their stay. The common areas are available for your convenience and comfort, and we encourage you to cook meals, work at our lovely farm table, or read/watch Netflix in the cozy living room.  We all do our part to maintain its peaceful and comfortable environment by respecting each other's space and by keeping it clean and clutter free.

name: Murray Hill Garden Apt. MANHATTAN
space: Centrally located in midtown/Murray Hill this apartment is just blocks from Grand Central,UN   Empire State and Chrysler Buildings. Located on the basement , the interior is approximately 400 sq/ft.  The apartment includes a mini-fridge, stand-up shower, air conditioning. Perfect for the budget conscious couple or single-traveler.  Unlike many budget hotels, the apartment is clean. Will be cleaned prior to your stay, and linens and soaps will be provided.

name: Fabulous Industrial Dumbo Loft
space: Welcome to Dumbo, Brooklyn- life under the Manhattan Bridge. The sounds of the city and the rumble of trains passing add to the genuine New York experience  The airy loft's decor is a charming mix of mid-century modern and rustic.  Glass french doors open to a large private room with full size platform bed, desk & chair, dresser, mirror, and lounge chair. - 4th floor walk- up with elevator available just outside of door. - 2 day minimum - Central heat/ AC in the summer. - Filtered water system installed. - Fresh bed linens & towels. - Wifi - The place comes complete with the coolest little 5 lb. blue    chihuahua. - Loft is 1 1/2 blks. from York St. F & 3 blks. from High St. A/C.  Both lines are one stop from Manhattan. - Great neighborhood with excellent services within a couple block radius:   - Restaurants   - Bars   - Delis   - Banks   - Laundry service   - Coffee spots I'm a location scout so I'm happy to connect you with anything you might need in the vicinity.  I look forward to

name: Luxury Building Perfect Location Beautiful 1 Bdrm
space: THE APARTMENT: A large quiet apartment, located in a luxury, elevator, 24 hour doorman building. The apartment is a 600 sq ft one bedroom w/a beautiful bright southern sky view overlooking southern Manhattan, with a large living room, full kitchen and bathroom, a Queen size bed, and a dining table for 4.  There is a clean modern kitchen with high end stainless appliances, gas cooking and granite counters and a bathroom with a modern shower and tub. Clean sheets and luxury bath towels are provided. Washer and Dryers are available in the building on the 2nd floor as well as a large terrace open to the residents.  Included with the apartment is premium cable (including HBO, Cinemax), large 55 inch flat screen TV, high speed wireless internet and automatic air/heat. For sleeping there is a QUEEN size bed + a large comfortable pull out couch for two. The apt is close to the A, C, E, as well as the 1 and 2 trains, lots of restaurants, bars, shops and very close to Gramercy Park and Flat Iron

name: Hell's Kitchen Hideaway - Private Entrance
space: The room you'll be staying in is quiet and cozy, with exposed brick, lots of natural light, a full-size bed, and a desk.  A private entrance leads directly into the room from the outside building hallway, one flight of stairs up from ground level.  The building itself is a red brick 5-story pre-war, next to a large open park.  The bedroom is also well insulated from street noise. Just outside the bedroom, you'll find a large kitchen (by New York standards), fully equipped and available for your use to store groceries and prepare meals.  You may encounter us here often as we prefer to cook at home as much as possible and also rise early to make morning coffee (feel free to help yourself to coffee and tea - we always make plenty). Beyond the kitchen in the hallway is the bathroom (typically small by New York standards), with standing shower.  Further down the hall is our sitting room and bedroom, where you may often find us at work early in the morning or relaxing at the end of the day (

name: Minimalist loft studio in Bushwick
space: Converted knitting factory building with exposed beams and some handsome loft charm. Ceiling-tall windows bathe the whole place in sunlight in the morning, and keep it bright throughout the day.

name: Gorgeous One Bedroom Apartment
space: Our gorgeous 1 bedroom apartment is on the most sought after block in the East Village and likely the city.  See ÛÏour block hasÛ below. This is a floor through loft ÛÒ like apartment - meaning we have views down to the street below from our bedroom and see the gardens out the back of the building from our rear windows.    We are on the first floor of our walkup. The apartment has beautiful finishes and fixtures like marble countertops throughout the kitchen and bathroom.  The bathroom has an extra deep soaking tub with massage jets (perfect after a long day of walking in the city!)   Typically, youÛªd have to be in Brooklyn to find the space this apartment offers.  This is a very rare apartment which is decorated impeccably is spacious and clean AND is located in THE BEST neighborhood.    The dining room has lovely high quality furniture and a beautiful mantel adorned with fantastic original artwork.   The dining room also has a massive piece of artwork (9 Û÷ x 4Ûª) designed by a Japanese

name: Clean-Furnished Room Near The Apollo (W 125th St.)
space: Want to rent a room in the heart of Harlem? Stay in this cozy and clean bedroom in this two bedroom apartment just two blocks from 125th Street.  The room is furnished with a comfortable platform day bed complete with a foam mattress topper.  There is also a work station that includes a computer desk and leather padded office chair.  For storage space, there are two book shelf towers, under bed drawers, shoe storage cubby chest and limited closet space.   The apartment is in a safe location near Columbia University, City College, The Apollo, Central Park and many other tourist attractions.  The MTA 125th street express subway station is located on the block where the express train can get you to 59th Street/Columbus Circle in midtown Manhattan in just 7 minutes.  There is also easy access to MTA bus lines.  For dining, there are a host of restaurants in the area offering various cuisines ranging from Thai to Soul food.  And if you desire to cook, the apartment has a completely stocked

name: Private Bedroom in Williamsburg
space: Big sunny bedroom with separate entrance in a 3 bedroom RAILROAD style apartment on the 4th floor (top floor walk up). Through the hallway of the building you can access kitchen / living room and bathroom, which are located on the opposite side of the apartment/ your bedroom. During daytime you can certainly walk through the rooms too, but at night you have to use the hallway of the building (our neighbors do the same thing).  Check floor plan drawing in photos! There is a queen sized bed, with a very comfortable mattress, a table, closet space, ceiling fan and wifi (and AC in summer). The room is very cozy and extremely bright with its two big windows. There is also the possibility to add a second large mattress if needed. The apartment is very conveniently located within 5-10 minutes walk to either the L-Train (Lorimer Stop), G-Train (Metropolitan Stop) or JMZ-Trains (Lorimer or Hewes Stop). Within 15-20 minutes you are either at Union Square (L Train) or the Lower East Side (JMZ). I

name: Huge Lower East Side Loft
space: Huge Lower East Side loft space right next to Chinatown, Little Italy and SoHo. The loft has three bedrooms; 2 Large bedrooms with queen sized beds and one small room with a full size bed with lots of light.     The Living Room is very spacious with two windows facing east for lots of sun. The style of the apartment is industrial and is a converted loft, making the style of the space one of a kind. There is a noodle factory located on the first floor of the building and the loft is located on the top floor. You hear minimal rumblings at night which isn't a problem. Check all the great reviews if concerned.     On the top is a private rooftop deck with lots of seatings and incredible views of the Empire State Building and Freedom Tower. Guests who stay are the only ones with access to the roof.     There is a large bathroom with a great shower and hand dryer. The kitchen is small but has all the amenities; Perfect for travelers.     This loft space is centrally located. It is at the foo

name: Stylish Room-Artist/Designers' Flat
space: One large private room with great high ceilings a nice big window. Brand new bed frame and tempur-pedic mattress. One closet, a tall dresser, a bookshelf, and a desk and chair. This room has two double doors the open up into the living room. There are two other bedrooms in this apartment so you will share the apartment with two roommates.  We have a beautiful, large living room with exposed brick on one wall and some comfy couches for lounging. Our large couch in the living room pulls out into a bed. The living room is meant for all to share and enjoy! One small bathroom, with a nice tub for taking baths. Nice long kitchen at the end of the apartment with a full sized refrigerator, gas stove, everything you need to cook and lots of room for storage. I have two very sweet male cats, not aggressive at all, and the apartment is kept very clean at all times. The gray cat is 3 years old and named Toby and the white one is a little over a year and his name is Frankie. There is a beautiful ro

name: Cozy Studio in the Heart of Crown Heights
space: The studio apartment has one large east facing window. This window extends to the primary sleeping arrangement, a queen size mattress in the loft via ladder.  The studio apartment is lightly and simply furnished with a comfortable vintage sofa, table and chair. Kitchen includes a fridge, stove, microwave and is minimally stocked for cooking along with dishes and silverware. Private full bathroom.  I look forward to having you experience the best of Brooklyn in my studio! Please message for availability and inquiries.  Many Thanks:)

name: Bright Room in Historic Brownstone
space: The apartment is on the top floor, 3rd floor (2nd floor for international standard) of a much desired and historical Brownstone building on a beautiful tree-lined street.  Your Private room is about 10'x8' or 3mx2.4m, has lock, hardwood floor, a bright window facing the charming tree-lined street, furnished with a twin-bed with warm and cozy bedding, a nice size closet, a desk and chair, a full-length mirror, and  the essentials for a good night sleep. You will be sharing this 3-bedroom apartment with me, and sometime another AirBnB guest who is in another identical room. 45 days maximum stay, longer term can be discussed. I'm an freelance artist and designer, working from home often, multicultural and LGBT friendly.

name: Chic apt in heart of hip Brooklyn!
space: Feel like a Brooklyn local and stay at our beautiful home located in the heart of Cobble Hill.  Boasting new amenities, hardwood floors and big windows, our home is comfortable, clean and chic.   New and modern one bedroom apartment with sleek appliances, chic decor  and lots of sunlight.  Apartment located on Atlantic Ave between Cobble Hill and Brooklyn Heights.    Surrounded by some of Brooklyn's best restaurants, bars and boutiques, and a ten minute walk for the Brooklyn Promenade and Brooklyn Bridge Parks overlooking Manhattan.  Subway is also only a few blocks away.  Take the F, G, 2, 3, 4 or 5!   Washer and dryer in basement and there is a public outdoor terrace on 2nd floor. Fit an extra 2 guests on our pull out couch.  Key drop off Corner cafes, cinemas, fire escapes and stoopsÛÓsuch is the streetscape in Cobble Hill. Known for its mom-and-pop shops, Italian meat markets, and boutique shopping, Cobble Hill fits in with its Brooklyn neighbors along Smith Street, Carroll Gardens

name: Private Room in sunny, spacious pad
space: This is a beautiful, large bedroom in the heart of the historic Bedford-Stuyvesant neighborhood.  This rowhouse sits on a beautiful tree-lined block of picturesque Brooklyn brownstones. The living room, or common area, has large bay-windows with a southern exposure, and the light in the morning is really quite lovely.  The bedroom's window, a northern exposure, makes for great soft light in the afternoon.  It is compete with original details, built in shelving unit, tin ceilings and crown molding.  All rooms have original pre-war wood floors.   The neighborhood is classically Brooklyn; with parks, basketball courts and plenty of trees.  You will be within walking distance of the (A) and (C) lines, as well as the (G).  The B43 and B26 buses stop right by the apartment.  Wine shops, bakeries, bodegas and the Zagat-approved Saraghina are all within a three block radius.   You will be sharing the apartment with two individuals; one a creative that works nights managing a venue, the other a

name: Awesome Brooklyn 1 Bedroom
space: I have a fully furnished, large, super comfortable and cozy private one bedroom apartment in Brooklyn. The L-Shaped couch is perfect for relaxing. The Queen-sized bed comes complete with comfortable linens and a snug (website hidden), HDTV, Wifi, DVR, Apple TV, ceiling fan (bedroom) all included. The apartment is a short walk from the 2,3,4,5,A,C,S trains. The neighborhood is home to both the Brooklyn ChildrenÛªs Museum and the Jewish ChildrenÛªs Museum.  My apartment is down the block from Brower Park which is popular with basketball players and dog-walkers. The botanic garden, Prospect Park, the Brooklyn Museum and the main branch of the Brooklyn Public Library all lie on Eastern Parkway at the neighborhoodÛªs western end.  Come check out one of Brooklyn's hippest 'hoods; it's changing every day!

name: Room in WASHINGTON HTS
space: The heart of Washington Heights. Big room (15 1/2 X 13 1/2) in very large three bedroom apartment. Three big windows, lots of light. Desk, TV, WiFi, full kitchen and living room usage. Laundry in basement. Very secure building. Half a block to A train (twenty minutes to midtown). Two blocks to 1 train (half hour to midtown). Starbucks on the corner. Grocery stores within two blocks. Deli on corner. Near restaurants, dry cleaners and Dunkin Donuts/31 Flavors.

name: HELL'S KITCHEN STUDIO for 2 or 3
space: Very Clean Studio in Hell's Kitchen, NYC available. 5th floor studio, of an elevator building, that can easy fit 3.  One sleeps @ sofa and other 2 share a bed. name: Midtown NYC Lux 2BR Great Location
space: 600 square feet of comfort and luxury in the middle of Manhattan, just a few blocks from Times Square and the Broadway theaters. Fifth Avenue and Soho, New York's most elegant shopping districts, are only a short trip away. This gorgeous apartment features three beds: One Luxurious Queen, One Tempur-Pedic Full, and One Tempur-Pedic twin (loft). name: Beautiful 1BR in Prime West Village
space: Welcome! This one bedroom apartment is located in the absolute heart of the vibrant and beautiful West Village. It has hardwood floors, tall ceilings, and is right around the corner from famous Bleecker Street! The West Village is a very historic, charming, and safe neighborhood in lower Manhattan. Nearby amenities include: - Restaurants (Little Owl, Spotted Pig, John's Pizzeria)  - Cafes (Bosie Tea Parlor, Tartine, Buvette, Gottino)  - Bakeries (Amy's Bread, Magnolia Bakery, Pasticceria Rocco) - Shopping (Coach, Ralph Lauren, Marc Jacobs, the list goes on!) - Bars (Blind Tiger, White Horse Tavern, Corner Bistro)  - Jazz clubs (Smalls, Blue Note, Village Vanguard)  ...and much more! The apartment is within walking distance of Soho, Tribeca, the Meatpacking District, the Highline, Washington Square Park, and the Hudson River. name: your holiday-ready Harlem home away from home!
space: 2-bedroom apartment, loved & lived-in by a young married couple & 2 kids!  It's filled with color, art, instruments, homey touches, handcrafted furniture (all the shelving and a lot of the furniture we made ourselves). We love having people in our home, and have unofficially hosted friends from all over the world, anywhere from a day to 3 months, but this is our first foray in Airbnb! Coffee station set up for Chemex pourover, Bialetti for espresso, or jars for cold brew. We can leave locally-roasted whole beans for grinding + instructions for any of the brewing methods! We'll tell you all the best coffee spots in the neighborhood ÛÒ 7-12 minute walk from about 3-4 great ones. Well-organized + well-stocked kitchen ÛÒ we cook every day! name: Dumbo Loft With A Beautiful View
space: PARKSIDE AND WATERFRONT DUMBO LOFT WITH STELLAR VIEWS * Seeking a sublet for entire month of August 2018, and January/February 2019. No short-term inquiries, please. * * Please send a message before making a reservation request. I will reply quickly with some helpful notes. * This is my 700 square foot loft apartment in Dumbo, Brooklyn, which has one of the best views in all of New York City. It is directly on the waterfront across the street from the park. (Yes, the view photos were actually taken from my window.) I'm on an upper floor of a century-old brick-and-timber building. There are hardwood floors, giant windows, high ceilings and exposed brick.  The living room furniture has been upgraded since these photos, which I will update soon. The view speaks for itself. It is like a moving painting, overlooking the East River, Financial District, the Brooklyn & Manhattan Bridges, a Victorian-era carousel, the South St Seaport and a giant park. Dumbo is beautiful, quiet neighborhood, bu

name: East Village Gay Friendly Dbl Room
space: East Village double bedroom in gay friendly and social walk up apartment.  We have a clean bright and very quiet true NY apartment in the center of the East Village with tons of bars, restaurants, boutiques and Tompkin Sq Park/Union Sq just outside the door.  A fully functional kitchen as well as toiletries and towels included for the shower(just bring your toothbrush!). Two Blocks from the L-train that will take you to both the west side and trendy Willamsburg.   We have a lot of knowledge of the area and the city for activities and nightlife.  The apartment can be social or as private as you wish and we love meeting new people and sharing our NYC experience.  Occasionally work from home but for the most part the apartment will seem like your own.  We are very easy going and will accommodate the best we can with your traveling schedule and any needs you may have when you arrive.

The other two are far away from my area.  So be sure to stay on the B/Q line to get to my place safely, correctly, and fast!***

You walk into the open layout living room, dining room with kitchenette . The kitchenette has a micro wave, convection/toaster oven, convection cook top and grill . There is a decent size bedroom (queen size bed) with closet space and night stands, dresser and a desk with a chair with an opaque curtain for privacy . The second bed (full bed) is in an alcove separated from the living room by curtains . The decor is unique and eclectic yet modern,  collected throughout the years . name: Restored townhouse apt w terrace
space: Full floor, 1350 sf, one bedroom apartment in beautifully restored townhouse near Central Park and the Museum of Natural History. 11x20 south-facing terrace. 400 sf living room with wood burning fireplace, separate kitchen, charming original dressing area, spacious bedroom with adjacent bathroom, and terrace. Queen size bed and sofa bed, sleeps up to 3. Internet.  This is a very special apartment in an extra-wide, fully restored, owner-occupied townhouse. Quiet and spacious. Grand living, built in 1891 for a physician and his family. This is absolutely one of the best locations in New York City. Walking distance to many museums (Met Museum, Natural History, Historical Society, Children's Museum), lincoln Center, Central Park and Riverside Park, tons of shops, restaurants, and bars. You will feel right at home shopping down the block at Zabar's, or at Zingone's on Columbus. name: Great 1BD waterfront City Island NY
space: I am renting my lovely one bedroom apartment that is located in a waterfront property with nice views over Long Island Sound and direct water access. The place is very conveniently located in City Island, a historic place famous for its seafood and sailing traditions. It is a very safe place, and everything is in walking distance, bars, coffee shops, grocery stores, art stores, banks, post office, and some of the best seafood restaurants of NYC within 5 minutes walk.  It is a great place to relax if you need to work in NYC, and still would like to feel on your own island! For commuting to NYC, you need to take B X29 bus to Pelham Bay Park subway station, and then take the 6 line Express to Manhattan.  It will take you about 45 minutes to 1 hour to get to midtown.  There is also an express bus from City Island to Manhattan, as an alternative for commuting.  There is street parking on the island, and you can park your bicycle on the property. If you love the city, and do not want to forg

The rest of the apartment (2 bedrooms, bathroom, living room and kitchen) is all downstairs. You have full access to the kitchen and living room, but this is really a studio within an apartment. So you have total privacy if you want it!  Great bars and restaurants just around the corner. Easy access to JMZ and L trains. You can be in Lower East Side or Union Square in 20 minutes. I have one roommate in his early 30s and we often rent the other small room. Come join us!

name: Private room in large 2 bed room
space: One bedroom available in a 2 bedroom apartment. I have a spare bedroom in my large, 2 bedroom , East Village apartment. There is a large kitchen, bathroom and living room to share. I live in the upper east corner of Alphabet City. It is a very diverse neighborhood with an awesome mixture of old school and new hipster/ bohemian culture. I am one block away from Tompkins Square Park and two from the East River Park. There is a City cycles Kiosk Just around the corner. There are also plenty of amazing and culturally diverse restaurants and bars to dine or have drinks in, just up the block on Ave A, B or C.

name: Cozy private room in 2 Bedroom, BK
space: I have a spare bedroom in my large, occupied 2 Bedroom apartment in Prospect Heights Brooklyn.  The room itself is medium sized (approx 10'x11"), with a small closet.  It is simple, spare, and clean, furnished with a full sized bed and a large bureau.  The apartment is full of light, has parquet floors, and is very well located one block from Grand Army Plaza and Prospect Park.  The kitchen is well provisioned and fully functional.  You are welcome to cook here.  There is one shared bathroom.  There is a cat that lives here, her name is Ginger, and she is incredibly friendly. The neighborhood is just awesome.  Vanderbilt Avenue, with all its restaurants and bars, is a block away. The Museum, Botanical Gardens, and Library are all close. And the park, of course.  Lots of subway access, with the 2/3 nearby, as well as the B and the Q.  I am an adjunct NYU professor, artist and activist. I frequently work from home, when not on campus, but am generally quite busy with lots of projects.

name: Private Room w/ Furnished Balcony
space: The room is perfect for anyone looking to for a place to rest while exploring NYC.   Fresh linens and towels will be provided to you during your stay as well as free Wifi. There is kitchen equipped w/ the basic essentials: stove, microwave, refrigerator, and pots & pans that you may use at any time if you prefer to cook your own meals instead of dining out.      The neighborhood is surrounded by great people, bars and restaurants. The apartment building is conveniently located next door to a Duane Reade and is also located right across the street from the G train subway station.  It is very easy to catch a yellow cab, and is approximately 15 mins from the city and cabs are typically $12-$15 from here all the way to the Meat Packing District (yellow & green cab, or lyft or Uber app).  The building is a private condo residence with an elevator.  The apartment has central air and heat.  The apartment also has its own washer and dryer so you would not need to go elsewhere for your laundry

name: Artsy Fashion Pad in the Heart of Williamsburg
space: Come stay in a bright, safe and well decorated flat in the heart of Williamsburg Brooklyn. This location can not be beat!  It is literally 1 block away from the Bedford exit off of the L train and only ONE stop away from Manhattan! The apartment is a stones throw to many of the restaurants, parks coffee shops, vinatge boutiques, flea markets and bars that Williamsburg has to offer. And a few blocks down at the end of the street you can touch the East River waters with your feet and soak up a beautiful view of Manhattan.  If you want the Brooklyn experience...here it is!  The apartment has a sunny large living room with high ceilings, a cozy and quiet bedroom with a comfortable full size bed, a bright and spacious kitchen fully stocked with cooking utensils and bathroom with a big pink bathtub!  Once you see the apartment you will fall in love!

name: Large Private room in UWS apartment
space: Private Bedroom with a queen-size bed in a one-bedroom  apartment on Upper West Side.  The apartment is in the ELEVATOR building. The apartment will be shared with the host, who will be staying in the living room.  *The room is for ONE PERSON only*  *PLEASE CONTACT ME before BOOKING. Introduce yourself and tell me a bit about you and the purpose of your visit  You will get: - A Room with a queen size bed - A nightstand with Drawer Space available for your use - A Garment Rack  to hang Clothing, Hangers  - A Shared Bathroom  - Fresh Linens - Towels - WiFi - Laundry in the Building - Use of Kitchen ( appliances include Blender, Juicer,    Toaster, MICROWAVE, Coffee-maker, Electric Tea pot) -Hair-dryer, Iron   -You can feel free to use the living room ( including the TV and dining room table)  when the host is not there.  The apartment is conveniently located near train 1.  Lots of restaurants and shops on Broadway  There is a one-time Laundry and cleaning fee of $20

name: Sunny & Stylish Brooklyn Flat
space: This comfortable, sun-filled apartment in the heart of historic Bedford-Stuyvesant is perfect for your next trip or an extended stay. The 2 bedroom garden apartment is recently remodeled with brand new windows, masonry, fully functioning kitchen and bathroom.  Exposed brick, a decorative fireplace and hardwood floors lend ambiance and history. Public transportation is a breeze with A, C, J, M and Z subway lines within walking distance and the B46 and B26 express bus lines right at the corner (take the bus to the train for free transfer and no need to walk). Take the A train from JFK or a quick 20 minute cab ride. The apartment is 25 minutes to Lower Manhattan. New cafes and shops are opening all the time in Bed-Stuy. name: Sunny Artist Live/Work Apartment
space: My apartment is in an old pre-war building 1 short block from Central Park West. It features 1 bedroom, a living room, kitchen and bathroom for your use. The subway near Central Park West is a short 3-minute walk. Do you want a sterile hotel-like atmosphere?  Then this is not the place for you.  This space is comfortable, eclectic, rustic, arty.  Your host uses one room as his studio (that room is not open to guests), but be assured that he will not be working there during your stay.  And, there will be no artist paint smells. The walls of the apartment feature your hostÛªs work. There is a full- size bed in the bedroom and a foldout single bed in the living room, which could accommodate 1 other person. name: 2 Bdrm Penthouse + Huge Rooftop Decks
space: Ready to live on the trendiest block of NYC? This is a penthouse unit in one of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhood.  Really...celebrities live in the building. 2 bedroom + 2 bathroom penthouse apartment on the Williamsburg waterfront. Completely quiet apartment (it's on the top floor), fully furnished with new furniture plus two large rooftop terraces. 24 hour doorman and concierge, lobby lounge, huge riverfront fitness center, and coffee shop in building. Check out the (EMAIL HIDDEN) Great neighborhood with plenty of restaurants, shopping, coffee shops and bars.  A few blocks from the L train and right on the waterfront.

name: Pretty One Bed in Brooklyn Heights
space: Stay in Beautiful Brooklyn Heights. Comfortable, modern, one bedroom apartment, recessed lighting, nicely renovated bathroom and kitchen, wi-fi (bring your own laptop), great lighting. Bedroom has full, new bed with comfort top. Kitchen has brand new tiling, cook in or out out, small dishwasher. Third floor walk-up. Neighborhood is gorgeous, one block from Montague Street for shopping and restaurants. Steps to beautiful, new kid-friendly Brooklyn Bridge Park, the Brooklyn Bridge and the Brooklyn Promenade. Close to all transportation (2/3/45/N/A/C, Borough Hall). Essentially, the best of both worlds - neighborhood-y, quiet and serene Brooklyn Brownstone but one stop to lower Manhattan.

All major highways, fast food, banks, post office and 24 hrs super market. Wifi and Mac Mini with wireless mouse and keyboard.  Access to Netflix and small library of DVDs at your disposal.  Your welcome to use the backyard as well.   Just 30 minutes to Manhattan via public transportation or 15 minutes via cab ride $30. Walking distance to Little India, plenty of Restaurants, parks and much more.  Please have a updated profile. Doing so would help speed up the process. Chain smokers are NOT welcome.

name: Prime East Village location w/backyard garden!
space: This apartment is very unique in that you have three different levels and a walkout backyard area.  There are also washer and dryer units steps away on the same floor.  Hands down the best location to be in. Everyone will tell you they are "near everything" but my neighborhood truly is. In just two square block (yes- two) you have dozens of outstanding restaurants, a dry cleaners, 3 banks, bars and lounges, access to several main subway lines, and the list goes on and on. Grab a coffee next door from City of Saints, enjoy the cheapest Michelin Star rated Dim Sum (Tim Ho Wan) right on the corner, the world's best cocktails at Angel's Share, or slurp up the famous Ramen at Ippudo, all within a 30 second walk!

name: Bushwick Duplex 2
space: One bedroom is available in my home. This is a  fairly new building in Bushwick, located near the J train and several buses. It is available for short and long term rentals.
