I am an entertainment professional always on the go . First and foremost I would like someone who is open-minded, educated and well traveled- basically who is not rigid in life but always learning and changing. I  would rather not have someone who "tolerates" the different people of the area, but embraces the judgement free home I have.  The rundown:  Central Air Washer/dryer in the apartment Dishwasher in the apt. A giant bathtub if you ever want to swim in it (think Jacuzzi without jets). The 6 train is 3 minutes away, the L 6 minutes and also 6 minutes for the NR train lines. Union Square is walking distance, Chelsea is only a 6 dollar cab ride away. The location is hard to beat! The fully equipped kitchen is shared between all 3 roommates, and like the bathroom, it is kept clean and tidy.  My other roommate, Heather, is a busy professional violinist and graduate student and is out of the apt most of the time.  Shelf space would be made available for both the kitchen (pantry, fridge) and bathroom (shower, medicine cabinet). name: Beautiful, private, uptown studio
space: Rent my beautiful, private loft apartment for a week, or by night.  The apartment has enormously high ceilings, a lofted sleeping area (sleeps 2), an exposed brick wall, a full kitchen and full bath, a sofa (sleeps 1), a dining table and work desk. The kitchen is fully equipped, towels and linens are available for your use. The studio has three huge south-facing windows, great light -- and good drapes. The studio is located in a brownstone, on a quiet, neighborly block in Hamilton Heights. Columbia U. and City College are walkable. Great access to the 1, A, B, C, and D subways, all about at 3 minute walk from the apartment. Grocery stores, restaurants and bars all within a block from the house.

name: New York City / West Village Apt
space: One bedroom Apt - clean and simple.  The apt is located on a historical street known for its cozy ambience mixed with chic restaurants and shops.  The building is 100 yrs old and still has many of the same fixtures and finishings.   Bedroom is roomy with beautiful view and daylight, furnished with work table, lamp, office chair and ceiling fan. Living room has couch (fold-out to single bed), small dining table and a projector iTV with internet connection.  Kitchen is basic with a bar and two stools.   Bathroom is small but clean with good plumbing.   Guests have access to the entire apt except designated personal closet spaces.

name: Sunny Studio in the West Village
space: This is a lovely studio in a safe, clean and homey building in the heart of the west village.  5 minutes walking distance to several subway stops, 2 blocks from the Hudson River and just a short walk to the night clubs of meatpacking district and the jazz bars and restaurants of the village. There is great sunlight from 3 large windows and all the basic amenities including wifi, kitchen with stove, microwave and toaster, bathroom with full bathtub. Although this is a studio, there is a smal pull out couch so it is possible to accomodate either a couple or two people sleeping separately.

name: Large and sunny one BR (600 sq.ft)
space: Very large and very sunny one bedroom, composed of a living room, a dining room, a bedroom, an office and a separate kitchen. The kitchen is fully equipped (oven, microwaves, blender, coffee machine, cooking utensils etc.). I have an A/C and the internet (wireless).  Important: I also have a cat named Gigi. She is very friendly. She stays in my apartment at all times.    It is extremely sunny (7 windows, orientation South, South East, East, North) and quiet (the neighbor is the theological seminary...). Great open views in the living room and the office - very rare in NYC.  There is a laundry in the basement, and a bike storage place.

name: Close to Subway Prime Williamsburg
space: I am renting this cozy private bedroom in my spacious Williamsburg apartment. Because the apartment is a railroad style, the room has a private entrance from the hallway and has a feel of a private studio.  It is equipped with a full bed and plenty of closet/storage space and your own TV. You get to share the roomy common space (Kitchen, Living Room, Dining Room, Bathroom) with me and two sweet cats, Chaucer and Lola.  The cats are very loving and will greet you in common spaces but will never be invited into your room.  Located 1/2 block away from the Lorimer Stop on the L train, 1 block away from the G train (Metropolitan stop) and 1 stop away from Bedford Avenue - 10 minute total commute to Union Square/Manhattan. The neighborhood is super safe, and a lot of fun! space: The bedroom fits three people very comfortably. You would share a bathroom with the other Airbnb guests in the other bedroom. Each bedroom has their own lock on the door for secure privacy. I must advise that there are a set (4 steps) of stairs that are a bit steep. The kitchen is only for light breakfast, not for cooking. The apt is a 5 minutes walk to the N/Q 30th Avenue Subway stop and 15  minutes to Central Park and  20 minutes to Times Square. JFK is a 30 minute / $45 Taxi ride and you can take train to JFK .

name: 5 Bdrm Historic Brownstone Triplex
space: Welome to lovely Brownstone Brooklyn!  Nestled in the charming Cobble Hill neighborhood of downtown Brooklyn, our home is perfect for a family looking for a long stay.  We are two blocks from the F train, 3 short stops on the train to Manhattan.  We are also just one block from Court St and Smith St. - Brooklyn's restaurant row.   You can walk to all amenities, including the newly built Brooklyn Bridge Park along the waterfront for play grounds, harbor ferries, sports fields, and bike paths.   Turn off Court St., a bustling commercial street with restaurants and shops, and you are instantly immersed in Brooklyn brownstone charm.  As you enter the historic district, you leave the hustle and bustle behind and walk down our quiet, tree-lined street.  You will arrive at our brownstone and some up the stoop (where you may want to hang out with a beer in the evening).  Our apartment is a triplex, the top three floors of a brownstone.  It is decorated in interesting art and contemporary furni

name: Big Apple Cosy Green Studio
space: Spacious (approximately 400 Sq feet) studio on the 4th floor walk-up conveniently located in the heart of the city, just 5 min walk from Moma, 10 min to Times Square, Theatre District or Central Park and subway station (E, M and 6) is only 2 blocks away! Apartment has a separate kitchen, bathroom with a shower and a bath, a queen size bed as well as a twin size sleeper (accommodates 2-3 people), TV with basic cable, Wifi, AC. The windows are facing backyard so good night sleep is guaranteed! I provide clean towels as well as sheets for the staying guests.  It's perfect for people who come to do sight-seeing and experience the real life in The Big Apple as it's conveniently located (just walking distance away) from the most popular tourist spots but still away from the tourist rush. Please reach out for availability before booking. Thanks!

name: Spacious 3br Apartment in Brooklyn

It is very clean and spacious, with simple and tasteful decor (danish modern meets modern rustic :), 3 bedrooms (2 with queen size beds and 1 with a twin bed, our daughter's room), 2 full bathrooms, a back yard with chickens (which you may enjoy but do not have to take care of :). The kitchen of course has everything you might need as we love to cook, and our dining area has ample room to have some friends or family over. Our 3br apartment is located in the heart of Prospect Heights, a family oriented neighborhood boasting convenience on every level. Restaurants, Prospect Park, The Brooklyn Library, the Botanical Gardens are all right here within 5 blocks, plus a deli right on the corner. And if you're planning trips into Manhattan, we have easy access to the 2/3, Q/B and C trains, you'll be there in 20 minutes. name: Manhattan (West Harlem) Apartment
space: I have a beautifully furnished one bedroom apartment in West Harlem near 125th Street. The apartment includes a private bedroom, living room, full kitchen, bathroom, and lots of windows. Comfortably hosts 4 people. The living room includes a queen size futon couch (new mattress, opens as a bed), coffee table, carpet, tv, free wi-fi, large closet, and ottoman. The private bedroom includes a queen size bed, window, closet, chair, and hardwood floor. The apartment has great heat, air conditioner, and 5 windows for ventilation. name: BIG & SUNNY, 1 STOP FROM MANHATTAN

You have all the amenities of home and something really rare in NY: SPACE. We want you to feel welcome and at home in our crazy metropolis with a mix of old world flair (this buidling was build 1897) with new world amenities. This apartment has parquet floors, high ceilings, central air and a washer/dryer in one. You can cook, enjoy cable tv, internet and dock in your iPod. The apartment is owned by artist Charlotta Janssen and the ground floor restaurant welcomes you with a North American Gastropub themed menu (open 7 days a week), where you can enjoy "green devils" as well as a garbanzo or bison burger ... For first time visitors we have information on what to do. Venues within walking distance:  The Brooklyn Academy of Music showing contemporary art house films

Extra guests (over two people) are charged at $15.00 per person per night. The building is quiet and well-maintained. The apartment is on the ground floor, so no steps and also sits in the back of the building so extra quiet for peaceful sleeps. There are (paid) laundry facilities in the basement of the building. The apartment is conveniently located steps from the subway (6 train) - a two minute walk.  The place is also very close to Central Park and museums (Guggenheim and Met and Museum of the City of

If you can agree to this, I would offer the apartment for this price. If taking care of the cats is an issue, my neighbors would do it, but I would raise the price by 20 dollars. If you have any questions, contact me! 1st bedroom is around 150 square feet. There is a queen sized bed, with a very comfortable mattress, a table, closet space, ceiling fan and AC in summer. The room is very cozy and extremely bright with its two big windows. In winter the heating can sometimes be a bit noisy as it is often the case in "old" buildings in New York. name: Modern, Carroll Garden Townhouse
space: Beautifully renovated, specious townhouse. The house has 2 floors, 2 bedrooms and 1.5 baths and all modern amenities (WiFi, Central Air Condition, etc). Large glass doors open out to a deck with a table and chairs, and lead to a small back yard. The master bedroom has a king size bed, the second bedroom is the kids room and has 2 single beds. There is one full bath upstairs and a half bath downstairs.  The house is located on a tree lined street in one of Brooklyn's best neighborhoods, Carroll Gardens. Our neighborhood is full of young families, great cafes, restaurants, shops, parks, etc. It is surrounded by several other quaint and historic neighborhoods such as Cobble Hill, Boerum Hill, Brooklyn Heights (by the foot of the Brooklyn Bridge).  10 min subway ride to downtown Manhattan.

name: Astoria awesome balcony apartment
space: Apartment is on the first floor (not street level), with a nice one bedroom, Queen size memory mattress (NOT A SPRING MATTRESS. THIS IS A  INCH TEMPER FOAM MATTRESS) to support a healthy back and an extra full size couch. A great balcony with an awesome look over the main street calming view. ( where i love to spend my mornings with my coffee. "The apartment building has laundry in the ground floor (most places in Astoria don't have that, you have to take your clothes to a laundry mat. I'm not a fan!) Full kitchen, with everything you might think of for cooking. FRENCH PRESS COFFEE I also have a very nice, authentic Hookah for your smoking pleasure.

name: Spacious and EASY access to all!
space: The corner unit on the 5th floor of a 6 floor elevator building, I've never had an apartment with more light and space. I have views of 3 different directions and can literally see the sunrise from my bed every morning! If you're an artist, even better! As a professional artist myself, I've adapted the space to serve all my creative needs. My guest room also serves as a studio/work space. The futon in the room folds down into a very comfortable bed if used as a bedroom, but equipped with a brand new custom-fabricated work table made from all reclaimed wood and parts from right here in NY. The room has plenty of space for painting or any other creative activity! If you're a photographer, the desk and monitor is perfect for adjusting/sorting any photos taken from your trip. However, when entertaining guest for dinner parties the table and space serves as a great dining area. Easily plug your laptop (or iPhone) into the NEC monitor or into my HD projector and Yamaha/Klipsch sound system.

name: Gorgeous 2 Fl Apt in1887 Brownstone
space: Spacious Victorian Brownstone on tree lined street in the heart of historic Park Slope, Brooklyn. Our home is situated in North Park Slope which is a charming, super safe area with an abundance of bars and top rated restaurants. You will be 5 minute walk from Prospect Park, Brooklyn Museum, Prospect Park Zoo, and Brooklyn Botanical Gardens and just 10 minutes away from BAM and the newly opened Barclays Center. Several subway lines are conveniently located. Walk to the 2/3 train or Q/B trains in 5 minutes. The Q will take you in Union Square in Manhattan in 20 minutes. The B can get you to West 4th St in the Village in the same amount of time. The 2/3 will take you to the Financial District or Tribeca in 15 minutes. The R, just one block away, takes you into the heart of SoHo. name: Clean and Cute Shared Room in Very Safe Area

This is how: https://www.airbnb.com/verify  Û¢ You must also have a photograph of yourself. We are sure your pets are amazing and that you take awesome sunset photos, but we want to see a nice, clean, well-lit, and sharp portrait of whomever might be staying in the apartment. What drives you in life? What kind of traveler(s) are you? What brings you to New York City? name: Large 2 BDRM @ McCarren Park!!
space: Large 2 bedroom/2 bathroom condo located across the street from Williamsburg's McCarren Park. Walking distance to Bedford Avenue, Brooklyn Waterfront and Greenpoint. Quiet part of neighborhood with easy parking. Central to many of Brooklyn's best bars, restaurants and music venues.  G and L trains are about a 10 min walk. Depending on where you're heading in Manhattan, it's about a 30-40 minute commute. Cabs and car service will run about $20, depending on what time of day.  The neighborhood is awesome. Personal favorites are The Blue Stove for coffee, Urban Rustic for great sandwiches, Five Leaves for a mellow sit down meal, Spritzenhaus bier garten for a good beer and a big pretzel, and Brooklyn Bowl for great music and a fun time.  Feel free to give me a shout with any questions or concerns about the apartment or neighborhood. I'll do my best to help you out any way I can.  Cheers!  Pete

name: Hip charming Williamsburg apartment
space: I love my apartment and my neighborhood and so will you if you are looking for a true Brooklyn experience.  We recently got a very sweet cat. We think this makes the apartment even better but we have discounted the price dramatically over Christmas because we ask that you feed her once a day.   This is a real one bedroom. As in my friends from New York come over for the firs time and say, "This is huge!" and my friends from other states come over and say, "I think I could almost do this." High ceilings, hard wood floors, bedroom you could actually do yoga in. There is a totally functional kitchen with counter space should you decide to hit up the nearby Brooklyn Meat Hook and roast yourself a overpriced, extremely tasty, locally slaughtered pork loin. (Cheaper, equally good option: the fresh fish market on the corner.) The apartment is on the second floor, which makes carrying up your purchases from the nearby wine and vintage stores easy. The building itself is not fancy. The hallway

Only the persons (maximum 2 people) listed on the reservation are allowed.  This is a small, quiet building and the doormen will uphold this restriction. name: Beautiful large 1 BR apartment !
space: This is about an 800 Sq. Foot Gem just on the edge of the Upper West Side and Morningside Heights. five minutes for Columbia University. The Apartment is bright, homey, comfortable, safe, and perfect for two couples traveling together or a small family vacation!! Great neighborhood and place for kids as well, for the couple who want privacy from their kids. The area is super convenient, lots of great restaurants, conveniently 1 block from the greatest subway line in NYC for easy access to downtown! It's situated at the cross of the Prospect Heights and Crown Heights, which means that you get the best of West Indies vibes along with the burgeoning hipster vibe of local coffee shops, bars and restaurants.   There are two main rooms, one of them is the bedroom which gets a lot of light in the morning.  The other room has the kitchen, a small dining room table to eat and my desk/workspace.  It's a super lovely place - cozy and pretty quiet.  The bathroom has a full tub, great water pressure and everything else you'd need.   It's two blocks away from the 2-3-4-5 and Shuttle trains, in a safe, quiet and small building full of wonderful people! It is also 4 blocks away from America's best Bloomingdale's, Dylan's Candy Store, and the famous Serendipity.  It is a 20 minute walk to the 65th Street Central Park entrance.  It is 6-9 blocks away from Memorial Sloan Hospital, Cornell Presbyterian Hospital, and the Hospital for Special Surgery.

space: The attic is light-filled with skylights and vistas of rooftops. It is a totally private and quiet space at the top of the house with a private bathroom and cooking space, a dining area in addition to the two main bedrooms, one with a queen size bed and the other with a twin bed as well as a double. It easily accommodates 3-4 people. The two bedrooms are connected by a spacious walk-in closet but each bedroom has it's own separate door and privacy.

name: My Other Little Guestroom
space: One of two cozy little guest rooms for two. This room is 10x12 and located on the second floor of a two family home. My bedroom is above yours on the third floor. It has a pillow top Serta Perfect Sleeper that sleeps two normal sized people. There is a small TV with an Apple TV in it. The bathroom, kitchen and living room are shared spaces.  Come visit the biggest China town in all New York!! 10 min walk from the 7 train and downtown Flushing, or, just catch the bus on the corner. Excellent Dim Sum, Hot Pot, Korean BBQ, and Indian food. I can help you find your way around NY. Come stay with me and my family. :) No pets, no children, no guests, no drugs and no smoking inside the room please. We prefer guests who keep their voices down after 8 pm. I have two cats so not a good match for those of you with bad allergies. I will supply you with bath towels, hair towels, wash rags, body wash, shampoo, conditioner, hairdryer, slippers, and an umbrella. you bring the rest. :) Me? I'm just a ha

name: Studio in Best Possible Location!
space: I am in love with this studio apartment, and you will likely fall for it as well.  It is perfectly sized for 2 people, with a queen sized bed, cozy leather club chair, and comfortable bar stools (where I did most of my eating, reading, and computer work).  The apartment is located in the center of Manhattan, but faces a cute courtyard so is extraordinarily quiet.  In the summer, I leave the curtains open because there is a magnificent tree that blocks neighbors' view into the apartment and creates a pretty filtered green light in the space.

name: HELLO HARLEM
space: ****This is a walk up in a 4-story historic brownstone-Please read the entire listing.**** You are truly taken care of during the whole reservation, from our communications before you book, to a smooth check in process, to a truly comfortable and convenient stay! The apartment has wonderful natural light with skylights in every room and both east and west facing views -- the sun rises in the kitchen and sets in the bedrooms. It is a very quiet apartment far above the street noise with solid walls and floors and no neighbors above or beside you.  The apartment is only a few blocks away from the 2 & 3 subway lines and a close walk to the 4,5, and 6 subway lines. The bus stops across the street! Very convenient loca

name: Dear Potential Airbnb Guests.

name: Great converted LOFT, STUDIO APT.
space: Sunny studio apartment with 11 foot ceilings in a quiet and safe building in Williamsburg, Brooklyn (near Grand St and Havemeyer St). There is a small balcony with room for two. The apartment is bright, comfortable and clean. The loft is spare and features: Wireless internet. Full Kitchen.   Gas Stove.  Microwave.  Dishwasher. Washer/ Dryer. Excellent selection of nightlife, cuisine and Manhattan views a short walk away. Directly in between the L, J, M and G trains. This is a convenient and easy place to stay in NYC. This is my home, please treat it with courtesy.

name: Huge Sunny Loft w Patio + Charm
space: The loft is a huge open-concept space with a private outdoor patio, central AC and great heat that you can control in winter. I have a well equipped modern kitchen with a dishwasher, gas stove/oven, microwave. Private outdoor patio with propane BBQ, hammock, vegetable + herb garden. Great office/studio space if you are in town to work. Coin operated laundry in the basement. The apartment has high ceilings and is on the main floor (no stairs). Located in a quiet 9-unit building. name: Beautiful duplex in a brownstone
space: Enjoy your stay in New York City from your duplex penthouse in Harlem.  It is a 2 bedroom, 2,5 bathrooms apartment,  1700 sq feet (170 m2). The  bedrooms are situated on the bottom floor (2nd floor of the brownstone). They each have their private bathroom. The first one has a king sized bed with orthopedic mattress. It has 3 windows with southern exposure, overlooking a quiet tree lined street. There is a large closet, a chest with drawers and a desk. There is also an armchair that can be opened and become a comfortable extra twin bed. The other bedroom is a very spacious "kids' bedroom" it has two loft twin beds (adapted to children 4yr old and older), and a full size bed where parents can comfortably sleep (it has a high quality orthopaedic mattress) . A private bathroom with shower is attached.  The upper floor is a large open space, with huge floor to bottom windows, and a terrace. It has a great amount of light. name: Huge two rooms in apartment
space: This is a 1,400 square feet apartment in a neighborhood called Bedford Stuyvesant. The apartment is exceptionally big and has two beautiful and spacious bedrooms that are finely decorated. The room and living room are not shared with room mate and you have your own entrance. You will share the apartment with one person only, who has her own room. It is on the first floor and it has bay windows, high ceilings, quiet tree-lined street, wooden floors, two entrances, eat-in kitchen, bicycle room, steamer for clothing (no need to iron), bathtub.  There are many restaurants, cafes and bars around the corner ((website hidden) Saraghina); express subway line (A train stop at Utica Avenue) very close.  This is a residential neighborhood, so it is quiet. My apartment offers you the space and quiet you may need after spending your day in the city (Manhattan), yet at the same time, you are in Brooklyn and very close to all other trendy neighborhoods like Williamsburgh (a 10 minute taxi ride).

name: Beautiful eco triplex w/green roof. Free yoga/spa.
space: Even though it is located in one of the most energized cities in the world, this New York brownstone is natural haven. It has three gorgeous and light filled floors looking onto ecologically landscaped gardens and water features. The roof deck boasts 360 views of the city and is shaded by a pergola and surrounded by a green roof. In the front you access the house via a bridge over a natural water feature with native fish and turtles. In the back there is a glass deck overlooking a large ecologically landscaped garden with a natural swimming pool - bring your bathing suit! Inside the house are all reclaimed antique wood floors, clay walls, and large bright sunny rooms. The design is spacious and modern using natural high quality finishes. In the winter it is kept cozy with radiant floors and in the summer it stais cool with intelligent solar design. There are a luxurious 1,800 square feet in total, which is massive by NY standards! This beautiful home has massive skylights, letting in tremendous amounts of light. It also has two large windows. Designer bedding covers the new full-size pillowtop bed. The kitchen was renovated with stainless steel appliances and a dishwasher recently. A Nesspresso machine is available. There is also a Bose stereo system where you can plug in your phone. The white-marbled bathroom also comes with its own large skylight, and clean towels will be provided. Plenty of ambient lighting is installed too, for those who appreciate a more sophisticated atmosphere at night. There is a desk and a table for working and eating. space: Our loft is located in an old big building that used to be a fabric factory. The place has super tall ceilings, a HUGE living room (featuring a swing and hammock completely functional), one bathroom, an open fully equipped kitchen and 4 rooms in total.  I live here with my husband Brian and our roommates Nicole and Florian. All in our late 20s, -30s, working a lot. name: Sunny Private BR Crown Hts Brooklyn
space: This is private bedroom in a shared apartment (I live in the apartment as well).   The bedroom is sunny and spacious--enough room for a yoga enthusiast!  Lots of windows facing a private school yard.   The apartment is in central Brooklyn (Crown Heights neighborhood) in a family-oriented, residential neighborhood with easily accessible amenities:  groceries, juice joint, take-out, bus & trains, dry cleaning, health food, yoga studio, parking, coffee, and bars!  Parking is generally accessible in the neighborhood (though you should always be vigilant with parking regs). There is a coin laundry room in the building, as well as an elevator.   Access the A/C or 2/3 Trains.  Close to Brooklyn Museum and Brooklyn Children's Museum.   I'm an avid baker and will provide muffins and cookies for your delight!  Teas always available.

name: Fabulous Brooklyn Apartment Share
space: Enjoy New York City while staying in a gorgeous, newly renovated, spacious apartment with a friendly, relaxed young professional couple and our adorable foster kitten. We will provide fresh linens, towels, and toiletries.  As our guest you will have full access to our fully equipped kitchen with all new appliances, including a dishwasher and Keurig coffee maker. You will also have limited access to a washer/dryer on site for additional cost.  During your stay feel free to make yourself at home in our lovely dining room with exposed brick or our comfortable living room with a large flatscreen TV and cable/Netflix. name: Stay like a real New Yorker!
space: *** PLEASE read carefully*** -Before contacting me, PLEASE make sure you have a profile set up. At the very minimum have a few verification's. Hopefully you have written something about yourself and have a picture. - Unfortunately we do not offer discounts on the room pricing. - ALL bookings will be through Airbnb, please do not ask to pay off the record. It is a true one bedroom, so you can expect plenty of privacy when you are staying here. My space is also professionally managed by a company called ShareJockey, this means a great experience all around.

name: Charming small Brooklyn Gem
space: Hello Travelers! Please try and read everything below if possible to determine if this this a good fit for you. We're looking for lovely people to stay in our charming apartment for long weekends or the occasional week or two! No offense to our fellow New Yorkers, but we aren't renting out to people that are between apartments and need a place in the mean time, we'd just like to keep it to foreign out-of-town lightly-packed travelers, the apartment is just not big enough to accommodate another roommate with their belongings.   ***April 2016 Update*** We just adopted a very sweet kitten. If you are allergic to cats, unfortunately we can not accommodate you :( You will undoubtedly have a true Brooklyn experience in this apartment! This part of Bedstuy is a very vibrant up and coming neighborhood but not too trendy, and there are great little pockets of places to visit!
